atk-s0508a2:6_2: Ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gimhasamaye sūriyātapasantattāya
atk-s0508a2:6_3: bhūmiyā gacchantaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso chattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:6_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sakyarājakule nibbattitvā nāgasamāloti
atk-s0508a2:6_5: laddhanāmo vayappatto ñātisamāgame paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kiñci kālaṃ bhagavato upaṭṭhāko ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:6_6: So ekadivasaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ aññataraṃ naccakiṃ mahāpathe tūriyesu vajjantesu naccantiṃ disvā,
atk-s0508a2:6_8: aho aniccā saṅkhārā”ti khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:10_0: Tattha disvāna sambuddhaṃ, vitti me upapajjatha.
atk-s0508a2:21_0: “Ayaṃ me pacchimā jāti, carimo vattate bhavo;
atk-s0508a2:29_0: Majjhe mahāpathe nārī, tūriye naccati naṭṭakī.
atk-s0508a2:38_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:39_0: Catūhi gāthāhi attano paṭipattikittanamukhena aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:40_5: tūriye naccati naṭṭakīti yathāvuttaṭṭhāne ekā nārī naṭṭakī nāṭakitthī nagaravīthiyā majjhe pañcaṅgike tūriye vajjante naccati,
atk-s0508a2:41_2: Gacchanto naṃ udikkhisanti nagaravīthiyaṃ gacchanto parissayapariharaṇatthaṃ vīthiṃ olokento taṃ naṭṭakiṃ olokesiṃ. Kiṃ viya?
atk-s0508a2:41_3: Maccupāsaṃva oḍḍitanti yathā maccussa maccurājassa pāsabhūto rūpādiko oḍḍito loke anuvicaritvā ṭhito ekaṃsena sattānaṃ anatthāvaho,
atk-s0508a2:41_4: evaṃ sāpi appaṭisaṅkhāne ṭhitānaṃ andhaputhujjanānaṃ ekaṃsato anatthāvahāti maccupāsasadisī vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:42_2: Manasīkāro yoniso udapajjathāti “ayaṃ aṭṭhisaṅghāto nhārusambandho maṃsena anupalitto chaviyā paṭicchanno
atk-s0508a2:42_5: Ādīnavo pāturahūti evaṃ kāyassa sabhāvūpadhāraṇamukhena tassa ca taṃnissitānañca cittacetasikānaṃ udayabbayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:42_6: sarasapabhaṅgutañca manasi karoto tesu ca yakkharakkhasādīsu viya bhayato upaṭṭhahantesu tattha me anekākāraādīnavo
atk-s0508a2:42_9: Nibbidā samatiṭṭhathāti nibbindanaṃ ādīnavānupassanānubhāvasiddhaṃ nibbidāñāṇaṃ mama hadaye saṇṭhāsi,
atk-s0508a2:42_10: muhuttampi tesaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ gahaṇe cittaṃ nāhosi,
atk-s0508a2:42_11: aññadatthu muñcitukāmatādivasena tattha udāsīnameva jātanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:43_1: Cittaṃ vimucci meti lokuttarabhāvanāya vattamānāya maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbakilesehi mama cittaṃ vimuttaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:46_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute tassa dhātuyo pupphehi pūjesi.
atk-s0508a2:46_3: So tena puññakammena nimmānaratīsu nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:46_4: sakyarājakule nibbattitvā bhagūti laddhanāmo vayappatto anuruddhakimilehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a2:46_5: bālakaloṇakagāme vasanto ekadivasaṃ thinamiddhābhibhavaṃ vinodetuṃ vihārato nikkhamma caṅkamaṃ abhiruhanto
atk-s0508a2:46_6: papatitvā tadeva aṅkusaṃ katvā thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:52_0: Saṃsarāmi manusse ce, rājā homi mahāyaso.
atk-s0508a2:60_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā phalasukhena nibbānasukhena ca vītināmento satthārā ekavihāraṃ anumodituṃ upagatena –
atk-s0508a2:60_2: appamatto viharasī”ti puṭṭho attano appamādavihāraṃ nivedento –
atk-s0508a2:72_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:74_0: Tattha middhena pakatoti kāyālasiyasaṅkhātena asattivighātasabhāvena middhena abhibhūto.
atk-s0508a2:74_3: Tattheva papatiṃ chamāti tattheva caṅkamasopāne niddābhibhūtatāya bhūmiyaṃ nipatiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:74_4: Gattāni parimajjitvāti bhūmiyaṃ patanena paṃsukitāni attano sarīrāvayavāni anumajjitvā.
atk-s0508a2:74_5: Punapāruyha caṅkamanti “patito dānāha”nti saṅkocaṃ anāpajjitvā punapi caṅkamaṭṭhānaṃ āruhitvā.
atk-s0508a2:74_6: Ajjhattaṃ susamāhitoti gocarajjhatte kammaṭṭhāne nīvaraṇavikkhambhanena suṭṭhu samāhito ekaggacitto hutvā caṅkaminti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:77_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto kakusandhassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a2:77_3: kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ divāvihārāya gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a2:77_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassape bhagavati parinibbute patiṭṭhite suvaṇṇacetiye
atk-s0508a2:77_6: chahi kulaputtehi saddhiṃ attasattamo sāsane pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharanto visesaṃ
atk-s0508a2:77_9: jīvite sāpekkhena ca na sakkā lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigantuṃ,
atk-s0508a2:77_11: mayaṃ nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā pabbataṃ abhiruyha kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhā samaṇadhammaṃ karomā”ti.
atk-s0508a2:78_0: Atha nesaṃ mahāthero upanissayasampannattā tadaheva chaḷabhiñño hutvā uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṃ upanesi. Itare – “tumhe, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:78_3: tumhe attanā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāramanuyuñjathā”ti vatvā piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:79_0: Tato nesaṃ eko dvīhatīhaccayena abhiññāparivāraṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikatvā tatheva vatvā tehi paṭikkhitto agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:79_3: Itare puthujjanakālaṅkiriyameva katvā chasu kāmasaggesu anulomapaṭilomato dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0508a2:79_4: amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle devalokā cavitvā eko mallarājakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0508a2:79_7: eko rājagahe ekissā kuladārikāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a2:79_8: Itaro aññatarissā paribbājikāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0508a2:79_11: “amhākaṃ dhītā samayantaraṃ jānātū”ti ekassa paribbājakassa niyyādayiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:79_15: Sā aññattha gacchantī antarāmagge sabhāyaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0508a2:79_17: So vaḍḍhitvā paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā nānāsatthāni uggahetvā mahāvādī hutvā vādappasuto vicaranto
atk-s0508a2:79_18: attanā sadisaṃ adisvā nagaradvāre assamaṃ kāretvā khattiyakumārādayo sippaṃ sikkhāpento viharanto attano
atk-s0508a2:79_19: mātuyā itthibhāvaṃ jigucchitvā jhānaṃ uppādetvā brahmaloke uppannāya abhisaṅkharitvā dinne vīsatipañhe
atk-s0508a2:79_21: Te cassa tesaṃ pañhānaṃ atthaṃ byākātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:79_22: Sabhiyasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ pana “suddhāvāsabrahmā te pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā adāsī”ti āgataṃ.
atk-s0508a2:80_0: Yadā pana bhagavā pavattavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahaṃ āgantvā veḷuvane vihāsi,
atk-s0508a2:80_1: tadā sabhiyo tattha gantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā te pañhe pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:80_2: Satthā tassa te pañhe byākāsīti sabbaṃ sabhiyasutte āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:80_3: Sabhiyo pana bhagavatā tesu pañhesu byākatesu paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:86_0: Arahā pana hutvā devadatte saṅghabhedāya parakkamante devadattapakkhikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ dento –
atk-s0508a2:89_0: Ye ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā.
atk-s0508a2:92_0: Vijānanti ca ye dhammaṃ, āturesu anāturā.
atk-s0508a2:94_0: “Yaṃ kiñci sithilaṃ kammaṃ, saṃkiliṭṭhañca yaṃ vataṃ;
atk-s0508a2:95_0: Saṅkassaraṃ brahmacariyaṃ, na taṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:98_0: Ārakā hoti saddhammā, nabhaṃ puthaviyā yathā”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:100_0: Tattha pareti paṇḍite ṭhapetvā tato aññe –
atk-s0508a2:100_2: Te tattha vivādaṃ karontā “mayaṃ yamāmase uparamāma nassāma satataṃ samitaṃ maccusantikaṃ gacchāmā”ti na jānanti.
atk-s0508a2:100_3: Ye ca tattha vijānantīti ye tattha paṇḍitā –
atk-s0508a2:100_5: Tato sammanti medhagāti evañhi te jānantā yonisomanasikāraṃ uppādetvā medhagānaṃ kalahānaṃ vūpasamāya paṭipajjanti.
atk-s0508a2:100_6: Atha nesaṃ tāya paṭipattiyā te medhagā sammanti.
atk-s0508a2:100_7: Atha vā pare cāti ye satthu ovādānusāsaniyā aggahaṇena sāsanato bāhiratāya pare,
atk-s0508a2:100_8: te yāva “mayaṃ micchāgāhaṃ gahetvā ettha idha loke sāsanassa paṭiniggāhena yamāmase vāyamāmā”ti na vijānanti,
atk-s0508a2:100_10: yadā pana tassa gāhassa vissajjanavasena ye ca tattha tesu vivādappasutesu adhammadhammādike adhammadhammādito yathābhūtaṃ vijānanti,
atk-s0508a2:100_11: tato tesaṃ santikā te paṇḍitapurise nissāya vivādasaṅkhātā medhagā sammantīti evampettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0508a2:101_3: Iriyantyamarā viyāti amarā viya jarāmaraṇaṃ atikkantā viya uddhatā unnaḷā capalā mukharā vippakiṇṇavācā
atk-s0508a2:101_4: hutvā vattanti caranti vicaranti tadā vivādo na vūpasammateva.
atk-s0508a2:101_6: āturesu anāturāti ye pana satthu sāsanadhammaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānanti,
atk-s0508a2:101_7: te kilesarogena āturesu sattesu anāturā nikkilesā anīghā viharanti,
atk-s0508a2:101_8: tesaṃ vasena vivādo accantameva vūpasammatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:102_0: Yaṃ kiñci sithilaṃ kammanti oliyitvā karaṇena sithilagāhaṃ katvā sāthalibhāvena kataṃ yaṃ kiñci kusalakammaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:102_7: “addhā ime mama cariyaṃ ñatvā maṃ ukkhipitukāmā sannipatitā”ti evaṃ attano vā āsaṅkāhi saritaṃ usaṅkitaṃ parisaṅkitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:102_8: Na taṃ hotīti taṃ evarūpaṃ brahmacariyaṃ samaṇadhammakaraṇaṃ tassa puggalassa mahapphalaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0508a2:102_9: Tassa amahapphalabhāveneva paccayadāyakānampissa na mahapphalaṃ hoti.
atk-s0508a2:102_11: Sallekhavuttino ca vivādassa avasaro eva natthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:103_0: Gāravo nūpalabbhatīti anusāsaniyā apadakkhiṇaggāhibhāvena garukātabbesu sabrahmacārīsu yassa puggalassa gāravo garukaraṇaṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:103_1: Ārakā hoti saddhammāti so evarūpo puggalo paṭipattisaddhammatopi paṭivedhasaddhammatopi dūre hoti,
atk-s0508a2:103_7: “Nabhaṃ puthaviyā yathā”ti yathā nabhaṃ ākāsaṃ puthaviyā pathavīdhātuyā sabhāvato dūre.
atk-s0508a2:104_0: “Nabhañca dūre pathavī ca dūre, pāraṃ samuddassa tadāhu dūre;
atk-s0508a2:105_0: Tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, satañca dhammo asatañca rājā”ti.;
atk-s0508a2:108_2: Ayampi kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi hutvā satthu santike dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:108_3: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhunovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā
atk-s0508a2:108_6: So tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu saṃsaranto kakusandhassa bhagavato kāle karavikasakuṇo hutvā madhurakūjitaṃ kūjanto satthāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:108_7: Aparabhāge mayūro hutvā aññatarassa paccekabuddhassa vasanaguhāya dvāre pasannamānaso divase divase tikkhattuṃ madhuravassitaṃ vassi,
atk-s0508a2:108_8: evaṃ tattha tattha puññāni katvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā nandakoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a2:108_9: vayappatto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:114_0: Arahā pana hutvā vimuttisukhena vītināmento satthārā bhikkhunīnaṃ ovāde āṇatto ekasmiṃ uposathadivase
atk-s0508a2:114_2: Tena naṃ bhagavā bhikkhunovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:114_3: Athekadivasaṃ theraṃ sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ aññatarā purāṇadutiyikā itthī kilesavasena oloketvā hasi.
atk-s0508a2:114_4: Thero tassā taṃ kiriyaṃ disvā sarīrassa paṭikkūlavibhāvanamukhena dhammaṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a2:117_0: Navasotāni te kāye, yāni sandanti sabbadā.
atk-s0508a2:120_0: Saggepi te na rajjanti, kimaṅgaṃ pana mānuse.
atk-s0508a2:122_0: “Ye ca kho bālā dummedhā, dummantī mohapārutā;
atk-s0508a2:125_0: “Yesaṃ rāgo ca doso ca, avijjā ca virājitā;
atk-s0508a2:126_0: Tādī tattha na rajjanti, chinnasuttā abandhanā”ti. – gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:127_3: dhī atthu taṃ jigucchāmi tava dhikkāro hotūti attho.
atk-s0508a2:127_5: Pūreti ativiya jegucchehi nānākuṇapehi nānāvidhaasucīhi sampuṇṇe.
atk-s0508a2:127_7: Mārapakkheti yasmā visabhāgavatthu andhaputhujjanānaṃ ayonisomanasikāranimittatāya kilesamāraṃ vaḍḍheti,
atk-s0508a2:127_11: Avassuteti sabbakālaṃ kilesāvassavanena tahiṃ tahiṃ asucinissandanena ca avassute.
atk-s0508a2:127_13: yāni sandanti sabbadāti “akkhimhā akkhigūthako”tiādinā vuttaṃ asucino avassavanaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:128_0: Evaṃ pana navachiddaṃ dhuvassavaṃ asucibharitaṃ kāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānantī mā purāṇaṃ amaññitthoti purāṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:128_1: ajānanakāle pavattaṃ hasitalapitaṃ kīḷitaṃ mā maññi,
atk-s0508a2:128_3: Māsādesi tathāgateti yathā upanissayasampattiyā purimakā buddhasāvakā āgatā,
atk-s0508a2:128_4: yathā vā te sammāpaṭipattiyā gatā paṭipannā,
atk-s0508a2:128_5: yathā ca rūpārūpadhammānaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ tathadhamme ca ariyasaccāni āgatā adhigatā avabuddhā,
atk-s0508a2:128_6: tathā imepīti evaṃ tathā āgamanādiatthena tathāgate ariyasāvake pakatisatte viya avaññāya kilesavasena ca upasaṅkamamānā māsādesi.
atk-s0508a2:128_9: kimaṅgaṃ pana mānuseti sabbaññubuddhenāpi akkhānena pariyosāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyasukhe saggepi te sāvakabuddhā na rajjanti,
atk-s0508a2:128_10: saṅkhāresu ādīnavassa suparidiṭṭhattā rāgaṃ na janenti,
atk-s0508a2:129_0: Ye ca khoti ye pana bālyappayogato bālā,
atk-s0508a2:129_3: mohena aññāṇena sabbaso paṭicchāditacittatāya mohapārutā tādisā tathārūpā andhaputhujjanā,
atk-s0508a2:129_6: rajjanti rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhopannā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0508a2:130_0: Virājitāti yesaṃ pana khīṇāsavānaṃ telañjanarāgo viya dummocanīyasabhāvo rāgo sapatto viya laddhokāso
atk-s0508a2:130_1: dussanasabhāvo doso aññāṇasabhāvā avijjā ca ariyamaggavirāgena sabbaso virājitā pahīnā samucchinnā,
atk-s0508a2:130_2: tādisā aggamaggasatthena chinnabhavanettisuttā tato eva katthacipi bandhanābhāvato abandhanā tattha tasmiṃ yathāvutte mārapāse na rajjanti.
atk-s0508a2:130_3: Evaṃ thero tassā itthiyā dhammaṃ kathetvā gato.
atk-s0508a2:133_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto tissassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a2:133_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthu sammāsambodhiṃ saddahanto bodhirukkhaṃ vanditvā bījanena pūjesi.
atk-s0508a2:133_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ
atk-s0508a2:133_5: patto sāsane pabbajitvā aññatarena upāsakena kārite ārāme āvāsiko hutvā viharati tena upaṭṭhīyamāno.
atk-s0508a2:133_6: Athekadivasaṃ eko khīṇāsavatthero lūkhacīvaradharo kesoharaṇatthaṃ araññato gāmābhimukho āgacchati,
atk-s0508a2:133_7: taṃ disvā so upāsako iriyāpathe pasīditvā kappakena kesamassūni ohārāpetvā paṇītabhojanaṃ bhojetvā sundarāni cīvarāni datvā “idheva, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:133_9: Taṃ disvā āvāsiko issāmaccherapakato khīṇāsavattheraṃ āha –
atk-s0508a2:133_11: iminā pāpupāsakena upaṭṭhīyamānassa evaṃ idha vasanato aṅgulīhi kese luñcitvā acelassa sato gūthamuttāhārajīvana”nti.
atk-s0508a2:133_12: Evañca pana vatvā tāvadeva vaccakuṭiṃ pavisitvā pāyāsaṃ vaḍḍhento viya hatthena gūthaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vaḍḍhetvā yāvadatthaṃ khādi,
atk-s0508a2:133_14: Iminā niyāmena yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā kālaṅkatvā niraye paccitvā puna gūthamuttāhāro vasitvā tasseva kammassa
atk-s0508a2:133_15: vipākāvasesena manussesu uppannopi pañca jātisatāni nigaṇṭho hutvā gūthabhakkho ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:134_0: Puna imasmiṃ buddhuppāde manussayoniyaṃ nibbattamānopi ariyūpavādabalena duggatakūle nibbattitvā thaññaṃ vā khīraṃ vā sappiṃ vā pāyamāno,
atk-s0508a2:134_4: evaṃ gūthamuttaparibhogena vaḍḍhanto vayappattopi tadeva paribhuñjati.
atk-s0508a2:134_6: So ñātakehi pariccatto naggapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā na nhāyati,
atk-s0508a2:134_7: rajojalladharo kesamassūni luñcitvā aññe iriyāpathe paṭikkhipitvā ekapādena tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0508a2:134_9: māsopavāsaṃ adhiṭṭhāya puññatthikehi dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ māse māse ekavāraṃ kusaggena gahetvā divā jivhaggena lehati,
atk-s0508a2:134_10: rattiyaṃ pana “allagūthaṃ sappāṇaka”nti akhāditvā sukkhagūthameva khādati,
atk-s0508a2:134_11: evaṃ karontassa pañcapaññāsavassāni vītivattāni mahājano “mahātapo paramappiccho”ti maññamāno tanninno tappoṇo ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:135_0: Atha bhagavā tassa hadayabbhantare ghaṭe padīpaṃ viya arahattūpanissayaṃ pajjalantaṃ disvā sayameva tattha
atk-s0508a2:135_2: ehibhikkhūpasampadāya laddhūpasampadaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:135_4: Vitthāro pana dhammapade “māse māse kusaggenā”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya vuttanayena veditabbo.
atk-s0508a2:135_5: Arahatte pana patiṭṭhito parinibbānakāle “ādito micchā paṭipajjitvāpi sammāsambuddhaṃ nissāya sāvakena adhigantabbaṃ mayā adhigata”nti dassento –
atk-s0508a2:141_0: Sukkhagūthāni ca khādiṃ, uddesañca na sādiyiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:147_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:149_1: rajojallamadhārayinti naggapabbajjūpagamanena nhānapaṭikkhepato pañcādhikāni paññāsavassāni sarīre laggaṃ āgantukareṇusaṅkhātaṃ rajo,
atk-s0508a2:149_3: Bhuñjanto māsikaṃ bhattanti rattiyaṃ gūthaṃ khādanto lokavañcanatthaṃ māsopavāsiko nāma hutvā puññatthikehi
atk-s0508a2:149_4: dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ māse māse ekavāraṃ jivhagge paṭhanavasena bhuñjanto alocayinti tādisacchārikāpakkhepena
atk-s0508a2:150_1: āsanaṃ parivajjayinti sabbena sabbaṃ āsanaṃ nisajjaṃ parivajjesiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:150_2: tiṭṭhanto ca ubho hatthe ukkhipitvā ekeneva pādena aṭṭhāsiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:150_5: Na sādiyinti na sampaṭicchiṃ paṭikkhipinti attho.
atk-s0508a2:151_1: bahuṃ duggatigāminanti etādisaṃ evarūpaṃ vipākanibbattanakaṃ duggatigāminaṃ bahuṃ pāpakammaṃ purimajātīsu idha ca katvā uppādetvā.
atk-s0508a2:151_2: Vuyhamāno mahoghenāti kāmoghādinā mahatā oghena visesato diṭṭhoghena apāyasamuddaṃ patiākaḍḍhiyamāno,
atk-s0508a2:151_3: buddhaṃ saraṇamāgamanti tādisena puññakammacchiddena kicchena manussattabhāvaṃ labhitvā idāni puññabalena buddhaṃ “saraṇa”nti āgamāsiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:151_6: passa dhammasudhammatanti āyatanagataṃ mama saraṇagamanaṃ passa,
atk-s0508a2:151_7: passa sāsanadhammassa ca sudhammataṃ yohaṃ tathāmicchāpaṭipannopi ekovādeneva satthārā edisaṃ sampattiṃ sampāpito.
atk-s0508a2:159_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a2:159_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso morahatthena bhagavantaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a2:159_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā uruvelakassapattherassa bhaginiyā kucchimhi nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:159_6: So vayappatto brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato gharāvāsaṃ vasati.
atk-s0508a2:159_7: Tena ca samayena mahājano saṃvacchare saṃvacchare phaggunamāse uttaraphaggunanakkhatte ussavaṃ anubhavanto gayāyaṃ titthābhisekaṃ karoti.
atk-s0508a2:159_9: Atha bhagavā tādise ussavadivase veneyyānukampāya gayātitthasamīpe viharati,
atk-s0508a2:159_10: mahājanopi titthābhisekādhippāyena tato tato taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagacchati.
atk-s0508a2:159_11: Tasmiṃ khaṇe senakopi titthābhisekatthaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagato satthāraṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a2:159_12: dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:163_0: Nibbāyiṃsu tayo aggī, labhāmi vipulaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:164_0: “Aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthusampadā;
atk-s0508a2:171_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā sañjātasomanasso udānavasena –
atk-s0508a2:185_0: Tattha svāgataṃ vata me āsīti mayā suṭṭhu āgataṃ vata āsi.
atk-s0508a2:185_1: Mama vā sundaraṃ vata āgamanaṃ āsi.
atk-s0508a2:185_7: Sambuddhanti sammā sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:185_8: Desentaṃ dhammamuttamanti uttamaṃ aggaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ ekantaniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ bhāsantaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:186_0: Mahappabhanti mahatiyā sarīrappabhāya ñāṇappabhāya ca samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0508a2:186_1: Gaṇācariyanti bhikkhuparisādīnaṃ gaṇānaṃ uttamena damathena ācārasikkhāpanena gaṇācariyaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:186_5: Kenaci anabhibhūto hutvā sakalaṃ lokaṃ abhibhavitvā ṭhitattā,
atk-s0508a2:186_6: pañcannampi mārānaṃ jitattā ca sadevakassa lokassa jinaṃ sadevake loke aggajinaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:186_8: ca sadevakena lokena aparimeyyadassanatāya asadisadassanatāya ca atuladassanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:187_5: Sabbe āsavā savāsanā parikkhīṇā etassāti sabbāsavaparikkhīṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:187_7: sabbaññubuddhā eva pana savāsane āsave khepentīti dassanatthaṃ “anāsava”nti vatvā puna “sabbāsavaparikkhīṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:187_13: tasmā svāgataṃ vata me āsīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:188_0: Idāni satthu dassanena attanā laddhaguṇaṃ dassento catutthaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:188_2: kañjiyapuṇṇalābu viya takkabharitacāṭi viya vasāpītapilotikā viya ca saṃkilesavatthūhi anamatagge saṃsāre cirakālaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:188_3: Gaddulabandhitaṃ viya thambhe sārameyaṃ sakkāyathambhe diṭṭhisandānena,
atk-s0508a2:188_5: tato vimocento ca abhijjhādīhi sabbaganthe hi maṃ senakaṃ ariyamaggahatthena,
atk-s0508a2:188_6: vimocayi vata so bhagavā mayhaṃ satthāti bhagavati abhippasādaṃ pavedeti.
atk-s0508a2:191_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto buddhasuññe loke candabhāgāya nadiyā tīre kinnarayoniyaṃ nibbatto.
atk-s0508a2:191_3: Ekadivasaṃ aññataraṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā katañjalī ajjunapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:191_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbattitvā sambhūtoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a2:191_5: vayappatto bhagavato parinibbānassa pacchā dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a2:191_6: pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:201_0: Sukhette vappitaṃ bījaṃ, sayambhumhi aho mama.
atk-s0508a2:205_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhena viharanto vassasataparinibbute bhagavati vesālikesu vajjiputtakesu
atk-s0508a2:205_1: dasa vatthūni paggayha ṭhitesu kākaṇḍakaputtena yasattherena ussāhitehi sattasatehi khīṇāsavehi taṃ diṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:205_2: bhinditvā saddhammaṃ paggaṇhantehi dhammavinayasaṅgahe kate tesaṃ vajjiputtakānaṃ uddhammaubbinayadīpane
atk-s0508a2:217_0: Yaso kittiñca pappoti, mittehi na virujjhatī”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:219_0: Tattha yo dandhakāle taratīti kismiñci kattabbavatthusmiṃ –
atk-s0508a2:219_2: na nu kho kappatī”ti vinayakukkucce uppanne yāva viyattaṃ vinayadharaṃ pucchitvā taṃ kukkuccaṃ na vinodeti,
atk-s0508a2:219_3: tāva dandhakāle tassa kiccassa dandhāyitabbasamaye tarati madditvā vītikkamaṃ karoti.
atk-s0508a2:219_4: Taraṇīye ca dandhayeti gahaṭṭhassa tāva saraṇagamanasīlasamādānādike,
atk-s0508a2:219_5: pabbajitassa vattapaṭivattakaraṇādike samathavipassanānuyoge ca taritabbe sampatte sīghaṃ taṃ kiccaṃ ananuyuñjitvā –
atk-s0508a2:219_8: Ayonisaṃvidhānenāti evaṃ dandhāyitabbe taranto taritabbe ca dandhāyanto anupāyasaṃvidhānena upāyasaṃvidhānābhāvena bālo,
atk-s0508a2:220_0: Tassatthā parihāyantīti tassa tathārūpassa puggalassa diṭṭhadhammikādibhedā atthā kāḷapakkhe candimā viya,
atk-s0508a2:220_1: parihāyanti divase divase parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0508a2:220_5: mā evaṃ paṭipajjā”ti ovādadāyakehi kalyāṇamittehi “avacanīyā maya”nti ovādassa anādāneneva viruddho nāma hoti.
atk-s0508a2:221_4: Purimā hi dve gāthā pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya caritabbaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ akatvā kukkuccapakatatāya dasa
atk-s0508a2:221_5: vatthūni dīpetvā saṅghena nikkaḍḍhite vajjiputtake sandhāya therena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:221_6: Pacchimā pana attasadise sammā paṭipanne sakatthaṃ nipphādetvā ṭhiteti.
atk-s0508a2:224_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a2:224_3: kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ sikkhākāmānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a2:224_4: sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā senāsanavisodhanavijjotanādikaṃ uḷāraṃ puññaṃ katvā paṇidhānamakāsi.
atk-s0508a2:224_5: So tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde amhākaṃ bodhisattaṃ paṭicca yasodharāya
atk-s0508a2:224_6: deviyā kucchimhi nibbattitvā rāhuloti laddhanāmo mahatā khattiyaparivārena vaḍḍhi,
atk-s0508a2:224_8: So pabbajitvā satthu santike anekehi suttapadehi suladdhovādo paripakkañāṇo vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:230_0: Bhikkhusaṅghe ṭhito satthā, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a2:234_0: Nibbattissanti pāsādā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0508a2:248_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:254_0: Rāhulo nāma nāmena, arahā so bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:260_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:263_0: Yañcamhi putto buddhassa, yañca dhammesu cakkhumā.
atk-s0508a2:265_0: “Yañca me āsavā khīṇā, yañca natthi punabbhavo;
atk-s0508a2:274_2: Rāhulabhaddoti maṃ vidūti “rāhulabhaddo”ti maṃ sabrahmacārino sañjānanti.
atk-s0508a2:274_3: Tassa hi jātasāsanaṃ sutvā bodhisattena “rāhu jāto,
atk-s0508a2:274_4: bandhanaṃ jāta”nti vuttavacanaṃ upādāya suddhodanamahārājā “rāhulo”ti nāmaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a2:274_5: Tattha ādito pitarā vuttapariyāyameva gahetvā āha –
atk-s0508a2:275_3: Amhi putto buddhassāti sammāsambuddhassa orasaputto amhi.
atk-s0508a2:275_6: Cakkhumāti maggapaññācakkhunā cakkhumā ca amhīti yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:276_0: Puna aparāparehipi pariyāyehi attani ubhayasampattiṃ dassetuṃ –
atk-s0508a2:277_0: Idāni yāya vijjāsampattiyā ca vimuttisampattiyā ca abhāvena sattakāyo kumine bandhamacchā viya saṃsāre parivattati,
atk-s0508a2:277_2: Tattha kāmehi kāmesu vā andhāti kāmandhā.
atk-s0508a2:277_3: “Chando rāgo”tiādivibhāgehi kilesakāmehi rūpādīsu vatthukāmesu anādīnavadassitāya andhīkatā.
atk-s0508a2:277_4: Jālapacchannāti sakalaṃ bhavattayaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhitena visattikājālena pakārato channā paliguṇṭhitā.
atk-s0508a2:277_5: Taṇhāchadanachāditāti tato eva taṇhāsaṅkhātena chadanena chāditā nivutā sabbaso paṭikujjitā.
atk-s0508a2:277_7: macchāva kumināmukheti kumināmukhe macchabandhānaṃ macchapasibbakamukhe baddhā macchā viya pamattabandhunā
atk-s0508a2:277_8: mārena yena kāmabandhanena baddhā ime sattā tato na nigacchanti antobandhanagatāva honti.
atk-s0508a2:278_0: Taṃ tathārūpaṃ kāmaṃ bandhanabhūtaṃ ujjhitvā pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā pahāya kilesamārassa bandhanaṃ chetvā,
atk-s0508a2:278_1: puna ariyamaggasatthena anavasesato samucchinditvā tato eva avijjāsaṅkhātena mūlena samūlaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:281_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe buddhasuññe
atk-s0508a2:281_3: loke rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatto sudassanaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ pabbatantare vasantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a2:281_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a2:281_6: candanoti laddhanāmo vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpanno ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:281_7: So ekaṃ puttaṃ labhitvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharanto
atk-s0508a2:281_8: satthāraṃ vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ āgato susāne vasati.
atk-s0508a2:281_9: Tassa āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā purāṇadutiyikā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā dārakaṃ ādāya mahatā parivārena therassa santikaṃ gacchati –
atk-s0508a2:281_11: Thero taṃ āgacchantiṃ dūratova disvā “idānissā avisayo bhavissāmī”ti yathāraddhaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:291_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā ākāse ṭhatvā tassā dhammaṃ desetvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā sayaṃ attanā pubbe vasitaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0508a2:303_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:304_0: Imāhi gāthāhi attano paṭipattiṃ kathento aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:305_0: Tattha jātarūpena sañchannāti jātarūpamayena sīsūpagādialaṅkārena alaṅkaraṇavasena paṭicchāditasarīrā,
atk-s0508a2:305_2: Dāsīgaṇapurakkhatāti yathārahaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattena attano dāsigaṇena purato katā parivāritāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:305_3: Aṅkena puttamādāyāti “api nāma puttampi disvā gehassitasāto bhaveyyā”ti puttaṃ attano aṅkena gahetvā.
atk-s0508a2:306_3: Sabbamidaṃ thero attano kāmarāgasamucchedaṃ bahumaññanto vadati.
atk-s0508a2:306_4: Yoniso udapajjathāti “evarūpāpi nāma sampatti jarābyādhimaraṇehi abhibhuyyati,
atk-s0508a2:306_5: aho saṅkhārā aniccā adhuvā anassāsikā”ti evaṃ yonisomanasikāro uppajji.
atk-s0508a2:309_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle migaluddako
atk-s0508a2:309_3: hutvā ekadivasaṃ araññāyatane devaparisāya satthu dhammaṃ desentassa “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti desanāya
atk-s0508a2:309_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a2:309_6: dhammikoti laddhanāmo vayappatto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe laddhappasādo pabbajitvā aññatarasmiṃ gāmakāvāse
atk-s0508a2:309_7: āvāsiko hutvā viharanto āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattāvattesu ujjhānabahulo akkhamo ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:309_8: Tena bhikkhū taṃ vihāraṃ chaḍḍetvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:309_10: Vihārasāmiko upāsako taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā bhagavato taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0508a2:309_11: Satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosetvā tamatthaṃ pucchitvā tena “evaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:309_14: pubbepi akkhamo ahosī”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi yācito rukkhadhammaṃ kathetvā upari tassa ovādaṃ dento –
atk-s0508a2:311_0: “Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāriṃ, dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahāti;
atk-s0508a2:312_0: Esānisaṃso dhamme suciṇṇe, na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārī.
atk-s0508a2:314_0: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
atk-s0508a2:315_0: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggatiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:317_0: “Tasmā hi dhammesu kareyya chandaṃ, iti modamāno sugatena tādinā;
atk-s0508a2:318_0: Dhamme ṭhitā sugatavarassa sāvakā, nīyanti dhīrā saraṇavaraggagāmino.
atk-s0508a2:322_0: Cando yathā dosinā puṇṇamāsiya”nti. – catasso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:323_4: Suciṇṇoti suṭṭhu ciṇṇo kammaphalāni saddahitvā sakkaccaṃ cittīkatvā upacito.
atk-s0508a2:323_6: Tattha lokiyaṃ tāva kāmāvacarādibhedo dhammo yathāsakaṃ sukhaṃ diṭṭhe vā dhamme upapajje vā apare vā pariyāye āvahati nipphādeti,
atk-s0508a2:323_7: itaraṃ pana vivaṭṭūpanissaye ṭhatvā ciṇṇo paramparāya āvahatīti vattuṃ vaṭṭati anupanissayassa tadabhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:323_9: na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārīti dhammacārī puggalo dhamme suciṇṇe taṃnimittaṃ duggatiṃ na gacchatīti eso dhamme suciṇṇe ānisaṃso udrayoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:324_2: tasmā “dhammo adhammo”ti ime aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇaphalāti dassetuṃ “na hi dhammo”tiādinā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:325_0: Tasmāti yasmā dhammādhammānaṃ ayaṃ yathāvutto vipākabhedo, tasmā.
atk-s0508a2:325_2: Iti modamāno sugatena tādināti iti evaṃ vuttappakārena ovādadānena sugatena sammaggatena sammāpaṭipannena
atk-s0508a2:325_3: iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappattiyā tādināmavatā hetubhūtena modamāno tuṭṭhiṃ āpajjamāno dhammesu chandaṃ kareyyāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:325_4: Ettāvatā vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassento “dhamme ṭhitā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:325_6: yasmā sugatassa varassa sugatesu ca varassa sammāsambuddhassa sāvakā tassa dhamme ṭhitā dhīrā ativiya
atk-s0508a2:325_7: aggabhūtasaraṇagāmino teneva saraṇagamanasaṅkhāte dhamme ṭhitabhāvena sakalavaṭṭadukkhatopi nīyanti nissaranti,
atk-s0508a2:326_0: Evaṃ satthārā tīhi gāthāhi dhamme desite desanānusārena yathānisinnova vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:332_0: Tattha cittaṃ pasādetvā, uttariṃ duttaraṃ bhavaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:336_1: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attanā adhigataṃ visesaṃ satthu nivedento carimagāthāya aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:337_5: pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana”nti evaṃ satthārā vuttassa dukkhamūlayogato,
atk-s0508a2:337_8: gaṇḍābhidhānassa upādānakkhandhapañcakassa mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ taṇhājālo samūhatoti taṇhāsaṅkhāto jālo maggena samugghāṭito.
atk-s0508a2:337_9: So khīṇasaṃsāro na catthi kiñcananti so ahaṃ evaṃ pahīnataṇhāvijjatāya parikkhīṇasaṃsāro pahīnabhavamūlattā eva na catthi,
atk-s0508a2:337_11: Cando yathā dosinā puṇṇamāsiyanti yathā nāma cando abbhamahikādidosarahito puṇṇamāsiyaṃ paripuṇṇakāle
atk-s0508a2:337_12: evaṃ ahampi arahattādhigamena apetarāgādikiñcano paripuṇṇadhammakoṭṭhāso ahosinti.
atk-s0508a2:340_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe mahānubhāvo
atk-s0508a2:340_3: nāgarājā hutvā nibbatto sambhavassa nāma paccekabuddhassa abbhokāse samāpattiyā nisinnassa mahantaṃ padumaṃ
atk-s0508a2:340_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a2:340_6: sappakoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:340_7: gahetvā ajakaraṇiyā nāma nadiyā tīre leṇagirivihāre vasanto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:342_0: Buddhopi sambhavo nāma, abbhokāse vasī tadā.
atk-s0508a2:348_0: So arahattaṃ patvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ āgato ñātīhi upaṭṭhīyamāno tattha katipāhaṃ vasitvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:348_1: desetvā ñātake saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā yathāvuttaṭṭhānameva gantukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:348_4: So gamanākāraṃ dassetvā ṭhito attanā vasitaṭṭhānakittanāpadesena vivekābhiratiṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a2:350_0: “Yadā balākā sucipaṇḍaracchadā, kāḷassa meghassa bhayena tajjitā;
atk-s0508a2:351_0: Palehiti ālayamālayesinī, tadā nadī ajakaraṇī rameti maṃ.
atk-s0508a2:353_0: “Yadā balākā suvisuddhapaṇḍarā, kāḷassa meghassa bhayena tajjitā;
atk-s0508a2:354_0: Pariyesati leṇamaleṇadassinī, tadā nadī ajakaraṇī rameti maṃ.
atk-s0508a2:356_0: “Kaṃ nu tattha na ramenti, jambuyo ubhato tahiṃ;
atk-s0508a2:361_0: Khemā ajakaraṇī sivā surammā”ti. – catasso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:362_3: Kāḷassa meghassa bhayena tajjitāti jalabhārabharitatāya kāḷassa añjanagirisannikāsassa pāvussakameghassa gajjato vuṭṭhibhayena nibbijjitā bhiṃsāpitā.
atk-s0508a2:362_7: Tadā nadī ajakaraṇī rameti manti tasmiṃ pāvussakakāle ajakaraṇīnāmikā nadī navodakassa pūrā hārahārinī
atk-s0508a2:362_8: kulaṅkasā maṃ rameti mama cittaṃ ārādhetīti utupadesavisesakittanāpadesena vivekābhiratiṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0508a2:363_6: idāni pāvussakakāle meghagajjitena āhitagabbhā pariyesati leṇanti nibaddhavasanaṭṭhānaṃ kulāvakaṃ karotīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:364_1: pacchatoti mama vasanakamahāleṇassa pacchato pacchābhāge āpagākūlaṃ ajakaraṇīnadiyā ubhatotīraṃ tahiṃ
atk-s0508a2:364_2: tahiṃ ito cito ca sobhentiyo niccakālaṃ phalabhāranamitasākhā siniddhapaṇṇacchāyā jambuyo tattha tasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:364_3: ṭhāne kaṃ nāma sattaṃ na ramenti nu,
atk-s0508a2:365_6: panādayanti taṃ ṭhānaṃ madhurena vassitena ninnādayanti.
atk-s0508a2:365_7: Nājja girinadīhi vippavāsasamayoti ajja etarahi aññāhipi pabbateyyāhi nadīhi vippavāsasamayo na hoti,
atk-s0508a2:365_8: visesato pana vāḷamacchasusumārādivirahitato khemā ajakaraṇī nadī.
atk-s0508a2:365_11: tasmā tattheva me mano ramatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:366_0: Evaṃ pana vatvā ñātake vissajjetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0508a2:366_1: Suññāgārābhiratidīpanena idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a2:369_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a2:369_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso ekaṃ mañcamadāsi.
atk-s0508a2:369_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe gahapatikule nibbattitvā muditoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:369_5: Tena ca samayena taṃ kulaṃ raññā kenacideva karaṇīyena palibuddhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:369_6: Mudito rājabhayābhīto palāyitvā araññaṃ paviṭṭho aññatarassa khīṇāsavattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ upagacchi.
atk-s0508a2:369_7: Thero tassa bhītabhāvaṃ ñatvā “mā bhāyī”ti samassāsesi.
atk-s0508a2:369_9: kālena idaṃ me bhayaṃ vūpasamessatī”ti pucchitvā “sattaṭṭhamāse atikkamitvā”ti vutte –
atk-s0508a2:369_14: So pabbajitvā sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho bhaye vūpasantepi samaṇadhammaṃyeva rocento kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto –
atk-s0508a2:369_15: “arahattaṃ appatvā imasmā vasanagabbhā bahi na nikkhamissāmī”tiādinā paṭiññaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:371_0: Ekaṃ mañcaṃ mayā dinnaṃ, pasannena sapāṇinā.
atk-s0508a2:377_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento sahāyabhikkhūhi adhigataṃ pucchito attano paṭipannākāraṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a2:385_0: “Nāsissaṃ na pivissāmi, vihārā ca na nikkhame;
atk-s0508a2:389_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:391_1: “Ettha pabbajitvā nibbhayo sukhena akilamanto jīvissāmī”ti evaṃ jīvikatthāya pabbajinti attho.
atk-s0508a2:391_2: Laddhāna upasampadanti paṭhamaṃ sāmaṇerapabbajjāyaṃ ṭhito ñatticatutthena kammena upasampadaṃ labhitvā.
atk-s0508a2:391_3: Tato saddhaṃ paṭilabhinti tato upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya kalyāṇamitte sevanto dve mātikā,
atk-s0508a2:391_11: Daḷhavīriyo parakkaminti evaṃ paṭiladdhasaddho hutvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva saccapaṭivedhāya
atk-s0508a2:391_13: akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya sammadeva padahiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:392_2: Tattha kāmanti yathākāmaṃ ekaṃsato vā bhijjatu.
atk-s0508a2:392_6: Maṃsapesī visīyarunti iminā daḷhaparakkamena imasmā kāyā maṃsapesiyo visīyanti ce,
atk-s0508a2:392_9: jaṅghāyo papatantu meti ubhohi jaṇṇukasandhīhi saha mama ubho jaṅghāyo satthiyo ūrubandhato bhijjitvā bhūmiyaṃ papatantu.
atk-s0508a2:397_0: Pañcakanipāte bhikkhu sivathikaṃ gantvātiādikā āyasmato rājadattattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:397_3: tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto,
atk-s0508a2:397_4: ito catuddase kappe buddhasuññe loke kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto,
atk-s0508a2:397_5: ekadivasaṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena vanantaṃ upagato tattha aññataraṃ paccekabuddhaṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:397_7: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ satthavāhakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:397_8: Tassa mahārājaṃ vessavaṇaṃ ārādhetvā paṭiladdhabhāvato mātāpitaro rājadattoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:397_9: So vayappatto pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya vāṇijjavasena rājagahaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:397_10: Tena ca samayena rājagahe aññatarā gaṇikā abhirūpā dassanīyā paramasobhaggayogato divase divase sahassaṃ labhati.
atk-s0508a2:397_11: Atha so satthavāhaputto divase divase tassā gaṇikāya sahassaṃ datvā saṃvāsaṃ kappento nacirasseva sabbaṃ
atk-s0508a2:397_12: dhanaṃ khepetvā duggato hutvā ghāsacchādanamattampi alabhanto ito cito ca paribbhamanto saṃvegappatto ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:397_13: So ekadivasaṃ upāsakehi saddhiṃ veḷuvanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:398_0: Tena ca samayena satthā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento nisinno hoti.
atk-s0508a2:398_1: So parisapariyante nisīditvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā dhutaṅgāni samādiyitvā susāne vasati.
atk-s0508a2:398_2: Tadā aññataropi satthavāhaputto sahassaṃ datvā tāya gaṇikāya saha vasati.
atk-s0508a2:398_3: Sā ca gaṇikā tassa hatthe mahaggharatanaṃ disvā lobhaṃ uppādetvā aññehi dhuttapurisehi taṃ mārāpetvā taṃ ratanaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a2:398_4: Atha tassa satthavāhaputtassa manussā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā ocarakamanusse pesesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:398_5: Te rattiyaṃ tassā gaṇikāya gharaṃ pavisitvā chaviādīni anupahacceva taṃ māretvā sivathikāya chaḍḍesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:398_6: Rājadattatthero asubhanimittaṃ gahetuṃ susāne vicaranto tassā gaṇikāya kaḷevaraṃ paṭikkulato manasi kātuṃ
atk-s0508a2:398_7: upagato katipayavāre yoniso manasi katvā aciramatabhāvato soṇasiṅgālādīhi anupahatachavitāya visabhāgavatthutāya
atk-s0508a2:398_9: tattha kāmarāgaṃ uppādetvā saṃviggataramānaso attano cittaṃ paribhāsitvā muhuttaṃ ekamantaṃ apasakkitvā
atk-s0508a2:398_10: ādito upaṭṭhitaṃ asubhanimittameva gahetvā yoniso manasikaronto jhānaṃ uppādetvā taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a2:404_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pītisomanassajāto –
atk-s0508a2:419_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:421_0: Tattha bhikkhu sivathikaṃ gantvāti saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanato bhikkhu,
atk-s0508a2:421_2: “Bhikkhū”ti cetaṃ attānaṃ sandhāya thero sayaṃ vadati.
atk-s0508a2:421_3: Itthinti thīyati ettha sukkasoṇitaṃ sattasantānabhāvena saṃhaññatīti thī, mātugāmo.
atk-s0508a2:421_5: Vañjhādīsu pana taṃsadisatāya taṃsabhāvānativattanato ca tabbohāro.
atk-s0508a2:421_7: Ujjhitanti pariccattaṃ ujjhaniyattā eva apaviddhaṃ anapekkhabhāvena khittaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:421_8: Khajjantiṃ kimihī phuṭanti kimīhi pūritaṃ hutvā khajjamānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:422_1: mataṃ disvāna pāpakanti yaṃ apagatāyuusmāviññāṇatāya mataṃ kaḷevaraṃ pāpakaṃ nihīnaṃ lāmakaṃ eke cokkhajātikā jigucchanti,
atk-s0508a2:422_3: Kāmarāgo pāturahūti tasmiṃ kuṇape ayonisomanasikārassa balavatāya kāmarāgo mayhaṃ pāturahosi uppajji.
atk-s0508a2:422_4: Andhova savatī ahunti tasmiṃ kaḷevare navahi dvārehi asuciṃ savati sandante asucibhāvassa adassanena andho viya ahosiṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a2:423_0: “Ratto atthaṃ na jānāti, ratto dhammaṃ na passati;
atk-s0508a2:424_0: Andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ rāgo sahate nara”nti ca.
atk-s0508a2:425_2: Keci panettha takārāgamaṃ katvā “kilesapariyuṭṭhānena avasavatti kilesassa vā vasavattī”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0508a2:425_3: Apare “andhova asati ahu”nti pāḷiṃ vatvā “kāmarāgena andho eva hutvā satirahito ahosi”nti atthaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0508a2:426_4: tamhā ṭhānā apakkamiṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitassa me rāgo uppajji,
atk-s0508a2:426_6: Apakkantova satimā sampajānohaṃ samaṇasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā satipaṭṭhānamanasikāravasena satimā,
atk-s0508a2:426_7: sammadeva dhammasabhāvajānanena sampajāno ca hutvā ekamantaṃ upāvisiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:429_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto kassapassa bhagavato kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:429_3: gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a2:429_4: saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāya māse māse aṭṭhakkhattuṃ catujjātiyagandhena satthu gandhakuṭiṃ opuñjāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:429_5: So tena puññakammena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sugandhasarīro hutvā,
atk-s0508a2:429_6: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe gahapatikule nibbattitvā subhūtoti laddhanāmo vayappatto,
atk-s0508a2:429_7: nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ pahāya titthiyesu pabbajitvā tattha sāraṃ alabhanto,
atk-s0508a2:429_8: satthu santike upatissakolitaselādike bahū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pabbajitvā sāmaññasukhaṃ anubhavante disvā
atk-s0508a2:429_9: sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā ācariyupajjhāye ārādhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vivekavāsaṃ vasanto
atk-s0508a2:431_0: Kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo.
atk-s0508a2:437_0: Ākāso viya paññāya, asaṅgo anilo yathā.
atk-s0508a2:480_0: “Pacchime ca bhave dāni, jāto vippakule ahaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:481_0: Gabbhaṃ me vasato mātā, dehenāsi sugandhitā.
atk-s0508a2:487_0: Vāsayiṃsu sugandhena, yasmiṃ jāto ahaṃ ghare.
atk-s0508a2:488_0: “Yadā ca taruṇo bhaddo, paṭhame yobbane ṭhito;
atk-s0508a2:491_0: Tadā buddhānubhāvaṃ taṃ, disvā pabbajito ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:494_0: “Yadā pabbajito cāhaṃ, yadā ca arahā ahuṃ;
atk-s0508a2:495_0: Nibbāyissaṃ yadā cāhaṃ, gandhavasso tadā ahu.
atk-s0508a2:497_0: Tatheva gandhe itare ca sabbaso, pasayha vāyāmi tato tahiṃ tahiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:499_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā titthiyesu pabbajitvā attano pattaṃ attakilamathānuyogaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:499_1: sāsane pabbajitvā pattaṃ jhānādisukhañca cintetvā attano paṭipattipaccavekkhaṇamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:502_0: Caraṃ ce nādhigaccheyya, taṃ me dubbhagalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:504_0: “Abbūḷhaṃ aghagataṃ vijitaṃ, ekañce ossajeyya kalīva siyā;
atk-s0508a2:505_0: Sabbānipi ce ossajeyya andhova siyā, samavisamassa adassanato.
atk-s0508a2:507_0: “Yañhi kayirā tañhi vade, yaṃ na kayirā na taṃ vade;
atk-s0508a2:511_0: Evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, aphalā hoti akubbato.
atk-s0508a2:514_0: Evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, saphalā hoti kubbato”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:516_2: Yuñjanti tasmiṃ attānaṃ yuñjanto yojento tathā paṭipajjanto.
atk-s0508a2:516_4: tappaṭipakkhato ayoge caraṃ caranto ce bhaveyya.
atk-s0508a2:516_5: Nādhigaccheyyāti yathādhippetaṃ hitasukhaṃ na pāpuṇeyyāti ñāyo.
atk-s0508a2:516_6: Tasmā yaṃ ahaṃ titthiyamatavañcito ayoge yuñjiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:517_0: Abbūḷhaṃ aghagataṃ vijitanti vibādhanasabhāvatāya aghā nāma rāgādayo,
atk-s0508a2:517_6: taṃ abbūḷhāghagataṃ vijitaṃ katvā evaṃbhūto hutvā,
atk-s0508a2:517_8: Ekañce ossajeyyāti adutiyatāya padhānatāya ca ekaṃ appamādaṃ sammāpayogameva vā ossajeyya pariccajeyya ce.
atk-s0508a2:517_9: Kalīva so puggalo kāḷakaṇṇī viya siyā.
atk-s0508a2:517_10: Sabbānipi ce ossajeyyāti sabbānipi vimuttiyā paripācakāni saddhāvīriyasatisamādhipaññindriyāni ossajeyya ce,
atk-s0508a2:518_4: Evaṃ subhāsitā vācāti subhāsitā vācā nāma tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānasampannapupphasadisaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:518_5: Yathā hi agandhakaṃ pupphaṃ dhārentassa sarīre gandho na pharati,
atk-s0508a2:518_6: evaṃ etampi yo sakkaccasavanādīhi ca samācarati,
atk-s0508a2:518_7: tassa sakkaccaṃ asamācarantassa yaṃ tattha kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:518_8: taṃ akubbato sutagandhaṃ paṭipattigandhañca na āvahati aphalā hoti.
atk-s0508a2:519_1: Evanti yathā taṃ pupphaṃ dhārentassa sarīre gandho pharati,
atk-s0508a2:519_2: evaṃ tepiṭakabuddhavacanasaṅkhātā subhāsitā vācāpi yo sakkaccasavanādīhi tattha kattabbaṃ karoti,
atk-s0508a2:522_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a2:522_3: nibbattitvā vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto attano bhariyāya putte ca kālaṅkate sokasallasamappito araññaṃ
atk-s0508a2:522_4: paviṭṭho satthārā tattha gantvā dhammaṃ kathetvā sokasalle abbūḷhe pasannamānaso sugandhapupphehi pūjetvā
atk-s0508a2:522_5: pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā sirasi añjaliṃ katvā abhitthavi.
atk-s0508a2:523_0: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe bimbisārarañño purohitassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:523_2: So viññutaṃ patto satthu rājagahagamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:523_3: karonto katipayaṃ divasaṃ gāmakāvāse vasitvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ rājagahaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:523_4: Bimbisāramahārājā tassa āgamanaṃ sutvā upasaṅkamitvā “idheva, bhante, vasatha,
atk-s0508a2:523_5: ahaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahāmī”ti sampavāretvā gato bahukiccatāya na sari.
atk-s0508a2:523_6: “Thero abbhokāse vasatī”ti devatā therassa temanabhayena vassaṃ vāresuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:523_7: Rājā avassanakāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā therassa kuṭikaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:523_8: Thero kuṭikāyaṃ vasanto senāsanasappāyalābhena samādhānaṃ labhitvā vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:525_0: Mātā pitā matā bhātā, ekacitamhi ḍayhare.
atk-s0508a2:527_0: Cittakkhepo ca me āsi, tena sokena aṭṭito.
atk-s0508a2:541_0: Yathāgatā tathā gatā, tattha kā paridevanā.
atk-s0508a2:545_0: Evaṃ mātā pitā tuyhaṃ, tattha kā paridevanā.
atk-s0508a2:547_0: Evaṃ mātā pitā tuyhaṃ, tattha kā paridevanā.
atk-s0508a2:548_0: “Yathāpi urago jiṇṇaṃ, hitvā gacchati saṃ tacaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:549_0: Evaṃ mātā pitā tuyhaṃ, saṃ tanuṃ idha hīyare.
atk-s0508a2:557_0: Sabbe satte uddharasi, ñāṇena tvaṃ mahāmune.
atk-s0508a2:559_0: Paṭipādesi me maggaṃ, tava ñāṇena cakkhuma.
atk-s0508a2:562_0: “Paṭipannā ca sekhā ca, phalaṭṭhā santi sāvakā;
atk-s0508a2:579_0: Atha therassa arahattappattiyā haṭṭhatuṭṭhe viya deve vassante upari taṃ vassane niyojanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:581_0: “Vassati devo yathāsugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā;
atk-s0508a2:582_0: Tassaṃ viharāmi vūpasanto, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva.
atk-s0508a2:584_0: “Vassati devo yathāsugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā;
atk-s0508a2:585_0: Tassaṃ viharāmi santacitto, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva.
atk-s0508a2:592_0: Atha ce patthayasī pavassa devā”ti. – imā pañca gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:593_2: Valāhako hi yathā agajjanto kevalaṃ vassanto na sobhati,
atk-s0508a2:593_3: evaṃ satapaṭalasahassapaṭalena uṭṭhahitvā thanayanto gajjanto vijjullatā nicchārentopi avassanto na sobhati,
atk-s0508a2:593_4: tathābhūto pana hutvā vassanto sobhatīti vuttaṃ “vassati devo yathāsugīta”nti. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a2:593_8: Tassaṃ viharāmīti tassaṃ kuṭikāyaṃ ariyavihāragabbhena iriyāpathavihārena viharāmi.
atk-s0508a2:594_0: Evaṃ therassa anekavāraṃ kataṃ uyyojanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchanto valāhakadevaputto ninnañca thalañca pūrento mahāvassaṃ vassāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:597_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito pañcanavute kappe buddhasuññe
atk-s0508a2:597_3: loke kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ byādhitaṃ disvā harītakaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:597_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe gahapatikule nibbattitvā sumanoti laddhanāmo sukhena vaḍḍhi.
atk-s0508a2:597_5: Tassa pana mātulo pabbajitvā arahā hutvā araññe viharanto sumane vayappatte taṃ pabbājetvā caritānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:597_6: So tattha yogakammaṃ karonto cattāri jhānāni pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattesi.
atk-s0508a2:597_8: So ca nacireneva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:607_0: Sabbattha sukhito hotu, mā ca te byādhimāgamā.
atk-s0508a2:611_0: Imaṃ jātiṃ upādāya, byādhi me nupapajjatha.
atk-s0508a2:613_0: Tisso vijjā sacchikatā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:617_0: Arahatte pana patiṭṭhito ekadivasaṃ mātulattherassa upaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:626_0: Sadattho me anuppatto, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:629_0: Sabbe me āsavā khīṇā, natthi dāni punabbhavo.
atk-s0508a2:633_0: Imāhi pañcahi gāthāhi sīhanādaṃ nadanto aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:634_2: Amataṃ abhikaṅkhantanti samathavipassanādīsu anavajjadhammesu yaṃ dhammaṃ mayhaṃ patthayanto ākaṅkhanto
atk-s0508a2:634_3: upajjhāyo amataṃ nibbānaṃ abhikaṅkhantaṃ maṃ ovādadānavasena anuggaṇhi.
atk-s0508a2:634_4: Kataṃ kattabbakaṃ mayāti tassa adhigamatthaṃ kattabbaṃ pariññādisoḷasavidhaṃ kiccaṃ kataṃ niṭṭhāpitaṃ mayā.
atk-s0508a2:635_0: Tato eva anuppatto adhigato catubbidhopi maggadhammo sacchikato.
atk-s0508a2:635_1: Sayaṃ dhammo anītihoti sayaṃ attanāyeva nibbānadhammo phaladhammo ca anītiho asandiddho attapaccakkho kato, “itiha,
atk-s0508a2:635_2: iti kirā”ti pavattiyā itihasaṅkhātaṃ saṃsayaṃ samucchindantoyeva ariyamaggo pavattati.
atk-s0508a2:636_2: Sussutāti pariyattibāhusaccassa paṭivedhabāhusaccassa ca pāripūrivasena suṭṭhu sutā.
atk-s0508a2:636_3: Tava sāsaneti tava ovāde anusiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitassa.
atk-s0508a2:637_1: Antevāsimhi sikkhitoti tuyhaṃ samīpe ciṇṇabrahmacariyavāsatāya antevāsī sikkhitavā sikkhitaadhisīlādisikkho amhīti.
atk-s0508a2:640_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:640_3: bhārukacchanagare gahapatikule nibbattitvā vaḍḍhoti laddhanāmo anupubbena vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0508a2:640_4: Athassa mātā saṃsāre sañjātasaṃvegā puttaṃ ñātīnaṃ niyyādetvā bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a2:640_5: kammaṃ karontī arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā aparena samayena puttampi viññutaṃ pattaṃ veḷudantattherassa santike
atk-s0508a2:640_7: So pabbajito buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā bahussuto dhammakathiko hutvā ganthadhuraṃ vahanto ekadivasaṃ “ekako
atk-s0508a2:640_9: Taṃ disvā mātā “kasmā tvaṃ ekako santaruttarova idhāgato”ti codesi.
atk-s0508a2:640_10: So mātarā codiyamāno “ayuttaṃ mayā kata”nti uppannasaṃvego vihāraṃ gantvā divāṭṭhāne nisinno vipassitvā
atk-s0508a2:640_11: arahattaṃ patvā mātu ovādasampattipakāsanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:642_0: “Sādhū hi kira me mātā, patodaṃ upadaṃsayi;
atk-s0508a2:649_0: “Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, ye me vijjiṃsu āsavā;
atk-s0508a2:650_0: Sabbe asesā ucchinnā, na ca uppajjare puna.
atk-s0508a2:653_0: Apihā nūna mayipi, vanatho te na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:656_0: Jātimaraṇasaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:657_0: Tattha sādhū hi kira me mātā,
atk-s0508a2:657_1: patodaṃ upadaṃsayīti sādhu vata mātā mayhaṃ ovādasaṅkhātaṃ patodaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0508a2:657_2: tena me vīriyaṃ uttejentī uttamaṅge paññāsīse vijjhi.
atk-s0508a2:657_6: janettiyā me anusiṭṭho yassā anusāsanībhūtaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā ahaṃ āraddhavīriyo pahitatto viharanto uttamaṃ aggaphalaṃ sambodhiṃ arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0508a2:658_0: Tato eva ārakattā kilesehi arahā puññakkhettatāya dakkhiṇeyyo dakkhiṇāraho amhi.
atk-s0508a2:658_1: Pubbenivāsañāṇādivijjāttayassa adhigatattā tevijjo nibbānassa sacchikatattā amataddaso namucino mārassa
atk-s0508a2:658_2: senaṃ kilesavāhiniṃ bodhipakkhiyasenāya jinitvā tassa jitattāyeva anāsavo sukhaṃ viharāmīti.
atk-s0508a2:659_0: Idāni “anāsavo”ti vuttamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “ajjhattañcā” ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:659_2: ajjhattaṃ ajjhattavatthukā ca bahiddhā bahiddhavatthukā ca āsavā ye mayhaṃ ariyamaggādhigamato pubbe vijjiṃsu upalabbhiṃsu,
atk-s0508a2:659_3: te sabbe anavasesā ucchinnā ariyamaggena samucchinnā pahīnā puna dāni kadācipi na ca uppajjeyyuṃ na uppajjissantiyevāti.
atk-s0508a2:660_0: Idāni mātu vacanaṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā attanā arahattassa adhigatattā mātaraṃ thomento “visāradā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:660_2: Evaṃ mātu attano ca arahattādhigamena satthu orasaputtabhāvaṃ ullapento mātaraṃ “bhaginī”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:660_3: Etamatthaṃ abhāsayīti etaṃ mama ovādabhūtaṃ atthaṃ abhaṇi.
atk-s0508a2:660_4: Evaṃ pana maṃ ovadantī na kevalaṃ visāradā eva,
atk-s0508a2:660_5: atha kho apihā nūna mayipi tava puttakepi apihā asanthavā maññe,
atk-s0508a2:660_7: Vanatho te na vijjati avijjādiko vanatho tava santāne nattheva,
atk-s0508a2:661_0: Idāni “tayā niyojitākāreneva mayā paṭipanna”nti dassento “pariyantakata”nti osānagāthamāha,
atk-s0508a2:664_0: Atthāya vata metiādikā āyasmato nadīkassapattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:664_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a2:664_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a2:664_4: attanā ropitassa ambarukkhassa paṭhamuppannaṃ manosilāvaṇṇaṃ ekaṃ ambaphalaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:664_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule uruvelakassapassa bhātā hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0508a2:664_6: Vayappatto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ anicchanto tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tīhi tāpasasatehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:664_7: nerañjarāya nadiyā tīre assamaṃ māpetvā viharati.
atk-s0508a2:664_8: Nadītīre vasanato hissa kassapagottatāya ca nadīkassapoti samaññā ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:664_9: Tassa bhagavā saparisassa ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:674_0: Arahatte pana patiṭṭhito aparabhāge attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā diṭṭhisamugghātakittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:676_0: “Atthāya vata me buddho, nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ agā;
atk-s0508a2:691_0: Tattha atthāya vata meti mayhaṃ atthāya vata hitāya vata.
atk-s0508a2:691_2: Nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ agāti nerañjarāsaṅkhātaṃ nadiṃ agañchi,
atk-s0508a2:691_3: tassā nadiyā tīre ca mama bhātu uruvelakassapassa assamaṃ upagatoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:692_4: Micchādiṭṭhiṃ vivajjayinti “yaññādīhi suddhi hotī”tiādinayappavattaṃ viparītadassanaṃ pajahiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:693_1: Tattha yajiṃ uccāvace yaññeti pākaṭayaññe somayāgavājapeyyādike nānāvidhe yaññe yajiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:693_2: Aggihuttaṃ juhiṃ ahanti tesaṃ yaññānaṃ yajanavasena āhutiṃ paggaṇhanto aggiṃ paricariṃ.
atk-s0508a2:693_3: Esā suddhīti maññantoti esā yaññakiriyā aggipāricariyā suddhihetubhāvato suddhi “evaṃ me saṃsārasuddhi hotī”ti maññamāno.
atk-s0508a2:693_4: Andhabhūto puthujjanoti paññācakkhuvekallena avijjandhatāya andhabhūto puthujjano hutvā vanagahanapabbatagahanādīni
atk-s0508a2:693_7: Parāmāsenāti dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā “idameva sacca”nti parāmasanato parāmāsasaṅkhātena micchābhinivesena.
atk-s0508a2:693_9: Asuddhiṃ maññisaṃ suddhinti asuddhiṃ maggaṃ “suddhiṃ magga”nti maññisaṃ maññiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:694_0: Micchādiṭṭhi pahīnā meti evaṃbhūtassa pana satthu sammukhā catusaccagabbhaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā yoniso
atk-s0508a2:694_1: paṭipajjantassa ariyamaggasammādiṭṭhiyā sabbāpi micchādiṭṭhi samucchedappahānavasena mayhaṃ pahīnā.
atk-s0508a2:694_2: Bhavāti kāmabhavādayo sabbepi bhavā ariyamaggasatthena vidālitā viddhaṃsitā.
atk-s0508a2:694_3: Juhāmi dakkhiṇeyyagginti āhavanīyādike aggī chaḍḍetvā sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyatāya sabbassa
atk-s0508a2:694_4: ca pāpassa dahanato dakkhiṇeyyaggiṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ juhāmi paricarāmi.
atk-s0508a2:694_5: Tayidaṃ mayhaṃ dakkhiṇeyyaggiparicaraṇaṃ dadhinavanītamathitasappiādinirapekkhaṃ satthu namassanamevāti āha “namassāmi tathāgata”nti.
atk-s0508a2:694_6: Atha vā juhāmi dakkhiṇeyyagginti dāyakānaṃ dakkhiṇāya mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena pāpassa ca dahanena dakkhiṇeyyaggibhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a2:694_7: attānaṃ juhāmi paricarāmi tathā katvā paricarāmi,
atk-s0508a2:695_0: Mohā sabbe pahīnā meti dukkhe aññāṇādibhedā sabbe mohā mayhaṃ pahīnā samucchinnā,
atk-s0508a2:695_3: natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti tīsu padesu me-
atk-s0508a2:698_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito ekatiṃse
atk-s0508a2:698_3: kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ pahāya
atk-s0508a2:698_4: tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane assamaṃ kāretvā vanamūlaphalāhāro vasati.
atk-s0508a2:698_5: Tena ca samayena bhagavā eko adutiyo tassa assamasamīpena gacchati.
atk-s0508a2:698_6: So bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito velaṃ oloketvā manoharāni kolaphalāni satthu upanesi.
atk-s0508a2:698_7: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0508a2:698_8: nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā dvīhi tāpasasatehi saddhiṃ gayāyaṃ viharati.
