atk-s0508a2:914_5: So pacchābhattaṃ upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā bhagavato santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0508a2:914_6: kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthetvā mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:914_7: Satthā tassa anantarāyataṃ disvā “anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:915_0: So tattha yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato kāle sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a2:915_1: vattapaṭivattāni pūrento ekassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ sibbitvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:915_2: Puna buddhasuññe loke bārāṇasiyaṃ tunnavāyo hutvā ekassa paccekabuddhassa cīvarakoṭiṃ chinnaṃ ghaṭetvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:915_3: Evaṃ tattha tattha puññāni katvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde avantiraṭṭhe kuraraghare mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:915_5: Koṭiagghanakassa kaṇṇapiḷandhanassa dhāraṇena “koṭikaṇṇo”ti vattabbe kuṭikaṇṇoti paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a2:916_0: So anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapento āyasmante mahākaccāne kulagharaṃ nissāya pavattapabbate
atk-s0508a2:916_1: viharante tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāya taṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0508a2:916_2: So aparabhāge saṃsāre sañjātasaṃvego therassa santike pabbajitvā kicchena kasirena dasavaggaṃ saṅghaṃ
atk-s0508a2:916_3: sannipātetvā upasampajjitvā katipayakālaṃ therassa santike vasitvā,
atk-s0508a2:916_4: theraṃ āpucchitvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ upagato,
atk-s0508a2:916_5: satthārā ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vāsaṃ labhitvā paccūsasamaye ajjhiṭṭho soḷasaaṭṭhakavaggiyānaṃ ussāraṇena sādhukāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:916_6: datvā bhāsitāya “disvā ādīnavaṃ loke”ti udānagāthāya pariyosāne vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:922_0: Sayaṃ vīṇā pavajjanti, buddhassa pavisato puraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:925_0: “Aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadā;
atk-s0508a2:930_0: Arahatte pana patiṭṭhito attano upajjhāyena ācikkhitaniyāmena paccantimesu janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadā,
atk-s0508a2:930_4: cīvaravippavāsoti pañca vare yācitvā te satthu santikā labhitvā punadeva attano vasitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā upajjhāyassa tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0508a2:930_7: Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “upasampanno hutvā attano upajjhāyassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:931_0: So aparabhāge vimuttisukhena viharanto attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā somanassajāto udānavasena –
atk-s0508a2:933_0: “Upasampadā ca me laddhā, vimutto camhi anāsavo;
atk-s0508a2:934_0: So ca me bhagavā diṭṭho, vihāre ca sahāvasiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:948_0: Tattha upasampadā ca me laddhāti yā sā kicchena dasavaggaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā attanā laddhā upasampadā.
atk-s0508a2:948_1: Yā ca pana varadānavasena sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena satthārā anuññātā upasampadā,
atk-s0508a2:948_4: tena itarepi satthu santikā laddhavare saṅgaṇhāti.
atk-s0508a2:948_5: Vimutto camhi anāsavoti aggamaggena sakalakilesavatthuvimuttiyā vimutto ca amhi.
atk-s0508a2:948_6: Tato eva kāmāsavādīhi anāsavo amhīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:948_7: So ca me bhagavā diṭṭhoti yadatthaṃ ahaṃ avantiraṭṭhato sāvatthiṃ gato,
atk-s0508a2:948_8: so ca bhagavā mayā adiṭṭhapubbo diṭṭho.
atk-s0508a2:948_9: Vihāre ca sahāvasinti na kevalaṃ tassa bhagavato dassanameva mayā laddhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:948_10: atha kho vihāre satthu gandhakuṭiyaṃ satthārā kāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā vāsentena saha avasiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:949_0: Bahudeva rattinti paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanāvasena kammaṭṭhānasodhanavasena ca,
atk-s0508a2:949_1: majjhimaṃ yāmaṃ devānaṃ brahmūnañca kaṅkhacchedanavasena bhagavā bahudeva rattiṃ abbhokāse atināmayi vītināmesi.
atk-s0508a2:949_3: Vihāraṃ pāvisīti ativelaṃ nisajjacaṅkamehi uppannaparissamavinodanatthaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0508a2:950_1: seyyaṃ kappesīti catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0508a2:950_5: Yathā sīho migarājā tejussadatāya pahīnabhayabheravo dakkhiṇena passena pāde pādaṃ accādhāya seyyaṃ kappesi,
atk-s0508a2:950_6: evaṃ cittutrāsalomahaṃsanachambhitattahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā pahīnabhayabheravo gotamo bhagavā seyyaṃ kappesīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:951_1: sīhaseyyaṃ kappetvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā “paṭibhātu taṃ bhikkhu dhammo bhāsitu”nti satthārā ajjhesitoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:951_4: Soṇo abhāsi saddhammanti soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggiyasuttāni soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo,
atk-s0508a2:951_6: paccakkhato abhāsīti thero attānameva paraṃ viya avoca.
atk-s0508a2:952_0: Pañcakkhandhe pariññāyāti pañcupādānakkhandhe tīhipi pariññāhi parijānitvā te parijānantoyeva,
atk-s0508a2:952_2: paramaṃ santiṃ nibbānaṃ pappuyya pāpuṇitvā ṭhito anāsavo.
atk-s0508a2:952_3: Tato eva idāni parinibbissati anupādisesanibbānavasena nibbāyissatīti.
atk-s0508a2:955_0: Yo eva garūnantiādikā āyasmato kosiyattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:955_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0508a2:955_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannacitto ucchukhaṇḍikaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:955_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:955_6: So viññutaṃ patto āyasmantaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ abhiṇhaṃ upasaṅkamati,
atk-s0508a2:955_8: So tena sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:963_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā garuvāsaṃ sappurisūpanissayañca pasaṃsanto –
atk-s0508a2:965_0: “Yo ve garūnaṃ vacanaññu dhīro, vase ca tamhi janayetha pemaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:966_0: So bhattimā nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa.
atk-s0508a2:969_0: So thāmavā nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa.
atk-s0508a2:971_0: “Yo ve samuddova ṭhito anejo, gambhīrapañño nipuṇatthadassī;
atk-s0508a2:972_0: Asaṃhāriyo nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa.
atk-s0508a2:974_0: “Bahussuto dhammadharo ca hoti, dhammassa hoti anudhammacārī;
atk-s0508a2:975_0: So tādiso nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa.
atk-s0508a2:982_0: Tattha yoti khattiyādīsu catūsu parisāsu yo koci.
atk-s0508a2:982_4: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāno paṭipajjitvā ca tassa phalaṃ jānantoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:982_6: Vase ca tamhi janayetha pemanti tasmiṃ garūnaṃ vacane ovāde vaseyya yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjeyya,
atk-s0508a2:982_7: paṭipajjitvā “iminā vatāhaṃ ovādena imaṃ jātiādidukkhaṃ vītivatto”ti tattha janayetha pemaṃ gāravaṃ uppādeyya.
atk-s0508a2:982_8: Idañhi dvayaṃ “garūnaṃ vacanaññu dhīro”ti padadvayena vuttassevatthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:982_10: so yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiyā tattha bhattimā ca nāma hoti,
atk-s0508a2:982_11: jīvitahetupi tassa anatikkamanato paṇḍito ca nāma hoti.
atk-s0508a2:982_12: Ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assāti tathā paṭipajjanto ca tāya eva paṭipattiyā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ jānanahetu
atk-s0508a2:983_0: Yanti yaṃ puggalaṃ paṭipattiyā antarāyakaraṇato “āpadā”ti laddhavohārā sotuṇhakhuppipāsādipākaṭaparissayā
atk-s0508a2:983_2: uḷārā balavantopi nakkhambhayante na kiñci cālenti. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a2:983_5: so thāmavā dhitimā daḷhaparakkamo nāma hoti.
atk-s0508a2:983_6: Anavasesasaṃkilesapakkhassa abhibhavanakapaññābalasamaṅgitāya paṇḍito ca nāma hoti.
atk-s0508a2:983_7: Tathābhūto ca ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assāti taṃ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0508a2:984_1: Yathā hi caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīre sinerupādasamīpe mahāsamuddo aṭṭhahipi disāhi uṭṭhitehi pakativātehi aniñjanato ṭhito anejo gambhīro ca,
atk-s0508a2:984_2: evaṃ kilesavātehi titthiyavādavātehi ca akampanīyato ṭhito anejo.
atk-s0508a2:984_3: Gambhīrassa anupacitañāṇasambhārehi aladdhagādhassa nipuṇassa sukhumassa paṭiccasamuppādādiatthassa paṭivijjhanena gambhīrapañño nipuṇatthadassī.
atk-s0508a2:984_4: Asaṃhāriyo nāma ca hoti paṇḍito so tādiso puggalo kilesehi devaputtamārādīsu vā kenaci asaṃhāriyatāya asaṃhāriyo nāma hoti,
atk-s0508a2:984_5: yathāvuttena atthena paṇḍito ca nāma hoti.
atk-s0508a2:985_2: Tameva dhammaṃ suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya avinassantameva dhāretīti dhammadharo ca hoti.
atk-s0508a2:985_3: Dhammassa hoti anudhammacārīti yathāsutassa yathāpariyattassa dhammassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya navalokuttaradhammassa
atk-s0508a2:985_7: So tādiso nāma ca hoti paṇḍitoti yo puggalo yaṃ garuṃ nissāya bahussuto dhammadharo dhammassa ca anudhammacārī hoti.
atk-s0508a2:985_8: So ca tādiso tena garunā sadiso paṇḍito nāma hoti paṭipattiyā sadisabhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:985_9: Tathābhūto pana so ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa,
atk-s0508a2:986_0: Atthañca yo jānāti bhāsitassāti yo puggalo sammāsambuddhena bhāsitassa pariyattidhammassa atthaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0508a2:986_3: idha paññā”ti tattha tattha yathāvuttaṃ atthañca ñatvāna tathā karoti yathā satthārā anusiṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:986_5: Atthantaro nāma sa hoti paṇḍitoti so evarūpo puggalo atthantaro atthakāraṇā sīlādiatthajānanamattameva upanissayaṃ katvā paṇḍito hoti.
atk-s0508a2:987_0: Ettha ca paṭhamagāthāya “yo ve garūna”ntiādinā saddhūpanissayo visesabhāvo vutto,
atk-s0508a2:987_4: pañcamagāthāya “atthañca yo jānātī”tiādinā paññūpanissayo visesabhāvo vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0508a2:992_0: Chakkanipāte disvāna pāṭihīrānītiādikā āyasmato uruvelakassapattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:992_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā,
atk-s0508a2:992_3: vayappatto satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ mahāparisānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā,
atk-s0508a2:992_4: sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānamakāsi.
atk-s0508a2:992_6: “anāgate gotamabuddhassa sāsane mahāparisānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:993_0: So tattha yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito dvānavutikappamatthake phussassa
atk-s0508a2:993_3: Te tayopi buddhappamukhaṃ saṅghaṃ paramāya pūjāya pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a2:993_4: amhākaṃ bhagavato nibbattito puretarameva bārāṇasiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule bhātaro hutvā,
atk-s0508a2:993_5: anukkamena nibbattā gottavasena tayopi kassapā eva nāma jātā.
atk-s0508a2:993_10: Te attano ganthe sāraṃ olokentā diṭṭhadhammikameva atthaṃ disvā pabbajjaṃ rocesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:993_11: Tesu jeṭṭhabhātā attano parivārena saddhiṃ uruvelaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā uruvelakassapo nāma
atk-s0508a2:993_12: jāto mahāgaṅgānadīvaṅke pabbajito nadīkassapo nāma jāto,
atk-s0508a2:994_0: Evaṃ tesu isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tattha tattha vasantesu bahūnaṃ divasānaṃ accayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā,
atk-s0508a2:994_2: pañcavaggiyatthere arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā yasappamukhe pañcapaññāsa sahāyake vinetvā saṭṭhi arahante “caratha,
atk-s0508a2:994_5: bhaddavaggiye vinetvā uruvelakassapassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vasanatthāya agyāgāraṃ pavisitvā,
atk-s0508a2:994_6: tattha katanāgadamanaṃ ādiṃ katvā aḍḍhuḍḍhasahassehi pāṭihāriyehi uruvelakassapaṃ saparisaṃ vinetvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0508a2:994_7: Tassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ ñatvā itarepi dve bhātaro saparisā āgantvā satthu santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:995_0: Satthā taṃ samaṇasahassaṃ ādāya gayāsīsaṃ gantvā piṭṭhipāsāṇe nisinno ādittapariyāyadesanāya sabbe arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:1007_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1017_0: Parisā mahatī hotu, nibbattassa tahiṃ tahiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1025_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:1027_0: Kassapo nāma gottena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a2:1030_0: “So ca sabbaṃ tamaṃ hantvā, vijaṭetvā mahājaṭaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:1037_0: Khemaṃ vijiritaṃ katvā, puna dethāti bhāsatha.
atk-s0508a2:1049_0: Nibbute tamhi lokagge, pūjaṃ katvā yathābalaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1057_0: Bahudhā saṃsito santo, diṭṭhiṃ hitvāna pāpikaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1064_0: “Tadā dve bhātaro mayhaṃ, pabbajiṃsu mayā saha;
atk-s0508a2:1067_0: Tato me āsi paññatti, uruvelakassapo iti.
atk-s0508a2:1071_0: Mama pañca satānūnā, sissā sabbe mamānugā.
atk-s0508a2:1072_0: “Tadā upecca maṃ buddho, katvāna vividhāni me;
atk-s0508a2:1076_0: “Te cevaññe ca bahavo, sissā maṃ parivārayuṃ;
atk-s0508a2:1079_0: Aho buddhe kataṃ kāraṃ, saphalaṃ me ajāyatha.
atk-s0508a2:1081_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā sīhanādaṃ nadanto –
atk-s0508a2:1087_0: Tato me āsi saṃvego, abbhuto lomahaṃsano.
atk-s0508a2:1101_0: Tattha disvāna pāṭihīrānīti nāgarājadamanādīni aḍḍhuḍḍhasahassāni pāṭihāriyāni disvā.
atk-s0508a2:1101_5: Yasassino”ti “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā sadevake loke yathābhuccaṃ patthaṭakittisaddassa.
atk-s0508a2:1101_6: Na tāvāhaṃ paṇipatinti yāva maṃ bhagavā “neva kho tvaṃ, kassapa, arahā,
atk-s0508a2:1101_14: “imassa mayi sāvakattaṃ upagate mama lābhasakkāro parihāyissati,
atk-s0508a2:1101_15: imassa eva vaḍḍhissatī”ti evaṃ parasampattiasahanalakkhaṇāya issāya ceva,
atk-s0508a2:1101_16: “ahaṃ gaṇapāmokkho bahujanasammato”ti evaṃ abbhunnatilakkhaṇena mānena ca vañcito,
atk-s0508a2:1102_1: yaṃ yaṃ bhagavā uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0508a2:1102_2: taṃ taṃ disvā “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo”ti cintetvāpi “na tveva kho arahā yathā aha”nti
atk-s0508a2:1102_3: evaṃ pavattaṃ micchāvitakkaṃ jānantopi ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamento ajjhupekkhitvā pacchā nerañjarāya majjhe
atk-s0508a2:1102_4: samantato udakaṃ ussāretvā reṇuhatāya bhūmiyā caṅkamitvā tena ābhatanāvāya ṭhito tadāpi “mahiddhiko”tiādikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1102_5: cintetvā puna “na tveva kho arahā yathā aha”nti pavattitaṃ micchāsaṅkappaṃ ñatvāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1102_6: Codesi narasārathīti tadā me ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā “neva kho tvaṃ arahā”tiādinā purisadammasārathi satthā maṃ codesi niggaṇhi.
atk-s0508a2:1102_8: abbhuto lomahaṃsanoti tato yathāvuttacodanāhetu ettakaṃ kālaṃ abhūtapubbatāya abbhuto lomahaṃsanavasena
atk-s0508a2:1102_9: pavattiyā lomahaṃsano “anarahāva samāno ‘arahā’ti maññi”nti saṃvego sahottappo ñāṇuppādo mayhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:1104_2: Kāmadhātupurakkhatoti kāmasugatiṃ ārabbha uppannataṇho yaññayajanena kāmalokaṃ purakkhatvā ṭhito.
atk-s0508a2:1104_5: Na hi akusalassa iṭṭho kanto vipāko nibbattati.
atk-s0508a2:1104_8: Pacchāti tāpasapabbajjāto pacchā satthu ovādena tāpasaladdhiṃ pahāya catusaccakammaṭṭhānānuyogakāle.
atk-s0508a2:1104_9: Samūhaninti vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā rāgañca dosañca mohañca anavasesato samugghātesiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1105_0: Yasmā panāyaṃ thero ariyamaggena rāgādayo samūhanantoyeva chaḷabhiñño ahosi,
atk-s0508a2:1105_1: tasmā taṃ attano chaḷabhiññabhāvaṃ dassento “pubbenivāsaṃ jānāmī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:1105_2: Tattha pubbenivāsaṃ jānāmīti attano paresañca pubbenivāsaṃ atītāsu jātīsu nibbattakkhandhe khandhapaṭibaddhe
atk-s0508a2:1105_3: ca pubbenivāsañāṇena hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya paccakkhato jānāmi bujjhāmi.
atk-s0508a2:1105_5: pakaticakkhunā āpāthagataṃ pakatirūpaṃ viya dibbaṃ mānusampi dūraṃ tiroṭṭhitaṃ atisukhumañca rūpaṃ vibhāvetuṃ
atk-s0508a2:1105_6: samatthañāṇaṃ bhāvanāya mayā visuddhaṃ katvā paṭiladdhanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1106_1: sabbasaṃyojanakkhayoti yo sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khayabhūto khayena vā laddhabbo,
atk-s0508a2:1106_2: so sadattho paramattho ca mayā ariyamaggādhigamena adhigatoti.
atk-s0508a2:1106_3: Evametāya gāthāya therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti veditabbo.
atk-s0508a2:1109_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa
atk-s0508a2:1109_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā vejjasatthe nipphattiṃ gato.
atk-s0508a2:1109_4: Vipassissa bhagavato upaṭṭhākaṃ asokaṃ nāma theraṃ byādhitaṃ arogamakāsi,
atk-s0508a2:1109_5: aññesañca sattānaṃ rogābhibhūtānaṃ anukampāya bhesajjaṃ saṃvidahi.
atk-s0508a2:1110_0: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde subuddhassa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:1110_1: Tassa tikicchakehi gabbhakāle parissayaṃ apaharitvā paripālitatāya tekicchakārīti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:1110_2: So attano kulānurūpāni vijjāṭṭhānāni sippāni ca sikkhanto vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0508a2:1110_3: Tadā cāṇakko subuddhassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ kiriyāsu upāyakosallañca disvā,
atk-s0508a2:1110_4: “ayaṃ imasmiṃ rājakule patiṭṭhaṃ labhanto maṃ abhibhaveyyā”ti issāpakato raññā candaguttena taṃ bandhanāgāre khipāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:1110_5: Tekicchakārī pitu bandhanāgārappavesanaṃ sutvā bhīto palāyitvā sāṇavāsittherassa santikaṃ gantvā attano
atk-s0508a2:1110_6: saṃvegakāraṇaṃ therassa kathetvā pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā abbhokāsiko nesajjiko ca hutvā viharati,
atk-s0508a2:1110_9: Taṃ disvā māro pāpimā “na imassa mama visayaṃ atikkamituṃ dassāmī”ti vikkhepaṃ kātukāmo sassānaṃ nipphattikāle
atk-s0508a2:1110_10: khettagopakavaṇṇena therassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ nippaṇḍento –
atk-s0508a2:1113_0: Na ca labhe piṇḍaṃ, kathamahaṃ kassa”nti. – āha; Taṃ sutvā thero –
atk-s0508a2:1115_0: “Buddhamappameyyaṃ anussara pasanno, pītiyā phuṭasarīro hohisi satatamudaggo.
atk-s0508a2:1122_0: Mā sītena pareto vihaññittho, pavisa tvaṃ vihāraṃ phusitaggaḷa”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:1125_0: “Phusissaṃ catasso appamaññāyo, tāhi ca sukhito viharissaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:1126_0: Nāhaṃ sītena vihaññissaṃ, aniñjito viharanto”ti. – āha;
atk-s0508a2:1127_0: Tattha atihitā vīhīti vīhayo koṭṭhāgāraṃ atinetvā ṭhapitā,
atk-s0508a2:1127_1: tattha paṭisāmitā khalato vā gharaṃ upanītāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1127_3: Sālī pana yebhuyyena vīhito pacchā paccantīti āha.
atk-s0508a2:1127_8: gāmato bahi ca dhaññaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ ṭhitanti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:1127_9: Na ca labhe piṇḍanti evaṃ sulabhadhaññe subhikkhakāle ahaṃ piṇḍamattampi na labhāmi.
atk-s0508a2:1127_10: Idāni kathamahaṃ kassanti ahaṃ kathaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0508a2:1128_0: Taṃ sutvā thero “ayaṃ varāko attanā attano pavattiṃ mayhaṃ pakāsesi,
atk-s0508a2:1128_2: na mayā kiñci kathetabba”nti vatthuttayānussatiyaṃ attānaṃ niyojento “buddhamappameyya”ntiādinā tisso gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1128_3: Tattha buddhamappameyyaṃ anussara pasannoti savāsanāya avijjāniddāya accantavigamena,
atk-s0508a2:1128_4: buddhiyā ca vikasitabhāvena buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pamāṇakarānaṃ rāgādikilesānaṃ abhāvā aparimāṇaguṇasamaṅgitāya appameyyapuññakkhettatāya ca appameyyaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1128_6: pasannamānaso “itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”tiādinā anussara anu anu buddhārammaṇaṃ satiṃ pavattehi,
atk-s0508a2:1128_8: Satatamudaggoti anussarantova pharaṇalakkhaṇāya pītiyā satataṃ sabbadā phuṭasarīro pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpehi
atk-s0508a2:1128_9: ajjhotthaṭasarīro ubbegapītiyā udaggo kāyaṃ udaggaṃ katvā ākāsaṃ laṅghituṃ samattho ca bhaveyyāsi,
atk-s0508a2:1128_11: Yato sītuṇhehi viya jighacchāpipāsāhipi anabhibhūto hohisīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1130_0: Evaṃ therena ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇe niyojanavasena attani ovadite puna māro vivekavāsato naṃ vivecetukāmo
atk-s0508a2:1130_1: hitesībhāvaṃ viya dassento “abbhokāse viharasī”ti pañcamaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:1130_3: abbhokāse kenaci apaṭicchanne vivaṭaṅgaṇe viharasi iriyāpathe kappesi.
atk-s0508a2:1130_4: Hemantikā himapātasamaye pariyāpannā imā sītā rattiyo vattanti.
atk-s0508a2:1130_5: Tasmā sītena pareto abhibhūto hutvā mā vihaññittho vighātaṃ mā āpajji mā kilami.
atk-s0508a2:1131_0: Taṃ sutvā thero “na mayhaṃ senāsanapariyesanāya payojanaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1131_2: Tattha phusissaṃ catasso appamaññāyoti appamāṇagocaratāya “appamaññā”ti laddhavohāre cattāro brahmavihāre phusissaṃ phusissāmi,
atk-s0508a2:1131_4: Tāhi ca sukhito viharissanti tāhi appamaññāhi sukhito sañjātasukho hutvā viharissaṃ cattāropi iriyāpathe kappessāmīti.
atk-s0508a2:1131_7: Yato nāhaṃ sītena vihaññissaṃ antaraṭṭhakepi himapātasamaye ahaṃ sītena na kilamissāmi,
atk-s0508a2:1131_8: tasmā aniñjito viharanto cittassa iñjitakāraṇānaṃ byāpādādīnaṃ suppahīnattā paccayuppanniñjanāya ca abhāvato samāpattisukheneva sukhito viharissāmīti.
atk-s0508a2:1131_9: Evaṃ thero imaṃ gāthaṃ vadantoyeva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1143_0: Ettha ca bindusārarañño kāle imassa therassa uppannattā tatiyasaṅgītiyaṃ imā gāthā saṅgītāti veditabbā.
atk-s0508a2:1146_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto kakusandhassa
atk-s0508a2:1146_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ kakusandhaṃ bhagavantaṃ araññaṃ ajjhogāhetvā
atk-s0508a2:1146_4: aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle jhānasukhena nisinnaṃ disvā pasannamānaso tassa dāḷimaphalaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1146_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sākete madhuvāseṭṭhassa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:1146_7: So viññutaṃ patto bhagavati sākete añjanavane viharante āyasmato gavampatittherassa pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a2:1146_8: paṭiladdhasaddho therasseva santike pabbajitvā tassovāde ṭhatvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:1156_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhena viharanto thero chabbaggiye bhikkhū sabrahmacārīsu gāravaṃ akatvā viharante disvā tesaṃ ovādadānavasena –
atk-s0508a2:1162_0: Na virūhati saddhamme, khette bījaṃva pūtikaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1168_0: Na vihāyati saddhammā, maccho bavhodake yathā.
atk-s0508a2:1171_0: So virūhati saddhamme, khette bījaṃva bhaddakaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1176_0: Tattha sabrahmacārīsūti samānaṃ brahmaṃ sīlādidhammaṃ carantīti sabrahmacārino,
atk-s0508a2:1176_7: Satthā hi sadevakaṃ lokaṃ yathārahaṃ lokiyalokuttarena dhammena rañjeti tosetīti dhammarājā.
atk-s0508a2:1176_8: Ettha ca “dhammarājassa sāsane”ti iminā nibbānaṃ nāma dhammarājasseva sāsane,
atk-s0508a2:1176_12: tathā dhammarājassa sāsanatopi ārakā hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:1176_14: Santike hoti nibbānanti nibbānaṃ tassa santike samīpe eva hoti.
atk-s0508a2:1176_16: Imā eva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1179_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1179_3: kuṭumbiyakule nibbattitvā kulloti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji.
atk-s0508a2:1179_5: Tenassa abhikkhaṇaṃ kilesā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0508a2:1179_6: Athassa satthā cittācāraṃ ñatvā asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā, “kulla,
atk-s0508a2:1179_7: tayā abhiṇhaṃ susāne cārikā caritabbā”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:1179_8: So susānaṃ pavisitvā uddhumātakādīni tāni tāni asubhāni disvā taṃ muhuttaṃ asubhamanasikāraṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0508a2:1179_10: Puna bhagavā tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā ekadivasaṃ tassa susānaṭṭhānaṃ gatakāle ekaṃ taruṇitthirūpaṃ adhunā mataṃ avinaṭṭhacchaviṃ nimminitvā dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:1179_11: Tassa taṃ diṭṭhamattassa jīvamānavisabhāgavatthusmiṃ viya sahasā rāgo uppajjati.
atk-s0508a2:1179_12: Atha naṃ satthā tassa pekkhantasseva navahi vaṇamukhehi paggharamānāsuciṃ kimikulākulaṃ ativiya bībhacchaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1179_14: So taṃ pekkhanto virattacitto hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1179_15: Athassa bhagavā obhāsaṃ pharitvā satiṃ janento –
atk-s0508a2:1182_1: Taṃ sutvā thero sammadeva sarīrasabhāvaṃ upadhārento asubhasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā tattha paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1182_2: nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā –
atk-s0508a2:1192_0: “Yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:1193_0: Yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho.
atk-s0508a2:1195_0: “Yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā;
atk-s0508a2:1196_0: Yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure.
atk-s0508a2:1201_0: Tattha kulloti attānameva thero paraṃ viya katvā vadati.
atk-s0508a2:1202_5: Udānakāle pana thero sayameva attānaṃ vadati.
atk-s0508a2:1202_8: Paggharantanti adho vaṇamukhehi samantato ca asuciṃ savantaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1202_9: Bālānaṃ abhinanditanti bālehi andhaputhujjanehi diṭṭhitaṇhābhinandanāhi “ahaṃ mama”nti abhinivissa nanditaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1203_1: Yathā hi sattā adāsena attano mukhe kāye vā guṇadose passanti,
atk-s0508a2:1203_2: evaṃ yogāvacaro yena attabhāve saṃkilesavodānadhamme yāthāvato passati,
atk-s0508a2:1203_4: Taṃ ñāṇadassanassa maggañāṇasaṅkhātassa dhammacakkhussa adhigamāya attano santāne uppādetvā.
atk-s0508a2:1203_5: Paccavekkhiṃ imaṃ kāyanti imaṃ karajakāyaṃ niccasārādivirahato tucchaṃ attaparasantānānaṃ vibhāgato santarabāhiraṃ ñāṇacakkhunā patiavekkhiṃ passiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1204_2: Tattha yathā idaṃ tathā etanti yathā idaṃ mayhaṃ sarīrasaṅkhātaṃ asubhaṃ āyuusmāviññāṇānaṃ anapagamā nānāvidhaṃ māyopamaṃ kiriyaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0508a2:1204_3: tathāva etaṃ matasarīraṃ pubbe tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anapagamā ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:1204_4: Yathā etaṃ etarahi matasarīraṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ apagamā na kiñci kiriyaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0508a2:1204_5: tathā idaṃ mama sarīrampi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ apagamā nassatevāti.
atk-s0508a2:1204_6: Yathā ca idaṃ mama sarīraṃ etarahi susāne na mataṃ na sayitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1204_8: tathā etaṃ etarahi matasarīrampi pubbe ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:1204_9: Yathā panetaṃ etarahi matasarīraṃ susāne sayitaṃ uddhumātakādibhāvaṃ upagataṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1204_11: Atha vā yathā idaṃ mama sarīraṃ asuci duggandhaṃ jegucchaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā,
atk-s0508a2:1204_13: Yathā vā etaṃ matasarīraṃ asuciādisabhāvañceva aniccādisabhāvañca,
atk-s0508a2:1204_15: Yathā adho tathā uddhanti yathā nābhito adho heṭṭhā ayaṃ kāyo asuci duggandho jeguccho paṭikkūlo anicco dukkho anattā ca,
atk-s0508a2:1204_16: tathā uddhaṃ nābhito upari asuciādisabhāvo ca.
atk-s0508a2:1204_17: Yathā uddhaṃ tathā adhoti yathā ca nābhito,
atk-s0508a2:1205_0: Yathā divā tathā rattinti yathā ayaṃ kāyo divā “akkhimhā akkhigūthako”tiādinā asuci paggharati,
atk-s0508a2:1205_2: Yathā rattiṃ tathā divāti yathā ca rattiṃ ayaṃ kāyo asuci paggharati,
atk-s0508a2:1205_5: Yathā pure tathā pacchāti yathā ayaṃ kāyo pure pubbe taruṇakāle asuci duggandho jeguccho paṭikkūlo,
atk-s0508a2:1205_9: Yathā vā pure atītakāle saviññāṇakāle asuciādisabhāvo ca aniccādisabhāvo ca,
atk-s0508a2:1205_10: tathā pacchā anāgatakāle aviññāṇakāleti evampettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0508a2:1206_0: Pañcaṅgikena turiyenāti “ātataṃ vitataṃ ātatavitataṃ ghanaṃ susīra”nti evaṃ pañcaṅgikena pañcahi aṅgehi
atk-s0508a2:1206_1: samannāgatena turiyena paricariyamānassa kāmasukhasamaṅgino issarajanassa tādisī tathārūpā rati sukhassādo na hoti.
atk-s0508a2:1206_3: sammā dhammaṃ vipassatoti samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ katvā indriyānaṃ ekarasabhāvena vīthipaṭipannāya
atk-s0508a2:1206_4: vipassanāya khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ passantassa yogāvacarassa yādisā dhammarati,
atk-s0508a2:1209_0: Imā eva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthāpi ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1212_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1212_6: So vayappatto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ pahāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vicaranto satthu
atk-s0508a2:1212_7: santike dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:1212_9: Taṃ ñātakā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena parivisitvā dhanena palobhetukāmā mahantaṃ dhanarāsiṃ purato upaṭṭhapetvā “idaṃ dhanaṃ tava santakaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1212_10: vibbhamitvā iminā dhanena puttadāraṃ paṭijagganto puññāni karohī”ti yāciṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:1212_11: Thero tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viparivattento ākāse ṭhatvā –
atk-s0508a2:1215_0: So plavatī hurā huraṃ, phalamicchaṃva vanasmi vānaro.
atk-s0508a2:1217_0: “Yaṃ esā sahate jammī, taṇhā loke visattikā;
atk-s0508a2:1220_0: “Yo cetaṃ sahate jammiṃ, taṇhaṃ loke duraccayaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:1223_0: “Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddaṃ vo, yāvantettha samāgatā;
atk-s0508a2:1225_0: Mā vo naḷaṃva sotova, māro bhañji punappunaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1233_5: Yathā pana rukkhaṃ saṃsibbantī pariyonandhantī tassa vināsāya māluvā latā vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0508a2:1233_6: evamassa cha dvārāni nissāya rūpādīsu punappunaṃ uppajjamānā taṇhā vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0508a2:1233_7: Vaḍḍhamānāva yathā māluvā latā attano apassayabhūtaṃ rukkhaṃ ajjhottharitvā pāteti,
atk-s0508a2:1233_9: So plavatīti so taṇhāvasiko puggalo aparāparaṃ bhavābhave uplavati dhāvati.
atk-s0508a2:1233_11: Phalamicchaṃva vanasmi vānaro yathā rukkhaphalaṃ icchanto vānaro vanasmiṃ dhāvanto rukkhassa ekaṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0508a2:1233_13: taṃ muñcitvā aññanti “sākhaṃ alabhitvā nisinno”ti vattabbataṃ nāpajjati;
atk-s0508a2:1233_14: evameva taṇhāvasiko puggalo hurā huraṃ dhāvanto “ārammaṇaṃ alabhitvā taṇhāya appavattiṃ patto”ti vattabbataṃ nāpajjati.
atk-s0508a2:1234_1: Esā lāmakabhāvena jammī visāhāratāya visamūlatāya visaphalatāya visaparibhogatāya rūpādīsu visattatāya
atk-s0508a2:1234_2: āsattatāya ca visattikāti saṅkhaṃ gatā chadvārikā taṇhā sahate abhibhavati tassa puggalassa.
atk-s0508a2:1234_3: Yathā nāma vane punappunaṃ vassante deve abhivaṭṭhaṃ bīraṇaṃ bīraṇatiṇaṃ vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0508a2:1234_4: evaṃ vaṭṭamūlakā sokā abhivaḍḍhanti vuddhiṃ āpajjantīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1235_1: duraccayanti yo pana puggalo evaṃ vuttappakāraṃ atikkamituṃ pajahituṃ dukkaratāya duraccayaṃ taṇhaṃ sahate abhibhavati,
atk-s0508a2:1235_3: Yathā nāma pokkhare padumapatte patitaṃ udabindu na patiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0508a2:1236_0: Taṃ vo vadāmīti tena kāraṇena ahaṃ tumhe vadāmi.
atk-s0508a2:1236_2: mā taṇhaṃ anuvattapuggalo viya vibhavaṃ anatthaṃ pāpuṇāthāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1236_3: Yāvantettha samāgatāti imasmiṃ ṭhāne yattakā sannipatitā, tattakā.
atk-s0508a2:1236_5: Taṇhāya mūlaṃ khaṇatha imissā chadvārikataṇhāya mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ avijjādikilesaggahanaṃ arahattamaggañāṇakudālena khaṇatha samucchindatha.
atk-s0508a2:1236_7: Usīratthova bīraṇaṃ yathā usīrena atthiko puriso mahantena kudālena bīraṇāparanāmaṃ usīraṃ nāma tiṇaṃ khaṇati,
atk-s0508a2:1236_10: māro bhañji punappunanti tumhe nadītīre jātaṃ naḷaṃ mahāvegena āgato nadīsoto viya kilesamāro maccumāro devaputtamāro ca punappunaṃ mā bhañjīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1237_2: mā pamādatthā”tiādinā vuttaṃ buddhassa bhagavato vacanaṃ karotha,
atk-s0508a2:1237_4: Khaṇo vo mā upaccagāti yo hi buddhavacanaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0508a2:1237_5: taṃ puggalaṃ ayaṃ buddhuppādakkhaṇo patirūpadesavāse uppattikkhaṇo sammadiṭṭhiyā paṭiladdhakkhaṇo channaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1237_8: Khaṇātītāti ye hi taṃ khaṇaṃ atītā,
atk-s0508a2:1237_9: ye vā puggale so khaṇo atīto,
atk-s0508a2:1237_10: te nirayamhi samappitā tattha nibbattā cirakālaṃ socanti.
atk-s0508a2:1238_0: Pamādo rajoti rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu sativossaggalakkhaṇo pamādo,
atk-s0508a2:1238_2: Pamādānupatito rajoti yo hi koci rajo nāma rāgādiko,
atk-s0508a2:1238_6: Abbahe sallamattanoti attano hadayanissitaṃ rāgādisallaṃ uddhareyya samūhaneyyāti.
atk-s0508a2:1241_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:1241_5: So vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kilesābhibhavena cetosamādhiṃ alabhanto
atk-s0508a2:1241_6: brahmacariyaṃ caritvā saṃvegajāto pacchā satthaṃ āharanto yoniso manasikāraṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā
atk-s0508a2:1249_0: “Satthaṃ vā āharissāmi, ko attho jīvitena me;
atk-s0508a2:1250_0: Kathañhi sikkhaṃ paccakkhaṃ, kālaṃ kubbetha mādiso.
atk-s0508a2:1259_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:1261_1: yato pabbajito ahanti yato paṭṭhāya ahaṃ pabbajito tānimāni paṇṇavīsativassāni.
atk-s0508a2:1261_3: cetosantimanajjhaganti sohaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caranto accharāsaṅghātamattampi aṅguliphoṭanamattampi
atk-s0508a2:1261_4: khaṇaṃ cetosantiṃ cetaso samādhānaṃ na labhiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1262_4: Bāhā paggayha kandantoti “idamidha ativiya ayuttaṃ vattati,
atk-s0508a2:1262_5: yadāhaṃ niyyānike sāsane pabbajitvā attānaṃ kilesapaṅkato uddharituṃ na sakkomī”ti uddhaṃmukho bāhā paggayha kandamāno.
atk-s0508a2:1263_11: Kathañhi nāma mādiso sikkhāpaccakkhānena kālaṃ kareyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1263_17: “Sikkhaṃ paccakkhā”ti pana pāṭhe kathañhi nāma mādiso sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya kālaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0508a2:1263_18: sikkhāsamaṅgī eva pana hutvā kālaṃ kareyya?
atk-s0508a2:1264_0: Tadāhanti yadā kilesābhibhavena samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya jīvite nibbindanto tadā.
atk-s0508a2:1264_3: Mañcakamhi upāvisinti paresaṃ nivāraṇabhayena ovarakaṃ pavisitvā mañcake nisīdiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1265_1: yoniso udapajjathāti “yadāhaṃ marissāmī”ti kaṇṭhe dhamaniṃ chindituṃ khuraṃ upanesiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1265_2: tato paraṃ “arogaṃ nu kho me sīla”nti paccavekkhantassa akkhaṇḍaṃ acchiddaṃ suparisuddhaṃ sīlaṃ disvā pīti uppajji,
atk-s0508a2:1265_4: passaddhakāyassa nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ anubhavantassa cittassa samāhitatāya vipassanāvasena yoniso manasikāro uppajji.
atk-s0508a2:1265_5: Atha vā tatoti kaṇṭhe khurassa upanayato vaṇe jāte uppannaṃ vedanaṃ vikkhambhento vipassanāya vasena yonisomanasikāro uppajji.
atk-s0508a2:1265_6: Idāni tato paraṃ maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “ādīnavo pāturahū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1268_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1268_3: aññatarassa kosiyagottassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatto,
atk-s0508a2:1268_4: mātugottavasena pana kātiyānoti laddhanāmo vayappatto sāmaññakānittherassa gihisahāyo theraṃ disvā pabbajito
atk-s0508a2:1268_5: samaṇadhammaṃ karonto rattiṃ “niddābhibhavaṃ vinodessāmī”ti caṅkamaṃ āruhi.
atk-s0508a2:1268_6: So caṅkamanto niddāya abhibhūto pacalāyamāno paripatitvā tattheva anantarahitāya bhūmiyā nipajji,
atk-s0508a2:1268_7: satthā tassa taṃ pavattiṃ disvā sayaṃ tattha gantvā ākāse ṭhatvā “kātiyānā”ti saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1268_8: So satthāraṃ disvā uṭṭhahitvā vanditvā saṃvegajāto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1270_0: “Uṭṭhehi nisīda kātiyāna, mā niddābahulo ahu jāgarassu;
atk-s0508a2:1271_0: Mā taṃ alasaṃ pamattabandhu, kūṭeneva jinātu maccurājā.
atk-s0508a2:1274_0: So karohi sudīpamattano tvaṃ, na hi tāṇaṃ tava vijjateva aññaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1276_0: “Satthā hi vijesi maggametaṃ, saṅgā jātijarābhayā atītaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:1280_0: Mā khiḍḍāratiñca mā niddaṃ, anuyuñjittha jhāya kātiyāna.
atk-s0508a2:1283_0: Pappuyya anuttaraṃ visuddhiṃ, parinibbāhisi vārināva joti.
atk-s0508a2:1286_0: Evampi tuvaṃ anādiyāno, māraṃ indasagotta niddhunāhi;
atk-s0508a2:1287_0: So vedayitāsu vītarāgo, kālaṃ kaṅkha idheva sītibhūto”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:1289_0: Tattha uṭṭhehīti niddūpagamanato uṭṭhahanto uṭṭhānavīriyaṃ karohi.
atk-s0508a2:1289_3: Nisīdāti pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā nisīda.
atk-s0508a2:1289_5: Mā niddābahulo ahūti niddābahulo niddābhibhūto mā ahu.
atk-s0508a2:1289_8: Mā taṃ alasanti jāgariyaṃ ananuyuñjantaṃ taṃ alasaṃ kusītaṃ pamattabandhu maccurājā kūṭeneva adduhanena
atk-s0508a2:1289_9: viya nesādo migaṃ vā pakkhiṃ vā jarārogehi mā jinātu mā abhibhavatu,
atk-s0508a2:1290_2: Evanti yathā nāma mahāsamuddaūmivego uparūpari uṭṭhahanto taṃ abhikkamituṃ asakkontaṃ purisaṃ abhibhavati,
atk-s0508a2:1290_3: evaṃ jāti jarā ca kosajjābhibhūtaṃ taṃ ativattate uparūpari ajjhottharati.
atk-s0508a2:1290_5: catūhi oghehi anajjhottharaṇīyaṃ arahattaphalasaṅkhātaṃ sudīpaṃ attano karohi attano santāne uppādehi.
atk-s0508a2:1290_6: Na hi tāṇaṃ tava vijjateva aññanti hīti hetuatthe nipāto.
atk-s0508a2:1290_7: Yasmā tato aggaphalato aññaṃ tava tāṇaṃ nāma idha vā huraṃ vā na upalabbhati,
atk-s0508a2:1291_0: Satthā hi vijesi maggametanti yaṃ sādhetuṃ avisahantā yato parājitā puthū aññatitthiyā,
atk-s0508a2:1291_1: tadetaṃ tassa sudīpassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ pañcavidhasaṅgato jātiādibhayato ca atītaṃ ariyamaggaṃ devaputtamārādike
atk-s0508a2:1291_3: Yasmā satthu santakaṃ nāma sāvakena adhigantabbaṃ na vissajjetabbaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1291_4: tasmā tassa adhigamāya pubbarattāpararattaṃ purimayāmaṃ pacchimayāmañca,
atk-s0508a2:1291_5: appamatto sato sampajāno hutvā anuyuñja yogaṃ bhāvanaṃ daḷhañca karohi.
atk-s0508a2:1292_0: Purimāni pamuñca bandhanānīti purimakāni gihikāle ābaddhāni gihibandhanāni kāmaguṇabandhanāni pamuñca vissajjehi,
atk-s0508a2:1292_4: Yasmā tvaṃ saṅghāṭipāruto muṇḍo bhikkhāhāro jīvati,
atk-s0508a2:1292_5: tasmā te kāmasukhānuyogo khiḍḍāratiniddānuyogo ca na yuttoti tato purimāni pamuñca bandhanāni khiḍḍāratiṃ niddañca mānuyuñjitthāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:1293_0: Taṃ pana anuyuñjanto yena jhānena jhāyato kilesā sabbaso jitā honti,
atk-s0508a2:1293_1: taṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ anuyuñjāti dassento “jhāyāhi jināhī”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:1293_2: Yogakkhemapathesu kovidosīti catūhi yogehi khemassa nibbānassa pathabhūtesu bodhipakkhiyadhammesu kusalo cheko asi,
atk-s0508a2:1293_4: visuddhiṃ nibbānaṃ arahattañca pappuyya pāpuṇitvā pana tvaṃ parinibbāhisi.
atk-s0508a2:1293_5: Vārināva jotīti mahatā salilavuṭṭhinipātena aggikhandho viya ariyamaggavuṭṭhinipātena parinibbāyissati.
atk-s0508a2:1294_5: yathā vaṭṭiādipaccayavekallena parittaraṃso mandapabho padīpo appikā latā vā vātena vidhamiyyati viddhaṃsiyyati,
atk-s0508a2:1294_10: Māraṃ tassa vase anāvattanā anupādānato ca anādiyāno,
atk-s0508a2:1294_12: Evaṃ pana viddhaṃsamāno so tvaṃ vedayitāsu sabbāsu vedanāsu vigatacchandarāgo idheva imasmiṃyeva attabhāve
atk-s0508a2:1294_13: sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhābhāvena sītibhūto nibbuto attano parinibbānakālaṃ kaṅkha āgamehīti.
atk-s0508a2:1294_14: Evaṃ satthārā anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpetvā desanāya katāya thero desanāvasāne vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:1294_15: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthārā desitaniyāmeneva imā gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1294_16: Tā eva imā gāthā therassa aññābyākaraṇañca jātā.
atk-s0508a2:1297_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1297_5: So vihāraṃ gantvā abhiṇhaso dhammassavanena paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:1316_0: Mahākhemaṅgamo santo, pariyosānabhaddako”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:1317_1: veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthānaṃ yāthāvato vibhāvanavasena desitoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1317_3: pavattinivattīnaṃ tadubhayahetūnañca aviparītato pakāsanavasena bhāsito svākhyātoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1317_16: Tato sañjātatāya sākiyā ādiccagottāti bhagavā “ādiccabandhū”ti vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:1317_17: Atha vā ādiccassa bandhūtipi bhagavā ādiccabandhu,
atk-s0508a2:1317_19: Kāmarāgasaṃyojanādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ samatikkamanabhāvato sabbasaṃyojanātīto tato eva kilesakammavipākavaṭṭānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1317_23: kāmataṇhādīnaṃ sabbataṇhānaṃ mūlaṃ avijjaṃ ayoniso manasikārañca visoseti sukkhāpetīti taṇhāmūlavisosano,
atk-s0508a2:1317_24: tiṇṇampi vedānaṃ sampaṭivedhassa viddhaṃsanato visassa dukkhassa kāraṇattā visamūlaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1317_25: sattānaṃ byasanuppattiṭṭhānatāya āghātanaṃ kammaṃ kilesaṃ vā chetvā samucchinditvā nibbutiṃ nibbānaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0508a2:1318_0: Aññāṇassa mūlaṃ ayoniso manasikāro āsavā ca “āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo”ti hi vuttaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1318_2: Atha vā “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādivacanato aññāṇaṃ mūlaṃ etassāti aññāṇamūlaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1318_6: Viññāṇānaṃ pariggaheti kāmabhavādīsu yathāsakakammunā viññāṇaggahaṇe upaṭṭhiteti vacanaseso.
atk-s0508a2:1318_7: Tattha tattha hi bhave paṭisandhiyā gahitāya taṃtaṃbhavanissitaviññāṇānipi gahitāneva honti.
atk-s0508a2:1318_10: Lokuttaradhammo hi uppajjamāno sattamabhavādīsu uppajjanārahāni viññāṇāni bhindattameva uppajjatīti.
atk-s0508a2:1319_0: Vedanānaṃ viññāpanoti sukhādīnaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ yathākkamaṃ dukkhasallāniccavasena yāthāvato pavedako.
atk-s0508a2:1319_1: Upādānappamocanoti kāmupādānādīhi catūhipi upādānehi cittasantānassa vimocako.
atk-s0508a2:1319_3: ñāṇena anupassanoti kāmabhavādinavavidhampi bhavaṃ ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvato sādhikaporisaṃ aṅgārakāsuṃ viya maggañāṇena anupaccakkhato dassetā.
atk-s0508a2:1320_0: Santapaṇītabhāvato atittikaraṭṭhena mahāraso pariññādivasena vā mahākiccatāya sāmaññaphalavasena mahāsampattitāya ca mahāraso,
atk-s0508a2:1320_1: anupacitasambhārehi duravagāhatāya alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhatāya ca suṭṭhu gambhīro jarāmaccunivāraṇo,
atk-s0508a2:1320_2: āyatiṃ bhavābhinipphattiyā nivattanena jarāya maccuno ca paṭisedhako.
atk-s0508a2:1320_3: Idāni yathāvuttaguṇavisesayuttaṃ dhammaṃ sarūpato dassento “ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko”ti vatvā punapi tassa katipaye
atk-s0508a2:1321_0: Yathā ito bāhirakasamaye asammāsambuddhapaveditattā kammavipāko vipallāso siyāti evaṃ avipallāsetvā paṭiccuppannadhammānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1321_1: paṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kammaṃ kammanti vipākañca vipākato ñatvāna pubbabhāgañāṇena jānanahetu sassatucchedaggāhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1321_2: vidhamanena yāthāvato ālokadassano takkarassa lokuttarañāṇālokassa dassano.
atk-s0508a2:1321_3: Kenaci kañci kadācipi anupaddutattā mahākhemaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati satte gameti cāti mahākhemaṅgamo,
atk-s0508a2:1321_5: akuppāya cetovimuttiyā anupādisesāya ca nibbānadhātuyā pāpanena pariyosānabhaddako sudesito cakkhumatāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:1322_0: Evaṃ thero nānānayehi ariyadhammaṃ pasaṃsanto tassa dhammassa attanā adhigatabhāvaṃ aññāpadesena pakāsesi.
atk-s0508a2:1325_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1325_5: So vayappatto jātimadena bhogaissariyarūpamadena ca matto aññe hīḷento garuṭṭhāniyānampi apacitiṃ akaronto mānathaddho vicarati.
atk-s0508a2:1325_6: So ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā upasaṅkamanto “sace maṃ samaṇo gotamo paṭhamaṃ ālapissati,
atk-s0508a2:1325_8: nālapissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā upasaṅkamitvā ṭhito bhagavati paṭhamaṃ anālapante sayampi mānena anālapitvā gamanākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0508a2:1328_1: So “cittaṃ me samaṇo gotamo jānātī”ti abhippasanno bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā paramanipaccākāraṃ katvā –
atk-s0508a2:1329_0: “Kesu na mānaṃ kayirātha, kesu cassa sagāravo;
atk-s0508a2:1330_0: Kyassa apacitā assu, kyassu sādhu supūjitā”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:1334_0: “Tesu na mānaṃ kayirātha, tesu assa sagāravo;
atk-s0508a2:1335_0: Kyassa apacitā assu, tyassu sādhu supūjitā.
atk-s0508a2:1337_0: Nihacca mānaṃ atthaddho, te namasse anuttare”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:1338_1: So tāya desanāya sotāpanno hutvā pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ patvā attano paṭipattikittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:1358_0: Tattha jātimadena mattohanti ahaṃ udicce brāhmaṇakule nibbatto,
atk-s0508a2:1358_1: “na mādiso ubhato sujāto añño atthī”ti kulamānena matto mānathaddho acārinti yojanā.

atk-s0508a2:1391_4: So tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā rājagahassa tiyojanappamāṇe ṭhāne araññāyatane nīvārehi yāpento aggiṃ paricārayamāno vasati.
atk-s0508a2:1391_5: Tassa satthā ghaṭe viya padīpaṃ hadayabbhantare pajjalantaṃ arahattūpanissayaṃ disvā assamapadaṃ agamāsi.

atk-s0508a2:1391_8: Evaṃ tayo divase datvā catutthadivase “bhagavā tumhe paramasukhumālā,
atk-s0508a2:1391_10: Tassa satthā ariyasantosaguṇaṃ pakāsento dhammaṃ desesi.

atk-s0508a2:1391_14: Satthā tattha gantvā paṭisanthāramukhena tassa vihāraṃ pucchanto –

atk-s0508a2:1434_8: tassa ca kāraṇāni vatvā idāni kodhe akodhe ca ādīnavānisaṃsadassanena dhammaṃ kathento “tassevā”tiādimāha.

atk-s0508a2:1434_12: Kujjhanena pana akuddhassa pāpaṃ hotīti vattabbameva natthi.
atk-s0508a2:1434_13: Keci pana “yo akuddhaṃ paṭikuddhaṃ ārabbha kujjhatī”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0508a2:1434_14: Kuddhaṃ appaṭikujjhantoti yo pana kuddhaṃ puggalaṃ “ayaṃ kuddho kodhapareto”ti ñatvā na paṭikujjhati khamati,
atk-s0508a2:1434_19: Yo paraṃ puggalaṃ saṅkupitaṃ kuddhaṃ “kodhapareto”ti ñatvā taṃ mettāyanto ajjhupekkhanto vā sato sampajāno hutvā upasammati khamati na paṭippharati.

atk-s0508a2:1701_3: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā
atk-s0508a2:1701_4: gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā ekasmiṃ pabbate viharati.

atk-s0508a2:1701_6: So bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ pavedento pupphamayaṃ āsanaṃ paññapetvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1701_8: aniccatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā tassa passantasseva ākāsena agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1701_9: So pubbe gahitaṃ niccaggāhaṃ pahāya aniccasaññaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā,
atk-s0508a2:1702_3: Ekadivasaṃ cūḷapitā “attano puttena kalahaṃ karotī”ti kujjhitvā,

atk-s0508a2:1702_7: Pacchimabhavikatāya dārakassa puññaphalena sayaṃ māretuṃ na visahi,

atk-s0508a2:1705_0: Satthā tāya velāya veneyyabandhave olokento dārakassa hadayabbhantare pajjalantaṃ arahattūpanissayaṃ disvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā satiṃ janetvā evamāha –
atk-s0508a2:1708_0: Dārako buddhānubhāvena chinnabandhano gāthāpariyosāne sotāpanno hutvā gandhakuṭisammukhe aṭṭhāsi.

atk-s0508a2:1708_3: yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mama puttassa pavattiṃ jāneyya”nti satthu santikaṃ agamāsi. Satthā,

atk-s0508a2:1765_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:1765_3: rājagahe aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:1765_5: So vayappatto kāme pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā saratiṇāni sayameva bhañjitvā paṇṇasālaṃ katvā vasati.
atk-s0508a2:1765_7: Atha bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento tassa arahattūpanissayaṃ disvā,

atk-s0508a2:1768_0: Tena me sarabhaṅgoti, nāmaṃ sammutiyā ahu.
atk-s0508a2:1770_0: “Na mayhaṃ kappate ajja, sare hatthehi bhañjituṃ;
atk-s0508a2:1771_0: Sikkhāpadā no paññattā, gotamena yasassinā”ti. – dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:1772_1: pubbe tāpasakāle saratiṇāni mama hatthehi chinditvā tiṇakuṭiṃ katvā acchisaṃ vasiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1773_0: Na mayhaṃ kappate ajjāti ajja idāni upasampannassa mayhaṃ sare saratiṇe hatthehi bhañjituṃ na kappate na vaṭṭati. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a2:1773_3: Tena yaṃ amhākaṃ satthārā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1774_0: Evaṃ ekena pakārena tiṇakuṭikāya apaṭisaṅkharaṇe kāraṇaṃ dassetvā idāni aparenapi pariyāyena naṃ dassento –
atk-s0508a2:1777_0: Soyaṃ rogo diṭṭho, vacanakarenātidevassā”ti. – imaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a2:1778_3: Roganti dukkhadukkhatādivasena rujanaṭṭhena rogabhūtaṃ upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0508a2:1778_4: Nāddasaṃ pubbeti satthu ovādapaṭilābhato pubbe na addakkhiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1778_6: vacanakarenātidevassāti sammutidevā upapattidevā visuddhidevāti sabbepi deve attano sīlādiguṇehi atikkamitvā
atk-s0508a2:1778_7: ṭhitattā atidevassa sammāsambuddhassa ovādapaṭikarena sarabhaṅgena so ayaṃ khandhapañcakasaṅkhāto rogo
atk-s0508a2:1778_10: Etena evaṃ attabhāvakuṭikāyampi anapekkho bāhiraṃ tiṇakuṭikaṃ kathaṃ paṭisaṅkharissatīti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:1779_0: Idāni yaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjantena mayā ayaṃ attabhāvarogo yāthāvato diṭṭho,
atk-s0508a2:1779_2: Yena nesaṃ ovādadhammopi majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇasadiso yatthāhaṃ patiṭṭhāya dukkhakkhayaṃ pattoti evaṃ attano arahattapaṭipattiṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:1781_0: “Yeneva maggena gato vipassī, yeneva maggena sikhī ca vessabhū;
atk-s0508a2:1782_0: Kakusandhakoṇāgamano ca kassapo, tenañjasena agamāsi gotamo.
atk-s0508a2:1791_0: Bhedā imassa kāyassa, jīvitassa ca saṅkhayā;
atk-s0508a2:1794_0: Tattha yeneva maggenāti yeneva sapubbabhāgena ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena.
atk-s0508a2:1795_2: Yehāyaṃ desito dhammoti yehi sattahi sammāsambuddhehi ayaṃ sāsanadhammo desito pavedito.
atk-s0508a2:1796_3: Vacanatthato pana ariyāni ca avitathaṭṭhena saccāni cāti ariyasaccāni,
atk-s0508a2:1796_4: ariyassa vā bhagavato saccāni tena desitattā,
atk-s0508a2:1796_8: Taṃ dukkhaṃ samudeti etasmāti samudayo, taṇhā.
atk-s0508a2:1796_13: etasmiṃ vā adhigate puggalassa rodhābhāvo hoti,
atk-s0508a2:1797_1: Nivattateti ariyamaggabhāvanāya sati anantakaṃ apariyantaṃ imasmiṃ saṃsāre jātiādidukkhaṃ na pavattati ucchijjati,
atk-s0508a2:1797_2: so nirodhoti ayaṃ dhammabhūtehi sammāsambuddhehi desito dhammoti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:1797_3: “Bhedā”tiādinā “rogo diṭṭho”ti dukkhapariññāya sūcitaṃ attano arahattappattiṃ sarūpato dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:1797_4: “Yasmiṃ nibbattate dukkha”nti pana pāṭhe sakalagāthāya tatthāyaṃ yojanā –
atk-s0508a2:1797_5: yasmiṃ khandhādipaṭipāṭisaññite saṃsāre idaṃ anantakaṃ jātiādidukkhaṃ nibbattaṃ,

atk-s0508a2:1797_7: Imassa jīvitindriyassa saṅkhayā kāyasaṅkhātassa khandhapañcakassa bhedā vināsā uddhaṃ natthi,

atk-s0508a2:1802_0: Aṭṭhakanipāte kammaṃ bahukantiādikā āyasmato mahākaccāyanattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:1802_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā vuddhippatto,
atk-s0508a2:1802_3: ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthārā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1802_5: sayampi taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthento paṇidhānaṃ katvā,
atk-s0508a2:1802_7: devamanussesu saṃsaranto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle vijjādharo hutvā ākāsena gacchanto satthāraṃ himavantapabbate
atk-s0508a2:1802_8: ekasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe nisinnaṃ disvā pasannamānaso kaṇikārapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1803_0: So tena puññakammena aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva parivattento kassapadasabalassa kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kulaghare
atk-s0508a2:1803_1: nibbattitvā parinibbute bhagavati suvaṇṇacetiyakaraṇaṭṭhāne satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāya pūjaṃ katvā,
atk-s0508a2:1803_2: “bhagavā mayhaṃ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sarīraṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1804_0: Tato yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ujjeniyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1804_3: attano nāmaṃ gahetvā āgato”ti kañcanamāṇavo tveva nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1804_4: So vuḍḍhimanvāya tayo vede uggahetvā pitu accayena purohitaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
atk-s0508a2:1804_7: tvaṃ tattha gantvā satthāraṃ idhānehī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0508a2:1804_10: Desanāpariyosāne so sattahi janehi saddhiṃ saha paṭisambhidāhi arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1820_0: Parisaṃ mañca toseti, yathā kaccāyano ayaṃ.

atk-s0508a2:1836_0: Pāpuṇissati taṃ ṭhānaṃ, yathāyaṃ byākato mayā.

atk-s0508a2:1854_2: Te tāvadeva dvaṅgulamattakesamassukā iddhimayapattacīvaradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1854_4: rājā pajjoto tumhākaṃ pāde vandituṃ dhammañca sotuṃ icchatī”ti satthu ārocesi. Satthā,
atk-s0508a2:1854_8: Thero satthu āṇāya attaṭṭhamo tattha gantvā rājānaṃ pasādetvā avantīsu sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā puna satthu santikameva gato.
atk-s0508a2:1854_9: So ekadivasaṃ sambahule bhikkhū samaṇadhammaṃ pahāya kammārāme saṅgaṇikārāme rasataṇhānugate ca pamādavihārino disvā tesaṃ ovādavasena –
atk-s0508a2:1856_0: “Kammaṃ bahukaṃ na kāraye, parivajjeyya janaṃ na uyyame;
atk-s0508a2:1857_0: So ussukko rasānugiddho, atthaṃ riñcati yo sukhādhivāho.
atk-s0508a2:1859_0: “Paṅkoti hi naṃ avedayuṃ, yāyaṃ vandanapūjanā kulesu;
atk-s0508a2:1860_0: Sukhumaṃ sallaṃ durubbahaṃ, sakkāro kāpurisena dujjaho”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:1862_0: Tattha kammaṃ bahukaṃ na kārayeti navāvāsakārāpanādiṃ samaṇadhammakaraṇassa paribandhabhūtaṃ mahantaṃ navakammaṃ na paṭṭhapeyya,
atk-s0508a2:1862_1: khuddakaṃ appasamārambhaṃ khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇādiṃ satthu vacanapaṭipūjanatthaṃ kātabbameva.
atk-s0508a2:1862_3: Jananti vā yādisaṃ saṃsevato bhajato payirupāsato kusalā dhammā parihāyanti,
atk-s0508a2:1862_9: atthaṃ riñcati yo sukhādhivāhoti yo rasānugiddho rasataṇhāvasiko bhikkhu paccayuppādanapasuto,
atk-s0508a2:1862_15: taṃ riñcati pajahati ekaṃsena attānaṃ tato vivecetīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1863_0: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya “kammārāmataṃ saṅgaṇikārāmataṃ paccayagedhañca vajjethā”ti ovaditvā idāni sakkārābhilāsaṃ garahanto dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:1863_2: yā ayaṃ bhikkhāya upagatānaṃ pabbajitānaṃ kulesu gehavāsīhi guṇasambhāvanāya karīyamānā vandanā pūjanā ca,
atk-s0508a2:1863_3: yasmā taṃ abhāvitattānaṃ osīdāpanaṭṭhena malinabhāvakaraṇaṭṭhena ca paṅko kaddamoti buddhādayo ariyā pavedayuṃ abbhaññaṃsu pavedesuṃ vā,
atk-s0508a2:1863_4: yasmā ca apariññātakkhandhānaṃ andhaputhujjanānaṃ sakkārābhilāsaṃ duviññeyyasabhāvatāya pīḷājananato
atk-s0508a2:1863_5: anto tudanato duruddharaṇato ca sukhumaṃ sallaṃ durubbahaṃ pavedayuṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1863_6: tato eva sakkāro kāpurisena dujjaho duppajaheyyo tassa pahānapaṭipattiyā appaṭipajjanato.
atk-s0508a2:1863_8: tasmā tassa pahānāya āyogo karaṇīyoti dasseti –

atk-s0508a2:1869_0: Attā ca naṃ yathā vedi, devāpi naṃ tathā vidū.
atk-s0508a2:1872_0: Ye ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā.
atk-s0508a2:1875_0: Paññāya ca alābhena, vittavāpi na jīvati.
atk-s0508a2:1878_0: Na ca diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ dhīro, sabbaṃ ujjhitumarahati.
atk-s0508a2:1883_0: Imā cha gāthā rañño pajjotassa ovādavasena abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1883_1: So kira brāhmaṇe saddahitvā pasughātayaññaṃ kāreti,
atk-s0508a2:1883_5: Tato naṃ thero vivecetuṃ “na parassā”tiādinā cha gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1884_1: kammaṃ maccassa pāpakanti parassa maccassa sattassa upanidhāya uddissa kāraṇaṃ katvā pāpakaṃ vadhabandhādikammaṃ na seveyya,
atk-s0508a2:1884_3: Attanā taṃ na seveyyāti attanāpi taṃ pāpakaṃ na kareyya. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a2:1884_4: Kammabandhū hi mātiyā ime mātiyā maccā kammadāyādā,
atk-s0508a2:1884_5: tasmā attanā ca kiñci pāpakammaṃ na kareyya,
atk-s0508a2:1885_0: Na pare vacanā coroti attanā coriyaṃ akatvā paravacanā parassa vacanamattena coro nāma na hoti,
atk-s0508a2:1885_1: tathā na pare vacanā muni parassa vacanamattena muni suvisuddhakāyavacīmanosamācāro na hoti.
atk-s0508a2:1885_2: Ettha hi pareti vibhattialopaṃ katvā niddeso.
atk-s0508a2:1885_5: Attā ca naṃ yathā vedīti naṃ sattaṃ tassa attā cittaṃ yathā “ahaṃ parisuddho,
atk-s0508a2:1885_8: upapattidevā ca tathā vidū vidanti jānanti,
atk-s0508a2:1885_9: tasmā sayaṃ tādisā devā ca pamāṇaṃ suddhāsuddhānaṃ suddhāsuddhabhāvajānane,
atk-s0508a2:1885_10: na ye keci icchādosaparetā sattāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:1886_1: kusalākusalasāvajjānavajjaṃ kammaṃ kammaphalaṃ kāyassa asubhataṃ saṅkhārānaṃ aniccataṃ ajānantā idha pare nāma.
atk-s0508a2:1886_2: Te mayamettha imasmiṃ jīvaloke yamāma uparamāma,
atk-s0508a2:1886_3: “satataṃ samitaṃ maccu santikaṃ gacchāmā”ti na jānanti.
atk-s0508a2:1886_4: Ye ca tattha vijānantīti ye ca tattha paṇḍitā “mayaṃ maccu samīpaṃ gacchāmā”ti vijānanti.
atk-s0508a2:1886_5: Tato sammanti medhagāti evañhi te jānantā medhagānaṃ paravihiṃsanānaṃ vūpasamāya paṭipajjanti,
atk-s0508a2:1886_6: attanā pare ca aññe na medhanti na bādhentīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1886_7: Tvaṃ pana jīvitanimittaṃ acore core karontopi daṇḍanena sāmike assāmike karontopi dhanajāniyā bādhasi paññāvekallato.
atk-s0508a2:1886_9: api vittaparikkhayo parikkhīṇadhanopi sappaññajātiko itarītarasantosena santuṭṭho anavajjāya jīvikāya jīvatiyeva.
atk-s0508a2:1886_13: Dummedhapuggalo pana paññāya ca alābhena diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca atthaṃ virādhento vittavāpi na jīvati garahādipavattiyā jīvanto nāma na hoti,
atk-s0508a2:1886_14: anupāyaññutāya yathādhigataṃ dhanaṃ nāsento jīvitampi sandhāretuṃ na sakkotiyeva.
atk-s0508a2:1887_0: Imā kira catassopi gāthā thero supinantena rañño kathesi.
atk-s0508a2:1887_1: Rājā supinaṃ disvā theraṃ namassantoyeva pabujjhitvā pabhātāya rattiyā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā attanā diṭṭhaniyāmena supinaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0508a2:1887_2: Taṃ sutvā thero tā gāthā paccunubhāsitvā “sabbaṃ suṇātī”tiādinā dvīhi gāthāhi rājānaṃ ovadi.
atk-s0508a2:1887_3: Tattha sabbaṃ suṇāti sotenāti idha sotabbaṃ saddaṃ āpāthagataṃ sabbaṃ subhāsitaṃ dubbhāsitañca abadhiro sotena suṇāti.
atk-s0508a2:1887_4: Tathā sabbaṃ rūpaṃ sundaraṃ asundarampi cakkhunā anandho passati,
atk-s0508a2:1887_6: Tattha pana na ca diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ dhīro,
atk-s0508a2:1887_9: na taṃ sabbaṃ dhīro sappañño ujjhituṃ pariccajituṃ gahetuṃ vā arahati.
atk-s0508a2:1887_10: Guṇāguṇaṃ pana tattha upaparikkhitvā ujjhitabbameva ujjhituṃ gahetabbañca gahetuṃ arahati,
atk-s0508a2:1887_11: tasmā cakkhumāssa yathā andho cakkhumāpi samāno ujjhitabbe diṭṭhe andho yathā assa apassanto viya bhaveyya,
atk-s0508a2:1887_12: tathā ujjhitabbe sute sotavāpi badhiro yathā assa asuṇanto viya bhaveyya.
atk-s0508a2:1887_13: Paññavāssa yathā mūgoti vicāraṇapaññāya paññavā vacanakusalopi avattabbe mūgo viya bhaveyya.
atk-s0508a2:1887_18: sayetha matasāyikanti attanā kātabbakicce uppanne upaṭṭhite matasāyikaṃ sayetha,
atk-s0508a2:1887_21: Atha vā atha atthe samuppanneti attanā akaraṇīye atthe kicce uppanne upaṭṭhite matasāyikaṃ sayetha,
atk-s0508a2:1887_23: Na hi paṇḍito ayuttaṃ kātumarahatīti evaṃ therena ovadito rājā akattabbaṃ pahāya kātabbeyeva yuttappayutto ahosīti.
atk-s0508a2:1890_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:1890_7: So siriguttassa bhāgineyyo sirimitto vayappatto satthu dhanapāladamane laddhappasādo pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a2:1890_9: Ekadivasaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ āsanaṃ abhiruhitvā cittabījaniṃ gahetvā nisinno bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0508a2:1890_10: Kathento ca uḷāratare guṇe vibhajitvā dassento –
atk-s0508a2:1893_0: Sa ve tādisako bhikkhu, evaṃ pecca na socati.
atk-s0508a2:1896_0: Guttadvāro sadā bhikkhu, evaṃ pecca na socati.
atk-s0508a2:1899_0: Kalyāṇasīlo so bhikkhu, evaṃ pecca na socati.
atk-s0508a2:1902_0: Kalyāṇamitto so bhikkhu, evaṃ pecca na socati.
atk-s0508a2:1905_0: Kalyāṇapañño so bhikkhu, evaṃ pecca na socati.
atk-s0508a2:1911_0: Adaliddoti taṃ āhu, amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1914_0: Anuyuñjetha medhāvī, saraṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:1915_1: Upaṭṭhite hi kodhuppattinimitte adhivāsanakhantiyaṃ ṭhatvā kopassa anuppādako.
atk-s0508a2:1915_3: parehi kataṃ aparādhaṃ paṭicca “akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1915_4: ajini maṃ ahāsi me”tiādinā kodhassa anupanayhanasīlo.
atk-s0508a2:1915_7: sa ve tādisako bhikkhūti so tathārūpo tathājātiko yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgato bhikkhu.
atk-s0508a2:1915_8: Evaṃ yathāvuttapaṭipattiyā pecca paraloke na socati sokanimittassa abhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:1915_9: Cakkhudvārādayo kāyadvārādayo ca guttā pihitā saṃvutā etassāti guttadvāro.
atk-s0508a2:1917_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojaye”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:1918_3: niyyānikāya pana paññāya vasena evaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1919_0: Evamettha kodhādīnaṃ vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena ca akkodhanādimukhena,
atk-s0508a2:1919_1: puggalādhiṭṭhānāya gāthāya sammāpaṭipattiṃ dassetvā idāni nipphattitalokuttarasaddhādike uddharitvā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0508a2:1919_4: yassa puggalassa tathāgate sammāsambuddhe “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinayappavattā maggenāgatasaddhā,
atk-s0508a2:1919_5: tato eva acalā avikampā suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0508a2:1919_8: Ariyakantanti ariyānaṃ kantaṃ piyāyitaṃ bhavantarepi avijahanato.
atk-s0508a2:1919_11: Taṃ panetaṃ sīlaṃ gahaṭṭhasīlaṃ pabbajitasīlanti duvidhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1919_14: Pabbajitasīlaṃ nāma dasasikkhāpadasīlaṃ upādāya sabbaṃ catupārisuddhisīlaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1920_0: Saṅghe pasādo yassatthīti “suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”tiādinā ariyasaṅghe pasādo saddhā yassa
atk-s0508a2:1920_1: puggalassa atthi acalo suppatiṭṭhitoti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1920_2: Ujubhūtañca dassananti diṭṭhivaṅkābhāvato kilesavaṅkābhāvato ca ujubhūtaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1920_3: Akuṭilaṃ ajimhaṃ kammassakatādassanañceva sappaccayanāmarūpadassanañcāti duvidhampi dassanaṃ yassa atthi acalaṃ suppatiṭṭhitanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:1920_8: paññādhananti imesaṃ suvisuddhānaṃ dhanānaṃ atthitāya “adaliddo”ti taṃ tādisaṃ puggalaṃ buddhādayo ariyā āhu.
atk-s0508a2:1920_9: Amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ tassa tathārūpassa jīvitaṃ diṭṭhadhammikādiatthādhigamena amoghaṃ avañjhaṃ saphalamevāti āhūti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1921_4: sāsananti “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”ntiādinā vuttaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ anussaranto kulaputto vuttappabhedaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1921_5: saddhañceva sīlañca dhammadassanahetukaṃ dhamme sunicchayā vimokkhabhūtaṃ pasādañca anuyuñjeyya vaḍḍheyyāti.
atk-s0508a2:1922_0: Evaṃ thero bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanāmukhena attani vijjamāne guṇe pakāsento aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1925_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare vibhavasampanno kuṭumbiyo hutvā ekadivasaṃ satthu
atk-s0508a2:1925_3: santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saññāvivaṭṭakusalānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi
atk-s0508a2:1925_4: taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0508a2:1925_6: ‘saññāvivaṭṭakusalānaṃ ayaṃ mama sāsane aggo’ti etadagge ṭhapayittha,
atk-s0508a2:1925_7: ahampi imassa adhikārakammassa balena so bhikkhu viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1925_8: Kaniṭṭhabhātā panassa tatheva bhagavati adhikārakammaṃ katvā manomayassa kāyassābhinimmānaṃ cetovivaṭṭakosallanti
atk-s0508a2:1925_9: dvinnaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena vuttanayeneva paṇidhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1925_10: Bhagavā dvinnampi patthanaṃ anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate kappasatasahassamatthake gotamassa
atk-s0508a2:1925_11: nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane tumhākaṃ patthanā samijjhissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1926_0: Te ubhopi janā tattha yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:1926_1: Tattha mahāpanthakassa antarākataṃ kalyāṇadhammaṃ na kathīyati.
atk-s0508a2:1926_2: Cūḷapanthako pana kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni odātakasiṇakammaṃ katvā devapure nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:1926_3: Apadāne pana “cūḷapanthako padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle tāpaso hutvā himavante vasanto tattha bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1926_6: Atha amhākaṃ satthā abhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane mahāvihāre viharati.
atk-s0508a2:1927_0: Tena ca samayena rājagahe dhanaseṭṭhissa dhītā attano dāsena saddhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā ñātakehi bhītā hatthasāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:1927_1: gahetvā tena saddhiṃ palāyitvā aññattha vasantī taṃ paṭicca gabbhaṃ labhitvā paripakkagabbhā “ñātigharaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1927_2: gantvā vijāyissāmī”ti gacchantī antarāmaggeyeva puttaṃ vijāyitvā sāminā nivattitā pubbe vasitaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a2:1927_5: Tasmiṃ ādhāvitvā vidhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle tameva paṭicca dutiyaṃ gabbhaṃ paṭilabhitvā paripakkagabbhā
atk-s0508a2:1927_6: pubbe vuttanayeneva antarāmagge puttaṃ vijāyitvā sāminā nivattitā jeṭṭhaputtassa mahāpanthakoti kaniṭṭhassa
atk-s0508a2:1927_7: cūḷapanthakoti nāmaṃ katvā yathāvasitaṭṭhāneyeva vasantī anukkamena dārakesu vaḍḍhantesu tehi, “amma,
atk-s0508a2:1927_8: ayyakakulaṃ no dassehī”ti nibundhiyamānā dārake mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0508a2:1927_9: Tato paṭṭhāya dārakā dhanaseṭṭhino gehe vaḍḍhanti.
atk-s0508a2:1927_11: Mahāpanthako pana ayyakena saddhiṃ bhagavato santikaṃ gato satthāraṃ disvā saha dassanena paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a2:1927_12: dhammaṃ sutvā upanissayasampannatāya pabbajitukāmo hutvā pitāmahaṃ āpucchi.
atk-s0508a2:1927_13: So satthu tamatthaṃ ārocetvā taṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0508a2:1927_14: So pabbajitvā bahuṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā paripuṇṇavasso upasampajjitvā yonisomanasikāre kammaṃ karonto
atk-s0508a2:1927_15: visesato catunnaṃ arūpajjhānānaṃ lābhī hutvā tato vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:1927_17: So jhānasukhena phalasukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṃ attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā adhigatasampattiṃ paṭicca sañjātasomanasso sīhanādaṃ nadanto –
atk-s0508a2:1930_0: Tato me ahu saṃvego, passitvā purisuttamaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1945_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:1951_0: Sabbaṃ taṇhaṃ visosetvā, pallaṅkena upāvisi”nti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:1952_7: sabbesaṃ bhayahetūnaṃ bodhimūleyeva pahīnattā kutocipi bhayābhāvato akutobhayaṃ nibbhayaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1952_9: sammāsambuddhaṃ mayhaṃ pitāmahena saddhiṃ gantvā yāya velāya sabbapaṭhamaṃ passiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1952_10: taṃ purisuttamaṃ sadevake loke aggapuggalaṃ passitvā tato dassanahetu tato dassanato pacchā “ettakaṃ
atk-s0508a2:1952_11: kālaṃ satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ dhammañca sotuṃ nālattha”nti mayhaṃ saṃvego ahu sahottappaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0508a2:1952_12: Uppannasaṃvego panāhaṃ evaṃ cintesinti dasseti siriṃ hatthehīti gāthāya.
atk-s0508a2:1952_14: yo vibhavatthiko puriso “upaṭṭhāyiko hutvā tava santike vasissāmī”ti saviggahaṃ siriṃ sayane upagataṃ
atk-s0508a2:1952_15: hatthehi ca pādehi ca koṭṭento paṇāmeyya nīhareyya,
atk-s0508a2:1952_16: so tathārūpo alakkhikapuriso etādisaṃ satthāraṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ ārādhetvā imasmiṃ navame khaṇe paṭilabhitvā
atk-s0508a2:1952_23: Nanu ayaṃ thero dārapariggahaṃ akatvāva pabbajito,
atk-s0508a2:1952_25: Yathā nāma puriso anibbattaphalameva rukkhaṃ chindanto acchinne tato laddhaphalehi parihīno nāma hoti.
atk-s0508a2:1953_3: tena bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadasaṅkhātena sājīvena ca samannāgato sikkhanabhāvena samaṅgībhūto,
atk-s0508a2:1953_4: sikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto hutvā tadubhayaṃ sampādentoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1953_5: Tena suvisuddhe pātimokkhe sīle patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:1953_6: Indriyesu susaṃvutoti manacchaṭṭhesu indriyesu suṭṭhu saṃvuto.
atk-s0508a2:1953_7: Rūpādivisayesu uppajjanakānaṃ abhijjhādīnaṃ pavattinivāraṇavasena satikavāṭena supihitacakkhādidvāroti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1953_8: Evaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaraindriyasaṃvarasīlasampattidassanena itarasīlampi atthato dassitameva hotīti thero
atk-s0508a2:1953_9: attano catupārisuddhisīlasampadaṃ dassetvā “namassamāno sambuddha”nti iminā buddhānussatibhāvanānuyogamāha.
atk-s0508a2:1953_10: Vihāsiṃ aparājitoti kilesamārādīhi aparājito eva hutvā vihariṃ,
atk-s0508a2:1953_13: aññadatthu te abhibhavanto eva vihāsinti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1954_1: yasmā suvisuddhasīlo satthari abhippasanno kilesābhibhavanapaṭipattiyañca ṭhito, tasmā.
atk-s0508a2:1954_7: Kīdiso pana soti āha “na nisīde muhuttampi,
atk-s0508a2:1954_9: “Aggamaggasaṇḍāsena mama hadayato taṇhāsalle anuddhaṭe muhuttampi na nisīde,
atk-s0508a2:1954_10: nisajjaṃ na kappeyya”nti evaṃ me cittābhinīhāro ahosīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:1955_0: Evaṃ pana cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya bhāvanaṃ bhāvayitvā ṭhānacaṅkameheva rattiṃ vītināmento arūpasamāpattito
atk-s0508a2:1955_1: vuṭṭhāya jhānaṅgamukhena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:1955_6: Sabbaṃ taṇhanti kāmataṇhādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ aggamaggena visosetvā sukkhāpetvā “taṇhāsalle anūhate na nisīde”ti,
atk-s0508a2:1960_0: Navakanipāte yadā dukkhantiādikā āyasmato bhūtattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:1960_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0508a2:1960_3: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā senoti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a2:1961_0: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāketanagarassa dvāragāme mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhissa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:1961_1: Tassa kira seṭṭhino jātā jātā dārakā baddhāghātena ekena yakkhena khāditā,
atk-s0508a2:1961_2: imassa pana pacchimabhavikattā bhūtā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:1961_5: Nāmakaraṇadivase cassa “evaṃ kate amanussā anukampantā parihareyyu”nti bhūtoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:1961_6: So pana attano puññabalena anantarāyo vaḍḍhi,
atk-s0508a2:1961_7: tassa “tayo pāsādā ahesu”ntiādi sabbaṃ yasassa kulaputtassa vibhavakittane viya veditabbaṃ.

atk-s0508a2:2107_9: Thero bhattakiccaṃ katvā rañño parisāya ca dhammaṃ kathetvā satthu āgamanato puretarameva sakalaṃ rājanivesanaṃ

atk-s0508a2:2111_0: So tena puññakammena ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bhagavati parinibbute

atk-s0508a2:2111_4: So ekadivasaṃ migavaṃ gato araññe yonakamahādhammarakkhitattheraṃ hatthināgena sālasākhaṃ gahetvā bījiyamānaṃ

atk-s0508a2:2136_2: katakicco anāsavo”ti evaṃ pavatto manoratho ijjhatu siddhiṃ pāpuṇātu.

atk-s0508a2:2148_0: Tattha esa bandhāmi sannāhanti esāhaṃ vīriyasaṅkhātaṃ sannāhaṃ bandhāmi,

atk-s0508a2:2150_0: Evaṃ vatvā thero araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto upajjhāyena saddhiṃ kaliṅgaraṭṭhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2150_5: Thero sappipariyesanaṃ akatvā vipassanāya eva kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0508a2:2150_7: vejjo therassa tattha appossukkataṃ disvā sayameva sappiṃ pariyesitvā theraṃ arogaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2150_8: So arogo hutvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:2152_0: Kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo.
atk-s0508a2:2170_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā there tattha viharante rājā koṭidhanapariccāgena bhojakagirivihāraṃ nāma kāretvā theraṃ tattha vāsesi.
atk-s0508a2:2174_0: Osānagāthamāha. Sā uttānatthāva. Tadeva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a2:2177_0: Anāgataṃ yo paṭikacca passatītiādikā āyasmato mahākappinattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:2177_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare kulaghare nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthu santike dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2177_3: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhuovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā tajjaṃ adhikārakammaṃ katvā
atk-s0508a2:2178_0: So tattha yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapasammāsambuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe
atk-s0508a2:2178_1: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto purisasahassagaṇajeṭṭhako hutvā gabbhasahassapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ mahantaṃ pariveṇaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:2178_2: Te sabbepi janā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā taṃ upāsakaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā saputtadārā devaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsariṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:2178_3: Tesu gaṇajeṭṭhako amhākaṃ satthu nibbattito puretarameva paccantadese kukkuṭanāmake nagare rājagehe nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:2178_6: Kappinakumāro pitu accayena chattaṃ ussāpetvā mahākappinarājā nāma jāto.
atk-s0508a2:2178_7: So sutavittakatāya pātova catūhi dvārehi sīghaṃ dūte pesesi –
atk-s0508a2:2179_0: Tena ca samayena amhākaṃ satthā loke uppajjitvā sāvatthiṃ upanissāya viharati.
atk-s0508a2:2179_1: Tasmiṃ kāle sāvatthivāsino vāṇijā sāvatthiyaṃ uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā taṃ nagaraṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā
atk-s0508a2:2179_3: Te rājā pakkosāpetvā niyyāditapaṇṇākāre vanditvā ṭhite “kuto āgatatthā”ti pucchi.

atk-s0508a2:2179_25: aparampi aḍḍhayojanavitthāraṃ nadiṃ tatheva atikkamitvā tatiyaṃ candabhāgaṃ nāma mahānadiṃ patvā tampi
atk-s0508a2:2180_0: Satthāpi taṃdivasaṃ paccūsasamayaṃyeva mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento “ajja mahākappino
atk-s0508a2:2180_1: tiyojanasatikaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya amaccasahassaparivāro mama santike pabbajituṃ āgamissatī”ti disvā “mayā

atk-s0508a2:2180_4: uttaraṇatitthassābhimukhaṭṭhāne mahānigrodhamūle pallaṅkena nisinno chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo vissajjesi.

atk-s0508a2:2180_7: Rājā bhagavato gopphakesu gahetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi saddhiṃ amaccasahassena.
atk-s0508a2:2206_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:2208_0: Kappino nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a2:2216_0: Tato cutā mayaṃ sabbe, ahumha tidasūpagā.

atk-s0508a2:2255_0: “Jino tasmiṃ guṇe tuṭṭho, etadagge ṭhapesi maṃ;
atk-s0508a2:2257_0: “Satasahasse kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a2:2260_0: Arahattaṃ patvā pana te sabbeva satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:2260_3: Sā eva tesaṃ pabbajjā upasampadā ca ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:2260_4: Satthā taṃ bhikkhusahassaṃ ādāya ākāsena jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2260_7: kappino bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desetī”ti? “Na, bhagavā, deseti.
atk-s0508a2:2260_17: bhante”ti thero satthu vacanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchitvā ekovādeneva samaṇasahassaṃ arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:2260_18: Tena naṃ satthā paṭipāṭiyā attano sāvake there ṭhānantare ṭhapento bhikkhuovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:2262_0: “Anāgataṃ yo paṭikacca passati, hitañca atthaṃ ahitañca taṃ dvayaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:2263_0: Viddesino tassa hitesino vā, randhaṃ na passanti samekkhamānā.
atk-s0508a2:2267_0: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā.
atk-s0508a2:2273_0: Paññāya ca alābhena, vittavāpi na jīvati.
atk-s0508a2:2276_0: Paññāsahito naro idha, api dukkhesu sukhāni vindati.
atk-s0508a2:2279_0: Yattha jāyetha mīyetha, tattha kiṃ viya abbhutaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2282_0: Jātā jātā marantīdha, evaṃ dhammā hi pāṇino.
atk-s0508a2:2284_0: “Na hetadatthāya matassa hoti, yaṃ jīvitatthaṃ paraporisānaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:2285_0: Matamhi ruṇṇaṃ na yaso na lokyaṃ, na vaṇṇitaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇehi.
atk-s0508a2:2287_0: “Cakkhuṃ sarīraṃ upahanti tena, nihīyati vaṇṇabalaṃ matī ca;
atk-s0508a2:2288_0: Ānandino tassa disā bhavanti, hitesino nāssa sukhī bhavanti.
atk-s0508a2:2290_0: “Tasmā hi iccheyya kule vasante, medhāvino ceva bahussute ca;
atk-s0508a2:2291_0: Yesañhi paññāvibhavena kiccaṃ, taranti nāvāya nadiṃva puṇṇa”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:2293_11: yo puggalo attano hitāvahaṃ ahitāvahaṃ tadubhayañca atthaṃ kiccaṃ anāgataṃ asampattaṃ puretaraṃyeva paññācakkhunā
atk-s0508a2:2293_13: tassa amittā vā ahitajjhāsayena mittā vā hitajjhāsayena randhaṃ gavesantā na passanti,
atk-s0508a2:2294_0: Idāni ānāpānasatibhāvanāya guṇaṃ dassento tattha tāni yojetuṃ “ānāpānasatī yassā”ti dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2294_6: Paripuṇṇā subhāvitāti catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ soḷasannañca ākārānaṃ pāripūriyā sabbaso puṇṇā sattannaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2294_7: bojjhaṅgānaṃ vijjāvimuttīnañca pāripūriyā suṭṭhu bhāvitā vaḍḍhitā.
atk-s0508a2:2294_9: yathā buddhena desitāti “so satova assasatī”tiādinā yathā bhagavatā desitā,
atk-s0508a2:2294_10: tathā anupubbaṃ anukkamena paricitā āsevitā bhāvitā.
atk-s0508a2:2294_12: abbhā muttova candimāti so yogāvacaro yathā abbhādiupakkilesā vimutto cando candālokena imaṃ okāsalokaṃ pabhāseti,
atk-s0508a2:2294_13: evaṃ avijjādiupakkilesavimutto ñāṇālokena attasantānapatitaṃ parasantānapatitañca saṅkhāralokaṃ pabhāseti pakāseti.
atk-s0508a2:2295_0: Idāni attānaṃ nidassanaṃ katvā bhāvanābhiyogassa saphalataṃ dassento “odātaṃ vata me citta”nti tatiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2295_2: nīvaraṇamalavigamato odātaṃ suddhaṃ vata mama cittaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2295_7: sakalasaṃkilesapakkhato paggahitañca hutvā dukkhādikā pubbantādikā ca disā obhāsate tattha vitiṇṇakaṅkhattā sabbadhammesu vigatasammohattā ca.
atk-s0508a2:2295_8: Tasmā tumhehipi evaṃ cittaṃ bhāvetabbanti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:2296_0: Yathā bhāvanāmayā paññā cittamalavisodhanādinā purisassa bahupakārā,
atk-s0508a2:2296_1: evaṃ itarāpīti dassento “jīvate vāpi sappañño”ti catutthagāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2296_3: parikkhīṇadhanopi sappaññajātiko itarītarasantosena santuṭṭho anavajjāya jīvikāya jīvatiyeva.
atk-s0508a2:2296_7: Dummedhapuggalo pana paññāya alābhena diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca atthaṃ virādhento vittavāpi na jīvati,
atk-s0508a2:2296_8: garahādippattiyā jīvanto nāma na tassa hoti,
atk-s0508a2:2296_9: anupāyaññutāya vā yathādhigataṃ dhanaṃ nāsento jīvitampi sandhāretuṃ na sakkotiyeva,
atk-s0508a2:2296_10: tasmā pārihāriyapaññāpi tumhehi appamattehi sampādetabbāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:2297_0: Idāni paññāya ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “paññā sutavinicchinī”ti pañcamaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2297_1: Tattha paññā sutavinicchinīti paññā nāmesā sutassa vinicchayinī,
atk-s0508a2:2297_6: Kittisilokavaddhanīti kittiyā sammukhā pasaṃsāya silokassa patthaṭayasabhāvassa vaddhanī,

atk-s0508a2:2298_0: Idāni tāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ aniccatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhīrabhāvāvahaṃ dhammaṃ kathento “nāyaṃ ajjatano dhammo”tiādinā sesagāthā abhāsi.

atk-s0508a2:2443_14: Sampatti ca vipatyantāti yā ettha sampatti,
atk-s0508a2:2443_24: kadāci vippayuñjitabbassa vasenāti vividhaṃ pajjati pāpuṇīyati.
atk-s0508a2:2444_0: Yemaṃ kāyaṃ mamāyantīti ye andhabālā puthujjanā evaṃ asubhaṃ aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ dukkhaṃ asāraṃ imaṃ kāyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2444_2: te jātiādīhi nirayādīhi ca ghoraṃ bhayānakaṃ apaṇḍitehi abhiramitabbato kaṭasisaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāraṃ punappunaṃ jananamaraṇādīhi vaḍḍhenti,
atk-s0508a2:2445_1: gūthalittaṃva pannaganti yathā nāma puriso sukhakāmo jīvitukāmo gūthagataṃ āsīvisaṃ disvā jigucchaniyatāya
atk-s0508a2:2445_2: vā sappaṭibhayatāya vā vivajjeti na allīyati,
atk-s0508a2:2445_3: evamevaṃ ye paṇḍitā kulaputtā asucibhāvena jegucchaṃ aniccādibhāvena sappaṭibhayaṃ imaṃ kāyaṃ vivajjenti chandarāgappahānena pajahanti.
atk-s0508a2:2445_4: Te bhavamūlaṃ avijjaṃ bhavataṇhañca vamitvā chaḍḍetvā accantameva pahāya tato eva sabbaso anāsavā saupādisesāya
atk-s0508a2:2448_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2448_3: gantvā dhammaṃ suṇamāno satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ samantapāsādikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā satthu
atk-s0508a2:2448_4: adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2448_7: So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampadāya
atk-s0508a2:2448_8: ekavassiko “ariyagabbhaṃ vaḍḍhemī”ti ekaṃ kulaputtaṃ attano santike upasampādetvā tena saddhiṃ satthu
atk-s0508a2:2448_10: Satthārā cassa tassa avassikassa bhikkhuno saddhivihārikabhāvaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0508a2:2448_15: parisaṃyeva pana nissāya satthu pāsaṃsopi bhavissāmī”ti vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:2454_0: Buddhena navame tattha, samaṇe aṭṭha bhojayiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2462_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:2468_0: Dhāremi antimaṃ dehaṃ, jetvā māraṃ savāhanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2470_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā sayampi sabbe dhutaṅgadhamme samādāya vattati,
atk-s0508a2:2470_2: tena naṃ bhagavā samantapāsādikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:2470_3: So aparena samayena kosambiyaṃ kalahe uppanne bhikkhusaṅghe ca dvidhābhūte ekena bhikkhunā taṃ kalahaṃ parivajjitukāmena “etarahi kho kalaho uppanno,
atk-s0508a2:2470_5: kathaṃ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabba”nti puṭṭho vivekavāsato paṭṭhāya tassa paṭipattiṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a2:2476_0: Tato saṅghāṭikaṃ katvā, lūkhaṃ dhāreyya cīvaraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2481_0: “Lūkhenapi vā santusse, nāññaṃ patthe rasaṃ bahuṃ;
atk-s0508a2:2482_0: Rasesu anugiddhassa, jhāne na ramatī mano.
atk-s0508a2:2487_0: “Yathā jaḷo va mūgo va, attānaṃ dassaye tathā;
atk-s0508a2:2496_0: Na ca appatvā dukkhantaṃ, vissāsaṃ eyya paṇḍito.
atk-s0508a2:2501_8: sayituṃ āsayituñca yuttabhāvena vasanaṭṭhānaṃ idha senāsananti adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2501_11: nānārammaṇato nivattetvā kammaṭṭhāneyeva cittassa paṭi paṭi sammadeva allīyanatthaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2502_0: Evaṃ bhāvanānurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ niddisanto senāsane santosaṃ dassetvā idāni cīvarādīsupi taṃ dassetuṃ “saṃkārapuñjā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2502_5: Karaṇe hi idaṃ nissakkavacanaṃ lūkhanti satthalūkharajanalūkhādinā lūkhaṃ avaṇṇāmaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2503_2: jīvikāna”ntiādikaṃ sugatovādaṃ anussaritvā nihatamānadappaṃ cittaṃ katvā.
atk-s0508a2:2504_2: Ubhayenapi lūkhenapi appenapi yena kenaci sulabhena itarītarena santusse samaṃ sammā tusseyya.
atk-s0508a2:2504_4: Nāññaṃ patthe rasaṃ bahunti attanā yathāladdhato aññaṃ madhurādirasaṃ bahuṃ paṇītañca na pattheyya na piheyya,
atk-s0508a2:2504_6: Rasesu gedhavāraṇatthaṃ pana kāraṇaṃ vadanto rasesu anugiddhassa,
atk-s0508a2:2505_0: Evaṃ catūsu paccayesu sallekhapaṭipattiṃ dassetvā idāni avasiṭṭhakathāvatthūni dassetuṃ “appiccho cevā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2505_5: catūsu paccayesu yathālābhasantosādinā santuṭṭho. Yo hi –
atk-s0508a2:2508_0: Pavivittoti gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya kāyena pavivitto vūpakaṭṭho.
atk-s0508a2:2509_0: Attānaṃ dassaye tathāti ajaḷo amūgopi samāno yathā jaḷo vā mūgo vā,
atk-s0508a2:2509_3: Jaḷo va mūgo vāti ca gāthāsukhatthaṃ rassattaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2509_5: Nātivelaṃ sambhāseyyāti ativelaṃ atikkantapamāṇaṃ na bhāseyya,
atk-s0508a2:2510_0: Na so upavade kañcīti so yathāvuttapaṭipattiko bhikkhu hīnaṃ vā majjhimaṃ vā ukkaṭṭhaṃ vā yaṃkiñci na vācāya upavadeyya.
atk-s0508a2:2510_1: Upaghātaṃ vivajjayeti kāyena upaghātaṃ pariviheṭhanaṃ vajjeyya.
atk-s0508a2:2510_2: Saṃvuto pātimokkhasminti pātimokkhamhi pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle saṃvuto assa,
atk-s0508a2:2510_4: Mattaññū cassa bhojaneti pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogavissajjanesu bhojane pamāṇaññū siyā.
atk-s0508a2:2511_0: Suggahītanimittassāti “evaṃ me manasi karoto cittaṃ samāhitaṃ ahosī”ti tadākāraṃ sallakkhento suṭṭhu gahitasamādhinimitto assa.
atk-s0508a2:2511_3: Cittassuppādakovidoti evaṃ bhāvayato cittaṃ līnaṃ hoti,
atk-s0508a2:2511_4: “evaṃ uddhata”nti līnassa uddhatassa ca cittassa uppattikāraṇe kusalo assa.
atk-s0508a2:2511_17: Kālena ca vipassananti yathāladdhaṃ samādhiṃ nikantiyā apariyādānena hānabhāgiyaṃ ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ vā akatvā
atk-s0508a2:2511_19: Atha vā kālena ca vipassananti samathaṃ anuyuñjanto tassa thirībhūtakāle saṅkocaṃ anāpajjitvā ariyamaggādhigamāya vipassanaṃ anuyuñjeyya. Yathāha –
atk-s0508a2:2514_7: Yuttayogo sadā siyāti sabbakālaṃ bhāvanānuyutto siyā.
atk-s0508a2:2514_8: Dukkhantanti vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ pariyosānaṃ nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ appatvā vissāsaṃ na eyya na gaccheyya.
atk-s0508a2:2514_9: “Ahaṃ parisuddhasīlo jhānalābhī abhiññālābhī vipassanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā ṭhito”ti vā vissaṭṭho na bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2515_1: evaṃ vivittasenāsanasevanādinā vipassanāvasena yuttayogatāpariyosānena vidhinā viharantassa.
atk-s0508a2:2515_5: kāmāsavādayo sabbe āsavā khīyanti khayaṃ abbhatthaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0508a2:2515_6: tesaṃ khayagamaneneva saupādisesaanupādisesapabhedaṃ duvidhampi nibbānaṃ adhigacchati pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0508a2:2516_0: Evaṃ thero tassa bhikkhuno ovādadānāpadesena attanā tathāpaṭipannabhāvaṃ dīpento aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2519_0: Vijāneyya sakaṃ atthantiādikā āyasmato aparassa gotamattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:2519_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā amhākaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0508a2:2519_3: uppattito puretarameva sāvatthiyaṃ udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā,
