atk-s0508a2:2519_4: vādamaggaṃ uggahetvā attano vādassa upari uttariṃ vadantaṃ alabhanto tehi tehi viggāhikakathaṃ anuyutto vicarati.
atk-s0508a2:2519_5: Atha amhākaṃ bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena yasādike veneyye vinetvā anāthapiṇḍikassa abhiyācanāya sāvatthiṃ upagacchi.
atk-s0508a2:2519_6: Tadā satthu jetavanapaṭiggahe paṭiladdhasaddho satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0508a2:2519_9: So tena pabbājiyamāno khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā kosalajanapadaṃ gantvā tattha ciraṃ vasitvā puna sāvatthiṃ paccāgami.
atk-s0508a2:2519_10: Taṃ bahū ñātakā brāhmaṇamahāsālā upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsitvā nisinnā “imasmiṃ loke bahū samaṇabrāhmaṇā saṃsāre suddhivādā,
atk-s0508a2:2519_11: tesu katamesaṃ nu kho vādo niyyāniko,
atk-s0508a2:2524_0: “Mittaṃ idha ca kalyāṇaṃ, sikkhā vipulaṃ samādānaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:2525_0: Sussūsā ca garūnaṃ, etaṃ samaṇassa patirūpaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2528_0: Saṅghe ca cittīkāro, etaṃ samaṇassa patirūpaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2531_0: Cittassa ca saṇṭhapanaṃ, etaṃ samaṇassa patirūpaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2534_0: Adhicitte ca āyogo, etaṃ samaṇassa patirūpaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2543_0: Lokamhi ca anabhiratiṃ, etaṃ samaṇassa patirūpaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2551_1: viññūjātiko puriso attano atthaṃ yāthāvato vicāretvā jāneyya.
atk-s0508a2:2551_2: Vicārento ca avalokeyyātha pāvacanaṃ idha loke puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇehi sammāsambuddhena ca pavuttaṃ pāvacanaṃ, samayo.
atk-s0508a2:2551_11: santaṃ nibbāna”nti sayambhūñāṇena yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāya pavedeti,
atk-s0508a2:2551_12: tasmā “tassa vādo niyyāniko”ti satthu sāsanamahantataṃ olokeyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2551_15: sāmaññaṃ samaṇabhāvaṃ pabbajjaṃ upagatassa kulaputtassa yaṃ ettha sāsane pabbajitabhāve vā patirūpaṃ yuttarūpaṃ sāruppaṃ assa siyā,
atk-s0508a2:2552_0: Kiṃ pana tanti āha “mittaṃ idha ca kalyāṇa”ntiādi.
atk-s0508a2:2552_1: Imasmiṃ sāsane kalyāṇamittaṃ seviyamānaṃ samaṇassa patirūpanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:2552_8: Sussūsā ca garūnanti garūnaṃ ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ kalyāṇamittānaṃ ovādassa sotukamyatā pāricariyā ca.
atk-s0508a2:2553_0: Buddhesu sagāravatāti sabbaññubuddhesu “sammāsambuddho bhagavā”ti gāravayogo garucittīkāro.
atk-s0508a2:2553_1: Dhamme apaciti yathābhūtanti ariyadhamme yāthāvato apacāyanaṃ ādarena abhipūjanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2554_1: piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya upasaṅkamituṃ ayuttaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vesiyādiagocarañca pahāya kāyikavācasikaavītikkamanasaṅkhātena
atk-s0508a2:2554_2: ācārena piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhānabhūtena gocarena ca yutto sampanno,
atk-s0508a2:2554_4: Ājīvo sodhitoti veḷudānādiṃ buddhapaṭikuṭṭhaṃ anesanaṃ pahāya anavajjuppāde paccaye sevantassa ājīvo sodhito hoti suvisuddho,
atk-s0508a2:2554_6: Cittassa ca saṇṭhapananti yathā cakkhādidvārehi rūpādiārammaṇesu abhijjhādayo nappavattanti,
atk-s0508a2:2554_7: evaṃ diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattādivasena cittassa sammā ṭhapanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2554_8: Etanti ācāragocarasampatti ājīvapārisuddhi indriyesu guttadvāratāti etaṃ tayaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2555_2: Iriyāpathiyaṃ pasādaniyanti paresaṃ pasādāvahaṃ ākappasampattinimittaṃ iriyāpathanissitaṃ sampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2555_3: Adhicitte ca āyogoti samathavipassanāsu anuyogo bhāvanā.
atk-s0508a2:2557_6: Dhammānaṃ pavicayo yathābhūtanti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ aviparītasalakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca parivīmaṃsā.
atk-s0508a2:2557_8: Saccānaṃ abhisamayoti dukkhādīnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ pariññābhisamayādivasena paṭivedho.
atk-s0508a2:2558_2: Tattha bhāveyya ca aniccanti “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā avibhāgato “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”ntiādinā
atk-s0508a2:2558_3: vibhāgato vā sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccasaññaṃ bhāveyya uppādeyya ceva vaḍḍheyya cāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2558_5: “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti pavattaṃ anattasaññañca bhāveyyāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:2558_8: karajakāye sabbasmimpi vā tebhūmakasaṅkhāre kilesāsucipaggharaṇato “asubhā”ti pavattasaññaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2558_11: Lokamhi ca anabhiratinti sabbaloke tebhūmakesu saṅkhāresu anābhiratisaññaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2559_0: Evaṃ pana vipassanābhāvanaṃ anuyutto taṃ ussukkāpento ime dhamme vaḍḍheyyāti dassento “bhāveyya ca bojjhaṅge”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2559_3: bodhissa vā taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā,
atk-s0508a2:2559_10: saddena satipaṭṭhānāni sammappadhānāni ca gahitānīti sabbepi sattatiṃsappabhede bodhipakkhiyadhamme bhāveyya uppādeyya ceva vaḍḍheyya ca.
atk-s0508a2:2560_0: Evaṃ bodhipakkhiyasattatiṃsadhamme bhāvento yathā maggasaccaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena abhisameti,
atk-s0508a2:2560_2: nirodhasaccaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena abhisametīti dassento “taṇhaṃ pajaheyyā”ti osānagāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2560_4: kāmataṇhādipabhedaṃ sabbaṃ taṇhaṃ ariyamaggena anavasesato samucchindeyya,
atk-s0508a2:2560_7: Samūlake āsave padāleyyāti kāmarāgānusayādisamūlake kāmāsavādike sabbepi āsave bhindeyya samucchindeyya.
atk-s0508a2:2560_8: Vihareyya vippamuttoti evaṃ sabbaso kilesānaṃ pahīnattā sabbadhi vimutto sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggaṃ nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikatvā vihareyya.
atk-s0508a2:2560_10: etaṃ samaṇassa samitapāpassa bhikkhuno patirūpaṃ sāruppanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2561_0: Evaṃ thero samaṇasāruppapaṭipattikittanamukhena sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ tabbilomato bāhirakasamayassa aniyyānikatañca vibhāvesi.
atk-s0508a2:2561_1: Taṃ sutvā te brāhmaṇamahāsālā sāsane abhippasannā saraṇādīsu patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:2566_0: Ekādasanipāte kiṃ tavattho vane tātātiādikā āyasmato saṃkiccattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:2566_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:2566_4: Tasmiṃ kucchigateyeva mātā byādhitā hutvā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2566_5: Tassā susānaṃ netvā jhāpiyamānāya gabbhāsayo na jhāyi.
atk-s0508a2:2566_6: Manussā sūlehi kucchiṃ vijjhantā dārakassa akkhikoṭiṃ pahariṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:2566_7: Te taṃ vijjhitvā aṅgārehi paṭicchādetvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:2566_9: aṅgāramatthake pana suvaṇṇabimbasadiso dārako padumagabbhe nipanno viya ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:2566_10: Pacchimabhavikasattassa hi sinerunā otthariyamānassapi arahattaṃ appatvā jīvitakkhayo nāma natthi.
atk-s0508a2:2567_0: Punadivase āḷāhanaṭṭhānaṃ gatā manussā tathānipannaṃ dārakaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittajātā dārakaṃ ādāya gāmaṃ pavisitvā nemittake pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:2567_6: vaḍḍhitakāle amhākaṃ ayyassa sāriputtattherassa santike taṃ pabbājessāmā”ti vatvā saṅkunā chinnakkhikoṭitāya
atk-s0508a2:2567_8: So sattavassikakāle attano gabbhagatasseva mātu maraṇaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2567_9: gabbhe ca attano pavattiṃ sutvā saṃvegajāto “pabbajissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:2567_14: So khuraggeyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā tiṃsamattehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ araññe viharanto ce
atk-s0508a2:2567_15: corahatthato mocetvā sayampi te core dametvā pabbājetvā aññatarasmiṃ vihāre bahūhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:2567_16: viharanto te vivādapasute disvā “aññattha gacchāmī”ti bhikkhū āpucchi.
atk-s0508a2:2567_19: Atha naṃ aññataro upāsako upaṭṭhātukāmo āsannaṭṭhāne vāsaṃ yācanto –
atk-s0508a2:2570_0: Verambhā ramaṇīyā te, paviveko hi jhāyina”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:2579_0: “Yañca aññe na rakkhanti, yo ca aññe na rakkhati;
atk-s0508a2:2580_0: Sa ve bhikkhu sukhaṃ seti, kāmesu anapekkhavā.
atk-s0508a2:2601_0: Kālañca paṭikaṅkhāmi, sampajāno patissato”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:2602_0: Tattha kiṃ tavattho vaneti kinti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2602_3: Tātāti daharasāmaṇeratāya naṃ attano puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā ālapati.
atk-s0508a2:2602_4: Ujjuhānova pāvuseti ujjuhāno kira nāma eko pabbato,
atk-s0508a2:2602_8: tasmā ujjuhāno vā pabbato etarahi pāvusakāle tava kimatthiyoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2602_9: Keci panettha “ujjuhāno nāma eko sakuṇo sītaṃ na sahati,
atk-s0508a2:2602_11: Tesaṃ matena ujjuhānassa viya sakuṇassa pāvusakāle ko tava attho vaneti?
atk-s0508a2:2602_12: Verambhā ramaṇīyā teti verambhavātā vāyantā kiṃ te ramaṇīyāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:2602_18: Paviveko hi jhāyinaṃ yasmā tādisānaṃ jhāyīnaṃ yattha katthaci pavivekoyeva icchitabbo,
atk-s0508a2:2602_22: yasmā jhāyīnaṃ pavivekakkhame nivāsaphāsuke senāsane laddheyeva jhānādayo sampajjanti,
atk-s0508a2:2602_24: tasmā na evarūpe sītakāle yattha katthaci vane vasituṃ sakkā,
atk-s0508a2:2603_0: Evaṃ upāsakena vutte thero vanādayo eva maṃ ramentīti dassento “yathā abbhānī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:2603_2: yathā pāvuse kāle abbhāni valāhakāni verambhavāto nudati khipati nīharati,
atk-s0508a2:2603_3: evameva me cittaṃ vivekapaṭisaññutā saññā abhikiranti vivekaṭṭhānaṃyeva ākaḍḍhanti.
atk-s0508a2:2604_4: niketacāriko tameva nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vicaraṇako uppādayateva me satiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2604_7: Ekadivasaṃ kira thero kākena khajjamānaṃ manussakuṇapaṃ passitvā asubhasaññaṃ paṭilabhi,
atk-s0508a2:2604_9: Tena kāye sabbaso chandarāgassa natthitāya vaneyeva vasitukāmomhīti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:2604_12: tena aññampi mama araññavāsakāraṇaṃ suṇāhīti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:2604_13: Yaṃ pabbajitaṃ mettāvihāritāya alobhaniyaparikkhāratāya ca rakkhitabbassa abhāvato aññe sevakādayo na rakkhanti.
atk-s0508a2:2604_14: Yo ca pabbajito aññe kenaci kiñcanapalibodhabhūte na rakkhati tādisānaṃyeva abhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:2604_16: so bhikkhu samucchinnakilesakāmatāya sabbaso vatthukāmesu anapekkhavā apekkhārahito yattha katthaci sukhaṃ seti.
atk-s0508a2:2604_17: Tassa anusaṅkitaparisaṅkitābhāvato araññamhi gāmamhi sadisamevāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2605_0: Idāni pabbatavanādīnaṃ ramaṇīyataṃ vasitapubbatañca dassetuṃ “acchodikā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2606_1: ime ye keci pāṇino sattā ususattiādīhi paharaṇehi haññantu māriyantu muṭṭhippahārādīhi vajjhantu bādhīyantu,
atk-s0508a2:2606_2: aññena vā yena kenaci ākārena dukkhaṃ pappontu pāpuṇantūti;
atk-s0508a2:2606_3: evaṃ dosasaṃhitaṃ paṭighasaṃyuttaṃ tato eva anariyaṃ byāpādavihiṃsādippabhedaṃ pāpasaṅkappaṃ uppāditaṃ nābhijānāmi,
atk-s0508a2:2608_0: Nābhinandāmi maraṇanti “kathaṃ nu kho me maraṇaṃ siyā”ti maraṇaṃ na icchāmi.
atk-s0508a2:2608_1: Nābhinandāmi jīvitanti “kathaṃ nu kho ahaṃ ciraṃ jīveyya”nti jīvitampi na icchāmi.
atk-s0508a2:2608_2: Etena maraṇe jīvite ca samānacittataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:2608_6: Bhatako yathāti yathā bhatako parassa kammaṃ karonto kammasiddhiṃ anabhinandantopi kammaṃ karontova divasakkhayaṃ udikkhati,
atk-s0508a2:2608_7: evaṃ ahampi jīvitaṃ anabhinandantopi attabhāvassa yāpanena maraṇaṃ anabhinandantopi pariyosānakālaṃ paṭikaṅkhāmīti.
atk-s0508a2:2613_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:2613_5: Taṃ vayappattaṃ rājā ajātasattu māretukāmo caṇḍaṃ mattahatthiṃ āropetvā nānāvidhehi upāyehi upakkamantopi
atk-s0508a2:2613_6: māretuṃ nāsakkhi pacchimabhavikassa arahattaṃ appatvā antarā jīvitantarāyābhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:2613_7: Tassa pavattiṃ disvā bhagavā mahāmoggallānattheraṃ āṇāpesi –
atk-s0508a2:2613_9: Thero iddhibalena saddhiṃ hatthinā taṃ ānesi.
atk-s0508a2:2613_10: Kumāro hatthito oruyha bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a2:2613_12: So dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā kosalaraṭṭhe vasati.
atk-s0508a2:2613_14: Te therassa santikaṃ gantvā ṭhitā therena kathitaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā sañjātasaṃvegā pasannacittā hutvā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:2625_0: Vaṇṇaṃ kittiṃ pasaṃsañca, sadā labhati sīlavā.
atk-s0508a2:2637_0: Sīlaṃ vilepanaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, yena vāti disodisaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2640_0: Sīlaṃ seṭṭho ativāho, yena yāti disodisaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2645_0: “Idheva kittiṃ labhati, pecca sagge ca summano;
atk-s0508a2:2651_3: imasmiṃ sattaloke atthakāmo kulaputto cārittavārittādibhedaṃ ādito sīlameva sikkheyya,
atk-s0508a2:2651_4: sikkhanto ca naṃ susikkhitaṃ akhaṇḍādibhāvāpādanena suṭṭhu sikkhitaṃ suparisuddhaṃ paripuṇṇañca katvā sikkheyya.
atk-s0508a2:2651_5: Asmiṃ loketi vā imasmiṃ saṅkhāraloke sikkhitabbadhammesu sīlaṃ ādito sikkheyya.
atk-s0508a2:2651_8: Yasmā sīlaṃ sevitaṃ paricitaṃ rakkhitaṃ manussasampatti,
atk-s0508a2:2651_10: nibbānasampattīti etaṃ sabbasampattiṃ taṃsamaṅgino sattassa upanāmeti āvahati.
atk-s0508a2:2652_0: Sīlaṃ sabbasampattiṃ upanāmetīti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassento “sīlaṃ rakkheyyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:2652_2: Pāṇātipātādito hi viramanto vattapaṭivattañca pūrento paṭipakkhābhibhavanato taṃ rakkhati nāma.
atk-s0508a2:2652_4: idaṃ tassa rakkhanupāyadassanaṃ ñāṇabalena hissa samādānaṃ avikopanañca hoti.
atk-s0508a2:2652_13: Sīlavā hi appamattatāya mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchati.
atk-s0508a2:2652_17: Idhaloke pasaṃsaṃ vittilābhaṃ paraloke dibbasampattiyā modanañca icchanto sīlaṃ rakkheyyāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:2653_1: Saṃyato hi kāyaduccaritādīhi kañci aviheṭhento abhayadānaṃ dadanto piyamanāpatāya mittāni ganthati.
atk-s0508a2:2653_4: Dussīlañhi puggalaṃ atthakāmā sattā na bhajanti,
atk-s0508a2:2656_2: Velāyati vā dussilyaṃ calayati viddhaṃsetīti velā.
atk-s0508a2:2656_7: sammāsambuddhāti sabbesaṃ buddhānaṃ kilesamalappavāhane nibbānamahāsamuddāvagāhaṇe ca titthabhūtañca.
atk-s0508a2:2657_0: Sīlaṃ balaṃ appaṭimanti mārasenappamaddane asadisaṃ balaṃ senāthāmo ca.
atk-s0508a2:2658_0: Apāyamahoghātikkamane saṃsāramahoghātikkamane ca kilesehi asaṃsīdanaṭṭhena setu.
atk-s0508a2:2658_2: Gandho anuttaroti paṭivātaṃ sabbadisāsu vāyanato anuttaro gandho sabbajanamanoharattā.
atk-s0508a2:2658_3: Tenāha “yena vāti disodisa”nti yena sīlagandhena taṃsamaṅgī disodisaṃ sabbā disā vāyati.
atk-s0508a2:2659_1: Yathā puṭabhattaṃ gahetvā maggaṃ gacchanto puriso antarāmagge jighacchādukkhena na kilamati,
atk-s0508a2:2659_2: evaṃ sīlasampannopi suddhaṃ sīlasambalaṃ gahetvā saṃsārakantāraṃ paṭipanno gatagataṭṭhāne na kilamatīti sīlaṃ aggaṃ sambalaṃ nāma.
atk-s0508a2:2659_3: Tathā sīlaṃ pātheyyamuttamaṃ corādīhi asādhāraṇattā tattha tattha icchitabbasampattinipphādanato ca.
atk-s0508a2:2659_4: Atikkāmento taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ vā vāheti sampāpetīti ativāho, yānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2659_5: Kenaci anupaddutaṃ hutvā icchitaṭṭhānappattihetutāya sīlaṃ seṭṭhaṃ ativāho.
atk-s0508a2:2659_6: Yenāti yena ativāhena yāti disodisanti agatiṃ gatiñcāpi taṃ taṃ disaṃ sukheneva gacchati.
atk-s0508a2:2660_0: Idheva nindaṃ labhatīti idhalokepi dummano rāgādīhi dūsitacitto “dussīlo pāpadhammo”ti nindaṃ garahaṃ labhati.
atk-s0508a2:2660_1: Pecca paralokepi apāye “purisattakali avajātā”tiādinā yamapurisādīhi ca nindaṃ labhati.
atk-s0508a2:2660_3: atha kho sabbattha dummano bālo idhaloke duccaritacaraṇena dūsitacitto paraloke kammakāraṇādivasena dukkhuppattiyāti sabbattha bālo dummano hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0508a2:2660_4: Sīlesu asamāhito sammā sīlesu na ṭhapitacitto appatiṭṭhitacitto.
atk-s0508a2:2661_0: Idheva kittiṃ labhatīti idhalokepi sumano “sappuriso sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo”ti kittiṃ labhati.
atk-s0508a2:2661_1: Pecca paralokepi sagge “ayaṃ sappuriso sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo.
atk-s0508a2:2661_2: Tathā hi devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapanno”tiādinā kittiṃ labhati.
atk-s0508a2:2661_4: atha kho dhīro dhitisampanno sīlesu suṭṭhu samāhito appitacitto supatiṭṭhitacitto sabbattha idhaloke sucaritacaraṇena,
atk-s0508a2:2661_6: Sīlameva idha agganti duvidhaṃ sīlaṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttaranti.
atk-s0508a2:2661_10: Lokuttaraṃ pana sakalampi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkāmetīti sīlaṃ aggameva.
atk-s0508a2:2665_0: Lokuttarasīlassa pana sabbaso pahīnapaṭipakkhassa sattamabhavato paṭṭhāya saṃsāradukkhaṃ vinivattentassa aggabhāve vattabbameva natthi.
atk-s0508a2:2665_1: Paññavā pana uttamoti “paññavā pana puggalo uttamo paramo seṭṭhoyevā”ti puggalādhiṭṭhānena paññāya eva seṭṭhabhāvaṃ vadati.
atk-s0508a2:2665_2: Idāni sīlapaññānaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ kiccato dassento “sīlapaññāṇato jaya”nti āha.
atk-s0508a2:2665_7: Na hi sīlena vinā paññā sambhavati,
atk-s0508a2:2665_11: paññāparidhotaṃ sīla”nti manussesu ca devesūti idaṃ nesaṃ ṭhānavisesadassanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2666_0: Evaṃ thero tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīlamukhena dhammaṃ desento attano suvisuddhasīlādiguṇatādīpanena aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2669_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto buddhassa
atk-s0508a2:2669_3: suññakāle kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto bālajanehi saddhiṃ kīḷāpasuto hutvā vicaranto ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2669_5: “kiṃ tuyhaṃ sabbaso vaṇitasarīrassa viya sakalaṃ kāyaṃ paṭicchādetvā bhikkhācaraṇena,
atk-s0508a2:2669_8: ghare ghare muttakarīsādīni nīharanto pacchā vatthusodhanena jīvāhī”ti akkosi.
atk-s0508a2:2669_9: So tena kammena niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena manussalokepi bahūni jātisatāni pupphachaḍḍakakule nibbattitvā tathā jīvikaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0508a2:2669_10: Imasmiñca buddhuppāde pupphachaḍḍakakule eva nibbatto ukkārasodhanakammena jīvikaṃ kappeti ghāsacchādanamattampi alabhanto.
atk-s0508a2:2670_0: Atha bhagavā pacchimayāme buddhāciṇṇaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya buddhacakkhunā
atk-s0508a2:2670_1: lokaṃ volokento sunītassa hadayabbhantare ghaṭe padīpaṃ viya pajjalantaṃ arahattūpanissayaṃ disvā vibhātāya
atk-s0508a2:2670_2: rattiyā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho.
atk-s0508a2:2670_5: Sunītopi tattha tattha vighāsuccārasaṅkārādikaṃ rāsiṃ katvā piṭakesu pakkhipitvā kājenādāya pariharanto
atk-s0508a2:2670_6: bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ satthāraṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā sārajjamāno sambhamākulahadayo gamanamaggaṃ nilīyanokāsañca
atk-s0508a2:2670_7: alabhanto kājaṃ bhittipasse ṭhapetvā ekena passena anupavisanto viya bhittiṃ allīno pañjaliko aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2671_0: Satthā tassa samīpaṃ patvā “ayaṃ attano kusalamūlasañcoditaṃ upagataṃ maṃ sārajjamāno jātiyā kammassa ca nihīnatāya sammukhībhāvampi lajjati,
atk-s0508a2:2671_2: gambhīrena brahmassarena “sunītā”ti ālapitvā “kiṃ imāya dukkhajīvikāya pabbajituṃ sakkhissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:2671_3: Sunīto tena satthu vacanena amatena viya abhisitto uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento “bhagavā,
atk-s0508a2:2671_9: So tāvadeva ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca labhitvā iddhimayapattacīvaradharo vassasaṭṭhikatthero viya hutvā satthu santike aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2671_10: Bhagavā taṃ vihāraṃ netvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0508a2:2671_12: pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:2671_13: Taṃ sakkādayo devā brahmāno ca upasaṅkamitvā namassiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:2672_0: “Tā devatā sattasatā uḷārā, brahmā ca indo upasaṅkamitvā;
atk-s0508a2:2674_0: Bhagavā taṃyeva devasaṅghapurakkhataṃ disvā sitaṃ katvā pasaṃsanto “tapena brahmacariyenā”ti gāthāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0508a2:2674_1: Atha naṃ sambahulā bhikkhū sīhanādaṃ nadāpetukāmā,
atk-s0508a2:2680_0: Nīcaṃ manaṃ karitvāna, vandissaṃ bahukaṃ janaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2692_0: ‘Ehi bhikkhū’ti maṃ āha, sā me āsūpasampadā.
atk-s0508a2:2694_0: Akāsiṃ satthu vacanaṃ, yathā maṃ ovadī jino.
atk-s0508a2:2701_0: Indo brahmā ca āgantvā, maṃ namassiṃsu pañjalī.
atk-s0508a2:2704_0: Yassa te āsavā khīṇā, dakkhiṇeyyosi mārisa.
atk-s0508a2:2712_2: ayaṃ pana sabbanihīne pukkusakule uppannataṃ dassento “nīce kulamhi jāto”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:2712_8: ahaṃ pana sabbakālaṃ kasiravuttitāya hīno uddhanaṃ upaṭṭhapitaukkhaliko dassanayuttaṃ thevakampi apassiṃ yevāti dassento “appabhojano”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:2712_10: mayhaṃ pana na tathāti dassento āha “hīnakammaṃ mamaṃ āsī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:2712_13: hatthavikalassa hatthavāti viya upacāravasenāyaṃ imassa samaññā ahosi yadidaṃ “pupphachaḍḍako”ti.
atk-s0508a2:2713_0: Jigucchitoti jātiyā ceva kammunā ca hīḷito.
atk-s0508a2:2713_4: Nīcaṃ manaṃ karitvānāti aññe manusse sineruṃ viya ukkhipitvā tesaṃ pādapaṃsutopi attānaṃ nihīnaṃ katvā pavattiyā nīcaṃ nihīnaṃ manaṃ katvā.
atk-s0508a2:2713_5: Vandissaṃ bahukaṃ jananti puthumahājanaṃ diṭṭhadiṭṭhakāle vandiṃ sirasi añjaliṃ karonto paṇāmiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2714_3: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhiyā “magadhāna”nti vutto,
atk-s0508a2:2715_2: pabbajituṃ sakkhissasī”ti satthārā okāse kate ahaṃ pabbajjaṃ ayāciṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2715_5: Yathā maṃ ovadīti “evaṃ samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvehī”ti yathā maṃ ovadi,
atk-s0508a2:2715_8: Tattha pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇañca bahukiccanti “paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ majjhimaṃ yāma”nti accantasaṃyogavasena upayogavacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2715_9: Na tathā āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ ekābhisamayavasena pavattanatoti “pacchime yāme”ti bhummavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2715_12: Indabrahmaggahaṇena aññesaṃ kāmadevānaṃ brahmūnañca āgamanaṃ vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2715_14: Namassiṃsūti kāyena vācāya ca namakkāraṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:2716_0: Tattha kāyena kataṃ namakkāraṃ dassento “pañjalī”ti vatvā vācāya kataṃ dassetuṃ “namo te”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2716_2: Sitaṃ pātukaritvānāti attano ovādassa mahapphalataṃ devabrahmūnañca guṇasampattiṃ nissāya satthā sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2716_3: Pātukaronto ca na aññe viya dante vidaṃseti,
atk-s0508a2:2716_5: tattakena ca abhibhūtadibbaphalikamuttarasmiyo avahasitatārakāsasimarīciyo susukkadāṭhasambhavā ghanarasmiyo
atk-s0508a2:2716_6: nikkhamitvā tikkhattuṃ satthu mukhaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonti,
atk-s0508a2:2716_7: taṃ disvā pacchato gacchantāpi satthā sitaṃ pātvākāsīti sañjānanti.
atk-s0508a2:2722_0: Evaṃ thero tehi bhikkhūhi pucchitamatthaṃ imāhi gāthāhi vissajjento sīhanādaṃ nadīti.
atk-s0508a2:2727_0: Terasanipāte yāhu raṭṭhetiādikā āyasmato soṇassa koḷivisassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:2727_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacini.
atk-s0508a2:2727_3: Ayaṃ kira anomadassissa bhagavato kāle mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi hutvā upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu
atk-s0508a2:2727_4: santike dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso satthu caṅkamanaṭṭhāne sudhāya parikammaṃ kāretvā nānāvaṇṇehi pupphehi
atk-s0508a2:2727_6: tathā satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca dīghasālaṃ kāretvā niyyādesi.
atk-s0508a2:2727_7: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare seṭṭhikule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:2727_9: So vayappatto vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ āraddhavīriyānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā,
atk-s0508a2:2727_10: sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paṇidhānamakāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2727_11: Satthāpi tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a2:2728_0: Sopi yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto parinibbute kassapadasabale anuppanne amhākaṃ bhagavati
atk-s0508a2:2728_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṃ karitvā ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ temāsaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2728_4: Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ tattha puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0508a2:2728_5: kāle campānagare usabhaseṭṭhissa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a2:2728_6: Tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya seṭṭhissa mahābhogakkhandho abhivaḍḍhi.
atk-s0508a2:2728_8: tassa pubbe paccekabuddhassa satasahassagghanikarattakambalapariccāgena suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sukhumālataro ca attabhāvo ahosi,
atk-s0508a2:2728_12: satavihatakappāsassa viya samphasso pādatalesu maṇikuṇḍalāvaṭṭavaṇṇāni lomāni jāyiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:2728_13: Vayappattassa tassa tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavike tayo pāsāde kāretvā nāṭakāni upaṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2728_14: So tattha mahatiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavanto devakumāro viya paṭivasati.
atk-s0508a2:2729_0: Atha amhākaṃ satthari sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharante bimbisāraraññā
atk-s0508a2:2729_1: pakkosāpito asītiyā gāmikasahassehi saddhiṃ rājagahaṃ āgato,
atk-s0508a2:2729_2: satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā sāsane pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0508a2:2729_4: na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2729_5: kāyaṃ kilametvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya,
atk-s0508a2:2729_6: padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhahitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya
atk-s0508a2:2729_8: “evaṃ vāyamantopi ahaṃ maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0508a2:2729_12: Satthā tassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā tattha gantvā vīṇūpamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato.
atk-s0508a2:2729_13: Soṇattheropi satthu sammukhā ovādaṃ labhitvā vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2731_0: Sudhāya lepanaṃ katvā, caṅkamaṃ kārayiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2740_0: “Yo so haṭṭhena cittena, dīghasālaṃ adāsi me;
atk-s0508a2:2757_0: Okkāko nāma nāmena, rājā raṭṭhe bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:2761_0: Taruṇī ca piyā kaññā, mahesittaṃ karissati.
atk-s0508a2:2763_0: Varaṃ laddhāna sā kaññā, putte pabbājayissati.
atk-s0508a2:2767_0: Mā no jāti pabhijjīti, nikhaṇissanti khattiyā.
atk-s0508a2:2781_0: Ṭhatvāna yogassa payuttatādino, tatottariṃ pāramatā na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:2783_0: Bhāro me ohito sabbo, nibbutomhi anāsavo.
atk-s0508a2:2787_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena aññābyākaraṇavasena ca –
atk-s0508a2:2790_0: Svājja dhammesu ukkaṭṭho, soṇo dukkhassa pāragū.
atk-s0508a2:2792_0: “Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;
atk-s0508a2:2796_0: Sīlaṃ samādhi paññā ca, pāripūriṃ na gacchati.
atk-s0508a2:2802_0: Akiccaṃ te na sevanti, kicce sātaccakārino;
atk-s0508a2:2809_0: Vīṇopamaṃ karitvā me, dhammaṃ deseti cakkhumā;
atk-s0508a2:2810_0: Tassāhaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, vihāsiṃ sāsane rato.
atk-s0508a2:2813_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2822_0: Katassa paticayo natthi, karaṇīyaṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:2825_0: Evaṃ rūpā rasā saddā, gandhā phassā ca kevalā.
atk-s0508a2:2828_0: Ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ visaññuttaṃ, vayañcassānupassatī”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:2829_0: Tattha yāhu raṭṭhe samukkaṭṭhoti yo ahu ahosi aṅgaraṭṭhe asītiyā gāmikasahassehi bhogasampattiyā issariyasampattiyā ca sammā ativiya ukkaṭṭho seṭṭho.
atk-s0508a2:2829_1: Rañño aṅgassa paddhagūti catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisāya rañjanaṭṭhena rañño aṅgādhipatino bimbisārassa
atk-s0508a2:2829_2: parivārabhūto gahapativiseso tassa raṭṭhe kuṭumbiko ahūti yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2829_3: Svājja dhammesu ukkaṭṭhoti so soṇo ajjetarahi lokuttaradhammesu ukkaṭṭho jāto,
atk-s0508a2:2829_4: gihikālepi kehici ukkaṭṭhoyeva hutvā idāni pabbajitakālepi ukkaṭṭhoyeva hotīti attānameva paraṃ viya dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:2829_5: Dukkhassa pāragūti sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gato,
atk-s0508a2:2829_6: etena dhammesu ukkaṭṭhoti avisesena vuttaṃ ukkaṭṭhabhāvaṃ viseseti arahattādhigamadīpanato.
atk-s0508a2:2830_3: apāyakāmasugatisampāpakāni pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni puriso satthena pāde baddharajjukaṃ viya heṭṭhimena maggattayena chindeyya,
atk-s0508a2:2830_4: rūpārūpabhavasampāpakāni pañca uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni puriso gīvāya baddharajjukaṃ viya aggamaggena jaheyya,
atk-s0508a2:2830_6: tesaṃ pana uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya pañca saddhādīni indriyāni uttari bhāvaye bhāveyya.
atk-s0508a2:2830_7: Evaṃbhūto pana bhikkhu rāgasaṅgo dosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅgoti pañcannaṃ saṅgānaṃ atikkamanena pañcasaṅgātigo hutvā, kāmogho, bhavogho,
atk-s0508a2:2830_9: avijjoghoti catunnaṃ oghānaṃ tiṇṇattā oghatiṇṇoti vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:2831_4: Māno hi unnamanākāravuttiyā tucchabhāvena naḷo viyāti “naḷo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:2831_9: pāripūriṃ na gacchatīti tassa sīlādīnaṃ paṭipakkhasevino lokiyopi tāva sīlādiguṇo pāripūriṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0508a2:2832_1: Bhikkhuno hi pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya aparimāṇasīlakkhandhagopanaṃ araññavāso dhutaṅgapariharaṇaṃ bhāvanārāmatāti evamādi kiccaṃ nāma.
atk-s0508a2:2832_2: Yehi pana idaṃ yathāvuttaṃ attano kiccaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2832_5: parikkhāramaṇḍanaṃ paccayabāhuliyanti evamādi bhikkhuno akiccaṃ nāma,
atk-s0508a2:2832_7: tesaṃ mānanaḷaṃ ukkhipitvā caraṇena unnaḷānaṃ sativossaggena pamattānaṃ cattāropi āsavā vaḍḍhanti.
atk-s0508a2:2833_8: Sātaccakārinoti satatakārino tesaṃ satiyā avippavāsena satānaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2833_12: cattāropi āsavā atthaṃ gacchanti parikkhayaṃ abhāvaṃ gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2834_0: Idāni attano santike ṭhitabhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ dento “ujumaggamhī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2834_1: Tattha ujumaggamhi akkhāteti antadvayaparivajjanena kāyavaṅkādippahānena ca ujuke majjhimapaṭipadābhūte ariyamagge satthārā bhāsite.
atk-s0508a2:2834_4: Attanā codayattānanti idha atthakāmo kulaputto apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇādinā attanāva attānaṃ codento.
atk-s0508a2:2835_2: Accāraddhamhi vīriyamhīti vipassanaṃ bhāventena mayā samādhinā vīriyaṃ samarasaṃ akatvā ativiya vīriye paggahite.
atk-s0508a2:2835_4: Vīṇopamaṃ karitvā meti āyasmato soṇassa “ye kho keci bhagavato sāvakā āraddhavīriyā viharanti.
atk-s0508a2:2835_6: atha ca pana me nānupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccati,
atk-s0508a2:2835_7: tasmāhaṃ vibbhamissāmī”ti citte uppanne satthā iddhiyā tassa sammukhe attānaṃ dassetvā “kasmā tvaṃ, soṇa,
atk-s0508a2:2835_9: kusalo tvaṃ pubbe agāriyabhūto vīṇāya tantissare”ti pucchitvā tena “evaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2835_11: Yadā te vīṇāya tantiyo accāyatā honti,
atk-s0508a2:2835_12: api nu te vīṇā tasmiṃ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vāti? No hetaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2835_14: yadā te vīṇāya tantiyo atisithilā honti,
atk-s0508a2:2835_15: api nu te vīṇā tasmiṃ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vāti? No hetaṃ, bhante.
atk-s0508a2:2835_17: yadā pana te vīṇāya tantiyo neva accāyatā honti,
atk-s0508a2:2835_19: api nu te vīṇā tasmiṃ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vāti? Evaṃ, bhante.
atk-s0508a2:2835_25: indriyānañca samataṃ paṭivijjhā”ti evaṃ vīṇaṃ upamaṃ katvā pavattitena vīṇopamovādena mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0508a2:2835_26: Tassāhaṃ vacanaṃ sutvāti tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ vīṇopamovādaṃ sutvā antarā uppannaṃ vibbhamitukāmataṃ pahāya satthu sāsane rato abhirato vihariṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2836_0: Viharanto ca samathaṃ paṭipādesiṃ vīriyasamataṃ yojento saddhāpaññānaṃ viya samādhivīriyānaṃ samarasataṃ
atk-s0508a2:2836_1: uppādento jhānādhiṭṭhānaṃ vipassanāsamādhiṃ sampādesiṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpesiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2837_4: paṭhamaṃ tāva pabbajjābhimukho hutvā kāme pahāya pabbajitvā ca sīlavisodhanaṃ araññavāso dhutaṅgapariharaṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2837_6: Pavivekañca cetasoti cetaso pavivekañca adhimuttassa evaṃ nekkhammādhimuttassa sato catukkapañcakajjhānānaṃ nibbattanena viveke yuttassa payuttassa.
atk-s0508a2:2837_7: Abyābajjhādhimuttassāti abyābajjhe nidukkhatāya adhimuttassa jhānasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā samathasukhe yuttappayuttassa.
atk-s0508a2:2837_8: Upādānakkhayassa cāti catunnampi upādānānaṃ khayante arahatte adhimuttassa.
atk-s0508a2:2837_10: Taṃ yathādhigataṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā arahattādhigamāya vipassanaṃ anuyuñjantassāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2838_0: Taṇhakkhayādhimuttassāti taṇhā khīyati etthāti taṇhakkhayo, nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2838_3: Asammohañca cetasoti asammohasampajaññavasena cittassa asammohapavattiṃ sammohasamucchindanena vā cittassa asammohabhūtaṃ ariyamaggaṃ adhimuttassa.
atk-s0508a2:2838_4: Disvā āyatanuppādanti cakkhādīnaṃ āyatanānaṃ yathāsakapaccayehi khaṇe khaṇe uppādaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2838_5: tappaṭipakkhato nirodhañca vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya disvā dassanahetu sammā cittaṃ vimuccatīti
atk-s0508a2:2838_6: sammā hetunā ñāyena maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbāsavato cittaṃ vimuccati.
atk-s0508a2:2839_2: tato eva accantupasamena santacittassa khīṇāsavabhikkhuno katassa kusalassa akusalassa vā upacayo natthi maggeneva samugghātitattā,
atk-s0508a2:2839_4: Evaṃ bhūtassa yathā ekaghano selo pabbato pakativātena na samīrati na saṃkampati,
atk-s0508a2:2839_5: evaṃ iṭṭhā ca aniṭṭhā ca rūpādayo ārammaṇadhammā tādino tādibhāvappattassa ṭhitaṃ anejaṃ pahīnasabbasokatāya
atk-s0508a2:2839_7: Assa ca ārammaṇadhammassa kālena kālaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vipassanto vayaṃ nirodhaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvaṃ anupassatīti aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2844_0: Cuddasakanipāte yadā ahantiādikā āyasmato khadiravaniyarevatattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:2844_2: Kāmañcimassa therassa gāthā heṭṭhā ekakanipāte āgatā.
atk-s0508a2:2844_3: Tattha panassa attano bhāgineyyesu satijananamattaṃ dassitanti tassā ekakanipāte saṅgaho kato.
atk-s0508a2:2844_4: Imā pana therassa pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya yāva parinibbānā paṭipattipakāsitā gāthā imasmiṃ cuddasakanipāte saṅgahaṃ āropitā.
atk-s0508a2:2844_7: thero kira arahattaṃ patvā kālena kālaṃ satthu dhammasenāpatippabhūtīnaṃ mahātherānañca upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a2:2844_8: katipāhameva tattha vasitvā khadiravanameva paccāgantvā phalasamāpattisukhena brahmavihārehi ca vītināmeti.
atk-s0508a2:2844_9: Evaṃ gacchante kāle jiṇṇo vuḍḍho vayo anuppatto ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:2844_10: So ekadivasaṃ buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge sāvatthiyā avidūre araññe vasi.
atk-s0508a2:2844_11: Tena ca samayena corā nagare katakammā ārakkhamanussehi anubandhā palāyantā therassa samīpe gahitabhaṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:2844_12: Manussā anudhāvantā therassa samīpe bhaṇḍaṃ disvā theraṃ bandhitvā “coro”ti saññāya gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ, “ayaṃ, deva, coro”ti.
atk-s0508a2:2844_16: Thero kiñcāpi jātito paṭṭhāya attanā tādisaṃ na katapubbaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2844_18: sabbaso kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā tādisassa karaṇe abhabbatāya pakāsanatthaṃ samīpe ṭhitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rañño ca dhammaṃ desento –
atk-s0508a2:2865_0: Evaṃ mohakkhayā bhikkhu, pabbatova na vedhati.
atk-s0508a2:2871_0: Evaṃ gopetha attānaṃ, khaṇo vo mā upaccagā.
atk-s0508a2:2886_0: Handāhaṃ parinibbissaṃ vippamuttomhi sabbadhī”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:2887_3: etasmiṃ dīghamantare kāle “idaṃ mayhaṃ hotū”ti abhijjhāvasena vā,
atk-s0508a2:2887_4: “ime sattā haññantū”tiādinā byāpādavasena vā anariyaṃ dosasaṃhitaṃ saṅkappaṃ nābhijānāmīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:2888_5: saddena karuṇaṃ muditaṃ upekkhañcāti itarabrahmavihāre saṅgaṇhāti.
atk-s0508a2:2888_8: Adhigatañhi jhānaṃ paccavekkhato paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa abhimukhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0508a2:2888_16: pacchā upekkhāti evaṃ anupubbaṃ anukkamena paricitaṃ āsevitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2889_1: sabbe vā te mayhaṃ mittāti sabbamitto.
atk-s0508a2:2889_8: mettāya sahitaṃ sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ visesato bhāvemi, vaḍḍhemi,
atk-s0508a2:2890_4: evaṃbhūtaṃ katvā mama mettacittaṃ āmodayāmi abhippamodayāmi brahmavihāraṃ bhāvemi.
atk-s0508a2:2890_7: akāpurisehi vā ariyehi buddhādīhi sevitaṃ brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ niddosaṃ mettādivihāraṃ bhāvemi vaḍḍhemīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2891_0: Evaṃ attuddesavasena pañcahi gāthāhi attano paṭipattiṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ aññāpadesena dassento “avitakka”ntiādinā catasso gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2891_3: etena thero brahmavihārabhāvanāya aññāpadesena attanā dutiyādijhānādhigamamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2891_4: Yasmā panāyaṃ thero tameva jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ekāsaneneva arahattaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0508a2:2891_5: tasmā tamatthaṃ aññāpadeseneva dassento “avitakkaṃ samāpanno”ti vatvā “sammāsambuddhasāvako.
atk-s0508a2:2891_8: Tattha vacīsaṅkhārābhāvato avitakkāvicārā samāpatti “ariyo tuṇhībhāvo”ti vadanti.
atk-s0508a2:2891_11: dvayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ dhammī vā kathā ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo”ti pana vacanato yā kāci samāpatti ariyo tuṇhībhāvo nāma.
atk-s0508a2:2892_0: Idāni tassādhigatattā lokadhammehi akampanīyataṃ upamāya pakāsento “yathāpi pabbato”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2892_5: suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitamūlo pakativātehi acalo akampanīyo hoti,
atk-s0508a2:2892_6: tasmā arahattaṃ nibbānañca evaṃ mohakkhayā bhikkhu,
atk-s0508a2:2892_8: mohamūlakattā ca sabbākusalānaṃ pahīnasabbākusalo bhikkhu yathā so pabbato pakativātehi,
atk-s0508a2:2892_9: evaṃ lokadhammehi na vedhati na kampati,
atk-s0508a2:2892_10: mohakkhayoti vā yasmā arahattaṃ nibbānañca vuccati,
atk-s0508a2:2892_11: tasmā mohakkhayāti mohakkhayassa hetu nibbānassa arahattassa ca adhigatattā catūsu ariyasaccesu suppatiṭṭhito
atk-s0508a2:2893_0: Idāni pāpaṃ nāmetaṃ asucisīlo eva samācarati,
atk-s0508a2:2893_2: sucisīlassa pana taṃ aṇumattampi bhāriyaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātīti dassento “anaṅgaṇassā”tiādigāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2893_4: rāgādiaṅgaṇābhāvato anaṅgaṇassa sabbakālaṃ sucianavajjadhamme eva gavesantassa sappurisassa vālaggamattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2893_5: kesaggamattaṃ pāpassa lesamattampi sakalaṃ lokadhātuṃ pharitvā ṭhitaṃ abbhamattaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0508a2:2893_6: tasmā na evarūpe kamme mādisā āsaṅkitabbāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:2894_0: Yasmā nikkilesesupi andhabālā evarūpe apavāde samuṭṭhāpenti,
atk-s0508a2:2894_1: tasmā atthakāmehi sakkaccaṃ attā rakkhitabboti ovādaṃ dento “nagaraṃ yathā”tiādigāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2894_3: yathā pana paccantanagaravāsīhi manussehi paccantaṃ nagaraṃ dvārapākārādīni thirāni karontehi saantaraṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2894_4: uddāpaparikhādīni thirāni karontehi sabāhiranti santarabāhiraṃ guttaṃ karīyati,
atk-s0508a2:2894_5: evaṃ tumhehipi satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ajjhattikāni cha dvārāni pidahitvā dvārarakkhitaṃ satiṃ avissajjetvā
atk-s0508a2:2894_6: yathā gayhamānāni bāhirāni cha āyatanāni ajjhattikāni upaghātāya saṃvattanti,
atk-s0508a2:2894_7: tathā aggahaṇena tānipi thirāni katvā tesaṃ appavesāya dvārarakkhitaṃ satiṃ appahāya vicarantā attānaṃ gopetha. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a2:2894_9: Yo hi evaṃ attānaṃ na gopeti,
atk-s0508a2:2894_14: channaṃ āyatanānaṃ avekallakkhaṇoti sabbopi ayaṃ khaṇo atikkamati,
atk-s0508a2:2895_0: Evaṃ thero imāya gāthāya sarājikaṃ parisaṃ bhikkhū ca ovaditvā puna maraṇe jīvite ca attano samacittataṃ
atk-s0508a2:2896_0: Evaṃ pana vatvā attano parinibbānakālaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ disvā saṅkhepeneva nesaṃ ovādaṃ datvā parinibbānaṃ pavedento osānagāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2896_1: Tattha sampādethappamādenāti sampādetabbaṃ dānasīlādiṃ appamādena sampādetha,
atk-s0508a2:2896_2: diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikapabhede gahaṭṭhavatte sīlānurakkhaṇe samathaanuyoge vipassanābhāvanāya ca appamattā hotha.
atk-s0508a2:2896_3: Esā me anusāsanīti dānasīlādīsu na pamajjathāti esā mama anusiṭṭhi ovādo.
atk-s0508a2:2897_0: Evaṃ sikhāpattaṃ parahitapaṭipattiṃ dīpetvā attahitapaṭipattiyāpi matthakaṃ gaṇhanto “handāhaṃ parinibbissaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2897_2: Tattha vippamuttomhi sabbadhīti sabbaso kilesehi bhavehi ca vippamutto amhi,
atk-s0508a2:2898_0: Evaṃ pana vatvā ākāse pallaṅkena nisinno tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā pajjalanto anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0508a2:2901_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā devamanussesu
atk-s0508a2:2901_3: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ satthavāhakule nibbatto.
atk-s0508a2:2901_4: Godattoti nāmena vayappatto pitari kālaṅkate kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapento pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya
atk-s0508a2:2901_5: aparāparaṃ sañcaritvā vāṇijjena jīvikaṃ kappeti yathāvibhavaṃ puññānipi karoti.
atk-s0508a2:2901_6: So ekadivasaṃ antarāmagge dhure yuttagoṇe vahituṃ asakkonte patite manussesu taṃ vuṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkontesu sayameva gantvā taṃ naṅguṭṭhe gāḷhaṃ vijjhi.
atk-s0508a2:2901_7: Goṇo “ayaṃ asappuriso mama balābalaṃ ajānanto gāḷhaṃ vijjhatī”ti kuddho manussavācāya,
atk-s0508a2:2901_9: ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ attano balaṃ aniguhanto tuyhaṃ bhāraṃ vahiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2901_10: ajja pana asamatthabhāvena patitaṃ maṃ ativiya bādhasi, hotu,
atk-s0508a2:2901_11: ito cavitvā nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne taṃ bādhetuṃ samattho paṭisattu bhaveyya”nti patthanānurūpena akkosi.
atk-s0508a2:2901_12: Taṃ sutvā godatto “evaṃ nāma satte bādhetvā kiṃ imāya jīvikāyā”ti saṃvegajāto sabbaṃ vibhavaṃ pahāya
atk-s0508a2:2901_13: aññatarassa mahātherassa santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā samāpattisukhena
atk-s0508a2:2901_14: vītināmento ekadivasaṃ attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ ariyagaṇānaṃ lokadhamme ārabbha
atk-s0508a2:2906_0: “Evaṃ paññāya ye tittā, samuddo vārinā yathā;
atk-s0508a2:2910_0: Narā dukkhaṃ nigacchanti, tedha socanti māṇavā.
atk-s0508a2:2916_0: Ṭhitā te indakhīlova, na te unnataonatā.
atk-s0508a2:2918_0: “Na heva lābhe nālābhe, na yase na ca kittiyā;
atk-s0508a2:2919_0: Na nindāyaṃ pasaṃsāya, na te dukkhe sukhamhi ca.
atk-s0508a2:2924_0: “Dhammena ca alābho yo, yo ca lābho adhammiko;
atk-s0508a2:2925_0: Alābho dhammiko seyyo, yañce lābho adhammiko.
atk-s0508a2:2927_0: “Yaso ca appabuddhīnaṃ, viññūnaṃ ayaso ca yo;
atk-s0508a2:2928_0: Ayasova seyyo viññūnaṃ, na yaso appabuddhinaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2930_0: “Dummedhehi pasaṃsā ca, viññūhi garahā ca yā;
atk-s0508a2:2937_0: Maraṇaṃ dhammikaṃ seyyo, yañce jīve adhammikaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2940_0: Caranti loke asitā, natthi tesaṃ piyāpiyaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2943_0: Pappuyya paramaṃ santiṃ, parinibbantināsavā”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:2944_13: attano khandhe ṭhapitaṃ yugaṃ nātivattati na atikkāmeti,
atk-s0508a2:2944_14: sammā yo uddharitvā dhuraṃ chaḍḍetvā na tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0508a2:2944_15: Evanti yathā so dhorayho attano bhadrājānīyatāya attano dhīravīratāya attano bhāraṃ nātivattati na pariccajati,
atk-s0508a2:2944_16: evaṃ ye vārinā viya mahāsamuddo lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya tittā dhātā paripuṇṇā,
atk-s0508a2:2944_20: pāṇinaṃ sattesu ayaṃ ariyānaṃ dhammo yadidaṃ tesaṃ paññāya pāripūriṃ gatattā lābhādinā attānukkaṃsanaṃ viya alābhādinā paresaṃ avambhanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2945_0: Evaṃ paññāpāripūriyā ariyānaṃ sukhavihāraṃ dassetvā tadabhāvato anariyānaṃ dukkhavihāraṃ dassetuṃ “kāle”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2945_2: Kālavasaṃ pattāti lābhādikālassa ca vasaṃ upagatā,
atk-s0508a2:2945_3: lābhādinā somanassitā alābhādinā ca domanassitāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2945_4: Bhavābhavavasaṃ gatāti bhavassa abhavassa ca vasaṃ upagatā vuddhihāniyo anuvattantā te.
atk-s0508a2:2945_6: tedha socanti māṇavāti te narā “māṇavā”ti laddhanāmā sattā lābhālābhādivasena vuddhihānivasena anurodhapaṭivirodhaṃ āpannā idhaloke socanti,
atk-s0508a2:2945_7: paraloke ca nirayādidukkhaṃ gacchanti pāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:2946_1: Tattha unnatā sukhadhammenāti sukhahetunā sukhapaccayena bhogasampattiādinā unnatiṃ gatā,
atk-s0508a2:2946_3: Dukkhadhammena conatāti dukkhahetunā dukkhapaccayena bhogavipattiādinā nihīnataṃ gatā dāliddiyādinā kāpaññataṃ pattā.
atk-s0508a2:2946_4: Dvayenāti yathāvuttena unnationatidvayena lābhālābhādidvayena vā bālaputhujjanā haññanti,
atk-s0508a2:2946_6: Yathābhūtaṃ adassino yasmā te dhammasabhāvaṃ yāthāvato nabbhaññaṃsu,
atk-s0508a2:2946_12: majjhe sibbinimaccagūti ye pana ariyā dukkhavedanāya sukhavedanāya majjhattatāvedanāya ca tappaṭibaddhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2946_13: chandarāgabhūtaṃ sibbiniṃ taṇhaṃ aggamaggādhigamena accagū atikkamiṃsu,
atk-s0508a2:2946_14: te indakhīlo viya vātehi lokadhammehi asampakampiyā ṭhitā,
atk-s0508a2:2946_16: kadācipi unnatā vā onatā vā na honti sabbaso anunayapaṭighābhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:2947_0: Evaṃ vedanādhiṭṭhānaṃ arahato anupalepaṃ dassetvā idāni lokadhamme vibhajitvā sabbatthakamevassa anupalepaṃ dassento “na hevā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:2948_1: sabbattha vā rūpādike visaye te khīṇāsavā na limpanti sabbaso pahīnakilesattā.
atk-s0508a2:2948_3: Udabinduva pokkhare yathā kamaladale jalabindu allīyitvā ṭhitampi tena na limpati,
atk-s0508a2:2948_8: Tato eva dhīrā paṇḍitā sabbattha lābhādīsu ñāṇamukhena piyanimittānaṃ sokādīnañca abhāvato sukhitā lābhādīhi
atk-s0508a2:2949_1: Tattha dhammena ca alābho yoti yo dhammaṃ rakkhantassa taṃnimittaṃ alābho lābhābhāvo,
atk-s0508a2:2949_3: Yo ca lābho adhammiko adhammena aññāyena buddhapaṭikuṭṭhena vidhinā uppanno,
atk-s0508a2:2949_4: tesu dvīsu alābho dhammiko dhammāvaho seyyo,
atk-s0508a2:2949_5: yādisaṃ lābhaṃ parivajjantassa akusalā dhammā parihāyanti,
atk-s0508a2:2949_8: Yañce lābho adhammikoti yo lābho adhammena uppanno,
atk-s0508a2:2950_1: viññūnaṃ ayaso ca yoti yo appabuddhīnaṃ duppaññānaṃ vasena puggalassa yaso labbhati,
atk-s0508a2:2950_2: yo ca viññūnaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ vasena ayaso yasahāni.
atk-s0508a2:2950_4: Te hissa yathā akusalā dhammā parihāyanti,
atk-s0508a2:2950_7: tathā ca bhabbajātiko taṃ aguṇaṃ pahāya guṇe patiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0508a2:2950_8: Na yaso appabuddhīnanti duppaññānaṃ vasena yaso seyyo hoti,
atk-s0508a2:2950_10: so cassa idha ceva viññūgarahādinā samparāye ca duggatiyaṃ dukkhaparikkilesādinā anatthāvaho.
atk-s0508a2:2950_13: micchāladdho ca yo yaso”ti “sakkāro kāpurisaṃ hantī”ti ca.
atk-s0508a2:2951_0: Dummedhehīti, nippaññehi. Yañce bālappasaṃsanāti bālehi aviddasūhi yā nāma pasaṃsanā.
atk-s0508a2:2952_2: Dukkhañca pavivekiyanti pavivekato nibbattaṃ kāyakilamathavasena pavattaṃ visamāsanupatāpādihetukaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:2953_0: Jīvitañca adhammenāti adhammena jīvikakappanaṃ jīvitahetu adhammacaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2953_1: Dhammena maraṇaṃ nāma “imaṃ nāma pāpaṃ akarontaṃ taṃ māressāmī”ti kenaci vutte mārentepi tasmiṃ pāpaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2953_2: akatvā dhammaṃ avikopentassa dhammahetumaraṇaṃ dhammikaṃ seyyoti tādisaṃ maraṇaṃ dhammato anapetattā
atk-s0508a2:2953_3: dhammikaṃ saggasampāpanato nibbānupanissayato ca viññūnaṃ pāsaṃsataraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2954_0: “Caje dhanaṃ aṅgavarassa hetu, aṅgaṃ caje jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno;
atk-s0508a2:2955_0: Aṅgaṃ dhanaṃ jīvitañcāpi sabbaṃ, caje naro dhammamanussaranto”ti. ;
atk-s0508a2:2956_0: Yañce jīve adhammikanti puriso yaṃ dhammato apetaṃ jīvikaṃ jīveyya,
atk-s0508a2:2956_1: taṃ na seveyya viññūhi garahitattā apāyasampāpanato cāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:2957_0: Idāni yathāvuttaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ anupalepaṃ kāraṇato dassento “kāmakopapahīnā”tiādigāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2958_0: Tattha kāmakopapahīnāti ariyamaggena sabbasova pahīnā anurodhapaṭivirodhā.
atk-s0508a2:2958_1: Santacittā bhavābhaveti khuddake ceva mahante ca bhave anavasesapahīnakilesapariḷāhatāya vūpasantacittā.
atk-s0508a2:2958_4: Natthi tesaṃ piyāpiyanti tesaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ katthaci lābhādike rūpādivisaye ca piyaṃ vā apiyaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0508a2:2959_0: Idāni yāya bhāvanāya te evarūpā jātā,
atk-s0508a2:2959_1: taṃ dassetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto “bhāvayitvānā”ti osānagāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:2959_5: Imā eva ca gāthā therassa aññābyākaraṇāpi ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2964_0: Soḷasakanipāte esa bhiyyotiādikā āyasmato aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:2964_2: Ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā
atk-s0508a2:2964_3: ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ attano sāsane paṭhamaṃ paṭividdhadhammarattaññūnaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2964_4: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento satasahassabhikkhuparivārassa satthuno sattāhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:2964_6: Satthāpissa anantarāyataṃ disvā bhāviniṃ sampattiṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2964_7: So yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā satthari parinibbute cetiye patiṭṭhāpiyamāne antocetiye ratanagharaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0508a2:2965_2: devamanussesu saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato kāle mahākālo nāma kuṭumbiko hutvā aṭṭhakarīsamatte khette sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā,
atk-s0508a2:2965_14: evaṃ ekasasse nava vāre aggadānaṃ nāma adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2966_1: tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto,
atk-s0508a2:2966_2: amhākaṃ bhagavato uppattito puretarameva kapilavatthunagarassa avidūre doṇavatthunāmake brāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:2966_3: Tassa koṇḍaññoti gottato āgataṃ nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:2966_4: So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā lakkhaṇamantesu ca pāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2966_5: Tena samayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto tusitapurato cavitvā kapilavatthupure suddhodanamahārājassa gehe nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:2966_6: Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase aṭṭhuttarasatesu brāhmaṇesu upanītesu ye aṭṭha brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇapariggahaṇatthaṃ mahātalaṃ upanītā.
atk-s0508a2:2966_9: “ekaṃsena ayaṃ buddho bhavissatī”ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā mahāsattassa abhinikkhamanaṃ udikkhanto vicarati.
atk-s0508a2:2967_0: Bodhisattopi kho mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhamāno anukkamena vuddhippatto ñāṇaparipākaṃ gantvā ekūnatiṃsatime
atk-s0508a2:2967_1: vasse mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamanto anomānadītīre pabbajitvā anukkamena uruvelaṃ gantvā padhānaṃ padahi.
atk-s0508a2:2967_2: Tadā koṇḍañño māṇavo mahāsattassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0508a2:2967_3: lakkhaṇapariggāhakabrāhmaṇānaṃ puttehi vappamāṇavādīhi saddhiṃ attapañcamo pabbajitvā,
atk-s0508a2:2967_5: chabbassāni taṃ upaṭṭhahanto tassa oḷārikāhāraparibhogena nibbinno apakkamitvā isipatanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2967_6: Atha kho bodhisatto oḷārikāhāraparibhogena laddhakāyabalo vesākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ bodhirukkhamūle aparājitapallaṅke
atk-s0508a2:2967_13: Desanāpariyosāne koṇḍaññatthero aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2967_14: Atha pañcamiyaṃ pakkhassa anattalakkhaṇasuttantadesanāya arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:2981_0: Idaṃ me paṭhamaṃ bhattaṃ, brahmacārissa yāpanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:2982_0: “Tusitā hi idhāgantvā, yo me bhikkhaṃ upānayi;
atk-s0508a2:2989_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:3001_0: Atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge jetavanamahāvihāre bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno paṭhamaṃ paṭividdhadhammabhāvaṃ dīpento,
atk-s0508a2:3001_3: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ aññāsikoṇḍañño”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:3001_4: So dvīhi aggasāvakehi attani karīyamānaṃ paramanipaccakāraṃ gāmantasenāsane ākiṇṇavihārañca pariharitukāmo,
atk-s0508a2:3001_5: vivekābhiratiyā viharitukāmo ca attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ paṭisanthārakaraṇampi
atk-s0508a2:3001_6: papañcaṃ maññamāno satthāraṃ āpucchitvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā chaddantehi nāgehi upaṭṭhiyamāno chaddantadahatīre
atk-s0508a2:3001_8: Evaṃ tattha vasantaṃ theraṃ ekadivasaṃ sakko devarājā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ṭhito evamāha –
atk-s0508a2:3001_11: Thero tassa catusaccagabbhaṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ suññatapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ nānānayavicittaṃ amatogadhaṃ buddhalīlāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0508a2:3001_12: Taṃ sutvā sakko attano pasādaṃ pavedento –
atk-s0508a2:3004_0: Virāgo desito dhammo, anupādāya sabbaso”ti. – paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a2:3005_1: sutvā dhammaṃ mahārasanti yadipi anekavāraṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā tattha abhippasanno.
atk-s0508a2:3005_2: Idāni pana tumhehi kathitaṃ nānānayavicittatāya asecanakatāya ca mahārasaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā eso ahaṃ tato bhiyyo pasīdāmi.
atk-s0508a2:3005_4: anupādāya sabbasoti sabbasaṃkilesato sabbasaṅkhārato ca virajjanato virāgajananato virāgo.
atk-s0508a2:3005_5: Tato eva rūpādīsu kañci dhammaṃ anupādāya aggahetvā vimuttisādhanavasena pavattattā sabbaso anupādāya desito.
atk-s0508a2:3006_0: Evaṃ sakko devarājā therassa desanaṃ thometvā theraṃ abhivādetvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0508a2:3006_1: Athekadivasaṃ thero micchāvitakkehi abhibhuyyamānānaṃ ekaccānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ cittācāraṃ disvā tappaṭipakkhabhūtañcassa anukkamaṃ anussaritvā,
atk-s0508a2:3006_2: attano ca sabbaso tato vinivattitamānasataṃ āvajjetvā tadatthaṃ dīpetvā –
atk-s0508a2:3012_0: Evaṃ sammanti saṅkappā, yadā paññāya passatī”ti. – dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:3013_0: Tattha bahūni loke citrānīti rūpādivasena tatthāpi nīlapītādivasena itthipurisādivasena ca anekāni loke cittavicittāni ārammaṇajātāni.
atk-s0508a2:3013_1: Asmiṃ pathavimaṇḍaleti paccakkhabhūtaṃ manussalokaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0508a2:3013_2: Mathenti maññe saṅkappanti tajjaṃ purisavāyāmasahitaṃ araṇisahitaṃ viya aggiṃ ayonisomanasikārābhisaṅkhātāni
atk-s0508a2:3013_3: micchāsaṅkappāni mathenti maññe mathentāni viya tiṭṭhanti. Kīdisaṃ?
atk-s0508a2:3014_2: Yathā gimhānaṃ pacchime māse vātena ūhataṃ uṭṭhitaṃ rajaṃ mahāmegho vassanto upasammaye,
atk-s0508a2:3014_5: yadā paññāya passatīti yadā ariyasāvako tāni lokacitrāni samudayato, assādato,
atk-s0508a2:3014_8: atha yathā taṃ rajaṃ uhataṃ meghena,
atk-s0508a2:3014_10: Na hi uppannāya sammādiṭṭhiyā micchāsaṅkappā patiṭṭhaṃ labhanti.
atk-s0508a2:3017_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā.
atk-s0508a2:3022_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:3024_0: Tattha sabbe saṅkhārāti chaḷārammaṇasaṅgahā sabbe tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā.
atk-s0508a2:3024_4: tattha tattha bhijjanato na niccā”ti yadā vipassanāpaññāya passati.
atk-s0508a2:3024_5: Atha nibbindati dukkheti atha imasmiṃ vaṭṭadukkhe nibbindati,
atk-s0508a2:3024_7: Esa maggo visuddhiyāti esa yathāvutto vipassanāvidhi ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā,
atk-s0508a2:3026_0: Sabbe dhammā anattāti sabbepi catubhūmakā dhammā anattā.
atk-s0508a2:3027_0: Evaṃ vipassanāvidhiṃ dassetvā tena vidhinā katakiccaṃ attānaṃ aññaṃ viya katvā dassento –
atk-s0508a2:3033_0: Chetvā khilañca pāsañca, selaṃ bhetvāna dubbhidaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:3034_0: Tiṇṇo pāraṅgato jhāyī, mutto so mārabandhanā”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:3036_1: sammāsambuddhehi bujjhitāni saccāni tesaṃ desanānusārena bujjhatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3036_9: atha vā kevalī nāma kilesehi asammissatāya maggañāṇaṃ phalañāṇañca,
atk-s0508a2:3036_11: Yasmā pana tadubhayampi maggabrahmacariyassa vasena hoti na aññathā,
atk-s0508a2:3037_4: yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti evaṃ vutto rāgapāso ca.
atk-s0508a2:3037_9: sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto”ti evaṃ vutto daḷho thiro pañcavidho cetokhilo ca.
atk-s0508a2:3037_11: Tato eva pabbatasadisatāya pabbatoti ca saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0508a2:3037_12: “Dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādinā vā nayena vutto aññāṇappabhedo ca.
atk-s0508a2:3037_13: Iti etaṃ sabbaṃ chetvā khilañca pāsañcāti etesu catubbidhesu saṃkilesadhammesu yo khilañca pāsañca ariyamaggañāṇāsinā chinditvā.
atk-s0508a2:3037_14: Selaṃ bhetvāna dubbhidanti yena kenaci ñāṇena chindituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ aññāṇaselaṃ vajirūpamañāṇena chinditvā,
atk-s0508a2:3037_16: tesaṃ paratīre nibbāne ṭhitattā tiṇṇo pāraṅgato.
atk-s0508a2:3037_18: mutto so mārabandhanāti so evarūpo khīṇāsavo sabbasmāpi kilesamārabandhanā mutto vippamutto visaṃyuttoti.
atk-s0508a2:3038_1: attano saddhivihārikaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ akalyāṇamittasaṃsaggena kusītaṃ hīnavīriyaṃ uddhataṃ unnaḷaṃ viharantaṃ disvā,
atk-s0508a2:3038_4: akalyāṇamitte pahāya kalyāṇamitte sevanto samaṇadhammaṃ karohī”ti ovadi.
atk-s0508a2:3038_6: Thero tassa anādiyanena dhammasaṃvegappatto puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya micchāpaṭipattiṃ garahanto sammāpaṭipattiṃ vivekavāsañca pasaṃsanto –
atk-s0508a2:3057_0: So me attho anuppatto, kiṃ me saddhivihārinā”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:3059_2: Mitte āgamma pāpaketi akalyāṇamitte nissāya samaṇadhammaṃ akaronto.
atk-s0508a2:3059_4: ūmiyā paṭikujjitoti yathā mahāsamudde patitapuriso samuddavīcīhi otthaṭo sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ alabhanto tattheva saṃsīdati,
atk-s0508a2:3059_5: evaṃ saṃsāramahoghasmiṃ paribbhamanto kodhupāyāsaūmiyā paṭikujjito otthaṭo vipassanāvasena paññāsīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ alabhanto tattheva saṃsīdati.
atk-s0508a2:3060_5: Dukkhassantakaro siyāti so tādiso sakalassāpi vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro bhaveyya.
atk-s0508a2:3061_3: Osāne pana kiṃ me saddhivihārināti attano saddhivihārikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3061_4: Tasmā edisena dubbacena anādarena saddhivihārinā kiṃ me payojanaṃ ekavihāroyeva mayhaṃ ruccatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3062_1: Tattha dvādasa vassāni vasitvā upakaṭṭhe parinibbāne satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā parinibbānaṃ anujānāpetvā tattheva gantvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0508a2:3065_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinitvā devamanussesu
atk-s0508a2:3065_3: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā udāyīti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0508a2:3065_5: paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:3065_6: Tayo hi ime udāyittherā amaccaputto pubbe āgato kāḷudāyī,
atk-s0508a2:3065_9: Svāyaṃ ekadivasaṃ satthārā setavāraṇaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ mahājanena pasaṃsiyamānaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:3065_10: katvā nāgopamasuttante desite desanāpariyosāne attano ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ satthu guṇe anussaritvā,
atk-s0508a2:3065_11: buddhārammaṇāya pītiyā samussāhitamānaso “ayaṃ mahājano imaṃ tiracchānagataṃ nāgaṃ pasaṃsati,
atk-s0508a2:3065_13: Handāhaṃ buddhamahāgandhahatthino guṇe pākaṭe karissāmī”ti satthāraṃ thomento –
atk-s0508a2:3071_0: Devāpi taṃ namassanti, iti me arahato sutaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3079_0: “Nāgaṃ vo kittayissāmi, na hi āguṃ karoti so;
atk-s0508a2:3080_0: Soraccaṃ avihiṃsā ca, pādā nāgassa te duve.
atk-s0508a2:3089_0: Gacchaṃ samāhito nāgo, ṭhito nāgo samāhito.
atk-s0508a2:3092_0: Sabbattha saṃvuto nāgo, esā nāgassa sampadā.
atk-s0508a2:3103_0: “Tatheva ca loke jāto, buddho loke viharati;
atk-s0508a2:3113_0: Sarīraṃ vijahaṃ nāgo, parinibbissatyanāsavo”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:3114_3: Satthā hi āsavakkhayañāṇādhigamena sabbagativimuttopi carimattabhāve gahitapaṭisandhivasena “manusso”tveva voharīyatīti.
atk-s0508a2:3114_8: Bhagavā hi attanāyeva uppāditena ariyamaggena cakkhutopi…pe…
atk-s0508a2:3114_10: Samāhitanti aṭṭhavidhena samādhinā maggaphalasamādhinā ca samāhitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3114_12: brahme vā seṭṭhe phalasamāpattipathe samāpajjanavasena pavattamānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3114_13: Kiñcāpi bhagavā na sabbakālaṃ yathāvutte brahmapathe iriyati,
atk-s0508a2:3114_14: tattha iriyasāmatthiyaṃ pana tanninnatañca upādāya “iriyamāna”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3114_15: Cittassūpasame ratanti cittassa upasamahetubhūte sabbasaṅkhārasamathe, nibbāne,
atk-s0508a2:3114_18: sabbadhammāna pāragunti yaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ sabbesaṃ khandhāyatanādidhammānaṃ abhiññāpāragū,
atk-s0508a2:3114_23: samāpattipāragūti chadhā pāraguṃ paramukkaṃsagatasampattiṃ khattiyapaṇḍitādayo manussā namassanti.
atk-s0508a2:3114_24: Dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā pūjentā kāyena vācāya manasā ca tanninnā tappoṇā tappabbhārā honti.
atk-s0508a2:3114_25: Devāpi taṃ namassantīti na kevalaṃ manussā eva,
atk-s0508a2:3114_26: atha kho aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu devāpi taṃ namassanti.
atk-s0508a2:3114_27: Iti me arahato sutanti evaṃ mayā ārakattādīhi kāraṇehi arahato,
atk-s0508a2:3114_29: dhammasenāpatiādīnañca “satthā devamanussāna”ntiādikaṃ vadantānaṃ santike evaṃ sutanti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:3115_0: Sabbasaṃyojanātītanti sabbāni dasapi saṃyojanāni yathārahaṃ catūhi maggehi saha vāsanāya atikkantaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3115_1: Vanā nibbanamāgatanti kilesavanato tabbirahitaṃ nibbanaṃ upagataṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3115_2: Kāmehi nekkhammaratanti sabbaso kāmehi nikkhamitvā pabbajjājhānavipassanādibhede nekkhamme abhirataṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3115_3: Muttaṃ selāva kañcananti asārato nissaṭasārasabhāvattā selato nissaṭakañcanasadisaṃ devāpi taṃ namassantīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:3116_0: Sa ve accaruci nāgoti so ekaṃsato āguṃ na karoti,
atk-s0508a2:3116_4: accarucīti attano kāyaruciyā ñāṇaruciyā ca sadevakaṃ lokaṃ atikkamitvā ruci, sobhi.
atk-s0508a2:3116_7: yathā hi himavā pabbatarājā attano thiragarumahāsārabhāvādīhi guṇehi aññe pabbate atirocati,
atk-s0508a2:3116_12: Taṃ pana saccanāmataṃ “na hi āguṃ karotī”tiādinā sayameva vakkhati.
atk-s0508a2:3117_0: Idāni buddhanāgaṃ avayavato ca dassento nāmato tāva dassetuṃ “na hi āguṃ karoti so”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:3117_7: katvā buddhanāgassa purimapādabhāvo tassa yuttoti āha “pādā nāgassa te duve”ti.
atk-s0508a2:3118_6: Suparisuddhavedanā ñāṇappabhedā upekkhā setadantā te etassa atthīti,
atk-s0508a2:3119_1: tassā adhiṭṭhānaṃ satīti āha “sati gīvā siro paññā”ti.
atk-s0508a2:3119_2: Vīmaṃsā dhammacintanāti yathā khāditabbākhāditabbassa soṇḍāya parāmasanaṃ ghāyanañca hatthināgassa vīmaṃsā nāma hoti,
atk-s0508a2:3119_6: abhiññāsamathānaṃ ādhānabhāvato samathavipassanāsaṅkhāto dhammo kucchisamāvāso etassāti dhammakucchisamāvāso.
atk-s0508a2:3120_2: Ajjhattaṃ susamāhitoti visayajjhatte phalasamāpattiyaṃ suṭṭhu samāhito tadidaṃ samādhānaṃ suṭṭhu sabbakālikanti
atk-s0508a2:3120_4: Bhagavā hi savāsanassa uddhaccassa pahīnattā vikkhepābhāvato niccaṃ samāhitova.
atk-s0508a2:3121_4: Esā nāgassa sampadāti esā “na hi āguṃ karoti so”tiādinā “sambuddha”ntiādinā eva vā yathāvuttā vakkhamānā
atk-s0508a2:3122_0: Bhuñjati anavajjānīti sammājīvassa ukkaṃsapāramippattiyā bhuñjati agarahitabbāni,
atk-s0508a2:3122_1: micchājīvassa sabbaso savāsanānañca pahīnattā sāvajjāni garahitabbāni na bhuñjati anavajjāni bhuñjanto ca sannidhiṃ parivajjayaṃ bhuñjatīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:3123_0: Saṃyojananti vaṭṭadukkhena saddhiṃ santānaṃ saṃyojanato vaṭṭe osīdāpanasamatthaṃ dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3123_2: Sabbaṃ chetvāna bandhananti maggañāṇena anavasesaṃ kilesabandhanaṃ chinditvā.
atk-s0508a2:3124_0: Yathā hi udake jātaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ udake pavaḍḍhati nopalippati toyena,
atk-s0508a2:3124_2: tatheva loke jāto buddho loke viharati,
atk-s0508a2:3126_0: Atthassāyaṃ viññāpanīti satthu guṇasaṅkhātassa upameyyatthassa viññāpanī,
atk-s0508a2:3126_2: Viññūhīti satthu paṭividdhacatusaccadhammaṃ parijānantehi attānaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0508a2:3126_4: yasmā nāgena mayā desitaṃ nāgaṃ tathāgatagandhahatthiṃ mahānāgā khīṇāsavā attano visaye ṭhatvā vijānissanti,
atk-s0508a2:3126_5: tasmā aññesaṃ puthujjanānaṃ ñāpanatthaṃ ayaṃ upamā amhehi bhāsitāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:3127_2: idāni sarīraṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahanto khandhaparinibbānena parinibbāyissatīti.
atk-s0508a2:3128_2: catusaṭṭhiyā pādehi satthu guṇe vaṇṇento anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:3133_0: Vīsatinipāte yaññatthaṃ vātiādikā āyasmato aparassa adhimuttattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:3133_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a2:3133_3: vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upaṭṭhahanto mahādānāni
atk-s0508a2:3133_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde āyasmato saṃkiccattherassa bhaginiyā kucchimhi nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:3133_7: So vayappatto mātulattherassa santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃyeva ṭhito arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:3143_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā samāpattisukhena vītināmento upasampajjitukāmo “mātaraṃ āpucchissāmī”ti mātu santikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3143_1: gacchanto antarāmagge devatāya balikammakaraṇatthaṃ maṃsapariyesanaṃ carantehi pañcasatehi corehi samāgacchi.
atk-s0508a2:3143_2: Corā ca taṃ aggahesuṃ “devatāya bali bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:3143_3: So corehi gahitopi abhīto acchambhī vippasannamukhova aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:3145_0: “Yaññatthaṃ vā dhanatthaṃ vā, ye hanāma mayaṃ pure;
atk-s0508a2:3146_0: Avasesaṃ bhayaṃ hoti, vedhanti vilapanti ca.
atk-s0508a2:3148_0: “Tassa te natthi bhītattaṃ, bhiyyo vaṇṇo pasīdati;
atk-s0508a2:3149_0: Kasmā na paridevesi, evarūpe mahabbhaye”ti. – dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:3150_0: Tattha yaññatthanti yajanatthaṃ devatānaṃ balikammakaraṇatthaṃ vā. Vā-
atk-s0508a2:3150_3: Ye hanāma mayaṃ pureti ye satte mayaṃ pubbe hanimha.
atk-s0508a2:3150_8: Amhehi gahitesu taṃ ekaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesānaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:3151_0: Tassa teti yo tvaṃ amhehi devatāya balikammatthaṃ jīvitā voropetukāmehi ukkhittāsikehi santajjito, tassa te.
atk-s0508a2:3151_3: Bhiyyo vaṇṇo pasīdatīti pakativaṇṇato uparipi te mukhavaṇṇo vippasīdati.
atk-s0508a2:3151_7: Evarūpe mahabbhayeti edise mahati maraṇabhaye upaṭṭhite.
atk-s0508a2:3152_0: Idāni thero coragāmaṇissa paṭivacanadānamukhena dhammaṃ desento –
atk-s0508a2:3158_0: Na bhayaṃ maraṇe hoti, bhāranikkhepane yathā.
atk-s0508a2:3161_0: Maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthi, rogānamiva saṅkhaye.
atk-s0508a2:3164_0: Nirassādā bhavā diṭṭhā, visaṃ pitvāva chaḍḍitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3167_0: Tuṭṭho āyukkhayā hoti, mutto āghātanā yathā.
atk-s0508a2:3170_0: Ādittāva gharā mutto, maraṇasmiṃ na socati.
atk-s0508a2:3172_0: “Yadatthi saṅgataṃ kiñci, bhavo vā yattha labbhati;
atk-s0508a2:3173_0: Sabbaṃ anissaraṃ etaṃ, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā.
atk-s0508a2:3175_0: “Yo taṃ tathā pajānāti, yathā buddhena desitaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:3176_0: Na gaṇhāti bhavaṃ kiñci, sutattaṃva ayoguḷaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3182_0: Passantassa yathābhūtaṃ, na bhayaṃ hoti gāmaṇi.
atk-s0508a2:3185_0: Mamattaṃ so asaṃvindaṃ, ‘natthi me’ti na socati.
atk-s0508a2:3188_0: Soyaṃ bhijjissati kāyo, añño ca na bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:3190_0: “Yaṃ vo kiccaṃ sarīrena, taṃ karotha yadicchatha;
atk-s0508a2:3191_0: Na me tappaccayā tattha, doso pemañca hehitī”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:3196_0: Ayaṃ saṅgītikārehi vuttagāthā. Ito aparā tisso corānaṃ, therassa ca vacanapaṭivacanagāthā –
atk-s0508a2:3198_0: “Kiṃ bhadante karitvāna, ko vā ācariyo tava;
atk-s0508a2:3207_0: “Sutvāna corā isino subhāsitaṃ, nikkhippa satthāni ca āvudhāni ca;
atk-s0508a2:3208_0: Tamhā ca kammā viramiṃsu eke, eke ca pabbajjamarocayiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:3210_0: “Te pabbajitvā sugatassa sāsane, bhāvetva bojjhaṅgabalāni paṇḍitā;
atk-s0508a2:3211_0: Udaggacittā sumanā katindriyā, phusiṃsu nibbānapadaṃ asaṅkhata”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:3213_9: Atikkantā bhayā sabbeti khīṇasaṃyojanassa arahato pañcavīsati mahābhayā,
atk-s0508a2:3213_10: aññe ca sabbepi bhayā ekaṃsena atikkantā atītā,
atk-s0508a2:3214_0: Diṭṭhe dhamme yathātatheti catusaccadhamme pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanāvasena maggapaññāya yathābhūtaṃ diṭṭhe.
atk-s0508a2:3214_2: Bhāranikkhepane yathāti yathā koci puriso sīse ṭhitena mahatā garubhārena saṃsīdanto tassa nikkhepane,
atk-s0508a2:3217_3: Tato eva maggo cāpi subhāvito aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggopi sammadeva bhāvito.
atk-s0508a2:3217_4: Rogānamiva saṅkhayeti yathā bahūhi rogehi abhibhūtassa āturassa rogānaṃ saṅkhaye pītisomanassameva hoti,
atk-s0508a2:3217_5: evaṃ khandharogasaṅkhaye maraṇe mādisassa bhayaṃ natthi.
atk-s0508a2:3218_0: Nirassādā bhavā diṭṭhāti tīhi dukkhatāhi abhibhūtā,
atk-s0508a2:3218_5: Visaṃ pitvāva chaḍḍitanti pamādavasena visaṃ pivitvā tādisena payogena chaḍḍitaṃ viya maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3219_0: Mutto āghātanā yathāti yathā corehi māraṇatthaṃ āghātanaṃ nīto kenaci upāyena tato mutto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hoti,
atk-s0508a2:3219_4: pariññādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ kiccānaṃ katattā katakicco kāmāsavādīhi anāsavo,
atk-s0508a2:3220_8: Ādittāva gharā muttoti yathā koci puriso samantato ādittato pajjalitato gehato nissaṭo,
atk-s0508a2:3221_0: Yadatthi saṅgataṃ kiñcīti yaṃkiñci imasmiṃ loke atthi, vijjati,
atk-s0508a2:3221_5: tassa yaṃkiñci paccayehi samacca sambhuyya kataṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3221_7: Bhavo vā yattha labbhatīti yasmiṃ sattanikāye yo upapattibhavo labbhati.
atk-s0508a2:3221_9: na ettha kenaci “evaṃ hotū”ti issariyaṃ vattetuṃ sakkā.
atk-s0508a2:3221_10: Iti vuttaṃ mahesināti “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ mahesinā sammāsambuddhena.
atk-s0508a2:3221_11: Tasmā “anissaraṃ eta”nti pajānanto maraṇasmiṃ na socatīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:3222_0: Na gaṇhāti bhavaṃ kiñcīti yo ariyasāvako “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā yathā buddhena bhagavatā desitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3222_1: tathā taṃ bhavattayaṃ vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya pajānāti.
atk-s0508a2:3222_2: So yathā koci puriso sukhakāmo divasaṃ santattaṃ ayoguḷaṃ hatthena na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0508a2:3222_3: evaṃ kiñci khuddakaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā bhavaṃ na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0508a2:3223_0: Na me hoti “ahosi”nti “atītamaddhānaṃ ahaṃ īdiso ahosi”nti attadiṭṭhivasena na me cittappavatti atthi diṭṭhiyā sammadeva ugghāṭitattā,
atk-s0508a2:3223_2: “Bhavissa”nti na hoti meti tato eva “anāgatamaddhānaṃ ahaṃ ediso kathaṃ nu kho bhavissaṃ bhaveyya”nti evampi me na hoti.
atk-s0508a2:3223_3: Saṅkhārā vigamissantīti evaṃ pana hoti “yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānā saṅkhārāva,
atk-s0508a2:3223_4: na ettha koci attā vā attaniyaṃ vā,
atk-s0508a2:3223_8: Tattha kā paridevanāti evaṃ passantassa mādisassa tattha saṅkhāragate kā nāma paridevanā.
atk-s0508a2:3224_4: Passantassa yathābhūtanti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya yāthāvato jānantassa.
atk-s0508a2:3225_0: Tiṇakaṭṭhasamaṃ lokanti yathā araññe apariggahe tiṇakaṭṭhe kenaci gayhamāne aparassa “mayhaṃ santakaṃ ayaṃ gaṇhatī”ti na hoti,
atk-s0508a2:3225_1: evaṃ so asāmikatāya tiṇakaṭṭhasamaṃ saṅkhāralokaṃ yadā paññāya passati,
atk-s0508a2:3225_2: so tattha mamattaṃ asaṃvindaṃ asaṃvindanto alabhanto akaronto.
atk-s0508a2:3226_0: Ukkaṇṭhāmi sarīrenāti asārakena abhinudena dukkhena akataññunā asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlasabhāvena
atk-s0508a2:3226_1: iminā kāyena ukkaṇṭhāmi imaṃ kāyaṃ nibbindanto evaṃ tiṭṭhāmi.
atk-s0508a2:3226_2: Bhavenamhi anatthikoti sabbenapi bhavena anatthiko amhi,
atk-s0508a2:3226_4: Soyaṃ bhijjissati kāyoti ayaṃ mama kāyo idāni tumhākaṃ payogena aññathā vā aññattha bhijjissati.
atk-s0508a2:3226_5: Añño ca na bhavissatīti añño kāyo mayhaṃ āyatiṃ na bhavissati,
atk-s0508a2:3227_0: Yaṃ vo kiccaṃ sarīrenāti yaṃ tumhākaṃ iminā sarīrena payojanaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3227_4: taṃ nimittaṃ imassa sarīrassa tumhehi yathicchitakiccassa karaṇahetu.
atk-s0508a2:3227_5: Tatthāti tesu karontesu ca akarontesu ca.
atk-s0508a2:3227_6: Doso pemañca hehitīti yathākkamaṃ paṭigho anunayo na bhavissati,
atk-s0508a2:3227_7: attano bhave apekkhāya sabbaso pahīnattāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:3227_8: Aññapaccayā aññattha ca paṭighānunayesu asantesupi tappaccayā,
atk-s0508a2:3228_1: Taṃ vacananti “natthi cetasikaṃ dukkha”ntiādikaṃ maraṇe bhayābhāvādidīpakaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3228_2: tato eva abbhutaṃ lomahaṃsanaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0508a2:3228_4: Corā hi “māṇavā”ti vuccanti “māṇavehi saha gacchanti katakammehi akatakammehipī”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0508a2:3229_2: Ko vā tava ācariyo kassa sāsanaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3229_3: ovādaṃ nissāya ayaṃ asokatā maraṇakāle sokābhāvo labbhatīti etaṃ atthaṃ abravuṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3230_0: Taṃ sutvā thero tesaṃ paṭivacanaṃ dento “sabbaññū”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:3230_1: Tattha sabbaññūti paropadesena vinā sabbapakārena sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthassa ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhavuttino
atk-s0508a2:3230_2: anāvaraṇañāṇassa adhigamena atītādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti, sabbaññū.
atk-s0508a2:3230_6: nattheva asādhāraṇañāṇapāḷiyā virodho visayuppattimukhena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā vuttattā.
atk-s0508a2:3230_8: taṃ itivuttakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vitthārato vuttamevāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3230_10: hīnādivibhāgabhinne sabbasmiṃ sattanikāye adhimuttavuttitāya mahatiyā karuṇāya samannāgatattā mahākāruṇiko,
atk-s0508a2:3231_0: Evaṃ therena satthu sāsanassa ca guṇe pakāsite paṭiladdhasaddhā ekacce corā pabbajiṃsu,
atk-s0508a2:3231_2: Tamatthaṃ dīpento dhammasaṅgāhakā “sutvāna corā”tiādinā dve gāthā abhāsiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:3231_6: Satthāni ca āvudhāni cāti asiādisatthāni ceva dhanukalāpādiāvudhāni ca.
atk-s0508a2:3232_0: Te pabbajitvā sugatassa sāsaneti te corā sobhanagamanatādīhi sugatassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajjaṃ upagantvā.
atk-s0508a2:3232_9: paccāgantvā tehi saddhiṃ upajjhāyassa santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0508a2:3235_0: Samaṇassa ahu cintātiādikā āyasmato pārāpariyattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:3235_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0508a2:3235_3: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:3235_4: Tassa vayappattassa gottavasena pārāpariyotveva samaññā ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:3235_5: So tayo vede uggahetvā brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gato.
atk-s0508a2:3235_6: Ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammadesanākāle jetavanavihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante nisīdi.
atk-s0508a2:3235_7: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā indriyabhāvanāsuttaṃ desesi.
atk-s0508a2:3235_12: So tathā anuvicintento āyatanamukhena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0508a2:3241_0: Attano kiccakārīssa, na ca kañci viheṭhaye.
atk-s0508a2:3247_0: Attano kiccakārīssa, na ca kañci viheṭhaye.
atk-s0508a2:3250_0: Anādīnavadassāvī, so dukkhā na hi muccati.
atk-s0508a2:3253_0: Anādīnavadassāvī, so dukkhā na hi muccati.
atk-s0508a2:3256_0: Na so muccati dukkhamhā, gandhesu adhimucchito.
atk-s0508a2:3264_0: “Manaṃ cetehi dhammehi, yo na sakkoti rakkhituṃ;
atk-s0508a2:3279_0: “So atthavā so dhammaṭṭho, so dakkho so vicakkhaṇo;
atk-s0508a2:3283_0: Na taṃ kiccanti maññitvā, appamatto vicakkhaṇo.
atk-s0508a2:3285_0: “Yañca atthena saññuttaṃ, yā ca dhammagatā rati;
atk-s0508a2:3286_0: Taṃ samādāya vattetha, sā hi ve uttamā rati.
atk-s0508a2:3289_0: Hantvā vadhitvā atha socayitvā, ālopati sāhasā yo paresaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3295_0: Pañca pañcahi hantvāna, anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo.
atk-s0508a2:3298_0: Sabbena sabbaṃ buddhassa, so naro sukhamedhatī”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:3299_8: Pavivittassāti pavivekahetunā kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanena vivekaṃ āraddhassa,
atk-s0508a2:3299_13: Sabbametaṃ thero attānaṃ paraṃ viya katvā vadati.
atk-s0508a2:3300_1: Tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṃ tāva kimānupubbanti anupubbaṃ anukkamo,
atk-s0508a2:3300_4: Puriso kiṃ vataṃ kiṃ samācāranti atthakāmo puriso samādiyitabbaṭṭhena “vata”nti laddhanāmaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3300_12: taṃ sampādentassa paraviheṭhanāya lesopi natthi tāya sati samaṇabhāvasseva abhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:3301_6: Tatthāpi ca yasmā indriyasaṃvare siddhe sabbaṃ sīlaṃ surakkhitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3301_8: tasmā indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ tāva dassetukāmo indriyānaṃ arakkhaṇe rakkhaṇe ca ādīnavānisaṃse vibhāvento “indriyāni manussāna”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:3301_10: tasmā cakkhādīni cha indriyānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0508a2:3301_15: Kathaṃ pana tāniyeva hitāya ca ahitāya hontīti āha “rakkhitānī”tiādi.
atk-s0508a2:3301_18: tassa rūpādīsu abhijjhādipāpadhammapavattiyā dvārabhāvato anatthāya pihitāni,
atk-s0508a2:3302_0: Indriyāneva sārakkhanti yasmā indriyasaṃvaro paripuṇṇo sīlasampadaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0508a2:3302_3: tasmā indriyārakkhā attahitapaṭipattiyāva mūlanti dassento āha “indriyāneva sārakkha”nti.
atk-s0508a2:3302_4: Satipubbaṅgamena ārakkhena saṃrakkhanto yonisomanasikārena indriyāni eva tāva sammadeva rakkhanto,
atk-s0508a2:3302_5: yathā akusalacorā tehi tehi dvārehi pavisitvā cittasantāne kusalaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ na vilumpanti,
atk-s0508a2:3302_15: ubhayenāpi vā attahitapaṭipattimeva dasseti parāviheṭhanassāpi attahitapaṭipattibhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:3302_16: Atha vā padadvayenapi attahitapaṭipattiṃ dasseti puthujjanassa sekkhassa ca parahitapaṭipattiyāpi attahitapaṭipattibhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:3303_0: Evaṃ rakkhitāni indriyāni hitāya hontīti vodānapakkhaṃ saṅkhepeneva dassetvā,
atk-s0508a2:3303_1: arakkhitāni ahitāya hontīti saṃkilesapakkhaṃ pana vibhajitvā dassento “cakkhundriyaṃ ce”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:3303_4: Anādīnavadassāvīti yo nīlapītādibhedesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu rūpāyatanesu gacchantaṃ yathāruci pavattantaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ anivārayaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3303_5: anivārayanto appaṭibāhanto tathāpavattiyaṃ ādīnavadassāvī na hoti ce,
atk-s0508a2:3303_6: diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ na passati ce.
atk-s0508a2:3303_8: Tattha yo “diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”ti vuttavidhinā diṭṭhamatteyeva ṭhatvā satisampajaññavasena
atk-s0508a2:3303_11: So dukkhā na hi muccatīti so evarūpo puggalo vaṭṭadukkhato na muccateva.
atk-s0508a2:3303_12: Ettha ca cakkhundriyassa anivāraṇaṃ nāma yathā tena dvārena abhijjhādayo pāpadhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3303_14: taṃ pana atthato satisampajaññassa anuṭṭhāpanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3303_20: Anussaranti assādavasena taṃ taṃ rasaṃ anuvicintento.
atk-s0508a2:3303_21: Ganthitoti rasataṇhāya tasmiṃ tasmiṃ rase ganthito bandho.
atk-s0508a2:3303_24: Hadayaṃ nāvabujjhatīti “dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī”ti pabbajjādikkhaṇe uppannaṃ cittaṃ na jānāti na sallakkheti,
atk-s0508a2:3303_25: sāsanassa hadayaṃ abbhantaraṃ anavajjadhammānaṃ sammaddanarasataṇhāya gadhito nāvabujjhati na jānāti,
atk-s0508a2:3304_5: Vividhaṃ vindate dukhanti rāgapariḷāhādivasena diṭṭhadhammikañca nirayasantāpādivasena abhisamparāyañca nānappakāraṃ dukkhaṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0508a2:3305_0: Manaṃ cetehīti manañca etehi rūpārammaṇādīhi dhammārammaṇappabhedehi ca.
atk-s0508a2:3305_6: etehi yathāvuttehi rūpādīhi pañcahi dhammehi dhammārammaṇappabhedato ca.
atk-s0508a2:3305_9: tato tassa arakkhaṇato naṃ puggalaṃ taṃnimittaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti,
atk-s0508a2:3305_11: anugacchantañca etehi pañcahipi rūpārammaṇādīhi chaṭṭhārammaṇena saddhiṃ sabbehipi ārammaṇappaccayabhūtehi anugacchatīti.
atk-s0508a2:3305_13: sotindriyañca asampattaggāhibhāvato “gacchantaṃ anivāraya”nti vuttaṃ itaraṃ sampattaggāhīti “gandhe ce paṭisevatī”tiādinā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3305_14: Tatthāpi ca rasataṇhā ca phoṭṭhabbataṇhā ca sattānaṃ visesato balavatīti “rasataṇhāya gadhito,
atk-s0508a2:3306_0: Evaṃ aguttadvārassa puggalassa chahi dvārehi chasupi ārammaṇesu asaṃvaranimittaṃ uppajjanakadukkhaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0508a2:3306_4: sarīraṃ nāmetaṃ pubbena lohitena ca sampuṇṇaṃ bharitaṃ aññena ca pittasemhādinā bahunā kuṇapena,
atk-s0508a2:3306_5: tayidaṃ naravīrena naresu chekena sippācariyena kataṃ vaggu maṭṭhaṃ lākhāparikammādinā cittitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3306_6: anto pana gūthādiasucibharitaṃ samuggaṃ viya chavimattamanoharaṃ bālajanasammohaṃ dukkhasabhāvatāya nirayādidukkhatāpanato ca kaṭukaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3306_10: īdise sarīre assādalobhena mahādukkhaṃ paccanubhuyyamānaṃ anavabujjhanto loko madhuragiddho khuradhārālehakapuriso viya daṭṭhabboti.
atk-s0508a2:3307_0: Idāni ete cakkhādīnaṃ gocarabhūtā rūpādayo vuttā,
atk-s0508a2:3307_1: te visesato purisassa itthipaṭibaddhā kamanīyāti tattha saṃvaro kātabboti dassento “itthirūpe”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:3307_3: Api ca yo koci itthiyā nivatthassa alaṅkārassa vā gandhavaṇṇakādīnaṃ vā piḷandhanamālānaṃ vā kāyapaṭibaddho
atk-s0508a2:3307_7: Api ca itthiyā nivatthavatthassapi alaṅkataalaṅkārassapi itthipayoganipphāditā veṇuvīṇāsaṅkhapaṇavādīnampi
atk-s0508a2:3307_11: Itthiyā kiṃkārapaṭissāvitādivasena assavaraso ceva paribhogaraso ca itthirasoti eke.
atk-s0508a2:3307_13: yo ca tāya purisassa dinnayāgubhattādīnaṃ raso,
atk-s0508a2:3307_17: Ettha ca yesaṃ itthirūpe itthisareti pāḷi,
atk-s0508a2:3307_27: Cakkavattino pana itthiratanassa kāyato candanagandho vāyati,
atk-s0508a2:3307_30: itthiyā sarīre ārūḷho āgantuko anulimpanādigandho “itthigandho”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0508a2:3307_33: Vividhaṃ vindate dukhanti itthirūpādīsu sarāganimittaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ vadhabandhanādivasena samparāyikaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3308_0: Itthisotāni sabbānīti itthiyā rūpādiārammaṇāni sabbāni anavasesāni pañca taṇhāsotāni sandanti.
atk-s0508a2:3308_5: evaṃ satisampajaññaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā saṃvaraṃ pavattetuṃ yo sakkoti,
atk-s0508a2:3308_6: so vīriyavā āraddhavīriyo akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāyāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3309_0: Evaṃ rūpādigocare pabbajitassa paṭipattiṃ dassetvā idāni gahaṭṭhassa dassetuṃ “so atthavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3309_2: so dakkho so vicakkhaṇoti so puggalo imasmiṃ loke atthavā, buddhimā,
atk-s0508a2:3309_6: analaso vā vicakkhaṇo iti kattabbatāsu kusalo nāma.
atk-s0508a2:3309_8: kiccaṃ dhammatthasaṃhitanti geharatiyā ramamānopi dhammatthasaṃhitaṃ dhammato atthato ca anapetameva taṃ taṃ kattabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3309_17: Ayañca nayo yesaṃ sammāpaṭipattiavirodhena tivaggatthassa vasena vattati bimbisāramahārājādīnaṃ viya,
atk-s0508a2:3310_0: Atho sīdati saññuttanti yadi idhaloke supasaṃhitaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ atthaṃ pariggahetvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3310_1: Vajje kiccaṃ niratthakanti samparāyikattharahitaṃ anatthupasaṃhitaṃ kiccaṃ sacepi vissajjeyya pariccajeyya.
atk-s0508a2:3310_3: appamatto vicakkhaṇoti satiavippavāsena appamatto vicāraṇapaññāsambhavena vicakkhaṇo anatthupasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3310_4: taṃ kiccaṃ mayā na kātabbanti maññitvā vivajjeyya.
atk-s0508a2:3311_2: Taṃ samādāya vattethāti yaṃkiñci diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikappabhedena atthena hitena saṃyuttaṃ tadubhayahitāvahaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3311_4: tadubhayaṃ sammā ādiyitvā pariggahaṃ katvā vatteyya.
atk-s0508a2:3311_5: “Sabbaṃ ratiṃ dhammarati jinātī”ti vacanato sā hi ekaṃsena uttamatthassa pāpanato uttamā rati nāma.
atk-s0508a2:3312_0: Yaṃ pana kāmaratisaṃyuttaṃ kiccaṃ niratthakanti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3312_2: Tattha uccāvacehīti mahantehi ceva khuddakehi ca.
atk-s0508a2:3312_10: yo puggalo kāmahetu pare hananto, ghātento,
atk-s0508a2:3312_11: socento sandhicchedasandhiruhanapasayhāvahārādīhi nānupāyehi paresaṃ santakaṃ harituṃ vāyamanto sāhasākāraṃ karoti, ālopati,
atk-s0508a2:3312_13: tassa taṃ kiccaṃ kāmaratisannissitaṃ anatthupasaṃhitaṃ ekantanihīnanti.
atk-s0508a2:3312_14: Etena tappaṭipakkhato dhammagatāya ratiyā ekaṃsato uttamabhāvaṃyeva vibhāveti.
atk-s0508a2:3313_0: Idāni yaṃ “tesamāvaraṇaṃ kātuṃ yo sakkotī”ti indriyānaṃ āvaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3313_1: taṃ upāyena saha vibhāvento “tacchanto āṇiyā āṇiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3313_4: ñāṇabalena ca samannāgato tacchako rukkhadaṇḍagataṃ āṇiṃ nīharitukāmo tato balavatiṃ āṇiṃ koṭento tato nīharati,
atk-s0508a2:3313_5: tathā kusalo bhikkhu cakkhādīni indriyāni vipassanābalena nihantukāmo indriyehi eva nihanti.
atk-s0508a2:3314_6: dassanalakkhaṇaṃ paññanti imānipi vimuttiparipācakāni pañcindriyāni bhāvento vaḍḍhento etehi pañcahi
atk-s0508a2:3314_7: indriyehi cakkhādīni pañcindriyāni anunayapaṭighādikilesuppattiyā dvārabhāvavihanena hantvā,
atk-s0508a2:3314_9: tato eva anīgho niddukkho brāhmaṇo anupādisesaparinibbānameva yāti upagacchatīti.
atk-s0508a2:3315_0: So atthavāti so yathāvutto brāhmaṇo uttamatthena samannāgatattā atthavā,
atk-s0508a2:3315_2: Sabbena sabbaṃ anavasesena vidhinā anavasesaṃ buddhassa bhagavato vākyabhūtaṃ anusāsaniṃ katvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0508a2:3315_3: Tato eva so naro uttamapuriso nibbānasukhañca edhati, brūheti,
atk-s0508a2:3316_0: Evaṃ therena attano cintitākāravibhāvanāvasena paṭipattiyā pakāsitattā idameva cassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3319_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:3319_3: satthu abhijātito puretaraṃyeva sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarasmiṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā telakānīti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a2:3319_4: vayappatto hetusampannatāya kāme jigucchanto gharāvāsaṃ pahāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vivaṭṭajjhāsayo
atk-s0508a2:3319_5: “ko so pāraṅgato loke”tiādinā vimokkhapariyesanaṃ caramāno te te samaṇabrāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0508a2:3319_8: Atha amhākaṃ bhagavati loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakke lokahitaṃ karonte ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ
