atk-s0508a2:3319_9: upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahatte
atk-s0508a2:3319_11: So ekadivasaṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ nisinno attanā adhigatavisesaṃ paccavekkhitvā tadanusārena attano paṭipattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:3324_0: “Ko so pāraṅgato loke, ko patto amatogadhaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:3331_0: Ko me bandhaṃ muñcaṃ loke, sambodhiṃ vedayissati.
atk-s0508a2:3340_0: Passa orasikaṃ bāḷhaṃ, bhetvāna yadi tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0508a2:3348_0: “Taṃ na passāmi tekicchaṃ, yo metaṃ sallamuddhare;
atk-s0508a2:3355_0: Gambhīre patitassa me, thalaṃ pāṇiñca dassaye.
atk-s0508a2:3364_0: Te sote ko nivāreyya, taṃ lataṃ ko hi checchati.
atk-s0508a2:3367_0: Mā te manomayo sotā, rukkhaṃva sahasā luve.
atk-s0508a2:3373_0: Pādāsi vuyhamānassa, mā bhāyīti ca mabravi.
atk-s0508a2:3376_0: Yaṃ taṃ pubbe amaññissaṃ, sakkāyābhirataṃ pajaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3385_0: Buddho mepānudī ganthaṃ, visadosappavāhano”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:3386_3: kathaṃ vā adhigantabbo”ti vimuttidhammaṃ anuvicinanto gavesanto.
atk-s0508a2:3386_5: pucchaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇeti te te nānātitthiye samaṇabrāhmaṇe vimuttidhammaṃ pucchanto pakatiyā anupasantasabhāvassa
atk-s0508a2:3386_6: cittassa samaṃ vūpasamabhūtaṃ vaṭṭadukkhavissaraṇaṃ ariyadhammaṃ nālatthaṃ nādhigacchanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3387_1: Tattha ko so pāraṅgato loketi imasmiṃ loke titthakārapaṭiññesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu ko nu kho so saṃsārassa pāraṃ nibbānaṃ upagato.
atk-s0508a2:3387_2: Ko patto amatogadhanti nibbānapatiṭṭhaṃ vimokkhamaggaṃ ko patto adhigatoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3387_3: Kassa dhammaṃ paṭicchāmīti kassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā ovādadhammaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmi paṭipajjāmi.
atk-s0508a2:3388_0: Antovaṅkagato āsīti vaṅkaṃ vuccati diṭṭhigataṃ manovaṅkabhāvato,
atk-s0508a2:3388_4: Macchova ghasamāmisanti āmisaṃ ghasanto khādanto maccho viya,
atk-s0508a2:3388_7: vepacityasuro yathāti mahindassa sakkassa pāsena baddho yathā vepacitti asurindo aserivihārī mahādukkhappatto,
atk-s0508a2:3389_5: yathāpāsena baddho migo sūkaro vā mocanupāyaṃ ajānanto paripphandamāno taṃ āviñchanto bandhanaṃ daḷhaṃ karoti,
atk-s0508a2:3389_6: evaṃ ahaṃ pubbe kilesapāsena paṭimukko mocanupāyaṃ ajānanto kāyasañcetanādivasena paripphandamāno taṃ na mocesiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3389_7: aññadatthu taṃ daḷhaṃ karonto sokādinā paraṃ kilesaṃ eva pāpuṇinti.
atk-s0508a2:3389_9: sambodhiṃ vedayissatīti imasmiṃ loke etaṃ kilesabandhanena bandhaṃ muñcanto sambujjhati etenāti “sambodhī”ti
atk-s0508a2:3389_10: laddhanāmaṃ vimokkhamaggaṃ ko me vedayissati ācikkhissatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3390_2: pabhaṅgunaṃ vā dhammappavattiṃ ādisantaṃ kathentaṃ jarāya maccuno ca pavāhanaṃ kassa dhammaṃ paṭicchāmi.
atk-s0508a2:3390_5: Vicikicchākaṅkhāganthitanti “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādinayappavattāya vicikicchāya āsappanaparisappanākāravuttiyā kaṅkhāya ca ganthitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3390_7: Kodhappattamanatthaddhanti sabbattha kodhena yuttamanasā thaddhabhāvaṃ gataṃ abhijappappadāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3390_8: Icchitālābhādivasena hi taṇhā sattānaṃ cittaṃ padālentī viya pavattati.
atk-s0508a2:3390_9: Dūre ṭhitassāpi vijjhanupāyatāya taṇhāva dhanu samupatiṭṭhati uppajjati etasmāti taṇhādhanusamuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3390_16: bhetvāna yadi tiṭṭhatīti yaṃ urasambandhanīyatāya orasikaṃ bāḷhaṃ balavataraṃ bhetvāna hadayaṃ vinivijjhitvā tasmiṃyeva hadaye tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0508a2:3391_1: Yāva hi sakkāyadiṭṭhi santānato na vigacchati,
atk-s0508a2:3391_3: Saṅkappaparatejitanti saṅkappena micchāvitakkena pare parajane nissayalakkhaṇaṃ patipatite tejitaṃ ussāhitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3391_4: Tena viddho pavedhāmīti tena diṭṭhisallena yathā hadayaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0508a2:3391_5: evaṃ viddho pavedhāmi saṅkappāmi sassatucchedādivasena ito cito ca parivaṭṭāmi.
atk-s0508a2:3391_6: Pattaṃva māluteritanti mālutena vāyunā eritaṃ vaṇṭato muttaṃ dumapattaṃ viya.
atk-s0508a2:3392_0: Ajjhattaṃ me samuṭṭhāyāti yathā loke sallaṃ nāma bāhirato uṭṭhāya ajjhattaṃ nimmathetvā bādhati,
atk-s0508a2:3392_2: Idaṃ pana ajjhattaṃ me mama attabhāve samuṭṭhāya so attabhāvasaññito chaphassāyatanakāyo yathā khippaṃ sīghaṃ paccati, ḍayhati.
atk-s0508a2:3392_4: Aggi viya sanissayaḍāhako taṃyeva māmakaṃ mama santakaṃ attabhāvaṃ ḍahanto yattha uppanno,
atk-s0508a2:3393_0: Taṃ na passāmi tekicchanti tādisāya tikicchāya niyuttatāya tekicchaṃ sallakattaṃ bhisakkaṃ taṃ na passāmi.
atk-s0508a2:3393_1: Yo metaṃ sallamuddhareti yo bhisakko etaṃ diṭṭhisallaṃ kilesasallañca uddhareyya,
atk-s0508a2:3393_2: uddharanto ca nānārajjena rajjusadisasaṅkhātāya esanisalākāya pavesetvāna satthena kantitvā nāññena mantāgadappayogena
atk-s0508a2:3393_3: vicikicchitaṃ sallaṃ tikicchituṃ sakkāti āharitvā yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3394_7: ko nu kho kiñci satthaṃ aggahetvā vaṇañca akaronto tato eva sabbagattāni abādhento mama hadayabbhantaragataṃ
atk-s0508a2:3394_8: pīḷājananato anto tudanato anto ruddhanato ca paramattheneva sallabhūtaṃ kilesasallaṃ uddharissatīti.
atk-s0508a2:3395_0: Evaṃ dasahi gāthāhi pubbe attanā cintitākāraṃ dassetvā punapi taṃ pakārantarena dassetuṃ “dhammappati hi so seṭṭho”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:3395_4: Visadosappavāhakoti yo mayhaṃ rāgādikilesassa pavāhako ucchinnako.
atk-s0508a2:3395_6: thalaṃ pāṇiñca dassayeti ko nu kho atigambhīre saṃsāramahoghe patitassa mayhaṃ “mā bhāyī”ti assāsento
atk-s0508a2:3396_0: Rahadehamasmi ogāḷhoti mahati saṃsārarahade ahamasmi sasīsaṃ nimujjanavasena otiṇṇo anupaviṭṭho.
atk-s0508a2:3396_1: Ahāriyarajamattiketi apanetuṃ asakkuṇeyyo rāgādirajo mattikā kaddamo etassāti ahāriyarajamattiko, rahado.
atk-s0508a2:3396_9: kāyālasiyalakkhaṇaṃ middhanti ime pāpadhammā patthaṭā yaṃ rahadaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3397_2: bhantasabhāvaṃ uddhaccaṃ meghathanitaṃ meghagajjitaṃ etesanti uddhaccameghathanitā.
atk-s0508a2:3397_3: Dasavidhā saṃyojanā eva valāhakā etesanti saṃyojanavalāhakā.
atk-s0508a2:3397_4: Vāhā mahāudakavāhasadisā rāganissitā micchāsaṅkappā asubhādīsu ṭhitā kuddiṭṭhiṃ maṃ vahanti apāyasamuddameva uddissa kaḍḍhantīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3398_3: kilesasototi ime pañcapisotā cakkhudvārādīnaṃ vasena sabbesu rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu savanato “rūpataṇhā…pe…
atk-s0508a2:3398_4: dhammataṇhā”tiādinā sabbabhāgehi vā savanato sabbadhi savanti.
atk-s0508a2:3398_5: Latāti paliveṭhanaṭṭhena saṃsibbanaṭṭhena latā viyāti latā, taṇhā.
atk-s0508a2:3398_6: Ubbhijja tiṭṭhatīti chahi dvārehi ubbhijjitvā rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0508a2:3398_7: Te soteti taṇhādike sote mama santāne sandante maggasetubandhanena ko purisaviseso nivāreyya,
atk-s0508a2:3399_0: Velaṃ karothāti tesaṃ sotānaṃ velaṃ setuṃ karotha sannivāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3399_2: Mā te manomayo sototi udakasoto oḷāriko,
atk-s0508a2:3399_3: tassa bālamahājanenapi setuṃ katvā nivāraṇaṃ sakkā.
atk-s0508a2:3399_4: Ayaṃ pana manomayo soto sukhumo dunnivāraṇo.
atk-s0508a2:3399_5: So yathā udakasoto vaḍḍhanto kūle ṭhitaṃ rukkhaṃ pātetvāva nāseti,
atk-s0508a2:3399_6: evaṃ tumhe apāyatīre ṭhite tattha sahasā pātetvā apāyasamuddaṃ pāpento mā luve mā vināseyya mā anayabyasanaṃ pāpeyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3400_0: Evaṃ ayaṃ thero purimattabhāve parimadditasaṅkhārattā ñāṇaparipākaṃ gatattā pavattidukkhaṃ upadhārento
atk-s0508a2:3400_2: tamākāraṃ dassetvā idāni jātasaṃvego kiṃkusalagavesī satthu santikaṃ gato yaṃ visesaṃ adhimucci,
atk-s0508a2:3400_4: Tattha evaṃ me bhayajātassāti evaṃ vuttappakārena saṃsāre jātabhayassa apārā orimatīrato sappaṭibhayato
atk-s0508a2:3400_5: saṃsāravaṭṭato “kathaṃ nu kho muñceyya”nti pāraṃ nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3400_7: tāṇo sadevakassa lokassa tāṇabhūto kilesasamucchedanī paññā āvudho etassāti paññāvudho.
atk-s0508a2:3400_10: sopānanti desanāñāṇena suṭṭhu katattā abhisaṅkhatattā sukataṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3400_13: vipassanāsaṅkhātaṃ sopānaṃ mahoghena vuyhamānassa mayhaṃ satthā pādāsi,
atk-s0508a2:3400_14: dadanto ca “iminā te sotthi bhavissatī”ti samassāsento mā bhāyīti ca abravi, kathesi.
atk-s0508a2:3401_1: catubhūmisampannaṃ satipaṭṭhānapāsādaṃ āruhitvā paccavekkhisaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ maggañāṇena patiavekkhiṃ
atk-s0508a2:3401_4: sakkāyābhirataṃ pajanti evaṃ paṭividdhasacco yaṃ sakkāye “ahaṃ mamā”ti abhirataṃ pajaṃ titthiyajanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3401_7: nāvāya abhirūhananti ariyamagganāvāya abhiruhanūpāyabhūtaṃ yadā vipassanāmaggaṃ yāthāvato addakkhiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3401_8: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ titthiyajanaṃ attānañca anadhiṭṭhāya citte aṭṭhapetvā aggahetvā titthaṃ nibbānasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0508a2:3401_9: amatamahāpārassa titthabhūtaṃ ariyamaggadassanaṃ sabbehi maggehi sabbehi kusaladhammehi ukkaṭṭhaṃ addakkhiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3402_0: Evaṃ attano anuttaraṃ maggādhigamaṃ pakāsetvā idāni tassa desakaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ thomento “sallaṃ attasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:3402_2: Attasamuṭṭhānanti “aha”nti mānaṭṭhānatāya “attā”ti ca laddhanāme attabhāve sambhūtaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3402_5: Etesaṃ appavattāyāti yathāvuttānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ appavattiyā anuppādāya.
atk-s0508a2:3402_6: Desesi maggamuttamanti uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3403_0: Dīgharattānusayitanti anamatagge saṃsāre cirakālaṃ santāne anu anu sayitaṃ kāraṇalābhena uppajjanārahabhāvena thāmagataṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3403_1: tato ca cirarattaṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ santānaṃ ajjhāruyha ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3403_2: Ganthanti abhijjhākāyaganthādiṃ mama santāne ganthabhūtaṃ kilesavisadosaṃ pavāhano buddho bhagavā attano desanānubhāvena apānudī parijahāpesi,
atk-s0508a2:3403_3: ganthesu hi anavasesato pahīnesu appahīno nāma kileso natthīti.
atk-s0508a2:3406_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a2:3406_3: vayappatto pitu accayena gharāvāse patiṭṭhito ratanakoṭṭhāgārakammikena dassitaṃ aparimāṇaṃ kulavaṃsānugataṃ
atk-s0508a2:3406_4: dhanaṃ disvā “imaṃ ettakaṃ dhanarāsiṃ mayhaṃ pituayyakapayyakādayo attanā saddhiṃ gahetvā gantuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0508a2:3406_5: mayā pana gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:3406_6: So abhiññālābhiṃ ekaṃ tāpasaṃ upaṭṭhahanto tena devalokādhipacce niyojito yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato
atk-s0508a2:3406_7: cuto devaloke nibbattitvā dibbasampattiṃ anubhavanto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto manussaloke
atk-s0508a2:3406_8: bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthassa kulassa ekaputtako hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:3407_0: Tena ca samayena padumuttaro bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko veneyyasatte nibbānamahānagarasaṅkhātaṃ khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:3407_1: Atha so kulaputto anukkamena viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3407_3: Tena kho pana samayena satthā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:3407_4: Taṃ disvā so pasannamānaso tadatthāya cittaṃ ṭhapetvā satasahassabhikkhuparivutassa bhagavato mahatā
atk-s0508a2:3407_5: sakkārena sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:3407_6: Satthā tassa anantarāyena ijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:3407_7: So satthāraṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a2:3407_8: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito dvenavute kappe phussassa
atk-s0508a2:3407_9: bhagavato kāle satthu vemātikabhātikesu tīsu rājaputtesu satthāraṃ upaṭṭhahantesu tesaṃ puññakiriyāya
atk-s0508a2:3408_0: Evaṃ tattha tattha bhave taṃ taṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:3408_2: tassa bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthe kule nibbattattā raṭṭhapāloti vaṃsānugatameva nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:3408_3: So mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhanto anukkamena yobbanapatto mātāpitūhi patirūpena dārena saṃyojito mahante
atk-s0508a2:3408_4: ca yase patiṭṭhāpito dibbasampattisadisaṃ sampattiṃ paccanubhoti.
atk-s0508a2:3408_5: Atha bhagavā kururaṭṭhe janapadacārikaṃ caranto thullakoṭṭhikaṃ anupāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:3408_6: Taṃ sutvā raṭṭhapālo kulaputto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a2:3408_7: pabbajitukāmo sattāhaṃ bhattacchedaṃ katvā kicchena kasirena mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a2:3408_8: pabbajjaṃ yācitvā satthu āṇattiyā aññatarassa therassa santike pabbajitvā yonisomanasikārena kammaṃ karonto
atk-s0508a2:3416_0: Sabbe jane hāsayanto, desesi amataṃ padaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3426_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:3434_0: Kheḷapiṇḍeva bhogamhi, pemaṃ mayhaṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:3439_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthāraṃ anujānāpetvā mātāpitaro passituṃ thullakoṭṭhikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0508a2:3439_1: tattha sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caranto pitu nivesane ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ labhitvā taṃ amataṃ viya paribhuñjanto,
atk-s0508a2:3439_3: dutiyadivase pitu nivesane piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatte itthāgārajane upagantvā “kīdisā nāma tā,
atk-s0508a2:3439_6: yāsaṃ tvaṃ hetu brahmacariyaṃ carasī”tiādīni vatvā,
atk-s0508a2:3439_7: palobhanakammaṃ kātuṃ āraddhe tassa adhippāyaṃ parivattetvā aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a2:3442_0: Āturaṃ bahusaṅkappaṃ, yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhiti.
atk-s0508a2:3445_0: Aṭṭhiṃ tacena onaddhaṃ, saha vatthehi sobhati.
atk-s0508a2:3448_0: Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
atk-s0508a2:3451_0: Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
atk-s0508a2:3454_0: Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
atk-s0508a2:3460_0: Bhutvā nivāpaṃ gacchāma, socante migaluddake”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:3461_2: Bimbanti dīghādibhāvena yuttaṭṭhānesu dīghādīhi aṅgapaccaṅgehi maṇḍitaṃ attabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3461_3: Arukāyanti navannaṃ vaṇamukhānaṃ lomakūpānañca vasena vissandamānaasuciṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3461_4: sabbaso ca arubhūtaṃ vaṇabhūtaṃ arūnaṃ vā kāyaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3461_6: Āturanti sabbakālaṃ iriyāpathantarādīhi pariharitabbatāya niccaṃ gilānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3461_7: Bahusaṅkappanti bālajanena abhūtaṃ āropetvā bahudhā saṅkappitabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3461_8: Yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhitīti yassa kāyassa dhuvabhāvo ṭhitisabhāvo natthi,
atk-s0508a2:3462_5: ākāso parivārito ‘rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”tiādīsu rūpanti vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:3462_6: Maṇinā kuṇḍalena cāti sīsūpagādiābharaṇagatena maṇinā kuṇḍalena cittakataṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3462_7: Aṭṭhiṃ tacena onaddhanti allacammena pariyonaddhaṃ atirekatisatapabhedaṃ aṭṭhiṃ passāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:3462_10: Saha vatthehi sobhatīti tayidaṃ rūpaṃ maṇinā cittakatampi vatthehi paṭicchāditameva sobhati,
atk-s0508a2:3463_3: yaṃ maṇḍanamanuyuttā sāsapakakkena mukhapīḷakādīni haritvā loṇamattikāya duṭṭhalohitaṃ haritvā mukhacuṇṇakavilepanaṃ karonti,
atk-s0508a2:3463_5: Alanti bālassa andhaputhujjanassa no ca pāragavesino vaṭṭābhiratassa mohāya sammohanāya samatthaṃ tassa cittaṃ mohetuṃ pariyattaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3463_6: pāragavesino pana vivaṭṭābhiratassa no alaṃ na pariyattaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3464_0: Aṭṭhāpadakatāti aṭṭhapadākārena katā sañcitā purimabhāge kese kappetvā nalāṭassa paṭicchādanavasena katā kesaracanā aṭṭhapadaṃ nāma,
atk-s0508a2:3464_2: Nettā añjanamakkhitāti ubhopi nayanāni anto dvīsu antesu ca yathā añjanacchāyā dissati,
atk-s0508a2:3465_1: pūtikāyo alaṅkatoti yathā añjanī añjananāḷikā navā abhinavā mālākammamakaradantādivasena cittā bahi maṭṭhā ujjalā dassanīyā,
atk-s0508a2:3465_3: evameva tāsaṃ kāyo nhānabbhañjanavatthālaṅkārehi alaṅkato bahi ujjalo,
atk-s0508a2:3465_4: anto pana pūti nānappakāraasucīhi bharito tiṭṭhatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:3466_6: Upamā kho ayaṃ therena katā atthassa viññāpanāya.
atk-s0508a2:3466_8: yathā migānaṃ māraṇatthāya daṇḍavāguraṃ oḍḍetvā tattha nivāpaṃ vikiriya migaluddake nilīne ṭhite tattheko
atk-s0508a2:3466_9: javaparakkamasampanno cheko migo pāsaṃ aphusanto eva yathāsukhaṃ nivāpaṃ khāditvā,
atk-s0508a2:3466_10: “vañcesi vata migo”ti migaluddake viravante eva gacchati.
atk-s0508a2:3466_11: Aparo migo balavā cheko javasampannova tattha gantvā nivāpaṃ khāditvā tattha tattha pāsaṃ chinditvā,
atk-s0508a2:3466_13: pāso chinno”ti migaluddake socante eva gacchati,
atk-s0508a2:3466_14: evaṃ mayampi pubbe puthujjanakāle mātāpitūhi āsajjanatthāya niyyādite bhoge bhuñjitvā tattha tattha asajjamānā nikkhantā.
atk-s0508a2:3466_15: Idāni pana sabbaso chinnakilesā apāsā hutvā ṭhitā,
atk-s0508a2:3466_16: tehi dinnabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā tesu socantesu eva gacchāmāti.
atk-s0508a2:3467_2: attanā pubbe bhuttabhoge ca idāni bhuttabhojanañca nivāpatiṇaṃ viya,
atk-s0508a2:3467_3: attānaṃ mahāmigaṃ viya ca katvā dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:3467_4: Imā gāthā vatvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā rañño korabyassa migājinauyyāne maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe nisīdi.
atk-s0508a2:3467_5: Therassa kira pitā sattasu dvārakoṭṭhakesu aggaḷaṃ dāpetvā malle āṇāpesi “nikkhamituṃ mā detha,
atk-s0508a2:3467_8: Atha rājā korabyo therassa tattha nisinnabhāvaṃ sutvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā “idha,
atk-s0508a2:3467_10: pabbajanto byādhipārijuññaṃ vā jarābhogañātipārijuññaṃ vā patto pabbajati.
atk-s0508a2:3467_11: Tvaṃ pana kiñcipi pārijuññaṃ anupagato eva kasmā pabbajito”ti pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:3467_16: ūno loko atitto taṇhādāso”ti imesaṃ catunnaṃ dhammuddesānaṃ attānaṃ vivittabhāvaṃ kathetvā tassā desanāya anugītiṃ kathento –
atk-s0508a2:3469_0: “Passāmi loke sadhane manusse, laddhāna vittaṃ na dadanti mohā;
atk-s0508a2:3470_0: Luddhā dhanaṃ sannicayaṃ karonti, bhiyyova kāme abhipatthayanti.
atk-s0508a2:3473_0: Oraṃ samuddassa atittarūpo, pāraṃ samuddassapi patthayetha.
atk-s0508a2:3475_0: “Rājā ca aññe ca bahū manussā, avītataṇhā maraṇaṃ upenti;
atk-s0508a2:3476_0: Ūnāva hutvāna jahanti dehaṃ, kāmehi lokamhi na hatthi titti.
atk-s0508a2:3478_0: “Kandanti naṃ ñātī pakiriya kese, ‘aho vatā no amarā’ti cāhu;
atk-s0508a2:3479_0: Vatthena naṃ pārutaṃ nīharitvā, citaṃ samodhāya tato ḍahanti.
atk-s0508a2:3481_0: “So ḍayhati sūlehi tujjamāno, ekena vatthena pahāya bhoge;
atk-s0508a2:3482_0: Na mīyamānassa bhavanti tāṇā, ñātī ca mittā atha vā sahāyā.
atk-s0508a2:3484_0: “Dāyādakā tassa dhanaṃ haranti, satto pana gacchati yenakammaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:3485_0: Na mīyamānaṃ dhanamanveti kiñci, puttā ca dārā ca dhanañca raṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3487_0: “Na dīghamāyuṃ labhate dhanena, na cāpi vittena jaraṃ vihanti;
atk-s0508a2:3488_0: Appaṃ hidaṃ jīvitamāhu dhīrā, asassataṃ vippariṇāmadhammaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3490_0: “Aḍḍhā daliddā ca phusanti phassaṃ, bālo ca dhīro ca tatheva phuṭṭho;
atk-s0508a2:3491_0: Bālo hi bālyā vadhitova seti, dhīro ca no vedhati phassaphuṭṭho.
atk-s0508a2:3493_0: “Tasmā hi paññāva dhanena seyyā, yāya vosānamidhādhigacchati;
atk-s0508a2:3494_0: Abyositattā hi bhavābhavesu, pāpāni kammāni karoti mohā.
atk-s0508a2:3497_0: Tassappapañño abhisaddahanto, upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3499_0: “Coro yathā sandhimukhe gahīto, sakammunā haññati pāpadhammo;
atk-s0508a2:3500_0: Evaṃ pajā pecca paramhi loke, sakammunā haññati pāpadhammo.
atk-s0508a2:3502_0: “Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:3503_0: Ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja.
atk-s0508a2:3505_0: “Dumapphalānīva patanti māṇavā, daharā ca vuḍḍhā ca sarīrabhedā;
atk-s0508a2:3506_0: Etampi disvā pabbajitomhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññameva seyyo.
atk-s0508a2:3509_0: Avañjhā mayhaṃ pabbajjā, anaṇo bhuñjāmi bhojanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3515_0: Sohaṃ viddho tadā santo, sampatto āsavakkhayaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3521_0: So me attho anuppatto, sabbasaṃyojanakkhayo”ti. – imā gāthā avoca;
atk-s0508a2:3522_1: imasmiṃ loke sadhane dhanasampanne aḍḍhe manusse passāmi,
atk-s0508a2:3522_2: te pana laddhāna vittaṃ dhanaṃ labhitvā bhogasampattiyaṃ ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇādīsu kassaci kiñcipi na dadanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a2:3522_4: Luddhā lobhābhibhūtā yathāladdhaṃ dhanaṃ sannicayaṃ sabbaso nicetabbaṃ nidhetabbaṃ karonti.
atk-s0508a2:3522_5: Bhiyyova yathādhigatakāmato upari kāme kāmaguṇe “tathāhaṃ edise ca bhoge paṭilabheyya”nti abhipatthayanti paccāsīsanti tajjañca vāyāmaṃ karonti.
atk-s0508a2:3523_1: Tattha pasayhappathaviṃ vijetvāti attano vaṃsānugataṃ pathaviṃ balakkārena abhivijiya.
atk-s0508a2:3523_3: Oraṃ samuddassāti anavasesaṃ samuddassa orabhāgaṃ labhitvāpi tena atittarūpo pāraṃ samuddassa dīpantarampi patthayeyya.
atk-s0508a2:3524_2: Kāmehi lokamhi na hatthi tittīti taṇhāvipannānaṃ imasmiṃ loke vatthukāmehi titti nāma natthi.
atk-s0508a2:3525_0: Kandanti nanti matapurisaṃ uddissa tassa guṇe kittentā kandanaṃ karonti.
atk-s0508a2:3525_1: Aho vatā no amarāti cāhūti aho vata amhākaṃ ñātī amarā siyunti ca kathenti,
atk-s0508a2:3526_0: So ḍayhati sūlehi tujjamānoti so matasatto chavaḍāhakehi sammā jhāpetuṃ sūlehi tujjamāno.
atk-s0508a2:3528_0: “Na dīghamāyu”ntiādinā kāmaguṇassa jarāya ca paṭikārābhāvaṃ vatvā puna tassa ekantikabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “appaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3528_3: Phassaṃ bālo ca dhīro ca tatheva phuṭṭhoti yathā bālo iṭṭhāniṭṭhasamphassaṃ phuṭṭho,
atk-s0508a2:3528_7: bālo hi bālyā vadhitova setīti bālapuggalo kenaci dukkhadhammena phuṭṭho socanto kilamanto urattāḷiṃ
atk-s0508a2:3528_8: kandanto bālabhāvena vadhito pīḷitova hutvā seti sayati.
atk-s0508a2:3528_9: Ito cito ca āvaṭṭanto vivaṭṭanto virodhento vedhati phassaphuṭṭhoti dhīro pana paṇḍito dukkhasamphassena
atk-s0508a2:3528_10: samphuṭṭho na vedhati kampanamattampi tassa na hotīti.
atk-s0508a2:3529_0: Tasmāti yasmā bālapaṇḍitānaṃ lokadhamme edisī pavatti,
atk-s0508a2:3529_3: yāya paññāya vosānaṃ bhavassa pariyosānabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigacchati.
atk-s0508a2:3530_1: saṃsāramāpajja paramparāyāti yo pāpāni katvā aparāparaṃ saṃsaraṇamāpajjitvā upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3530_3: tassa pāpakammakārino puggalassa kiriyaṃ abhisaddahanto “attā ca me hotī”ti pattiyāyanto aññopi appapañño
atk-s0508a2:3530_4: bālo yathā paṭipajjitvā upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3531_0: Coro yathāti yathā coro pāpadhammo gharasandhiṃ chindanto sandhimukhe ārakkhakapurisehi gahito sakammunā
atk-s0508a2:3531_1: tena attano sandhicchedakammunā kāraṇabhūtena kasādīhi tāḷanādivasena haññati rājapurisehi bādhiyyati
atk-s0508a2:3531_3: Evaṃ pajāti evamayaṃ sattaloko idha pāpāni karitvā pecca patvā tena kammunā paramhi loke nirayādīsu haññati,
atk-s0508a2:3532_0: Evametāhi ekādasahi gāthāhi yathārahaṃ cattāro dhammuddese pakāsetvā idāni kāmesu saṃsāre ca ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3532_1: disvā saddhāya attano pabbajitabhāvaṃ pabbajitakiccassa ca matthakappattiṃ vibhāvento “kāmā hī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:3532_2: Tattha kāmāti vatthukāmā manāpiyā rūpādayo dhammā,
atk-s0508a2:3532_12: Evaṃ tena virūparūpena tathā tathā assādaṃ dassetvā mathenti cittaṃ pabbajjāya abhiramituṃ na dentīti
atk-s0508a2:3532_13: iminā appassādabahudukkhatādinā ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā tasmā taṃnimittaṃ ahaṃ pabbajito amhi.
atk-s0508a2:3532_14: Dumapphalāni pakkakāle aparipakkakāle ca yattha katthaci parūpakkamato sarasato vā patanti,
atk-s0508a2:3532_15: evaṃ sattā daharā ca vuḍḍhā ca sarīrassa bhedā patantiyeva.
atk-s0508a2:3532_16: Etampi disvāti evaṃ aniccatampi paññācakkhunā disvā,
atk-s0508a2:3532_18: Apaṇṇakanti aviraddhanakaṃ sāmaññameva samaṇabhāvova seyyo uttaritaro.
atk-s0508a2:3533_0: Saddhāyāti kammaṃ kammaphalaṃ buddhasubuddhataṃ dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiñca saddahitvā.
atk-s0508a2:3533_1: Upeto jinasāsaneti satthu sāsane sammāpaṭipattiṃ upagato.
atk-s0508a2:3533_3: Tato eva anaṇo bhuñjāmi bhojanaṃ nikkilesavasena sāmibhāvato sāmiparibhogena paribhuñjanato.
atk-s0508a2:3534_0: Kāme ādittato disvāti vatthukāme kilesakāme ca ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvato disvā.
atk-s0508a2:3534_1: Jātarūpāni satthatoti katākatappabhedā sabbasuvaṇṇavikatiyo anatthāvahatāya nisitasatthato.
atk-s0508a2:3534_3: Nirayesu mahabbhayanti saussadesu aṭṭhasu mahānirayesu labbhamānaṃ mahābhayañca sabbattha disvāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:3535_0: Etamādīnavaṃ ñatvāti etaṃ kāmānaṃ ādittatādiṃ saṃsāre ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ ñatvā.
atk-s0508a2:3535_1: Saṃvegaṃ alabhiṃ tadāti tasmiṃ satthu santike dhammassa sutakāle bhavādike saṃvegaṃ alatthaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3535_2: Viddho tadā santoti tasmiṃ gahaṭṭhakāle rāgasallādīhi viddho samāno idāni satthu sāsanaṃ āgamma sampatto āsavakkhayaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3536_0: Evaṃ thero rañño korabyassa dhammaṃ desetvā satthu santikameva gato.
atk-s0508a2:3536_1: Satthā ca aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0508a2:3539_0: Rūpaṃ disvā sati muṭṭhātiādikā āyasmato mālukyaputtassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:3539_1: Imassa āyasmato vatthu heṭṭhā chakkanipāte vuttameva.

atk-s0508a2:3628_0: Yathāssa passato rūpanti assa yogino yathā tattha abhijjhādayo nappavattanti,
atk-s0508a2:3628_2: Sevato cāpi vedananti taṃ ārabbha uppannaṃ vedanaṃ taṃsampayuttadhamme ca gocarasevanāya sevato cāpi.

atk-s0508a2:3628_4: Nopacīyatīti na upaciyati na ācayaṃ gacchati.

atk-s0508a2:3629_0: Evaṃ thero imāhi gāthāhi satthu ovādassa attanā upadhāritabhāvaṃ pavedetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0508a2:3629_1: gato nacirasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0508a2:3632_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarabhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gaṇapāmokkho hutvā tīṇi purisasatāni
atk-s0508a2:3632_3: samādapetvā tehi saddhiṃ satthu gandhakuṭiṃ kāretvā katapariyositāya gandhakuṭiyā sabhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0508a2:3632_4: bhagavato mahādānaṃ pavattetvā satthāraṃ bhikkhū ca ticīvarena acchādesi.
atk-s0508a2:3632_5: So tena puññakammena ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke eva vasitvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:3632_6: buddhuppāde aṅguttarāpesu āpaṇe nāma brāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā seloti laddhanāmo ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:3632_8: brāhmaṇasippesu ca nipphattiṃ gantvā tīṇi māṇavakasatāni mante vācento āpaṇe paṭivasati.
atk-s0508a2:3632_9: Tena ca samayena satthā sāvatthito nikkhamitvā aḍḍhateḷasahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ aṅguttarāpesu cārikaṃ caranto selassa,
atk-s0508a2:3632_10: antevāsikānañca ñāṇaparipākaṃ disvā aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe viharati.
atk-s0508a2:3632_11: Atha keṇiyo nāma jaṭilo satthu āgamanaṃ sutvā tattha gantvā saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena satthāraṃ svātanāya
atk-s0508a2:3632_12: nimantetvā sake assame pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādeti.
atk-s0508a2:3632_13: Tasmiñca samaye selo brāhmaṇo saddhiṃ tīhi māṇavakasatehi jaṅghāvihāraṃ anuvicaranto keṇiyassa assamaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3632_14: pavisitvā jaṭile kaṭṭhaphālanuddhanasampādanādinā dānūpakaraṇaṃ sajjente disvā,

atk-s0508a2:3632_17: vacanaṃ sutvāva haṭṭho udaggo pītisomanassajāto tāvadeva māṇavakehi saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā katapaṭisanthāro
atk-s0508a2:3632_18: ekamantaṃ nisinno bhagavato kāye bāttiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni disvā “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato rājā

atk-s0508a2:3652_0: Tattha paripuṇṇakāyoti abhibyattarūpānaṃ dvattiṃsāya mahāpurisalakkhaṇānaṃ paripuṇṇatāya ahīnaṅgapaccaṅgatāya ca paripuṇṇasarīro.
atk-s0508a2:3652_4: Cārudassanoti sucirampi passantānaṃ atittijanakaṃ appaṭikkūlaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ cāru eva dassanaṃ assāti cārudassano.

atk-s0508a2:3654_0: Mahāpurisalakkhaṇāti pubbe vuttabyañjanāneva vacanantarena nigamento āha.

atk-s0508a2:3677_0: Tattha anujāto tathāgatanti, tathāgataṃ anujāto, tathā gatena hetunā ariyāya jātiyā jātoti attho.

atk-s0508a2:3706_0: Tato tepi māṇavakā hetusampannatāya tattheva pabbajjāpekkhā hutvā –

atk-s0508a2:3794_0: Usabhūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3796_0: Sakkūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3797_0: “Vasī gaṇī patāpī ca, tejassī ca durāsado;
atk-s0508a2:3798_0: Brahmūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3800_0: Dharaṇūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3802_0: Udadhūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3804_0: Nerūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3806_0: Gaganūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3808_0: Assāsako mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3810_0: Ratanākaro mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3812_0: Meghūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3814_0: Sūriyūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3816_0: Candūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3818_0: Appameyyo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3820_0: Vimutti asadisā yassa, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3822_0: Yassa parakkamo jeṭṭho, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3823_0: “Rāgo doso ca moho ca, visā sabbe samūhatā;
atk-s0508a2:3824_0: Agadūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3826_0: Vejjūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a2:3828_0: Buddho buddhoti sutvāna, pīti me udapajjatha.
atk-s0508a2:3831_0: “Kahaṃ nu kho so bhagavā, lokajeṭṭho narāsabho;
atk-s0508a2:3840_0: Gāvī yathā vacchagiddhā, evāhaṃ viciniṃ jinaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3846_0: Mattova kuñjaro dantī, evaṃ buddhā durāsadā.
atk-s0508a2:3862_0: Buddhoti niṭṭhaṃ gantvāna, saha sissehi pabbajiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3868_0: Tena kammena sukatena, aṭṭha hetū labhāmahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3869_0: “Disāsu pūjito homi, bhogā ca amitā mama;
atk-s0508a2:3870_0: Patiṭṭhā homi sabbesaṃ, tāso mama na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:3871_0: “Byādhayo me na vijjanti, dīghāyuṃ pālayāmi ca;
atk-s0508a2:3876_0: Aṭṭha gopānasī nāma, tava putto mahāmuni.
atk-s0508a2:3878_0: Tena kammena sukatena, pañca hetū labhāmahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3880_0: Ādeyyavacano homi, na dhaṃsemi yathā ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3881_0: “Abhantaṃ hoti me cittaṃ, akhilo homi kassaci;
atk-s0508a2:3882_0: Tena kammena sukatena, vimalo homi sāsane.
atk-s0508a2:3884_0: Sāvako te mahāvīra, bhikkhu taṃ vandate muni.
atk-s0508a2:3886_0: Tena kammena sukatena, pañca hetū labhāmahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3888_0: Sabbasampattiko homi, maccheraṃ me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:3894_0: Tena kammena sukatena, pāvisiṃ abhayaṃ puraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3897_0: “Ye keci damakā loke, hatthiasse damenti ye;
atk-s0508a2:3898_0: Karitvā kāraṇā nānā, dāruṇena damenti te.
atk-s0508a2:3908_0: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a2:3912_2: pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhuma bhagavā yasmā mayaṃ ito atīte aṭṭhame divase taṃ saraṇaṃ agamimha.
atk-s0508a2:3912_3: Tasmā sattarattena tava sāsane damakena dantā amha,
atk-s0508a2:3914_0: “Tuvaṃ buddho tuvaṃ satthā, tuvaṃ mārābhibhū muni;
atk-s0508a2:3915_0: Tuvaṃ anusaye chetvā, tiṇṇo tāresimaṃ pajaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3919_0: Imāhi dvīhi gāthāhi abhitthavitvā osānagāthāya satthāraṃ vandanaṃ yācati –
atk-s0508a2:3922_0: Pāde vīra pasārehi, nāgā vandantu satthuno”ti.
atk-s0508a2:3923_0: Tattha tuvaṃ buddhoti tvameva imasmiṃ loke sabbaññubuddho.
atk-s0508a2:3923_4: Anusaye chetvāti kāmarāgādike anusaye ariyamaggasatthena chinditvā.
atk-s0508a2:3923_9: Evaṃ vatvā thero sapariso satthāraṃ abhivandatīti.
atk-s0508a2:3926_0: Yātaṃ me hatthigīvāyātiādikā āyasmato bhaddiyattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:3926_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle mahābhogakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0508a2:3926_3: ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ uccākulikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3926_4: disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:3926_6: Sopi taṃ byākaraṇaṃ sutvā uccākulikasaṃvattanikaṃ kammaṃ pucchitvā dhammassavanassa kārāpanaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3926_10: uposathāgāre paṭissayadānanti evamādiṃ yāvajīvaṃ bahupuññaṃ katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0508a2:3926_11: kassapassa bhagavato aparabhāge amhākaṃ bhagavato uppattiyā puretaraṃ bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbiyaghare nibbatto
atk-s0508a2:3926_12: sambahule paccekabuddhe piṇḍāya caritvā ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne samāgantvā bhattavissaggaṃ karonte disvā tattha
atk-s0508a2:3926_13: pāsāṇaphalakāni attharitvā pādodakādiṃ upaṭṭhapento yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0508a2:3927_0: So ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare sākiyarājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:3927_2: So vayappatto anuruddhādīhi pañcahi khattiyehi saddhiṃ satthari anupiyambavane viharante satthu santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:3927_3: Taṃ satthā aparabhāge jetavane ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno uccākulikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:3927_4: So phalasukhena nibbānasukhena ca vītināmento araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi “aho sukhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:3927_10: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhaddiya,
atk-s0508a2:3927_16: Idāni pana pabbajito abhīto anubbiggo anussaṅkito viharāmī”ti vatvā –
atk-s0508a2:3983_0: Imāhi gāthāhi satthu purato sīhanādaṃ nadi.
atk-s0508a2:3984_1: pubbe mayā gacchantenāpi hatthigīvāya hatthikkhandhe nisīditvā yātaṃ caritaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3984_2: Vatthāni pariharantenāpi sukhumā sukhasamphassā kāsikavatthavisesā dhāritā.
atk-s0508a2:3984_3: Odanaṃ bhuñjantenāpi tivassikānaṃ purāṇagandhasālīnaṃ odano tittirakapiñjarādinā sucinā maṃsena upasittatāya sucimaṃsūpasecano bhutto,
atk-s0508a2:3984_4: tathāpi taṃ sukhaṃ na mayhaṃ cittaparitosakaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0508a2:3984_5: yathā etarahi vivekasukhanti dassento āha “sojja bhaddo”tiādi.
atk-s0508a2:3984_9: Sojjāti so ajja etarahi pabbajjāyaṃ ṭhito.
atk-s0508a2:3984_12: Uñchāpattāgate ratoti uñchācariyāya patte āgate pattapariyāpanne abhirato,
atk-s0508a2:3984_15: Putto godhāyāti kāḷigodhāya nāma khattiyāya putto.
atk-s0508a2:3984_16: Bhaddiyoti evaṃnāmo attānameva thero aññaṃ viya katvā vadati.
atk-s0508a2:3985_14: Vitthārato pana dhutaṅgakathā visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva gahetabbā.
atk-s0508a2:3986_3: Daḷhamaṭṭālakoṭṭhaketi thirehi aṭṭālehi dvārakoṭṭhakehi ca samannāgate,
atk-s0508a2:3987_0: Satiṃ paññañcāti ettha satisīsena samādhiṃ vadati.
atk-s0508a2:3988_0: Evaṃ thero satthu sammukhā sīhanādaṃ nadi. Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū abhippasannā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3991_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:3991_3: sāvatthiyaṃ kosalarañño purohitassa bhaggavassa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:3991_5: rañño ca maṅgalāvudhaṃ sayanapīṭhe ṭhapitaṃ pajjali,
atk-s0508a2:3991_6: taṃ disvā rājā bhīto saṃviggo niddaṃ na labhi.
atk-s0508a2:3991_7: Purohito tāyaṃ velāyaṃ nakkhattayogaṃ ullokento “coranakkhattena jāto”ti sanniṭṭhānamakāsi.
atk-s0508a2:3991_8: So vibhātāya rattiyā rañño santikaṃ gato sukhaseyyaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:3991_12: tassa ko nu kho vipāko bhavissatī”ti?
atk-s0508a2:3991_25: Tassa nāmaṃ karontā yasmā jāyamāno rañño cittaṃ vihesento jāto,
atk-s0508a2:3991_26: tasmā hiṃsakoti katvā pacchā diṭṭhaṃ adiṭṭhanti viya ahiṃsakoti vohariṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:3992_0: So vayappatto pubbakammabalena sattannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti.
atk-s0508a2:3992_2: buddhasuññe loke kassako hutvā nibbatto ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ vassodakena tintaṃ allacīvaraṃ sītapīḷitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3992_3: attano khettabhūmiṃ upagataṃ disvā “puññakkhettaṃ me upaṭṭhita”nti somanassajāto aggiṃ katvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:3992_4: So tassa kammassa balena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne thāmajavabalasampanno ca hutvā imasmiṃ pacchimattabhāve sattannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti.
atk-s0508a2:3992_5: So takkasilaṃ gantvā disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike dhammantevāsī hutvā sippaṃ uggaṇhato ācariyabrāhmaṇaṃ tassa bhariyañca sakkaccaṃ paṭijaggati.
atk-s0508a2:3992_6: Tenassa sā brāhmaṇī gehe labbhamānena bhattādinā saṅgahaṃ karoti.
atk-s0508a2:3992_7: Taṃ asahamānā aññe māṇavā ācariyena saddhiṃ bhedaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:3992_8: Brāhmaṇo tesaṃ vacanaṃ dve tayo vāre asaddahanto hutvā pacchā saddahitvā “mahābalo māṇavo,
atk-s0508a2:3992_10: upāyena naṃ māressāmī”ti cintetvā niṭṭhitasippaṃ attano nagaraṃ gantuṃ āpucchantaṃ māṇavaṃ āha –
atk-s0508a2:3992_12: niṭṭhitasippena nāma antevāsinā ācariyassa garudakkhiṇā dātabbā,
atk-s0508a2:3992_17: bahūsu māriyamānesu ekantato eko naṃ māreyyāti.
atk-s0508a2:3992_18: Taṃ sutvā ahiṃsako attano ciraparicitaṃ nikkaruṇataṃ purakkhatvā sannaddhapañcāvudho kosalarañño vijite
atk-s0508a2:3992_19: jālinaṃ vanaṃ pavisitvā mahāmaggasamīpe pabbatantare vasanto pabbatasikhare ṭhatvā maggena gacchante
atk-s0508a2:3992_20: manusse oloketvā vegena gantvā aṅguliyo gahetvā rukkhagge olambesi.
atk-s0508a2:3992_23: Evaṃ gaṇanāya aparipūramānāya laddhā laddhā aṅguliyo suttena ganthitvā mālaṃ katvā yaññopacitaṃ viya aṃse olambesi.
atk-s0508a2:3993_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ manusse mārente maggo avaḷañjo ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:3993_1: So magge manusse alabhanto gāmūpacāraṃ gantvā nilīyitvā āgatāgate manusse māretvā aṅguliyo gahetvā gacchati.
atk-s0508a2:3993_5: Evaṃ tena so padeso ubbāsito ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:3993_6: Aṅgulimālassa ca ekāya ūnā sahassaaṅguliyo saṅgahā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3993_7: Atha manussā taṃ corupaddavaṃ kosalarañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3993_11: Taṃ sutvā aṅgulimālassa mātā mantāṇī nāma brāhmaṇī tassa pitaraṃ āha –
atk-s0508a2:3993_12: “putto kira te coro hutvā idañcidañca karoti,
atk-s0508a2:3993_16: rājā yaṃ vā taṃ vā karotū”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:3993_17: Atha brāhmaṇī puttasinehena pātheyyaṃ gahetvā “mama puttaṃ saññāpetvā ānessāmī”ti maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0508a2:3994_5: mahājāni abhavissā”ti ñatvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto sayameva pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā aṅgulimālaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3994_6: uddissa tiṃsayojanikaṃ maggaṃ padasāva paṭipajjamāno antarāmagge gopālakādīhi vāriyamānopi jālinaṃ vanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:3994_8: Tasmiñca khaṇe tassa mātā tena diṭṭhā,
atk-s0508a2:3994_9: so mātaraṃ dūratova disvā “mātarampi māretvā ajja ūnaṅguliṃ pūressāmī”ti asiṃ ukkhipitvā upadhāvi.
atk-s0508a2:3994_10: Tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ antare bhagavā attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0508a2:3994_11: Aṅgulimālo bhagavantaṃ disvā “kiṃ me mātaraṃ vadhitvā aṅguliyā gahitena?
atk-s0508a2:3994_13: yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ jīvitā voropetvā aṅguliṃ gaṇheyya”nti ukkhittāsiko bhagavantaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi.
atk-s0508a2:3994_14: Atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāsi,
atk-s0508a2:3994_15: yathā pakatiiriyāpathena gacchantampi attānaṃ aṅgulimālo sabbathāmena dhāvantopi na sakkoti sampāpuṇituṃ.
atk-s0508a2:3994_16: So parihīnajavo ghurughurupassāsī kacchehi sedaṃ muñcanto padaṃ uddharitumpi asakkonto khāṇu viya ṭhito bhagavantaṃ “tiṭṭha tiṭṭha,
atk-s0508a2:3994_27: pucchitvā naṃ jānissāmī”ti bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0508a2:3996_0: “Gacchaṃ vadesi samaṇa ṭhitomhi, mamañca brūsi ṭhitamaṭṭhitoti;
atk-s0508a2:3997_0: Pucchāmi taṃ samaṇa etamatthaṃ, kathaṃ ṭhito tvaṃ ahamaṭṭhitomhī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:3998_7: tasmā taṃ samaṇaṃ ahaṃ evamatthaṃ pucchāmi.
atk-s0508a2:4000_0: “Ṭhito ahaṃ aṅgulimāla sabbadā, sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:4001_0: Tuvañca pāṇesu asaññatosi, tasmā ṭhitohaṃ tuvamaṭṭhitosī”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:4003_4: ahaṃ sabbadā sabbakāle ādimajjhapariyosānesu tasathāvarabhedesu sabbesu sattesu daṇḍaṃ nidhāya nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno,
atk-s0508a2:4003_6: Tuvañca pāṇesu asaññatosīti tvaṃ pana sattesu saññamarahito asi,
atk-s0508a2:4003_9: Tato eva tāsu tāsu gatīsu paribbhamanatopi tuvaṃ idāni iriyāpathena ṭhitopi aṭṭhito asi,
atk-s0508a2:4003_11: Tato aṅgulimālo yathābhuccaguṇappabhāvitassa jalatale telassa viya sakalaṃ lokaṃ abhibyāpetvā ṭhitassa
atk-s0508a2:4003_12: bhagavato kittisaddassa sutapubbattā hetusampattiyā ñāṇassa ca paripākagatattā “ayaṃ so bhagavā”ti sañjātapītisomanasso
atk-s0508a2:4005_0: “Cirassaṃ vata me mahito mahesī, mahāvanaṃ samaṇo paccapādi;
atk-s0508a2:4006_0: Sohaṃ cajissāmi sahassapāpaṃ, sutvāna gāthaṃ tava dhammayutta”nti. –
atk-s0508a2:4008_2: Mahitoti sadevakena lokena mahatiyā pūjāya pūjito.
atk-s0508a2:4008_5: Mahāvanaṃ samaṇo paccapādīti imaṃ mahāraññaṃ samitasabbapāpo bhagavā paṭipajji.
atk-s0508a2:4008_7: sutvāna gāthaṃ tava dhammayuttanti sohaṃ dhammayuttaṃ dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ tava gāthaṃ suṇiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4008_8: Sohaṃ taṃ sutvāna “cirassampi cirakālenapi saṅgataṃ paricitaṃ pāpasahassaṃ pajahissa”nti cintetvā idāni naṃ aññadatthu pariccajissāmīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4010_0: “Icceva coro asimāvudhañca, sobbhe papāte narake anvakāsi;
atk-s0508a2:4011_0: Avandi coro sugatassa pāde, tattheva pabbajjamayāci buddhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4013_0: “Buddho ca kho kāruṇiko mahesi, yo satthā lokassa sadevakassa;
atk-s0508a2:4014_0: Tamehi bhikkhūti tadā avoca, eseva tassa ahu bhikkhubhāvo”ti.
atk-s0508a2:4016_0: Tattha iccevāti iti eva evaṃ vatvā anantarameva.
atk-s0508a2:4016_7: Idha pana tīhipi padehi yattha patitaṃ aññena gahetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0508a2:4016_10: pañcavidhampi attano āvudhaṃ anu khipi chaḍḍesi,
atk-s0508a2:4016_11: tāni chaḍḍetvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā “pabbājetha maṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4016_15: Evaṃ tena pabbajjāya yācitāya satthā tassa purimakammaṃ olokento ehibhikkhubhāvāya hetusampattiṃ disvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā – “ehi, bhikkhu,
atk-s0508a2:4016_19: Sā eva ca tassa pabbajjā upasampadā ca ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:4017_0: Evaṃ thero satthu santike ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca labhitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto
atk-s0508a2:4017_1: arahattaṃ patvā vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento pītisomanassajāto udānavasena –
atk-s0508a2:4019_0: “Yo ca pubbe pamajjitvā, pacchā so nappamajjati;
atk-s0508a2:4020_0: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā.
atk-s0508a2:4023_0: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā.
atk-s0508a2:4026_0: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā”ti. – gāthattayaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:4027_1: yo puggalo gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā kalyāṇamittasaṃsaggato pubbe pāpamittasaṃsaggena vā attano vā paṭisaṅkhānābhāvena
atk-s0508a2:4027_5: samathavipassanaṃ anuyuñjanto tisso vijjā cha abhiññā pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0508a2:4027_6: so abbhādīhi mutto cando viya okāsalokaṃ attanā adhigatāhi vijjābhiññāhi imaṃ khandhādilokaṃ obhāsetīti.
atk-s0508a2:4028_0: Yassa puggalassa kataṃ upacitaṃ pāpakammaṃ kammakkhayakarena lokuttarakusalena avipākārahabhāvassa āharitattā
atk-s0508a2:4029_2: So hi uppannaṃ vātātapaparissayaṃ abhibhavitvā yogaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0508a2:4030_0: Evaṃ pītisomanassajāto vimuttisukhena viharanto yadā nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisati,
atk-s0508a2:4030_1: tadā aññenapi khitto leḍḍu therassa kāye nipatati,
atk-s0508a2:4030_2: aññenapi khitto daṇḍo tasseva kāye nipatati.
atk-s0508a2:4030_3: So bhinnena pattena vihāraṃ pavisitvā satthu santikaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0508a2:4030_10: kammassa vipākena bahūni vassasahassāni niraye pacceyyāsi, tassa,
atk-s0508a2:4030_13: Atha thero anodhiso sabbasattesu mettacittaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā –
atk-s0508a2:4032_0: “Disāpi me dhammakathaṃ suṇantu, disāpi me yuñjantu buddhasāsane;
atk-s0508a2:4033_0: Disāpi me te manuje bhajantu, ye dhammamevādapayanti santo.
atk-s0508a2:4038_0: “Na hi jātu so mamaṃ hiṃse, aññaṃ vā pana kañci naṃ;
atk-s0508a2:4042_0: Dāruṃ damayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti paṇḍitā.
atk-s0508a2:4048_0: Ajjāhaṃ saccanāmomhi, na naṃ hiṃsāmi kañci naṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4063_0: Appamatto hi jhāyanto, pappoti paramaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4069_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4084_0: Ohito garuko bhāro, bhavanetti samūhatā”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:4085_0: Tattha disāpīti mayhaṃ disāpi amittā paccatthikāpi ye maṃ evaṃ upavadanti “yathā mayaṃ aṅgulimālassa vasena ñātiviyogadukkhaparetā dukkhaṃ pāpuṇāma,
atk-s0508a2:4085_2: Me dhammakathaṃ suṇantūti mayā satthu santike sutaṃ catusaccadhammapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ suṇantu.
atk-s0508a2:4085_4: Te manuje bhajantūti tādise sappurise kalyāṇamitte bhajantu sevantu.
atk-s0508a2:4085_5: Ye dhammamevādapayanti santoti ye sappurisā kusaladhammameva,
atk-s0508a2:4086_0: Khantivādānanti adhivāsanakhantimeva vadantānaṃ tato eva avirodhappasaṃsinanti kenaci avirodhabhūtāya mettāya eva pasaṃsanasīlānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4086_1: Suṇantu dhammaṃ kālenāti yuttappayuttakāle tesaṃ santike dhammaṃ suṇantu.
atk-s0508a2:4086_2: Tañca anuvidhīyantūti tañca yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ sammadeva uggahitvā anukarontu dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjantūti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4087_0: Na hi jātu so mamaṃ hiṃseti so mayhaṃ diso paccatthiko jātu,
atk-s0508a2:4087_3: Aññaṃ vā pana kañci nanti na kevalaṃ maṃyeva,
atk-s0508a2:4087_4: aññaṃ vāpi kañci sattaṃ na hiṃseyya,
atk-s0508a2:4087_7: pāpuṇitvā ca rakkheyya tasathāvareti sabbe ca satte paramāya rakkhāya rakkheyya,
atk-s0508a2:4088_0: Evaṃ thero imāhi gāthāhi pare pāpato parimocento parittakiriyaṃ nāma katvā attano paṭipattiṃ pakāsento “udakaṃ hī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:4088_1: Tattha pathaviyā thalaṭṭhānaṃ khaṇitvā ninnaṭṭhānaṃ pūretvā mātikaṃ vā katvā rukkhadoṇiṃ vā ṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a2:4088_7: usukārāpi tāpetvā vaṅkābhāvaṃ harantā tejanaṃ usuṃ damayanti,
atk-s0508a2:4088_9: tacchakāpi nemiādīnaṃ atthāya tacchantā dāruṃ damayanti attano ruciyā ujuṃ vā vaṅkaṃ vā karonti.
atk-s0508a2:4088_10: Evaṃ ettakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paṇḍitā sappaññā ariyamaggaṃ uppādentā attānaṃ damenti,
atk-s0508a2:4089_0: Idāni purisadammasārathinā satthārā attano damitākāraṃ kataññutañca pakāsento “daṇḍeneke”tiādikā pañca gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4089_3: gopālādayo ca gāvādike daṇḍena yaṭṭhiyā damenti.
atk-s0508a2:4089_7: ahaṃ dantomhi tādināti ahaṃ pana iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappattena sammāsambuddhena vinā eva daṇḍena,
atk-s0508a2:4089_9: nihitadaṇḍanihitasatthabhāvena danto damito nibbisevano gato amhi.
atk-s0508a2:4090_1: hiṃsakassa pure satoti satthārā samāgamato pubbe hiṃsakassa me samānassa ahiṃsakoti nāmamattaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:4090_2: Ajjāhanti idāni panāhaṃ “ahiṃsako”ti saccanāmo avitathanāmo amhi.
atk-s0508a2:4090_3: Tasmā na naṃ hiṃsāmi kañcipi sattaṃ na hiṃsāmi na bādhemi,
atk-s0508a2:4091_2: tassa oghassa vicchedakaraṃ buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ buddhasaṅkhātaṃ saraṇaṃ agamaṃ upagacchiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4092_0: Lohitapāṇīti pāṇamatipātanena paresaṃ lohitena ruhirena makkhitapāṇi.
atk-s0508a2:4092_1: Saraṇagamanaṃ passāti mahapphalaṃ mama saraṇagamanaṃ passāti attānamevālapati.
atk-s0508a2:4093_0: Tādisaṃ kammanti anekasatapurisavadhaṃ dāruṇaṃ tathārūpaṃ pāpakammaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4093_1: Phuṭṭho kammavipākenāti pubbe katassa pāpakammassa vipākena phuṭṭho,
atk-s0508a2:4093_3: Atha vā phuṭṭho kammavipākenāti upanissayabhūtassa kusalakammassa phalabhūtena lokuttaramaggena,
atk-s0508a2:4093_5: Sabbaso kilesānaṃ khīṇattā anaṇo bhuñjāmi bhojanaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4094_0: Idāni pubbe attano pamādavihāraṃ garahāmukhena pacchā appamādapaṭipattiṃ pasaṃsanto tattha ca paresaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4094_2: Tattha bālāti bālyena samannāgatā idhalokaparalokatthaṃ ajānantā.
atk-s0508a2:4094_4: te pamāde ādīnavaṃ apassantā pamādaṃ anuyuñjanti pavattenti,
atk-s0508a2:4094_6: Medhāvīti dhammojapaññāya samannāgato pana paṇḍito kulavaṃsāgataṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ sattaratanadhanaṃ viya appamādaṃ rakkhati.
atk-s0508a2:4094_7: Yathā hi “uttamaṃ dhanaṃ nissāya bhogasampattiṃ pāpuṇissāma,
atk-s0508a2:4094_9: sugatimaggaṃ sodhessāmā”ti dhane ānisaṃsaṃ passantā dhanaṃ rakkhanti;
atk-s0508a2:4094_12: tisso vijjā cha abhiññā sampādessāmī”ti appamāde ānisaṃsaṃ passanto dhanaṃ seṭṭhaṃva appamādaṃ rakkhatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4095_0: Mā pamādanti pamādaṃ mā anuyuñjetha pamādena kālaṃ mā vītināmayittha.
atk-s0508a2:4095_2: kilesakāmesu ca ratisaṅkhātaṃ taṇhāsanthavampi mā anuyuñjetha mā vindittha mā paṭilabhittha.
atk-s0508a2:4095_3: Appamatto hīti upaṭṭhitasatitāya appamatto puggalo jhāyanto jhāyanappasuto paramaṃ uttamaṃ nibbānasukhaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0508a2:4096_0: Svāgataṃ nāpagatanti yaṃ tadā mama satthu santike āgataṃ āgamanaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4096_4: Netaṃ dummantitaṃ mamāti yaṃ tadā mayā “satthu santike pabbajissāmī”ti mantitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4096_7: Savibhattesu dhammesūti sāvajjānavajjādivasena pakārato vibhattesu dhammesu yaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4097_1: idāni payogāsayasampannatāya tattha sukhaṃ viharāmī”ti sukhavihārabhāvañceva “pubbe jātimattena brāhmaṇo,
atk-s0508a2:4097_2: idāni satthu orasaputtatāya brāhmaṇo”ti paramatthabrāhmaṇabhāvañca dassento “araññe”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:4097_3: Tattha sukhaṃ sayāmīti sayantopi sukhaṃ sukhena nidukkhena cittutrāsādīnaṃ abhāvena cetodukkharahito sayāmi.
atk-s0508a2:4098_1: Udicco ubhatoti mātito ca pitito ca ubhato udito saṃsuddhagahaṇiko.
atk-s0508a2:4101_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanno kuṭumbiko hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:4101_3: So ekadivasaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4101_4: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā satasahassabhikkhuparivārassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a2:4101_5: sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā sattame divase bhagavato,
atk-s0508a2:4101_6: bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uttamāni vatthāni datvā paṇidhānamakāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4101_7: Satthāpissa anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4101_8: Sopi tattha puññāni karonto satthari parinibbute niṭṭhite sattayojanike suvaṇṇacetiye anekasahassehi
atk-s0508a2:4101_9: dīparukkhehi dīpakapallikāhi ca “dibbacakkhuñāṇassa upanissayapaccayo hotū”ti uḷāraṃ dīpapūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4102_0: Evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbikagehe
atk-s0508a2:4102_1: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute niṭṭhite yojanike kanakathūpe bahū kaṃsapātiyo kāretvā
atk-s0508a2:4102_2: sappimaṇḍassa pūretvā majjhe ekekaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā mukhavaṭṭiyā mukhavaṭṭiṃ phusāpento cetiyaṃ parikkhipāpetvā
atk-s0508a2:4102_3: attanā ekaṃ mahatiṃ kaṃsapātiṃ kāretvā sappimaṇḍassa pūretvā sahassavaṭṭiyo jālāpetvā sīse ṭhapetvā sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0508a2:4103_0: Evaṃ tasmimpi attabhāve yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā
atk-s0508a2:4103_1: tato cuto anuppanne buddhe bārāṇasiyaṃyeva duggatakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:4103_3: So sumanaseṭṭhissa nāma gehe kammaṃ karonto jīvati.
atk-s0508a2:4103_4: So ekadivasaṃ upariṭṭhaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya gandhamādanapabbatato ākāsenāgantvā
atk-s0508a2:4103_5: bārāṇasīnagaradvāre otaritvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā nagare piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ disvā pasannacitto pattaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0508a2:4103_6: attano atthāya ṭhapitaṃ ekaṃ bhāgabhattaṃ patte pakkhipitvā paccekabuddhassa dātukāmo ārabhi.
atk-s0508a2:4103_8: So taṃ netvā paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:4103_9: Paccekabuddho taṃ gahetvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a2:4103_10: Taṃ disvā rattiṃ sumanaseṭṭhissa chatte adhivatthā devatā “aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4103_13: Taṃ sutvā sumanaseṭṭhi “evaṃ devatāya anumoditaṃ idameva uttamadāna”nti cintetvā tattha pattiṃ yāci.
atk-s0508a2:4103_15: Tena pasannacitto sumanaseṭṭhi tassa sahassaṃ datvā “ito paṭṭhāya tuyhaṃ sahatthena kammakaraṇakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0508a2:4103_16: patirūpaṃ gehaṃ katvā niccaṃ vasāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:4104_0: Yasmā nirodhato vuṭṭhitassa paccekabuddhassa dinnapiṇḍapāto taṃdivasameva uḷārataravipāko hoti,
atk-s0508a2:4104_1: tasmā taṃdivasaṃ sumanaseṭṭhi rañño santikaṃ gacchanto taṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4104_4: ayaṃ oloketabbayuttoyevā”ti vatvā tadā tena katapuññaṃ attanāpissa sahassaṃ dinnabhāvaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0508a2:4104_5: Taṃ sutvā rājā tussitvā sahassaṃ datvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne gehaṃ katvā vasā”ti gehaṭṭhānamassa āṇāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:4104_6: Tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ sodhāpentassa mahantiyo nidhikumbhiyo uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4104_8: Rājā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ uddharāpetvā rāsikataṃ disvā “ettakaṃ dhanaṃ imasmiṃ nagare kassa gehe atthī”ti?
atk-s0508a2:4104_10: “Tena hi ayaṃ annabhāro imasmiṃ nagare mahādhanaseṭṭhi nāma hotū”ti taṃdivasameva tassa seṭṭhichattaṃ ussāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:4105_0: So tato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:4105_4: satthu cūḷapitu putto paramasukhumālo mahāpuñño tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu alaṅkatanāṭakitthīhi
atk-s0508a2:4105_5: parivuto devo viya sampattiṃ anubhavanto suddhodanamahārājena ussāhitehi sakyarājūhi satthu parivāratthaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4105_6: pesitehi bhaddiyakumārādīhi anupiyambavane viharantaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā satthu santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a2:4105_8: puna dhammasenāpatissa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā cetiyaraṭṭhe pācīnavaṃsadāyaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4105_9: karonto sattamahāpurisavitakke vitakketvā aṭṭhamaṃ jānituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0508a2:4105_10: Tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā satthā aṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ kathetvā catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ deseti.
atk-s0508a2:4105_11: So desanānusārena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā abhiññāpaṭisambhidāparivāraṃ arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4125_0: Divā rattiñca passāmi, samantā yojanaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a2:4129_0: Tassa dīpo mayā dinno, vippasannena cetasā.
atk-s0508a2:4131_0: Atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge jetavanamahāvihāre ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4131_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ anuruddho”ti.
atk-s0508a2:4132_0: So vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedī viharanto ekadivasaṃ attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pītisomanassajāto
atk-s0508a2:4132_2: Keci pana “therassa pabbajjaṃ arahattappattiñca pakāsentehi saṅgītikārehi ādito catasso gāthā bhāsitā.
atk-s0508a2:4132_3: Tato parā therassa ariyavaṃsapaṭipattiyā ārādhitacittena bhagavatā bhāsitā.
atk-s0508a2:4132_4: Itarā sabbāpi tena tena kāraṇena thereneva bhāsitā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0508a2:4132_5: Iti sabbathāpi imā gāthā therena bhāsitāpi,
atk-s0508a2:4132_6: theraṃ uddissa bhāsitāpi therassa cetā gāthāti veditabbā.
atk-s0508a2:4138_0: Na tena suddhimajjhagaṃ, mārassa visaye rato.
atk-s0508a2:4143_0: “Rūpā saddā rasā gandhā, phoṭṭhabbā ca manoramā;
atk-s0508a2:4152_0: “Mahiccho ca asantuṭṭho, saṃsaṭṭho yo ca uddhato;
atk-s0508a2:4153_0: Tassa dhammā ime honti, pāpakā saṃkilesikā.
atk-s0508a2:4159_0: Anāsavo ca so hoti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā.
atk-s0508a2:4164_0: “Yadā me ahu saṅkappo, tato uttari desayi;
atk-s0508a2:4168_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4186_0: Vasī iddhiguṇe cutūpapāte, kāle passati devatā sa bhikkhu.
atk-s0508a2:4217_3: yathā aññe keci ñātipārijuññena vā bhogapārijuññena vā abhibhūtā pabbajanti,
atk-s0508a2:4217_7: mahantañca bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya kāmesu nirapekkhā pabbajitāti.
atk-s0508a2:4218_0: Sameto naccagītehīti naccehi ca gītehi ca samaṅgībhūto,
atk-s0508a2:4218_5: Na tena suddhimajjhaganti tena kāmabhogena saṃsārasuddhiṃ nādhigacchiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4218_6: Mārassa visaye ratoti kilesamārassa visayabhūte kāmaguṇe rato.
atk-s0508a2:4218_7: “Kilesamārassa visayabhūtena kāmaguṇabhogena saṃsārasuddhi hotī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhiko ahutvāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4219_0: Pañca kāmaguṇe sarūpato dassetuṃ “rūpā saddā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4219_1: Tattha manoramāti lobhanīyaṭṭhena manaṃ ramayantīti manoramā,
atk-s0508a2:4221_0: Vicinīti esantova tattha tattha saṅkārakūṭādike paṃsukūluppattiṭṭhāne vicini.
atk-s0508a2:4221_1: Aggahīti vicinitvā asucimakkhitampi ajigucchanto gaṇhi. Dhovīti,
atk-s0508a2:4221_3: Rajayīti dhovitvā gahitaṃ sibbitvā kappiyarajanena rajayi.
atk-s0508a2:4222_0: Idāni pācīnavaṃsadāye satthārā dinnaovādaṃ tassa ca attanā matthakappattabhāvaṃ dīpento “mahiccho ca asantuṭṭho”tiādikā gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4222_2: uḷāruḷāre bahū ca paccaye icchantoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4222_5: Saṃsaṭṭhoti gihīhi ceva pabbajitehi ca ananulomikena saṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho.
atk-s0508a2:4222_11: Saṃkilesikāti tassa cittassa malīnabhāvakaraṇato saṃkilesikā dhammā honti.
atk-s0508a2:4223_0: Sato ca hoti appicchoti yadā panāyaṃ puggalo kalyāṇamitte sevanto bhajanto payirupāsanto saddhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0508a2:4223_1: yoniso manasi karonto satimā ca mahicchataṃ pahāya appiccho ca hoti.
atk-s0508a2:4223_3: cittassa vighātakaraṃ vikkhepaṃ pahāya avighātavā avikkhitto samāhito,
atk-s0508a2:4223_5: vivekābhiratiyā nibbidāya dhammapītiyā vitto sumano tuṭṭhacitto,
atk-s0508a2:4224_0: Tassa evaṃ appicchatādiguṇasamannāgatassa ime satipaṭṭhānādayo sattatiṃsappabhedā tividhavipassanāsaṅgahā kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena kusalā,
atk-s0508a2:4224_2: So tehi samannāgato sabbaso āsavānaṃ khepanena aggamaggakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya anāsavo ca hoti.
atk-s0508a2:4224_3: Iti evaṃ vuttaṃ mahesinā sammāsambuddhena pācīnavaṃsadāye mahāpurisavitakke matthakaṃ pāpanavasenāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:4225_3: te ca matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ asamatthabhāvena ṭhitaṃ mama saṅkappaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0508a2:4225_6: Iddhiyāti “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti evaṃ pavattaadhiṭṭhāniddhiyā.
atk-s0508a2:4226_0: Yadā me ahu saṅkappoti yasmiṃ kāle mayhaṃ “kīdiso nu kho aṭṭhamo mahāpurisavitakko”ti parivitakko ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:4226_1: Tato mama saṅkappamaññāya iddhiyā upasaṅkamīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:4226_5: nāyaṃdhammo papañcārāmassa papañcaratino”ti imamaṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ pūrento upari desayi.
atk-s0508a2:4226_6: Taṃ pana desitaṃ dhammaṃ desento āha “nippapañcarato buddho,
atk-s0508a2:4226_11: Tasmiṃ nippapañce rato abhirato sammāsambuddho yathā taṃ pāpuṇāmi,
atk-s0508a2:4227_0: Tassāhaṃ dhammamaññāyāti tassā satthu desanāya dhammaṃ jānitvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanto vihāsiṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahe
atk-s0508a2:4228_0: Satthārā attano samāgamaṃ tena sādhitamatthaṃ dassetvā idāni attano pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya āraddhavīriyataṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4228_3: Tattha yato nesajjiko ahanti yato paṭṭhāya “yogānukūlatā kammaṭṭhānapariyuṭṭhitasappurisacariyā sallekhavuttī”ti
atk-s0508a2:4228_4: evamādiguṇe disvā nesajjiko ahosiṃ tāni pañcapaññāsa vassāni.
atk-s0508a2:4228_5: Yato middhaṃ samūhatanti yato paṭṭhāya mayā niddā pariccattā tāni pañcavīsativassāni.
atk-s0508a2:4228_6: “Therassa pañcapaññāsāya vassesu nesajjikassa sato ādito pañcavīsativassāni niddā nāhosi,
atk-s0508a2:4228_7: tato paraṃ sarīrakilamathena pacchimayāme niddā ahosī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0508a2:4229_0: “Nāhu assāsapassāsā” tiādikā tisso gāthā satthu parinibbānakāle bhikkhūhi “kiṃ bhagavā parinibbuto”ti puṭṭho parinibbānabhāvaṃ pavedento āha.
atk-s0508a2:4229_2: ṭhitacittassa tādinoti anulomapaṭilomato anekākāravokārā sabbā samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya sabbapacchā
atk-s0508a2:4229_3: catutthajjhāne ṭhitacittassa tādino buddhassa bhagavato assāsapassāsā nāhu nāhesunti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4229_4: Etena yasmā catutthajjhānaṃ samāpannassa kāyasaṅkhārā nirujjhanti.
atk-s0508a2:4229_6: tasmā catutthajjhānakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya assāsapassāsā nāhesunti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:4229_9: Santimārabbhāti anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha paṭicca sandhāya.
atk-s0508a2:4230_1: Vedanaṃ ajjhavāsayīti sato sampajāno hutvā māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ adhivāsesi,
atk-s0508a2:4230_2: na vedanānuvattī hutvā ito cito ca samparivatti.
atk-s0508a2:4230_4: vimokkho cetaso ahūti yathā telañca paṭicca,
atk-s0508a2:4230_5: vaṭṭiñca paṭicca pajjalanto pajjoto padīpo tesaṃ parikkhaye nibbāyati.
atk-s0508a2:4230_6: Nibbuto ca katthaci gantvā na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0508a2:4230_9: evaṃ kilesābhisaṅkhāre nissāya pavattamāno khandhasantāno tesaṃ parikkhaye nibbāyati,
atk-s0508a2:4230_10: nibbuto ca katthaci gantvā na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0508a2:4231_0: Eteti parinibbānakkhaṇe satthu santāne pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ attano paccakkhatāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4231_4: Tathā hi cittuppādakathāyampi phassapañcamakāva ādito vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:4231_5: Aññe dhammāti saha nissayena aññe cittacetasikā dhammā,
atk-s0508a2:4231_9: āsaṅkābhāvato pana te sandhāya “na bhavissantī”ti na vattabbameva.
atk-s0508a2:4231_10: “Itare pana sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ viya bhavissanti nu kho”ti siyā āsaṅkāti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ “nāññe dhammā bhavissantī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4232_3: devate devakāyasmiṃ devasamūhe upapajjanavasena puna āvāso āvasanaṃ idāni mayhaṃ natthīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4232_5: Sā kira devatā purimattabhāve therassa pādaparicārikā,
atk-s0508a2:4232_6: tasmā idāni theraṃ jiṇṇaṃ vuddhaṃ disvā purimasinehena āgantvā “tattha cittaṃ paṇidhehi,
atk-s0508a2:4232_7: yattha te vusitaṃ pure”ti devūpapattiṃ yāci.
atk-s0508a2:4232_8: Atha “dāni natthī”tiādinā thero tassā paṭivacanaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4233_0: Atha thero vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā attano ānubhāvaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ pakāsento “yassa muhuttenā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:4233_2: yassa khīṇāsavabhikkhuno muhuttamattena eva sahassadhā sahassappakāro tisahassimahāsahassipabhedo,
atk-s0508a2:4233_4: saṃvidito sammadeva vidito ñāto paccakkhaṃ kato,
atk-s0508a2:4233_5: evaṃ iddhiguṇe iddhisampadāya cutūpapāte ca vasībhāvappatto so bhikkhu upagatakāle devatā passati,
atk-s0508a2:4233_7: Therena kira jāliniyā devatāya paṭivacanadānavasena “natthi dānī”ti gāthāya vuttāya bhikkhū jāliniṃ apassantā
atk-s0508a2:4233_8: “kiṃ nu kho thero dhammālapanavasena kiñci ālapatī”ti cintesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4233_9: Tesaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā thero “yassa muhuttenā”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:4234_1: Ghāsahārakoti ghāsamattassa atthāya bhattiṃ katvā jīvanako.
atk-s0508a2:4234_4: pasādena abhimukho hutvā āhāradānaṃ adāsinti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:4234_7: Imāya gāthāya yāva carimattabhāvā uḷārasampattihetubhūtaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:4235_0: Ito sattāti ito manussalokato cavitvā devaloke dibbena ādhipaccena satta.
atk-s0508a2:4235_1: Tato sattāti tato devalokato cavitvā manussaloke cakkavattibhāvena satta.
atk-s0508a2:4235_4: Devaloke ṭhito tadāti tañca kho na imasmiṃyeva attabhāve,
atk-s0508a2:4235_5: api ca kho yadā ito anantarātīte attabhāve devaloke ṭhito,
atk-s0508a2:4236_0: Idāni attanā dibbacakkhuñāṇacutūpapātañāṇānaṃ adhigatākāraṃ dassento “pañcaṅgike”tiādinā dve gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4236_6: paccavekkhaṇanimittanti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatattā pañcaṅgiko samādhīti vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:4236_11: Dibbacakkhu visujjhi meti evaṃvidhe samādhimhi sampādite mayhaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ visujjhi,
atk-s0508a2:4237_0: Cutūpapātaṃ jānāmīti sattānaṃ cutiñca upapattiñca jānāmi,
atk-s0508a2:4237_1: jānanto ca “ime sattā amumhā lokamhā āgantvā idhūpapannā,
atk-s0508a2:4237_2: imamhā ca lokā gantvā amumhi loke upapajjissantī”ti sattānaṃ āgatiṃ gatiñca jānāmi,
atk-s0508a2:4237_3: jānanto eva ca nesaṃ itthabhāvaṃ manussabhāvaṃ tato aññathābhāvaṃ aññathātiracchānabhāvañca upapattito puretarameva jānāmi.
atk-s0508a2:4237_4: Tayidaṃ sabbampi pañcaṅgike samādhimhi sampādite evāti dassento āha “jhāne pañcaṅgike ṭhito”ti.
atk-s0508a2:4237_5: Tattha pañcaṅgike jhāne ṭhito patiṭṭhito hutvā evaṃ jānāmīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4238_0: Evaṃ vijjāttayaṃ dassetvā tappasaṅgena pubbe dassitampi tatiyavijjaṃ saha kiccanipphattiyā dassento “pariciṇṇo mayā satthā”tiādinā gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0508a2:4238_3: Heṭṭhato veḷugumbasminti tattha aññatarassa veḷugumbassa heṭṭhā.
atk-s0508a2:4241_0: Samaṇassa ahu cintātiādikā āyasmato pārāpariyattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:4241_2: Tā ca gāthā satthari dharante attano puthujjanakāle manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ niggaṇhanacintāya pakāsanavasena bhāsitā.
atk-s0508a2:4241_3: Imā pana aparabhāge satthari parinibbute attano ca parinibbāne upaṭṭhite tadā āyatiñca bhikkhūnaṃ uddhammapaṭipattiyā pakāsanavasena bhāsitā. Tattha –
atk-s0508a2:4245_3: satthari aggasāvakesu ekaccesu mahātheresu ca parinibbutesu atītasatthuke pāvacane subbacesu sikkhākāmesu bhikkhūsu dullabhesu,
atk-s0508a2:4245_4: dubbacesu micchāpaṭipattibahulesu bhikkhūsu ca jātesu supupphite mahante sālavane nisinnassa pavivittassa ekaggassa jhāyanasīlassa,
atk-s0508a2:4245_6: pārāpariyattherassa paṭipattiṃ nissāya cintā vīmaṃsā ahosīti itarā –
atk-s0508a2:4248_0: Iriyaṃ āsi bhikkhūnaṃ, aññathā dāni dissati.
atk-s0508a2:4253_0: “Paṇītaṃ yadi vā lūkhaṃ, appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ;
atk-s0508a2:4257_0: Na bāḷhaṃ ussukā āsuṃ, yathā te āsavakkhaye.
atk-s0508a2:4269_0: Nibbutā dāni te therā, parittā dāni tādisā.
atk-s0508a2:4290_0: Kathā vaḍḍhenti paṭibuddhā, yā kathā satthugarahitā.
atk-s0508a2:4299_0: Piṇḍapāte ca sampanne, ambe āmalakāni ca.
atk-s0508a2:4311_0: Dhammaṃ paresaṃ desenti, lābhato no ca atthato.
atk-s0508a2:4323_0: Satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāna, evaṃ gāme munī care.
atk-s0508a2:4326_0: Kiñcāpi pacchimo kālo, phuseyya amataṃ padaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4331_0: Tattha iriyaṃ āsi bhikkhūnanti purisuttame lokanāthamhi sammāsambuddhe tiṭṭhante dharante etarahi paṭipattibhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:4331_1: Aññathā aññena pakārena bhikkhūnaṃ iriyaṃ caritaṃ ahosi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattibhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:4331_2: Aññathā dāni dissatīti idāni pana tato aññathā bhikkhūnaṃ iriyaṃ dissati ayāthāvapaṭipattibhāvatoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:4332_0: Idāni satthari dharante yenākārena bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipatti ahosi,
atk-s0508a2:4332_4: yāvadeva hirīkopīnapaṭicchādanaṃ katvā cīvaraṃ paribhuñjiṃsu. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0508a2:4332_5: Santuṭṭhā itarītare yasmiṃ tasmiṃ hīne paṇīte vā yathāladdhe paccaye santosaṃ āpannā.
atk-s0508a2:4333_3: Bahuṃ yāpanatthaṃ abhuñjiṃsūti paṇītaṃ bahuṃ bhuñjantāpi yāpanamattameva āhāraṃ bhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4333_5: Nādhimucchitā na ajjhositā akkhabbhañjanaṃ viya sākaṭikā,
atk-s0508a2:4334_1: bhesajje atha paccayepi jīvitānaṃ pavattiyā parikkhārabhūte bhesajjasaṅkhāte paccaye gilānapaccaye.
atk-s0508a2:4334_2: Yathā teti yathā te purimakā bhikkhū āsavakkhaye ussukā yuttā āsuṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4334_3: tathā te rogābhibhūtāpi gilānapaccaye bāḷhaṃ ativiya ussukā nāhesunti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4335_1: Evaṃ catūhi gāthāhi catupaccayasantosaṃ bhāvanābhiratiñca dassentena tesaṃ ariyavaṃsapaṭipadā dassitā.
atk-s0508a2:4336_0: Nīcāti “mayaṃ paṃsukūlikā piṇḍapātikā”ti attukkaṃsanaparavambhanāni akatvā nīcavuttino,
atk-s0508a2:4336_4: Mudūti vattapaṭipattiyaṃ sakale ca brahmacariye mudū,
atk-s0508a2:4336_6: Mudūti vā abhākuṭikā uttānamukhā pupphitamukhena paṭisanthāravuttino,
atk-s0508a2:4336_12: na mukhena kharā vacīpāgabbhiyarahitāti vā attho.
atk-s0508a2:4337_1: Pāsādikanti pasādajanikaṃ paṭipattiṃ passantānaṃ suṇantānañca pasādāvahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4337_6: Siniddhā teladhārāvāti yathā anivattitā kusalajanābhisiñcitā savantī teladhārā avicchinnā siniddhā maṭṭhā dassanīyā pāsādikā hoti,
atk-s0508a2:4337_7: evaṃ tesaṃ ākappasampannānaṃ iriyāpatho acchiddo saṇho maṭṭho dassanīyo pāsādiko ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:4338_4: Te therāti te yathāvuttappakārā paṭipattiparāyaṇā therā idāni parinibbutāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4338_5: Parittā dāni tādisāti idāni pacchime kāle tādisā tathārūpā therā parittā appakā katipayā evāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0508a2:4339_0: Kusalānañca dhammānanti vivaṭṭassa upanissayabhūtānaṃ vimokkhasambhārānaṃ anavajjadhammānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4339_4: bahukārabhāvadassanatthaṃ panassā visuṃ gahaṇaṃ yathā puññañāṇasambhārāti.
atk-s0508a2:4339_5: Sabbākāravarūpetanti ādikalyāṇatādīhi sabbehi ākāravarehi pakāravisesehi upetaṃ yuttaṃ jinassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ lujjati vinassatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4340_1: kilesānañca yo utūti kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ lobhādīnañca kilesānaṃ yo utu yo kālo,
atk-s0508a2:4340_4: ye ca saddhammasesakāti ye pana evarūpe kāle kāyacittaupadhivivekatthāya upaṭṭhitā āraddhavīriyā,
atk-s0508a2:4340_7: suvisuddhasīlācārāpi samānā idāni ekacce bhikkhū iriyāpathasaṇṭhāpanaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4341_0: Te kilesā pavaḍḍhantāti ye bhagavato orasaputtehi ca tadā parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gamitā kilesā,
atk-s0508a2:4341_1: te etarahi laddhokāsā bhikkhūsu vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjantā.
atk-s0508a2:4341_2: Āvisanti bahuṃ jananti kalyāṇamittarahitaṃ ayonisomanasikārabahulaṃ andhabālajanaṃ abhibhavitvā avasaṃ karontā āvisanti santānaṃ anupavisanti.
atk-s0508a2:4341_3: Evaṃbhūtā ca te kīḷanti maññe bālehi,
atk-s0508a2:4341_5: yathā nāma keḷisīlā rakkhasā bhisakkarahite ummatte āvisitvā te anayabyasanaṃ āpādentā tehi kīḷanti,
atk-s0508a2:4341_6: evaṃ te kilesā sammāsambuddhabhisakkarahite andhabāle bhikkhū āvisitvā tesaṃ diṭṭhadhammikādibhedaṃ anatthaṃ uppādentā tehi saddhiṃ kīḷanti maññe,
atk-s0508a2:4342_2: Kilesavatthūsūti paṭhamaṃ uppannaṃ kilesā pacchā uppajjanakānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato kilesāva kilesavatthūni,
atk-s0508a2:4342_4: Sasaṅgāmeva ghositeti hiraññasuvaṇṇamaṇimuttādikaṃ dhanaṃ vippakiritvā “yaṃ yaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇādi yassa yassa hatthagataṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4342_5: taṃ taṃ tassa tasseva hotū”ti evaṃ kāmaghosanā sasaṅgāmaghosanā nāma.
atk-s0508a2:4342_7: kilesavatthūsu “yo yo kileso yaṃ yaṃ sattaṃ gaṇhāti abhibhavati,
atk-s0508a2:4342_8: so so tassa tassa hotū”ti kilesasenāpatinā mārena sasaṅgāme ghosite viya.
atk-s0508a2:4342_9: Tehi tehi kilesehi abhibhūtā te bālaputhujjanā tena tena ārammaṇabhāgena vidhāvitā vositāti.
atk-s0508a2:4343_0: Te evaṃ vidhāvitā kiṃ karontīti āha “pariccajitvā saddhammaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4343_3: paṭipattisaddhammaṃ chaḍḍetvā āmisakiñjakkhahetu aññamaññehi bhaṇḍare kalahaṃ karontīti.
atk-s0508a2:4343_8: vohāramattamevā”ti ca evamādīni diṭṭhigatāni micchāgāhe anventā anugacchantā idaṃ seyyo idameva seṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4344_2: Taṃ dadantassa gahaṭṭhassa ananulomikasaṃsaggavasena akiccāni pabbajitena akattabbāni kammāni nisevare karonti.
atk-s0508a2:4345_0: Udarāvadehakaṃ bhutvāti “ūnūdaro mitāhāro”ti vuttavacanaṃ acintetvā udarapūraṃ bhuñjitvā.
atk-s0508a2:4345_1: Sayantuttānaseyyakāti “dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti pāde pādaṃ accādhāya sato sampajāno”ti vuttavidhānaṃ ananussaritvā uttānaseyyakā sayanti.
atk-s0508a2:4345_2: Yā kathā satthugarahitāti rājakathāditiracchānakathaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0508a2:4346_0: Sabbakārukasippānīti sabbehi vessādīhi kārukehi kattabbāni bhattatālavaṇṭakaraṇādīni hatthasippāni.
atk-s0508a2:4346_2: Avūpasantā ajjhattanti kilesavūpasamābhāvato gadduhanamattampi samādhānābhāvato ca ajjhattaṃ avūpasantā,
atk-s0508a2:4346_5: Atiacchatīti tesaṃ ājīvakiccapasutatāya ekadesampi aphusanato visuṃyeva nisīdati,
atk-s0508a2:4347_0: Mattikanti pākatikaṃ vā pañcavaṇṇaṃ vā gihīnaṃ viniyogakkhamaṃ mattikaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4347_4: Ākaṅkhantā bahuttaranti bahuṃ piṇḍapātādiuttaruttaraṃ ākaṅkhantā “amhehi mattikādīsu dinnesu manussā
atk-s0508a2:4347_5: daḷhabhattikā hutvā bahuṃ uttaruttaraṃ catupaccayajātaṃ dassantī”ti adhippāyena gihīnaṃ upanāmentīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4348_8: Sabbattha gihīnaṃ upanāmenti ākaṅkhantā bahuttaranti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:4349_0: Bhesajjesu yathā vejjāti gihīnaṃ bhesajjappayogesu yathā vejjā,
atk-s0508a2:4349_2: Kiccākicce yathā gihīti gahaṭṭhānaṃ khuddake ceva mahante ca kicce kattabbe gihī viya.
atk-s0508a2:4349_3: Gaṇikāva vibhūsāyanti attano sarīrassa vibhūsane rūpūpajīviniyo viya.
atk-s0508a2:4349_4: Issare khattiyā yathāti issare issariyapavattane yathā khattiyā,
atk-s0508a2:4350_7: Bahūhi parikappehīti yathāvuttehi aññehi ca bahūhi micchājīvappakārehi.
atk-s0508a2:4352_5: No ca dhammatoti dhammanimittaṃ no ca upaṭṭhapenti.
atk-s0508a2:4352_6: Yo satthārā ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitāya parisāya saṅgaho anuññāto,
atk-s0508a2:4352_10: ‘dhammakathiko’ti evaṃ sambhāvento mahājano mayhaṃ lābhasakkāre upanayissatī”ti icchācāre ṭhatvā lābhanimittaṃ paresaṃ dhammaṃ desenti.
atk-s0508a2:4352_11: No ca atthatoti yo so vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā saddhammaṃ kathentena pattabbo attho,
atk-s0508a2:4353_4: Paralābhopajīvantāti sāsane lābhassa andhabālaputhujjanehi pare sīlādiguṇasampanne sekkhe uddissa uppannattā taṃ paralābhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4353_5: parato vā dāyakato laddhabbalābhaṃ upajīvantā bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū pāpajigucchāya abhāvato ahirikā samānā ca “mayaṃ paralābhaṃ bhuñjāma,
atk-s0508a2:4354_1: Tathāti yathā pubbe vuttā bandhanakārakādayo, tathā.
atk-s0508a2:4354_3: Muṇḍā saṅghāṭipārutāti kevalaṃ muṇḍitakesatāya muṇḍā pilotikakhaṇḍehi saṅghaṭitaṭṭhena “saṅghāṭī”ti laddhanāmena cīvarena pārutasarīrā.
atk-s0508a2:4354_6: “pesalo dhutavādo bahussuto”ti vā madhuravacanamanuyuttā “ariyo”ti ca kevalaṃ sambhāvanaṃ bahumānaṃyeva icchanti esanti,
atk-s0508a2:4355_0: Evanti “kusalānañca dhammānaṃ paññāya ca parikkhayā”ti vuttanayena.
atk-s0508a2:4355_2: nānappakārena vā saṃkilesadhamme payātuṃ pavattituṃ āraddhe.
atk-s0508a2:4355_3: Na dāni sukaraṃ tathāti idāni imasmiṃ dullabhakalyāṇamitte dullabhasappāyasaddhammassavane ca kāle yathā satthari dharante aphusitaṃ aphuṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4355_5: phusitaṃ vā hānabhāgiyaṃ ṭhitibhāgiyameva vā ahutvā yathā visesabhāgiyaṃ hoti,
atk-s0508a2:4356_0: Idāni attano parinibbānakālassa āsannattā saṃkhittena ovādena sabrahmacāriṃ ovadanto “yathā kaṇṭakaṭṭhānamhī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:4356_2: yathā puriso kenacideva payojanena kaṇṭakanicite padese anupāhano vicaranto “mā maṃ kaṇṭako vijjhī”ti satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāva vicarati,
atk-s0508a2:4356_3: evaṃ kilesakaṇṭakanicite gocaragāme payojanena caranto muni satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāna satisampajaññayutto
atk-s0508a2:4356_4: appamattova careyya kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahantoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0508a2:4357_1: tesaṃ vattamanussaranti purimake yoge bhāvanāya yuttatāya yogī āraddhavipassake saritvā tesaṃ vattaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4357_2: āgamānusārena sammāpaṭipattibhāvanāvidhiṃ anussaranto dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā yathāpaṭipajjanto.
atk-s0508a2:4357_3: Kiñcāpi pacchimo kāloti yadipāyaṃ atītasatthuko carimo kālo,
atk-s0508a2:4357_4: tathāpi yathādhammameva paṭipajjanto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpento phuseyya amataṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigaccheyya.
atk-s0508a2:4358_2: Ayañca osānagāthā saṅgītikārehi therassa parinibbānaṃ pakāsetuṃ vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0508a2:4363_0: Tiṃsanipāte pāsādike bahū disvātiādikā āyasmato phussattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:4363_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā devamanussesu
atk-s0508a2:4363_3: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekassa maṇḍalikarañño putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:4363_5: So viññutaṃ patto khattiyakumārehi sikkhitabbasippesu nipphattiṃ gato.
atk-s0508a2:4363_6: Upanissayasampannattā kāmesu alaggacitto aññatarassa mahātherassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a2:4363_7: pabbajitvā cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto jhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapādakaṃ vipassanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4363_9: Athekadivasaṃ paṇḍaragotto nāma eko tāpaso tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā nisinno sambahule bhikkhū sīlācārasampanne
atk-s0508a2:4363_10: susaṃvutindriye bhāvitakāye bhāvitacitte disvā pasannacitto “sādhu vatāyaṃ paṭipatti loke ciraṃ tiṭṭheyyā”ti
atk-s0508a2:4363_12: anāgatamaddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipatti bhavissatī”ti theraṃ pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:4366_0: Isi paṇḍarasagotto, apucchi phussasavhaya”nti. – gāthaṃ ādito ṭhapesuṃ;
atk-s0508a2:4367_5: Paṇḍarasagottoti paṇḍarassa nāma isino vaṃse jātattā tena samānagotto.
atk-s0508a2:4370_0: Anāgatamhi kālamhi, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:4372_0: Tattha kiṃ chandāti imasmiṃ sāsane anāgate bhikkhū kīdisacchandā kīdisādhimuttikā,
atk-s0508a2:4372_12: Taṃ meti taṃ anāgate bhikkhūnaṃ chandādhippāyākappabhedaṃ pucchito mayhaṃ akkhāhi kathehīti theraṃ ajjhesati.
atk-s0508a2:4372_13: Tassa thero tamatthaṃ ācikkhanto sakkaccasavane tāva niyojetuṃ –
atk-s0508a2:4376_4: ācikkhato pana mama vacanaṃ suṇāhi anāgatatthadīpanato saṃvegāvahato ca sakkaccaṃ upadhārehīti.
atk-s0508a2:4377_0: Atha thero anāgataṃsañāṇena bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnañca bhāviniṃ pavattiṃ yathābhūtaṃ disvā tassa ācikkhanto –
atk-s0508a2:4379_0: “Kodhanā upanāhī ca, makkhī thambhī saṭhā bahū;
atk-s0508a2:4401_0: Kuhā thaddhā lapā siṅgī, carissantyariyā viya.
atk-s0508a2:4415_0: “Ye ye alābhino lābhaṃ, na te pujjā bhavissare;
atk-s0508a2:4416_0: Supesalepi te dhīre, sevissanti na te tadā.
atk-s0508a2:4422_0: Paṭisaṅkhā ca kāsāve, bhikkhūnaṃ na bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:4442_0: “Uddhato unnaḷo bālo, sīlaṃ yassa na vijjati;
atk-s0508a2:4464_0: Bhāvethaṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ, phusantā amataṃ pada”nti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a2:4465_4: Tadā pana kalyāṇamittabahulatāya ovādakesu viññāpakesu sabrahmacārīsu bahūsu vijjamānesu kilesesu balavantesu
atk-s0508a2:4465_5: paṭisaṅkhānabahulatāya ca yebhuyyena bhikkhū akkodhanā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4465_9: Upanāhīti āghātavatthūsu āghātassa upanayhanasīlā upanāhasambhavato vā upanāhī.
atk-s0508a2:4465_15: tesaṃ vā udakapuñjaniyā viya udakassa makkho makkhanaṃ puñjanaṃ etesaṃ atthīti makkhī.
atk-s0508a2:4466_1: gambhīre tīragocarāti gambhīre durobhāse saddhamme aññāte eva “ñātoti,
atk-s0508a2:4466_3: tato eva tassa orabhāge pavattitāya orimatīragocarā.
atk-s0508a2:4466_13: sammāsambuddhena suṭṭhu aviparītaṃ ādikalyāṇādippakārena desitaṃ imaṃ āgamasaddhammaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4466_15: “āpattiṃ ‘anāpattī’ti garukāpattiṃ ‘lahukāpattī”’tiādinā duccaritasaṃkilesena asaddhammena saṇhasukhumaṃ rūpārūpadhammaṃ paṭikkhipissanti,
atk-s0508a2:4466_16: diṭṭhisaṃkilesena ubhayatrāpi taṇhāsaṃkilesena saṃkilesissanti malinaṃ karissanti.
atk-s0508a2:4466_22: abhidhammakathaṃ vedallakathaṃ kathentā kaṇhadhammaṃ okkamamānā na bujjhissantī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:4467_2: Atha vā guṇahīnāti vinayavārittādiguṇena hīnā dhammavinaye appakataññuno.
atk-s0508a2:4467_13: avinayañca ‘vinayo”’ti evaṃ attanā yathicchitamatthaṃ saṅghamajjhe patiṭṭhapentā balavanto bhavissanti.
atk-s0508a2:4468_5: Dubbalā te bhavissantīti parisāyaṃ alajjussannatāya balavirahitā te bhavissanti,
atk-s0508a2:4468_8: Te hi dhammena vattuṃ samatthāpi pāpajigucchatāya appakiccatāya ca kehici virodhaṃ akarontā attano vādaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4468_9: patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na vāyamantā diṭṭhāvikammaṃ vā adhiṭṭhānaṃ vā akatvā tuṇhī honti.
atk-s0508a2:4469_10: te ṭhapetvā avasesā pasujātī ajā nāma.
atk-s0508a2:4469_14: kappiyākappiyaṃ sāruppāsāruppaṃ ajānantā attano atthāya sādiyissanti sampaṭicchissanti.
atk-s0508a2:4470_3: tato eva sīlesu asamāhitā catupārisuddhisīlesu na samāhitacittā. Unnaḷāti,
atk-s0508a2:4470_6: Kalahābhiratā magāti sārambhabahulatāya karaṇuttariyapasutā kalahe eva abhiratā magasadisā migā viya
atk-s0508a2:4471_2: tādisaṃ cīvaraṃ nivāsetvā ceva pārupitvā ca vicaraṇakā.
atk-s0508a2:4471_5: Thaddhāti kodhena mānena ca thaddhamānasā kakkhaḷahadayā.
atk-s0508a2:4471_10: nippesikatāvasena ca paccayatthaṃ lapakāti vā attho.
atk-s0508a2:4471_12: Yaṃ siṅgaṃ siṅgāratā cāturatā cāturiyaṃ parikkhatatā pārikkhatiya”nti evaṃ vuttehi siṅgasadisehi pākaṭakilesehi samannāgatā,
atk-s0508a2:4471_15: Kuhakānañhi ariyānamiva ṭhitabhāvaṃ dassento ariyā viya vicarantīti āha.
atk-s0508a2:4472_0: Telasaṇṭhehīti sitthakatelena vā udakatelena vā osaṇṭhitehi.
atk-s0508a2:4473_3: arahantānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ciṇṇatāya arahaddhajaṃ jigucchissanti kāsāvaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a2:4473_6: Te hi setakaṃ sambhāventā “sabbena sabbaṃ setake gahite liṅgapariccāgo eva siyā”ti dantavaṇṇaṃ pārupanti.
atk-s0508a2:4475_0: Te teva anusikkhantāti ye ye micchājīvappayogena laddhalābhā,
atk-s0508a2:4475_1: te te eva puggale anusikkhantā bhamissanti.
atk-s0508a2:4475_2: Bhamissantīti sayampi te viya micchājīvena lābhaṃ uppādetuṃ rājakulādīni sevantā paribbhamissanti.
atk-s0508a2:4476_0: Ye ye alābhino lābhanti ye ye bhikkhū micchājīvaparivajjanena appapuññatāya ca lābhassa paccayassa na lābhino,
atk-s0508a2:4476_1: te pujjā pūjanīyā pāsaṃsā tadā anāgate kāle na bhavissanti.
atk-s0508a2:4476_2: Supesalepi te dhīreti dhitisampannatāya dhīre suṭṭhu pesalepi te bhikkhū na sevissanti,
atk-s0508a2:4476_3: tadā anāgate te lābhino lābhakāmāva bhikkhūti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4477_3: Garahantā sakaṃ dhajanti attano dhajabhūtaṃ kāsāvaṃ jigucchantā.
atk-s0508a2:4477_5: Titthiyānaṃ dhajaṃ kecīti keci sakyaputtiyabhāvaṃ paṭijānantā eva titthiyānaṃ setavatthikānaṃ dhajabhūtaṃ avadātakaṃ setavatthaṃ dhāressanti.
atk-s0508a2:4478_0: Agāravo ca kāsāveti arahaddhajabhūte kāsāve agāravo abahumānaṃ tadā anāgate tesaṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:4478_1: Paṭisaṅkhā ca kāsāveti “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevāmī”tiādinā nayena paccavekkhaṇamattampi kāsāvaparibhoge na bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:4479_0: Kāsāvaṃ dhārentena kāsāvaṃ bahumānena “duccaritato oramitabba”nti kāsāvassa garukātabbabhāve chaddantajātakamudāharanto
atk-s0508a2:4479_2: Tattha sallaviddhassāti puthunā savisena sallena viddhassa,
atk-s0508a2:4479_5: Mahāghorāti sarīrajīvitesu nirapekkhatāya bhimmā garutarā paṭisaṅkhā aññehi acintiyā cintāmattena pavattetuṃ asakkuṇeyyā chaddantamahānāgassaāsi, ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:4479_6: Chaddantanāgarājakāle hi bodhisatto soṇuttarena nāma nesādena paṭicchannaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā visapītena sallena
atk-s0508a2:4479_7: viddho mahatā dukkhena abhibhūto taṃ gahetvā paridahitaṃ kāsāvaṃ disvā “ayaṃ ariyaddhajena paṭicchanno,
atk-s0508a2:4479_8: na mayā hiṃsitabbo”ti tattha mettacittameva paccupaṭṭhapetvā uparidhammaṃ desesi. Yathāha –
atk-s0508a2:4484_1: Tattha surattaṃ arahaddhajanti soṇuttarena paridahitakāsāvaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0508a2:4485_0: Chaddantanāgarājena vuttagāthāsu anikkasāvoti rāgādīhi kasāvehi kasāvo,
atk-s0508a2:4485_3: Apeto damasaccenāti indriyadamena ceva paramatthasaccapakkhikena vacīsaccena ca apeto,
atk-s0508a2:4485_5: Na soti so evarūpo puggalo kāsāvaṃ paridahituṃ nārahati.
atk-s0508a2:4486_0: Vantakasāvassāti catūhi maggehi vantakasāvo chaḍḍitakasāvo pahīnakasāvo assa bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4486_3: Upetoti indriyadamena ceva vuttappakārena saccena ca upagato samannāgato.
atk-s0508a2:4486_4: Sa veti so evarūpo puggalo taṃ gandhakāsāvavatthaṃ ekantena arahatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4488_0: Vītarāgoti vigatacchandarāgo. Odātamanasaṅkappoti suvisuddhamanovitakko, anāvilasaṅkappo vā.
atk-s0508a2:4489_0: Kāsāvaṃ kiṃ karissatīti yassa sīlaṃ natthi,
atk-s0508a2:4489_1: tassa kāsāvaṃ kiṃ nāma payojanaṃ sādhessati,
atk-s0508a2:4490_1: Anādarāti satthari dhamme aññamaññañca ādararahitā agāravā.
atk-s0508a2:4490_2: Tādīnaṃ mettacittānanti mettābhāvanāya sampayuttahadaye teneva arahattādhigamena iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappatte uḷāraguṇe.
atk-s0508a2:4490_4: Niggaṇhissantīti “sīlādisampanne disvā te sambhāventā vipannasīle amhe na bahuṃ maññissantī”ti attani agāravabhayena yathā te ubbāḷhā pakkamissanti,
