atk-s0508a2:4492_0: Te tathā sikkhitā bālāti te andhabālā ācariyupajjhāyehi sikkhāpiyamānāpi anādaratāya asikkhitāti.
atk-s0508a2:4492_1: Nādiyissantupajjhāyeti upajjhāye ācariye ca ādaraṃ na karonti,
atk-s0508a2:4492_4: Khaḷuṅko viya sārathiṃ yathā khaḷuṅko duṭṭhasso assadamakaṃ nādiyati na tassa upadese tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0508a2:4492_5: evaṃ tepi upajjhāyācariye na bhāyanti na sārajjantīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:4493_4: Taṃyeva sarūpato dassento “patte kālamhi pacchime”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:4493_17: Aparisuddhasīlo hi ekadesena pariyattibāhusaccaṃ paggayha tiṭṭhati lābhādikāmatāya.
atk-s0508a2:4493_18: Yadā pana mātikāpariyosānā pariyatti sabbaso antaradhāyati,
atk-s0508a2:4493_20: tadā yathā tathā dhanaṃ saṃharitvā dānamukhena vissajjenti,
atk-s0508a2:4494_0: Evaṃ thero pacchime kāle uppajjanakaṃ mahābhayaṃ dassetvā puna tattha sannipatitabhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ dadanto “purā āgacchate”tiādinā tisso gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4494_1: Tattha purā āgacchate etanti etaṃ mayā tumhākaṃ vuttaṃ paṭipattiantarāyakaraṃ anāgataṃ mahābhayaṃ āgacchati purā,
atk-s0508a2:4495_1: Kāruṇikāti karuṇāya niyuttā paresaṃ dukkhāpanayanākāravuttiyā karuṇāya samannāgatā.
atk-s0508a2:4495_2: Āraddhavīriyāti akusalānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ upasampadāya paggahitavīriyā.
atk-s0508a2:4497_1: Kāyaduccarite vā vacīduccarite vā manoduccarite vā pañcasu vā kāmaguṇesu cittassa vossaggo vossaggānuppadānaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4498_2: Atthato hi appamādo nāma satiyā avippavāso,
atk-s0508a2:4498_7: tasmā pamādaṃ bhayato upaddavato disvā appamādañca khemato anupaddavato disvā appamādapaṭipattiyā sikhābhūtaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4498_8: sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgahaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ ariyamaggaṃ bhāvetha,
atk-s0508a2:4498_9: amataṃ nibbānaṃ phusantā sacchikarontā attano santāne uppādetha,
atk-s0508a2:4498_10: dassanamaggamatte aṭṭhatvā upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ uppādanavasena vaḍḍhetha,
atk-s0508a2:4499_0: Evaṃ thero sampattaparisaṃ ovadati. Imā eva cimassa therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthā ahesunti.
atk-s0508a2:4502_1: Tassa āyasmato mahāmoggallānattherassa ca vatthu evaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-s0508a2:4502_2: atīte ito satasahassakappādhike asaṅkhyeyyamatthake āyasmā sāriputto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:4502_7: Tesu saradamāṇavo pitu accayena kulasantakaṃ dhanaṃ paṭipajjitvā ekadivasaṃ rahogato cintesi –
atk-s0508a2:4502_9: tasmā mayā ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ upagantvā mokkhamaggo gavesitabbo”ti sahāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, samma,
atk-s0508a2:4502_11: kiṃ tvaṃ pabbajituṃ sakkhissasī”ti vatvā tena “na sakkhissāmī”ti vutte “hotu ahameva pabbajissāmī”ti
atk-s0508a2:4502_12: ratanakoṭṭhāgārāni vivarāpetvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā pabbatapādaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0508a2:4502_13: Tassa pabbajjaṃ anupabbajitā catusattatisahassamattā brāhmaṇaputtā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4502_14: So pañca abhiññāyo aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā tesampi jaṭilānaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0508a2:4502_15: Tepi sabbe pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4503_0: Tena samayena anomadassī nāma sammāsambuddho loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko satte saṃsāramahoghato
atk-s0508a2:4503_1: tāretvā ekadivasaṃ “saradatāpasassa ca antevāsikānañca saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti eko adutiyo pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0508a2:4503_2: ākāsena gantvā “buddhabhāvaṃ me jānātū”ti tāpasassa passantasseva ākāsato otaritvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4503_3: Saradatāpaso satthu sarīre mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni upadhāretvā “sabbaññubuddhoyevāya”nti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4504_0: Tasmiṃ samaye tassa antevāsikā catusattatisahassamattā jaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ojavantāni phalāphalāni
atk-s0508a2:4504_1: gahetvā āgatā satthāraṃ disvā sañjātappasādā attano ācariyassa ca satthu ca nisinnākāraṃ oloketvā, “ācariya,
atk-s0508a2:4504_2: mayaṃ pubbe ‘tumhehi mahantataro koci natthī’ti vicarāma,
atk-s0508a2:4504_3: ayaṃ pana puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4504_5: Sāsapena saddhiṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ sineruṃ samaṃ kātuṃ icchatha?
atk-s0508a2:4504_7: Atha te tāpasā ācariyassa vacanaṃ sutvā “yāva mahā vatāyaṃ purisuttamo”ti sabbeva pādesu nipatitvā satthāraṃ vandiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4505_4: Tumhehi yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ phalāphalaṃ ābhataṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4505_5: taṃ taṃ āharathā”ti āharāpetvā hatthe dhovitvā sayaṃ tathāgatassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:4505_6: Satthārā ca phalāphale paṭiggaṇhitamatte devatā dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4505_8: Tato bhojanakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā satthari nisinne sabbe antevāsike pakkositvā satthu santike sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ kathento nisīdi.
atk-s0508a2:4505_9: Satthā “dve aggasāvakā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ āgacchantū”ti cintesi.
atk-s0508a2:4505_10: Te satthu cittaṃ ñatvā tāvadeva satasahassakhīṇāsavaparivārā aggasāvakā āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4506_1: satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pupphāsanena pūjā kātabbā,
atk-s0508a2:4506_3: Te tāvadeva iddhiyā vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni āharitvā buddhassa yojanappamāṇaṃ pupphāsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4506_7: Evaṃ tesaṃ paññattesu āsanesu saradatāpaso tathāgatassa purato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito – “bhante,
atk-s0508a2:4506_8: mayhaṃ anuggahatthāya imaṃ pupphāsanaṃ abhiruhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:4506_10: Satthari nisinne dve aggasāvakā sesabhikkhū ca attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4506_12: Satthu samāpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā dve aggasāvakāpi sesabhikkhūpi nirodhaṃ samāpajjiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4506_13: Tāpaso sattāhaṃ nirantaraṃ pupphacchattaṃ dhārento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4506_14: Itare pana vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ paribhuñjitvā sesakāle añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4507_0: Satthā sattāhassa accayena nirodhato vuṭṭhāya aggasāvakaṃ nisabhattheraṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0508a2:4507_2: Thero sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvā tesaṃ pupphāsanānumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4507_3: Tassa desanāvasāne satthā dutiyaṃ aggasāvakaṃ anomattheraṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0508a2:4507_5: Sopi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sammasitvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0508a2:4507_7: Atha satthā buddhavisaye ṭhatvā dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0508a2:4507_8: Desanāvasāne ṭhapetvā saradatāpasaṃ avasesā sabbepi catusattatisahassamattā jaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4507_11: Te tāvadeva antarahitatāpasavesā aṭṭhaparikkhāravaradharā saṭṭhivassikattherā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4508_0: Saradatāpaso pana “aho vatāhampi ayaṃ nisabhatthero viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa aggasāvako bhaveyya”nti
atk-s0508a2:4508_1: satthu desanākāle uppannaparivitakkatāya aññavihito hutvā maggaphalāni paṭivijjhituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0508a2:4508_2: Atha tathāgataṃ vanditvā tathā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4508_4: “ito tvaṃ kappasatasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa aggasāvako
atk-s0508a2:4508_5: sāriputto nāma bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā dhammakathaṃ vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0508a2:4509_0: Saradatāpasopi sahāyakassa sirivaḍḍhassa santikaṃ gantvā, samma,
atk-s0508a2:4509_1: mayā anomadassissa bhagavato pādamūle anāgate uppajjanakassa gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4510_0: Sirivaḍḍho taṃ upadesaṃ sutvā attano nivesanadvāre aṭṭhakarīsamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ samatalaṃ kāretvā lājapañcamāni
atk-s0508a2:4510_1: pupphāni vikiritvā nīluppalacchadanaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā bhikkhūnampi āsanāni paññāpetvā
atk-s0508a2:4510_3: saradatāpasena satthāraṃ nimantāpetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā,
atk-s0508a2:4510_6: Satthāpissa anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā vuttanayena byākaritvā bhattānumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a2:4510_7: Sirivaḍḍho haṭṭhapahaṭṭho yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā dutiyacittavāre kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:4510_8: Saradatāpaso cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:4511_0: Tato paṭṭhāya nesaṃ ubhinnampi antarākammaṃ na kathitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4511_1: Amhākaṃ pana bhagavato uppattito puretarameva saradatāpaso rājagahassa avidūre upatissagāme rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a2:4511_2: Taṃdivasamevassa sahāyopi rājagahasseva avidūre kolitagāme moggaliyā brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a2:4511_3: Tāni kira dvepi kulāni yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā ābaddhapaṭibaddhasahāyakāneva.
atk-s0508a2:4511_5: Dasamāsaccayena jātānampi tesaṃ chasaṭṭhi dhātiyo upaṭṭhāpesuṃ,
atk-s0508a2:4511_6: nāmaggahaṇadivase rūpasāribrāhmaṇiyā puttassa upatissagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā upatissoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4511_7: Itarassa kolitagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā kolitoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4511_8: Te ubhopi mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhantā vuddhimanvāya sabbasippānaṃ pāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4512_0: Athekadivasaṃ te rājagahe giraggasamajjaṃ passantā mahājanaṃ sannipatitaṃ disvā ñāṇassa paripākagatattā
atk-s0508a2:4512_1: yoniso ummujjantā “sabbepime oraṃ vassasatānaṃ maccumukhe patissantī”ti saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā “amhehi
atk-s0508a2:4512_3: tañca pariyesantehi ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti nicchayaṃ katvā pañcahi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ sañcayassa paribbājakassa santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4512_4: Tesaṃ pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sañcayo lābhaggayasaggappatto ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:4512_5: Te katipāheneva sabbaṃ sañcayassa samayaṃ pariggaṇhitvā tattha sāraṃ adisvā tato nikkhamitvā tattha tattha
atk-s0508a2:4512_6: te te paṇḍitasammate samaṇabrāhmaṇe pañhaṃ pucchanti,
atk-s0508a2:4512_9: Evaṃ te mokkhaṃ pariyesantā katikaṃ akaṃsu –
atk-s0508a2:4513_0: Tena ca samayena amhākaṃ satthari paṭhamābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke anupubbena uruvelakassapādike
atk-s0508a2:4513_1: sahassajaṭile dametvā rājagahe viharante ekadivasaṃ upatisso paribbājako paribbājakārāmaṃ gacchanto āyasmantaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4513_2: assajittheraṃ rājagahe piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā “na mayā evarūpo ākappasampanno pabbajito diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0508a2:4513_3: santadhammena nāma ettha bhavitabba”nti sañjātappasādo pañhaṃ pucchituṃ āyasmantaṃ udikkhanto piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi.
atk-s0508a2:4513_4: Theropi laddhapiṇḍapāto paribhuñjituṃ patirūpaṃ okāsaṃ gato.
atk-s0508a2:4513_6: Bhattakiccapariyosāne cassa attano kuṇḍikāya udakaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4514_0: Evaṃ so ācariyavattaṃ katvā katabhattakiccena therena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “ko vā te satthā,
atk-s0508a2:4514_1: kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:4514_3: Puna tena “kiṃvādī panāyasmato satthā”ti puṭṭho “imassa sāsanassa gambhīrataṃ dassessāmī”ti attano navakabhāvaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4514_4: pavedetvā saṅkhepavasena cassa sāsanadhammaṃ kathento “ye dhammā hetuppabhavā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:4514_5: Paribbājako paṭhamapadadvayameva sutvā sahassanayasampanne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0508a2:4514_7: Gāthāpariyosāne pana sotāpanno hutvā upari visese appavattente “bhavissati ettha kāraṇa”nti sallakkhetvā theraṃ āha – “mā, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:4514_13: ahaṃ mayhaṃ sahāyakassa katapaṭiññaṃ mocetvā taṃ gahetvā āgamissāmī”ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0508a2:4514_14: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā theraṃ uyyojetvā paribbājakārāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4515_0: Kolitaparibbājako taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā “mukhavaṇṇo na aññadivasesu viya,
atk-s0508a2:4515_1: addhānena amataṃ adhigataṃ bhavissatī”ti tenevassa visesādhigamaṃ sambhāvetvā amatādhigamaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:4515_3: amataṃ adhigata”nti paṭijānitvā tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4515_9: tasmā sañcayassa santikaṃ gantvā satthu guṇe pakāsetvā tampi satthu santikaṃ netukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:4515_10: So lābhāsāpakato antevāsikabhāvaṃ anicchanto “na sakkomi cāṭi hutvā udakasiñcanaṃ hotu”nti paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0508a2:4515_11: Te anekehi kāraṇehi taṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkontā attano ovāde vattamānehi aḍḍhateyyasatehi antevāsikehi saddhiṃ veḷuvanaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:4515_12: Satthā te dūratova āgacchante disvā “etaṃ me sāvakayugaṃ bhavissati aggaṃ bhaddayuga”nti vatvā tesaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4515_13: parisāya cariyavasena dhammaṃ desetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:4516_0: Tesu āyasmā mahāmoggallāno pabbajitadivasato sattame divase magadharaṭṭhe kallavālagāme samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4516_1: karonto thinamiddhe okkante satthārā saṃvejito thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ suṇanto eva uparimaggattayaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4516_3: Āyasmā sāriputto pabbajitadivasato aḍḍhamāsaṃ atikkamitvā satthārā saddhiṃ rājagahe sūkarakhataleṇe viharanto
atk-s0508a2:4516_4: attano bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanāpariggahasuttante desiyamāne desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4516_5: pesetvā parassa vaḍḍhitaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjanto viya sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a2:4516_6: Iti dvinnampi aggasāvakānaṃ satthu samīpe eva sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4534_0: Aṅkolā bimbijālā ca, pupphitā mama assame.
atk-s0508a2:4546_0: Aññe opupphā padumā, pupphitā taḷāke tadā.
atk-s0508a2:4552_0: Saṃgulā maggurā ceva, vasanti taḷāke tadā.
atk-s0508a2:4554_0: Oguhā ajagarā ca, vasanti taḷāke tadā.
atk-s0508a2:4558_0: Dindibhā suvapotā ca, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4560_0: Pampakā jīvaṃjīvā ca, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4562_0: Mahākāḷā ca sakuṇā, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4563_0: “Pasadā ca varāhā ca, camarā gaṇḍakā bahū;
atk-s0508a2:4564_0: Rohiccā sukapotā ca, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4568_0: Cetā ca luddakā ceva, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4574_0: Kolā bhallātakā billā, phalāni dhārayanti te.
atk-s0508a2:4576_0: Jīvakā sutakā ceva, bahukā mama assame.
atk-s0508a2:4582_0: Sukate assame ramme, viharāmi ahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a2:4586_0: Sabbe maṃ brāhmaṇā ete, jātimanto yasassino.
atk-s0508a2:4598_0: Asaṃsaṭṭhā ca te dhīrā, mama sissā durāsadā.
atk-s0508a2:4600_0: Vītināmenti te rattiṃ, mama sissā durāsadā.
atk-s0508a2:4602_0: Mohanīye na muyhanti, mama sissā durāsadā.
atk-s0508a2:4609_0: “Purato pesenti khāriṃ, pacchato ca vajanti te;
atk-s0508a2:4628_0: Anattukkaṃsakā sabbe, na te vambhenti kassaci.
atk-s0508a2:4632_0: Kumbhaṇḍā dānavā garuḷā, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4640_0: Vasāmi assame tattha, jhāyī jhānarato ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4643_0: “Rattindivaṃ na jānāmi, arati me na vijjati;
atk-s0508a2:4644_0: Sake sisse ovadanto, bhiyyo hāsaṃ labhāmahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4662_0: Buddho nu kho na vā buddho, handa passāmi cakkhumaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4670_0: Taṃ ñāṇaṃ kittayissāmi, suṇātha mama bhāsato.
atk-s0508a2:4673_0: “Tuvaṃ satthā ca ketu ca, dhajo yūpo ca pāṇinaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:4674_0: Parāyaṇo patiṭṭhā ca, dīpo ca dvipaduttamo.
atk-s0508a2:4676_0: Na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave.
atk-s0508a2:4678_0: Na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā dharetave.
atk-s0508a2:4680_0: Na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave.
atk-s0508a2:4691_0: “Tāva accuggato neru, āyato vitthato ca so;
atk-s0508a2:4694_0: Na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave.
atk-s0508a2:4696_0: Ye keci udake pāṇā, antojālīkatā siyuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4713_0: “Ko nu kho bhagavā hetu, sitakammassa satthuno;
atk-s0508a2:4714_0: Na hi buddhā ahetūhi, sitaṃ pātukaronti te.
atk-s0508a2:4723_0: “Hatthī assā rathā pattī, senā ca caturaṅginī;
atk-s0508a2:4742_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:4764_0: Yassāhaṃ kāraṃ katvāna, sabbattha pāramiṃ gato.
atk-s0508a2:4765_0: “Aparimeyye kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dasseti me idha;
atk-s0508a2:4768_0: Vicinaṃ titthiye sabbe, esāhaṃ saṃsariṃ bhave.
atk-s0508a2:4776_0: Ye keci buddhimā sattā, sujjhanti jinasāsane.
atk-s0508a2:4780_0: Na tattha sāraṃ vindeyya, sārena rittako hi so.
atk-s0508a2:4786_0: Brāhmaṇo sañcayo nāma, tassa mūle vasāmahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4796_0: So me puṭṭho kathessati, paṭipucchāmahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0508a2:4800_0: Kathaṃ gottosi tvaṃ vīra, kassa sissosi mārisa.
atk-s0508a2:4802_0: Buddho loke samuppanno, tassa sissomhi āvuso.
atk-s0508a2:4804_0: Buddhassa sāsanaṃ dhammaṃ, sādhu me kathayassu bho.
atk-s0508a2:4805_0: “So me puṭṭho kathī sabbaṃ, gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ padaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:4807_0: “Ye dhammā hetuppabhavā, tesaṃ hetuṃ tathāgato āha;
atk-s0508a2:4816_0: So me attho anuppatto, kālo me nappamajjituṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4842_0: Paññāya sadiso natthi, tava puttassa cakkhuma.
atk-s0508a2:4844_0: Uttame damathe dantā, parivārenti taṃ sadā.
atk-s0508a2:4854_0: Anāgāmī ca arahā, parivārenti taṃ sadā.
atk-s0508a2:4856_0: Sāvakā te bahū sabbe, parivārenti taṃ sadā.
atk-s0508a2:4860_0: Paññāya pāramiṃ pattā, parivārenti taṃ sadā.
atk-s0508a2:4868_0: Sāsane te patiṭṭhāya, labhanti amataṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4870_0: Gaṅgā ca yamunā ceva, sarabhū ca atho mahī.
atk-s0508a2:4878_0: Ete sabbe atikkamma, jalasi sabbadā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4880_0: Sabbā velaṃva phusanti, sañcuṇṇā vikiranti tā.
atk-s0508a2:4882_0: Dhammaṃ vāditukāmā te, nātivattanti taṃ muniṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4890_0: Na so limpati toyena, parisuddho hi kesarī.
atk-s0508a2:4894_0: Nātikkamanti taṃ māsaṃ, samayo pupphanāya so.
atk-s0508a2:4904_0: Tevijjā chaḷabhiññā ca, iddhiyā pāramiṃ gatā.
atk-s0508a2:4910_0: Tathā hi jātimā eso, pasū tāseti sabbadā.
atk-s0508a2:4914_0: Kākā senāva vibbhantā, migaraññā yathā migā.
atk-s0508a2:4917_0: “Na hevaṃ tvaṃ mahāvīra, dhammaṃ desesi pāṇinaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:4924_0: Ekaṃ pañhaṃ kathentova, vimatiṃ chindasi pāṇinaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4929_0: “Yathā sakena thāmena, kittito hi mayā jino;
atk-s0508a2:4931_0: “Sace hi koci devo vā, manusso vā susikkhito;
atk-s0508a2:4937_0: “Aparimeyye kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a2:4939_0: “Yo koci manujo bhāraṃ, dhāreyya matthake sadā;
atk-s0508a2:4940_0: Bhārena dukkhito assa, bhārehi bharito tathā.
atk-s0508a2:4943_0: “Oropito ca me bhāro, bhavā ugghāṭitā mayā;
atk-s0508a2:4946_0: Ahaṃ aggomhi paññāya, sadiso me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:4950_0: Kathesi sāsanaṃ mayhaṃ, nirodho sayanaṃ mama.
atk-s0508a2:4954_0: Lokanāthaṃ ṭhapetvāna, sadiso me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:4961_0: “Yadi rūpinī bhaveyya, paññā me vasumatīpi na sameyya;
atk-s0508a2:4970_0: Appicchā hotha santuṭṭhā, jhāyī jhānaratā sadā.
atk-s0508a2:4972_0: So me ācariyo dhīro, assaji nāma sāvako.
atk-s0508a2:4975_0: “Yo me ācariyo āsi, assaji nāma sāvako;
atk-s0508a2:4980_0: Aparabhāge pana satthā jetavanamahāvihāre ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno attano sāvake tena tena guṇavisesena etadagge ṭhapento –
atk-s0508a2:4980_3: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti theraṃ mahāpaññabhāvena etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:4980_4: So evaṃ sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ patvā dhammasenāpatiṭṭhāne patiṭṭhahitvā sattahitaṃ karonto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0508a2:4983_0: Ajjhattarato samāhitatto, eko santusito tamāhu bhikkhuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:4985_0: “Allaṃ sukkhaṃ vā bhuñjanto, na bāḷhaṃ suhito siyā;
atk-s0508a2:4998_0: Ubhayantarena nāhosi, kena lokasmi kiṃ siyā.
atk-s0508a2:5001_0: Appassuto anādaro, kena lokasmi kiṃ siyā.
atk-s0508a2:5012_0: “Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
atk-s0508a2:5020_0: Tādisaṃ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
atk-s0508a2:5023_0: Satañhi so piyo hoti, asataṃ hoti appiyo.
atk-s0508a2:5027_0: Taṃ me amoghaṃ savanaṃ, vimuttomhi anāsavo.
atk-s0508a2:5040_0: Evaṃ mohakkhayā bhikkhu, pabbatova na vedhati.
atk-s0508a2:5051_0: “Ubhayena midaṃ maraṇameva, nāmaraṇaṃ pacchā vā pure vā;
atk-s0508a2:5052_0: Paṭipajjatha mā vinassatha, khaṇo vo mā upaccagā.
atk-s0508a2:5055_0: Evaṃ gopetha attānaṃ, khaṇo vo mā upaccagā;
atk-s0508a2:5067_0: “Na vissase ekatiyesu evaṃ, agārisu pabbajitesu cāpi;
atk-s0508a2:5068_0: Sādhūpi hutvāna asādhu honti, asādhu hutvā puna sādhu honti.
atk-s0508a2:5092_1: Imā hi kāci gāthā therena bhāsitā,
atk-s0508a2:5092_3: sabbā pacchā attano cariyapavedanavasena therena bhāsitattā therasseva gāthā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5093_9: Yatasaṅkappajjhāyīti sabbaso micchāsaṅkappaṃ pahāya nekkhammasaṅkappādivasena saṃyatasaṅkappo hutvā ārammaṇūpanijjhānena
atk-s0508a2:5093_11: Appamattoti tasmiṃyeva yathācāribhāve yatasaṅkappo hutvā jhāyanena ca pamādarahito sabbattha suppatiṭṭhitasatisampajañño.
atk-s0508a2:5093_17: Santusitoti paccayasantosena ca bhāvanārāmasantosena ca sammadeva tusito tuṭṭho.
atk-s0508a2:5093_18: Bhāvanāya hi uparūpari visesaṃ āvahantiyā uḷāraṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0508a2:5093_20: Tamāhu bhikkhunti taṃ evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ sikkhattayapāripūriyā bhayaṃ ikkhanatāya bhinnakilesatāya ca bhikkhūti vadanti.
atk-s0508a2:5094_0: Idāni yathāvuttasantosadvaye paccayasantosaṃ tāva dassento “allaṃ sukkhaṃ vā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:5094_7: Kathaṃ pana siyāti āha “ūnūdaro mitāhāro”ti paṇītaṃ lūkhaṃ vāpi bhojanaṃ bhuñjanto bhikkhu yāvadatthaṃ abhuñjitvā ūnūdaro sallahukudaro,
atk-s0508a2:5094_8: tato eva mitāhāro parimitabhojano aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ āharanto tattha mattaññutāya paccavekkhaṇasatiyā ca sato hutvā paribbaje vihareyya.
atk-s0508a2:5095_0: Yathā pana ūnūdaro mitāhāro ca nāma hoti,
atk-s0508a2:5095_2: Tattha abhutvāti cattāro vā pañca vā ālope kabaḷe abhuñjitvā tattakassa āhārassa okāsaṃ ṭhapetvā pānīyaṃ piveyya.
atk-s0508a2:5095_4: Nibbānañhi pesitacittassa bhikkhuno phāsuvihārāya jhānādīnaṃ adhigamayogyatāya sukhavihārāya alaṃ pariyattanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5095_5: Iminā kucchiparihāriyaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vadanto piṇḍapāte itarītarasantosaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:5095_7: so catupañcālopamattenāpi āhārena sarīraṃ yāpetuṃ samatthassa ativiya thirapakatikassa puggalassa vasena vutto siyā,
atk-s0508a2:5095_8: uttaragāthāhipi saṃsandati eva appakasseva cīvarassa senāsanassa ca vakkhamānattā.
atk-s0508a2:5096_0: Kappiyanti yaṃ kappiyakappiyānulomesu khomādīsu aññataranti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5096_1: Tañce chādetīti kappiyaṃ cīvaraṃ samānaṃ chādetabbaṃ ṭhānaṃ chādeti ce,
atk-s0508a2:5096_2: satthārā anuññātajātiyaṃ santaṃ heṭṭhimantena anuññātapamāṇayuttaṃ ce hotīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5096_3: Idamatthikanti idaṃ payojanatthaṃ satthārā vuttapayojanatthaṃ yāvadeva sītādipaṭighātanatthañceva hirīkopīnapaṭicchādanatthañcāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5096_4: Etena kāyaparihāriyaṃ cīvaraṃ tattha itarītarasantosañca vadati.
atk-s0508a2:5097_0: Pallaṅkena nisinnassāti pallaṅkaṃ vuccati samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5097_3: Jaṇṇuke nābhivassatīti yassaṃ kuṭiyaṃ tathā nisinnassa deve vassante jaṇṇukadvayaṃ vassodakena na temiyati,
atk-s0508a2:5097_5: sakkā hi tattha nisīditvā atthakāmarūpena kulaputtena sadatthaṃ nipphādetuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5098_0: Evaṃ thero imāhi catūhi gāthāhi ye te bhikkhū mahicchā asantuṭṭhā,
atk-s0508a2:5098_1: tesaṃ paramukkaṃsagataṃ sallekhaovādaṃ pakāsetvā idāni vedanāmukhena bhāvanārāmasantosaṃ dassento “yo sukha”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:5098_5: vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya yathābhūtaṃ yo apassīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5098_6: Sukhavedanā hi paribhogakāle assādiyamānāpi visamissaṃ viya bhojanaṃ vipariṇāmakāle dukkhāyeva hoti.
atk-s0508a2:5098_8: Dukkhamaddakkhi sallatoti dukkhavedanaṃ yo sallanti passi.
atk-s0508a2:5098_9: Dukkhavedanā hi yathā sallaṃ sarīraṃ anupavisantampi anupavisitvā ṭhitampi uddhariyamānampi pīḷanameva janeti,
atk-s0508a2:5098_12: tena ca “yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti vacanato vedanādvaye attattaniyagāhaṃ viniveṭheti.
atk-s0508a2:5098_16: Kena lokasmi kiṃ siyāti evaṃ vedanāmukhena pañcapi upādānakkhandhe parijānitvā tappaṭibaddhaṃ sakalakilesajālaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5098_17: samucchinditvā ṭhito kena nāma kilesena lokasmiṃ baddho,
atk-s0508a2:5099_0: Idāni micchāpaṭipanne puggale garahanto sammāpaṭipanne pasaṃsanto “mā me”tiādikā catasso gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5099_1: Tattha mā me kadāci pāpicchoti yo asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya pāpiccho,
atk-s0508a2:5099_6: tādiso atihīnapuggalo mama santike kadācipi mā hotu. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a2:5099_7: Kena lokasmi kiṃ siyāti lokasmiṃ sattanikāye tassa tādisassa puggalassa kena ovādena kiṃ bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5100_0: Bahussuto cāti yo puggalo sīlādipaṭisaṃyuttassa suttageyyādibhedassa bahuno sutassa sambhavena bahussuto,
atk-s0508a2:5100_1: dhammojapaññāya pārihāriyapaññāya paṭivedhapaññāya ca vasena medhāvī,
atk-s0508a2:5101_0: Yo papañcamanuyuttoti yo pana puggalo kammārāmatādivasena rūpābhisaṅgādivasena ca pavattiyā papañcanaṭṭhena taṇhādibhedaṃ papañcaṃ anuyutto,
atk-s0508a2:5102_0: Yo ca papañcaṃ hitvānāti yo pana puggalo taṇhāpapañcaṃ pahāya tadabhāvato nippapañcassa nibbānassa pathe
atk-s0508a2:5102_2: so nibbānaṃ ārādhayi sādhesi adhigacchīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5103_0: Athekadivasaṃ thero attano kaniṭṭhabhātikassa revatattherassa kaṇṭakanicitakhadirarukkhasañchanne nirudakakantāre
atk-s0508a2:5103_1: vāsaṃ disvā taṃ pasaṃsanto “gāme vā”tiādikā dve gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5103_2: Tattha gāme vāti kiñcāpi arahanto gāmante kāyavivekaṃ na labhanti,
atk-s0508a2:5103_4: Tesañhi dibbapaṭibhāgānipi ārammaṇāni cittaṃ cāletuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0508a2:5103_5: tasmā gāme vā hotu araññādīsu aññataraṃ vā,
atk-s0508a2:5103_7: taṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakanti so bhūmippadeso ramaṇīyo evāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5104_0: Araññānīti supupphitatarusaṇḍamaṇḍitāni vimalasalilāsayasampannāni araññāni ramaṇīyānīti sambandho.
atk-s0508a2:5104_1: Yatthāti yesu araññesu vikasitesu viya ramamānesu kāmapakkhiko kāmagavesako jano na ramati.
atk-s0508a2:5104_2: Vītarāgāti vigatarāgā pana khīṇāsavā bhamaramadhukarā viya padumavanesu tathārūpesu araññesu ramissantīti.
atk-s0508a2:5104_3: Na te kāmagavesinoti yasmā te vītarāgā kāmagavesino na hontīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5105_0: Puna thero rādhaṃ nāma duggatabrāhmaṇaṃ anukampāya pabbājetvā,
atk-s0508a2:5105_1: upasampādetvā tameva pacchāsamaṇaṃ katvā vicaranto ekadivasaṃ tassa ca subbacabhāvena tussitvā ovādaṃ dento “nidhīnaṃvā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:5105_2: Tattha nidhīnaṃvāti tattha tattha nidahitvā ṭhapitānaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇādipūrānaṃ nidhikumbhīnaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5105_3: Pavattāranti kicchajīvike duggatamanusse anukampaṃ katvā “ehi te sukhena jīvituṃ upāyaṃ dassessāmī”ti
atk-s0508a2:5105_4: nidhiṭṭhānaṃ netvā hatthaṃ pasāretvā “imaṃ gahetvā sukhaṃ jīvāhī”ti ācikkhitāraṃ viya.
atk-s0508a2:5105_6: “iminā naṃ asāruppena vā khalitena vā saṅghamajjhe niggaṇhissāmī”ti randhagavesako ca,
atk-s0508a2:5105_7: aññātaṃ ñāpetukāmo ñātaṃ assādento sīlādivuddhikāmatāya taṃ taṃ vajjaṃ olokento ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhito cāti,
atk-s0508a2:5105_9: Yathā hi duggatamanusso “imaṃ nidhiṃ gaṇhāhī”ti niggayhamānopi nidhidassane kopaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0508a2:5105_11: evaṃ evarūpesu puggalesu asāruppaṃ vā khalitaṃ vā disvā ācikkhante kopo na kātabbo,
atk-s0508a2:5105_14: Niggayhavādinti yo vajjaṃ disvā ayaṃ me saddhivihāriko,
atk-s0508a2:5105_16: upakārakoti acintetvā vajjānurūpaṃ tajjento paṇāmento daṇḍakammaṃ karonto sikkhāpeti,
atk-s0508a2:5105_25: Tādisañhi ācariyaṃ bhajamānassa antevāsikassa seyyo hoti,
atk-s0508a2:5106_0: Athekadā assajipunabbasukehi kīṭāgirismiṃ āvāse dūsite satthārā āṇatto attano parisāya mahāmoggallānena
atk-s0508a2:5106_1: ca saddhiṃ tattha gato dhammasenāpati assajipunabbasukesu ovādaṃ anādiyantesu imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:5106_4: Atha vā uppanne vatthusmiṃ vadanto ovadati nāma,
atk-s0508a2:5106_5: anuppanne “ayasopi te siyā”tiādiṃ anāgataṃ uddissa vadanto anusāsati nāma.
atk-s0508a2:5106_8: sāsanaṃ vā pesetvā vadanto anusāsati nāma.
atk-s0508a2:5106_11: Asabbhā cāti akusalā dhammā ca nivāraye,
atk-s0508a2:5106_13: Satañhi soti evarūpo puggalo sādhūnaṃ piyo hoti.
atk-s0508a2:5106_14: Ye pana asantā asappurisā vitiṇṇaparalokā āmisacakkhukā jīvikatthāya pabbajitā,
atk-s0508a2:5106_15: tesaṃ so ovādako anusāsako “na tvaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyo,
atk-s0508a2:5106_17: kasmā amhe vadasī”ti evaṃ mukhasattīhi vijjhantānaṃ appiyo hotīti.
atk-s0508a2:5107_1: so eva upanissayasampanno”ti bhikkhūsu kathāya samuṭṭhitāya “nayidameta”nti dassento “aññassā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:5107_2: Tattha aññassāti attano bhāgineyyaṃ dīghanakhaparibbājakaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0508a2:5107_3: Tassa hi satthārā vedanāpariggahasutte desiyamāne ayaṃ mahāthero bhāvanāmagge adhigantvā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto.
atk-s0508a2:5107_4: Sotamodhesimatthikoti satthāraṃ bījayamāno ṭhito atthiko hutvā sussūsanto sotaṃ odahiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5107_5: Taṃ me amoghaṃ savananti taṃ tathā sutaṃ savanaṃ mayhaṃ amoghaṃ avañjhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0508a2:5108_0: Tattha neva pubbenivāsāyāti attano paresañca pubbenivāsajānanañāṇatthāya,
atk-s0508a2:5108_2: Parikammakaraṇavasena tadatthaṃ cittapaṇidhānamattampi nevatthi neva ahosīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5108_6: sattānaṃ cutiyā upapattiyā ca jānanañāṇāya cutūpapātañāṇatthāya.
atk-s0508a2:5108_8: Paṇidhī me na vijjatīti imesaṃ abhiññāvisesānaṃ atthāya parikammavasena cittassa paṇidhi cittābhinīhāro me natthi nāhosīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5108_9: Sabbaññuguṇā viya hi buddhānaṃ aggamaggādhigameneva sāvakānaṃ sabbe sāvakaguṇā hatthagatā honti,
atk-s0508a2:5108_10: na tesaṃ adhigamāya visuṃ parikammakaraṇakiccaṃ atthīti.
atk-s0508a2:5109_0: Rukkhamūlantiādikā tisso gāthā kapotakandarāyaṃ viharantassa yakkhena pahatakāle samāpattibalena attano nibbikāratādīpanavasena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:5109_4: Paññāya uttamo theroti thero hutvā paññāya uttamo,
atk-s0508a2:5110_0: Upeto hoti tāvadeti yadā yakkhena sīse pahato,
atk-s0508a2:5110_1: tāvadeva avitakkaṃ catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpattiṃ samāpanno ariyena tuṇhībhāvena upeto samannāgato ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:5111_0: Pabbatova na vedhatīti mohakkhayā bhinnasabbakileso bhikkhu.
atk-s0508a2:5111_1: So selamayapabbato viya acalo suppatiṭṭhito iṭṭhādinā kenaci na vedhati,
atk-s0508a2:5112_0: Athekadivasaṃ therassa asatiyā nivāsanakaṇṇe olambante aññataro sāmaṇero, “bhante,
atk-s0508a2:5112_2: Taṃ sutvā “bhaddaṃ tayā suṭṭhu vutta”nti sirasā viya sampaṭicchanto tāvadeva thokaṃ apakkamitvā parimaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5113_0: Puna maraṇe jīvite ca attano samacittataṃ dassento “nābhinandāmī”tiādinā dve gāthā vatvā paresaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5113_9: Kesu ubhosu kālesūti āha “pacchā vā pure vā”ti majjhimavayassa pacchā vā jarājiṇṇakāle pure vā daharakāle maraṇameva maraṇaṃ ekantikameva.
atk-s0508a2:5113_10: Tasmā paṭipajjatha sammā paṭipattiṃ pūretha vippaṭipajjitvā mā vinassatha apāyesu mahādukkhaṃ mānubhavatha.
atk-s0508a2:5113_11: Khaṇo vo mā upaccagāti aṭṭhahi akkhaṇehi vivajjito ayaṃ navamo khaṇo mā tumhe atikkamīti attho.

atk-s0508a2:5154_3: ayaṃ mahāthero sekhova samāno satthari parinibbute heṭṭhā vuttanayena bhikkhūhi samuttejito devatāya
atk-s0508a2:5154_4: ca saṃvejito “sveyeva ca dāni dhammasaṅgīti kātabbā,
atk-s0508a2:5154_6: yvāyaṃ sekho sakaraṇīyo hutvā asekhehi therehi saddhiṃ dhammaṃ saṅgāyituṃ sannipātaṃ gantu”nti sañjātussāho
atk-s0508a2:5154_7: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā bahudevarattiṃ vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto caṅkame vīriyasamataṃ alabhitvā vihāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5154_8: pavisitvā sayane nisīditvā sayitukāmo kāyaṃ āvaṭṭesi.
atk-s0508a2:5154_9: Appattañca sīsaṃ bimbohanaṃ pādā ca bhūmito muttamattā,
atk-s0508a2:5154_10: etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:5164_0: Taṃ kathaṃ ṭhapayitvāna, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a2:5174_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5184_0: Sabbe te buddhanāgassa, na hontupaṇidhimhi te.
atk-s0508a2:5191_0: “Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti.

atk-s0508a2:5192_1: attano paṭipattidīpanādivasena ca bhāsitagāthā ekajjhaṃ katvā anukkameva khuddakanikāyasaṅgāyanakāle
atk-s0508a2:5194_0: “Pisuṇena ca kodhanena ca, maccharinā ca vibhūtanandinā;
atk-s0508a2:5195_0: Sakhitaṃ na kareyya paṇḍito, pāpo kāpurisena saṅgamo.
atk-s0508a2:5197_0: “Saddhena ca pesalena ca, paññavatā bahussutena ca;
atk-s0508a2:5198_0: Sakhitaṃ kareyya paṇḍito, bhaddo sappurisena saṅgamo.
atk-s0508a2:5201_0: Āturaṃ bahusaṅkappaṃ, yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhiti.
atk-s0508a2:5207_0: Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
atk-s0508a2:5210_0: Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.

atk-s0508a2:5232_0: Maṃsāni tassa vaḍḍhanti, paññā tassa na vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0508a2:5238_0: Taṃ mūlaṃ brahmacariyassa, tasmā dhammadharo siyā.
atk-s0508a2:5253_0: Dhammaṃ anussaraṃ bhikkhu, saddhammā na parihāyati.

atk-s0508a2:5262_0: Natthi etādisaṃ mittaṃ, yathā kāyagatā sati.
atk-s0508a2:5264_0: “Ye purāṇā atītā te, navehi na sameti me;
atk-s0508a2:5268_0: Mā vārayittha sotāro, passantu samayo mamaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5271_0: Karoti satthā okāsaṃ, na nivāreti cakkhumā.
atk-s0508a2:5292_0: Satthu ca parinibbānaṃ, yo amhaṃ anukampako.
atk-s0508a2:5307_0: Ohito garuko bhāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. –
atk-s0508a2:5309_0: Tattha pisuṇena cāti ādito dve gāthā chabbaggiye bhikkhū devadattapakkhiyehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃsaggaṃ karonte disvā tesaṃ ovādadānavasena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:5309_2: Tāya hi yutto puggalo “pisuṇo”ti vutto yathā nīlaguṇayutto paṭo nīloti.
atk-s0508a2:5309_5: Vibhūtanandināti sattānaṃ vibhūtaṃ vibhavanaṃ vināsaṃ icchantena,
atk-s0508a2:5309_9: Te hi pañcavatthudīpanāya bahū jane sammāpaṭipanne bhindantā satthari bahiddhatāya thaddhamacchariyādimacchariyapakatā
atk-s0508a2:5309_13: Pāpo kāpurisena saṅgamo kāpurisena pāpapuggalena samāgamo nihīno lāmako.
atk-s0508a2:5310_5: Paññavatāti udayatthagāminiyā nibbedhikāya paññāya vasena paññāsampannena.
atk-s0508a2:5310_7: Bhaddoti tena tādisena sādhunā saṅgamo bhaddo sundaro kalyāṇo diṭṭhadhammikādibhedaṃ atthaṃ āvahatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:5311_0: Passa cittakatantiādikā satta gāthā attano rūpasampattiṃ disvā kāmasaññaṃ uppādentiyā uttarāya nāma upāsikāya kāyavicchandajananatthaṃ bhāsitā.
atk-s0508a2:5312_0: Bahussuto cittakathītiādikā dve gāthā therena arahattaṃ patvā udānavasena bhāsitā.
atk-s0508a2:5312_3: Thero hi bahudeva rattiṃ caṅkamena vītināmetvā sarīraṃ utuṃ gāhāpetuṃ ovarakaṃ pavisitvā sayituṃ mañcake nisinno pādā ca bhūmito muttā,
atk-s0508a2:5313_3: sabbaso kilesapariḷāhassa vūpasantattā sunibbuto sītibhūtoti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5314_0: Yasmiṃ patiṭṭhitā dhammāti theraṃ uddissa khīṇāsavamahābrahmunā bhāsitā gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:5314_1: Upaṭṭhitāya hi dhammasaṅgītiyā theraṃ uddissa yehi bhikkhūhi “eko bhikkhu vissagandhaṃ vāyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5314_2: Atha thero adhigate arahatte sattapaṇṇiguhādvāraṃ saṅghassa sāmaggīdānatthaṃ āgato,
atk-s0508a2:5314_4: Te bhikkhū lajjāpento “yasmiṃ patiṭṭhitā dhammā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:5314_6: buddhassa bhagavato dhammā teneva adhigatā paveditā ca paṭivedhapariyattidhammā.
atk-s0508a2:5314_8: soyaṃ gottato gotamo dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko saupādisesanibbānassa adhigatattā idāni anupādisesanibbānagamane magge patiṭṭhahi,
atk-s0508a2:5315_0: Athekadivasaṃ gopakamoggallāno nāma brāhmaṇo theraṃ pucchi –
atk-s0508a2:5315_6: buddhato gaṇhinti sammāsambuddhato uggaṇhiṃ dvisahassādhikāni asītidhammakkhandhasahassāni satthu santikā adhigaṇhinti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5315_7: Dve sahassāni bhikkhutoti dve dhammakkhandhasahassāni bhikkhuto gaṇhiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5315_10: Ye me dhammā pavattinoti ye yathāvuttaparimāṇā dhammakkhandhā mayhaṃ paguṇā vācuggatā jivhagge parivattantīti.
atk-s0508a2:5316_0: Athekadā thero sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanādhurepi ganthadhurepi ananuyuttaṃ ekaṃ puggalaṃ disvā bāhusaccābhāve
atk-s0508a2:5316_2: Tattha appassutāyanti ekassa dvinnaṃ vā paṇṇāsānaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5316_3: atha vā pana vaggānaṃ antamaso ekassa dvinnaṃ vā suttantānampi uggahitānaṃ abhāvena appassuto ayaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5316_5: Balibaddova jīratīti yathā balibaddo jīramāno vaḍḍhamāno neva mātu na pitu,
atk-s0508a2:5316_13: Maṃsāni tassa vaḍḍhantīti yathā balibaddassa “kasanabhāravahanādīsu asamattho eso”ti araññe vissaṭṭhassa
atk-s0508a2:5316_14: yathā tathā vicarantassa khādantassa pivantassa maṃsāni tassa vaḍḍhanti;
atk-s0508a2:5316_15: evamevaṃ imassāpi upajjhāyādīhi vissaṭṭhassa saṅghaṃ nissāya cattāro paccaye labhitvā uddhaṃvirecanādīni
atk-s0508a2:5316_16: katvā kāyaṃ posentassa maṃsāni vaḍḍhanti thūlasarīro hutvā vicarati.
atk-s0508a2:5316_17: Paññāti lokiyalokuttarā panassa paññā ekaṅgulimattāpi na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0508a2:5316_18: araññe gacchalatādīni viya assa chadvārāni nissāya taṇhā ceva navavidhamāno ca vaḍḍhatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:5317_0: Bahussutoti gāthā attano bāhusaccaṃ nissāya aññaṃ atimaññantaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ uddissa vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:5317_2: Atimaññatīti atikkamitvā maññati attānaṃ ukkaṃsento paraṃ paribhavati.
atk-s0508a2:5317_3: Tathevāti yathā andho andhakāre telapajjotaṃ dhārento ālokadānena paresaṃyeva atthāvaho,
atk-s0508a2:5317_5: tatheva pariyattibāhusaccena sutavā puggalo sutena anupapanno attano atthaṃ aparipūrento andho ñāṇālokadānena paresaṃyeva atthāvaho,
atk-s0508a2:5318_2: Sutañca na vināsayeti bahussutaṃ payirupāsitvā laddhaṃ sutañca na vināseyya,
atk-s0508a2:5318_4: Taṃ mūlaṃ brahmacariyassāti yasmā bahussutaṃ payirupāsitvā laddhaṃ taṃ sutaṃ pariyattibāhusaccaṃ maggabrahmacariyassa mūlaṃ padhānakāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5318_5: Tasmā dhammadharo siyā vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā yathāsutassa dhammassa dhāraṇe paṭhamaṃ pariyattidhammadharo bhaveyya.
atk-s0508a2:5319_2: Ekissā hi gāthāya pubbabhāge apaññāyamānepi pubbabhāge vā paññāyamāne aparabhāge apaññāyamānepi “imassa aparabhāgassa iminā pubbabhāgena,
atk-s0508a2:5319_3: imassa vā pubbabhāgassa iminā aparabhāgena bhavitabba”nti jānanto pubbāparaññū nāma.
atk-s0508a2:5319_4: Attatthādibhedaṃ tassa tassa bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānātīti atthaññū.
atk-s0508a2:5319_5: Niruttipadakovidoti niruttiyaṃ sesapadesupi cāti catūsupi paṭisambhidāsu cheko.
atk-s0508a2:5319_6: Suggahītañca gaṇhātīti teneva kovidabhāvena atthato byañjanato ca dhammaṃ sugahitameva katvā gaṇhāti.
atk-s0508a2:5319_7: Atthañcopaparikkhatīti yathāsutassa yathāpariyattassa dhammassa atthaṃ upaparikkhati “iti sīlaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5320_0: Khantyā chandikato hotīti tesu manasā anupekkhitesu dhammesu diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā nijjhānaṃ khamāpetvā
atk-s0508a2:5320_2: Tathābhūto ca vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto ussahitvā tuleti taṃtaṃpaccayanāmarūpadassanavasena ussāhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5320_3: katvā tato paraṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā tuleti “anicca”ntipi,
atk-s0508a2:5320_7: ajjhattaṃ susamāhitoti so evaṃ passanto paggahetabbādisamaye cittassa paggaṇhanādinā padahati,
atk-s0508a2:5320_8: padahanto ca ajjhattaṃ gocarajjhatte vipassanāsamādhinā maggasamādhinā ca suṭṭhu samāhito bhaveyya,
atk-s0508a2:5320_10: Svāyaṃ guṇo sabbopi yasmā bahussutaṃ dhammadharaṃ sappaññaṃ buddhasāvakaṃ payirupāsantassa hoti,
atk-s0508a2:5320_11: tasmā asaṅkhataṃ dhammaṃ ārabbha dukkhādīsu pariññādivisiṭṭhakiccatāya dhammaviññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ dhammañāṇaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5321_0: Evaṃ bahupakāratāya tassa pūjanīyakaṃ dassento “bahussuto”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:5321_3: Tameva desanādhammaṃ suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya avinassantaṃ dhāretīti dhammadharo.
atk-s0508a2:5321_4: Tato eva mahesino bhagavato dhammakosaṃ dhammaratanaṃ ārakkhatīti kosārakkho.
atk-s0508a2:5321_6: tasmā cakkhu sabbassa lokassa pūjanīyo mānanīyoti,
atk-s0508a2:5321_7: bahussutabhāvena bahujanassa pūjanīyabhāvadassanatthaṃ nigamanavasena punapi “bahussuto”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5322_3: tasmiṃ eva dhamme rato abhiratoti dhammarato,
atk-s0508a2:5322_4: tasseva dhammassa punappunaṃ vicintanena dhammaṃ anuvicintayaṃ dhammaṃ āvajjento manasi karotīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5322_6: Saddhammāti evarūpo bhikkhu sattatiṃsapabhedā bodhipakkhiyadhammā navavidhalokuttaradhammā ca na parihāyati,
atk-s0508a2:5322_7: na kadāci tassa tato parihāni hotīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5323_0: Athekadivasaṃ kāye avītarāgaṃ kusītaṃ hīnavīriyaṃ kosallāyā ti nāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ saṃvejento “kāyamaccheragaruno”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:5323_1: Tattha kāyamaccheragarunoti “kāyadaḷhībahulassa kāye mamattassa ācariyupajjhāyānampi kāyena kattabbaṃ kiñci akatvā vicarantassa.
atk-s0508a2:5323_2: Hiyyamāneti attano kāye jīvite ca khaṇe khaṇe parihiyyamāne.
atk-s0508a2:5323_3: Anuṭṭhaheti sīlādīnaṃ paripūraṇavasena uṭṭhānavīriyaṃ na kareyya.
atk-s0508a2:5323_4: Sarīrasukhagiddhassāti attano sarīrassa sukhāpaneneva gedhaṃ āpannassa.
atk-s0508a2:5323_5: Kuto samaṇaphāsutāti evarūpassa puggalassa sāmaññavasena kuto sukhavihāro,
atk-s0508a2:5324_0: Na pakkhantītiādikā āyasmato sāriputtassa dhammasenāpatino parinibbutabhāvaṃ sutvā therena bhāsitā.
atk-s0508a2:5324_1: Tattha na pakkhanti disā sabbāti puratthimādibhedā sabbā disā na pakkhayanti,
atk-s0508a2:5324_3: Dhammā na paṭibhanti manti pubbe suṭṭhu paguṇāpi pariyattidhammā idāni sakkaccaṃ samannāhariyamānāpi mayhaṃ na upaṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0508a2:5324_4: Gate kalyāṇamittamhīti sadevakassa lokassa kalyāṇamittabhūte dhammasenāpatimhi anupādisesanibbānaṃ gate.
atk-s0508a2:5324_5: Andhakāraṃva khāyatīti sabbopāyaṃ loko andhakāro viya upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0508a2:5325_4: Yathā kāyagatā satīti kāyagatāsatibhāvanā takkarassa yathā ekantahitāvahā,
atk-s0508a2:5325_5: evaṃ etādisaṃ anāthassa puggalassa ekantahitāvahaṃ aññaṃ mittaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0508a2:5325_6: sanāthassa aññāpi bhāvanā hitāvahā evāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:5326_3: Na sameti meti mayhaṃ cittaṃ na samāgacchati,
atk-s0508a2:5326_4: na te mama cittaṃ ārādhentīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5326_5: Svajja ekova jhāyāmīti sohaṃ ajja vuḍḍhatarehi virahito ekova hutvā jhāyāmi jhānapasuto homi.
atk-s0508a2:5326_6: Vassupetoti vassakāle kulāvakaṃ upeto pakkhī viya.
atk-s0508a2:5328_0: Taṃ sutvā thero “dassanāya abhikkante”ti aparaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:5328_1: Imāya hi gāthāya sambandhatthaṃ purimagāthā idha nikkhittā.
atk-s0508a2:5328_2: Teneva sacāhaṃ desantarato āgatāgate tāvadeva dassetuṃ lacchāmīti etassa padassa atthasiddhiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:5329_0: Paṇṇavīsati vassānīti pañca gāthā attano aggupaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:5329_1: Āraddhakammaṭṭhānabhāvena hi satthu upaṭṭhānapasutabhāvena ca therassa maggena asamucchinnāpi kāmasaññādayo na uppajjiṃsu,
atk-s0508a2:5329_2: kāyavacīmanokammāni ca sabbakālaṃ satthari mettāpubbaṅgamāni mettānuparivattāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5329_4: Sekhabhūtassa me satoti sekhabhūmiyaṃ sotāpattiphale ṭhitassa me sato.
atk-s0508a2:5329_6: ettha ca kāmasaññādianuppattivacanena attano āsayasuddhiṃ dasseti,
atk-s0508a2:5329_8: Tattha gandhakuṭiyaṃ paribhaṇḍakaraṇādinā satthu vattapaṭivattakaraṇena ca mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5329_10: rahogatassa satthāraṃ uddissa hitūpasaṃhāramanasikārena mettaṃ manokammaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5330_0: Ahaṃ sakaraṇīyomhīti satthu parinibbāne upaṭṭhite maṇḍalamāḷaṃ pavisitvā kapisīsaṃ ālambitvā sokābhibhūtena vuttagāthā.
atk-s0508a2:5330_1: Tattha sakaraṇīyomhīti dukkhaparijānanādinā karaṇīyena sakaraṇīyo amhi.
atk-s0508a2:5330_3: Satthu ca parinibbānanti mayhaṃ satthu parinibbānañca upaṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5330_4: Yo amhaṃ anukampakoti yo satthā mayhaṃ anuggāhako.
atk-s0508a2:5331_0: Tadāsi yaṃ bhiṃsanakanti gāthā satthu parinibbānakāle pathavīkampanadevadundubhiphalanādike disvā sañjātasaṃvegena vuttagāthā.
atk-s0508a2:5332_0: Bahussutotiādikā tisso gāthā theraṃ pasaṃsantehi saṅgītikārehi ṭhapitā.
atk-s0508a2:5332_4: Ayañhi thero ekapadeyeva ṭhatvā saṭṭhipadasahassāni satthārā kathitaniyāmeneva gaṇhāti,
atk-s0508a2:5332_5: gahitañca suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya sabbakālaṃ na vinassati,
atk-s0508a2:5333_0: Pariciṇṇoti gāthā parinibbānakāle therena bhāsitā, sā vuttatthā eva.
atk-s0508a2:5338_0: Cattālīsanipāte na gaṇena purakkhatotiādikā āyasmato mahākassapattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:5338_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare vedeho nāma asītikoṭivibhavo kuṭumbiko ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:5338_5: saṅghamāmako upāsako hutvā viharanto ekasmiṃ uposathadivase pātova subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni
atk-s0508a2:5338_6: adhiṭṭhāya gandhapupphādīni gahetvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a2:5339_0: Tasmiñca khaṇe satthā mahānisabhattheraṃ nāma tatiyasāvakaṃ “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5339_4: Upāsako taṃ sutvā pasanno dhammakathāvasāne mahājane uṭṭhāya gate satthāraṃ vanditvā “sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethā”ti nimantesi.
atk-s0508a2:5339_9: ekaṃ sāmaṇerampi vihāre asesetvā mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethā”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5339_11: Upāsako satthu adhivāsanaṃ viditvā gehaṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ sajjetvā punadivase satthu kālaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:5339_12: Satthā pattacīvaramādāya bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto upāsakassa gharaṃ gantvā paññattāsane nisinno dakkhiṇodakāvasāne
atk-s0508a2:5340_0: Tasmiṃ antare mahānisabhatthero piṇḍāya caranto tameva vīthiṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0508a2:5340_1: Upāsako disvā uṭṭhāya gantvā theraṃ vanditvā “pattaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:5340_8: So therassa pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātassa pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5340_9: Tato theraṃ anugantvā nivatto satthu santike nisīditvā evamāha –
atk-s0508a2:5340_11: ‘satthāpi gehe nisinno’ti vuttepi pavisituṃ na icchi,
atk-s0508a2:5340_12: atthi nu kho etassa tumhākaṃ guṇehi atirekaguṇo”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5340_16: so pana bhikkhu na evaṃ nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ udikkhati,
atk-s0508a2:5340_20: so abbhokāseyeva vasatī”ti bhagavā “ayañca ayañcetassa guṇo”ti mahāsamuddaṃ pūrayamāno viya tassa guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0508a2:5341_0: Upāsako pakatiyāpi jalamānapadīpo telena āsitto viya suṭṭhutaraṃ pasanno hutvā cintesi –
atk-s0508a2:5341_2: anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike dhutavādānaṃ aggabhāvatthāya patthanaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5341_3: So punapi satthāraṃ nimantetvā teneva niyāmena satta divase mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0508a2:5341_4: mahābhikkhusaṅghassa ticīvarāni datvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā evamāha – “yaṃ me, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:5341_5: satta divase dānaṃ dentassa mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5341_8: imināhaṃ na aññaṃ devasampattiṃ vā sakkamārabrahmasampattiṃ vā patthemi,
atk-s0508a2:5341_9: idaṃ pana me kammaṃ anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike mahānisabhattherena pattaṭṭhānantaraṃ pāpuṇanatthāya
atk-s0508a2:5341_15: anāgate satasahassakappāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0508a2:5341_16: tassa tvaṃ tatiyasāvako mahākassapatthero nāma bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5341_17: Taṃ sutvā upāsako “buddhānaṃ dve kathā nāma natthī”ti punadivase pattabbaṃ viya taṃ sampattiṃ amaññittha.
atk-s0508a2:5342_0: Tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu sampattiṃ anubhavanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassisammāsambuddhe bandhumatīnagaraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5342_1: upanissāya kheme migadāye viharante devalokā cavitvā aññatarasmiṃ parijiṇṇabrāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:5342_2: Tasmiñca kāle vipassī bhagavā sattame sattame saṃvacchare dhammaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0508a2:5342_10: So brāhmaṇānaṃ kenacideva kiccena sannipāte sati brāhmaṇiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā sayaṃ taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā gacchati.
atk-s0508a2:5342_11: Brāhmaṇīnaṃ sannipāte sati sayaṃ gehe acchati,
atk-s0508a2:5342_13: Tasmiṃ pana divase brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ āha – “bhoti,
atk-s0508a2:5342_15: “Mayaṃ mātugāmajātikā nāma rattiṃ sotuṃ na sakkoma,
atk-s0508a2:5342_16: divā sossāmā”ti brāhmaṇaṃ gehe ṭhapetvā taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā upāsikāhi saddhiṃ divā gantvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:5342_17: vanditvā ekamante nisinnā dhammaṃ sutvā upāsikāhiyeva saddhiṃ āgamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5342_18: Atha brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0508a2:5343_0: Tasmiṃ samaye satthā parisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane nisinno cittabījaniṃ ādāya ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya,
atk-s0508a2:5343_1: sineruṃ manthaṃ katvā sāgaraṃ nimmathento viya,
atk-s0508a2:5343_3: Brāhmaṇassa parisapariyante nisinnassa dhammaṃ suṇantassa paṭhamayāmasmiṃyeva sakalasarīraṃ pūrayamānā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajji.
atk-s0508a2:5343_8: apārupitvā ca nāma bahi vicarituṃ na sakkā”ti sabbathāpi adātukāmo ahosi,
atk-s0508a2:5343_9: athassa nikkhante paṭhamayāme majjhimayāmepi tatheva pīti uppajji.
atk-s0508a2:5343_11: Athassa majjhimayāme nikkhante pacchimayāmepi tatheva pīti uppajji.
atk-s0508a2:5343_12: Tadā so “yaṃ vā hotu taṃ vā pacchāpi jānissāmī”ti vatthaṃ saṅgharitvā satthu pādamūle ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:5343_13: Tato vāmahatthaṃ ābhujitvā dakkhiṇena hatthena tikkhattuṃ apphoṭetvā “jitaṃ me,
atk-s0508a2:5344_0: Tasmiñca samaye bandhumarājā dhammāsanassa pacchato antosāṇiyaṃ nisinno dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0508a2:5344_1: Rañño ca nāma “jitaṃ me”ti saddo amanāpo hoti.
atk-s0508a2:5344_4: So tena gantvā pucchito “avasesā hatthiyānādīni āruyha asicammādīni gahetvā parasenaṃ jinanti,
atk-s0508a2:5344_6: Ahaṃ pana pacchato āgacchantassa kūṭagoṇassa muggarena sīsaṃ bhinditvā taṃ palāpento viya maccheracittaṃ madditvā pārutavatthaṃ dasabalassa adāsiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5344_8: So puriso āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0508a2:5344_13: “ayaṃ mayhaṃ tuṇhīnisinnassa paṭhamaṃ kiñci adatvā satthu guṇe kathentassa adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5344_14: Satthu guṇe paṭicca uppannena pana mayhaṃ ko attho”ti tampi vatthayugaṃ dasabalasseva adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5344_15: Rājāpi “kiṃ brāhmaṇena kata”nti pucchitvā “tampi tena vatthayugaṃ tathāgatasseva dinna”nti sutvā aññānipi dve vatthayugāni pesesi,
atk-s0508a2:5344_17: Rājā aññānipi cattārīti evaṃ yāva dvattiṃsavatthayugāni pesesi.
atk-s0508a2:5344_18: Atha brāhmaṇo “idaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vaḍḍhetvā gahaṇaṃ viya hotī”ti attano atthāya ekaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5344_19: brāhmaṇiyā ekanti dve vatthayugāni gahetvā tiṃsayugāni tathāgatasseva adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5344_20: Tato paṭṭhāya ca so satthu vissāsiko jāto.
atk-s0508a2:5345_0: Atha naṃ rājā ekadivasaṃ sītasamaye satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇantaṃ disvā satasahassagghanakaṃ attanā pārutarattakambalaṃ datvā āha –
atk-s0508a2:5345_2: So “kiṃ me iminā kambalena imasmiṃ pūtikāye upanītenā”ti cintetvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ tathāgatassa mañcassa upari vitānaṃ katvā agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5345_3: Athekadivasaṃ rājā pātova vihāraṃ gantvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ satthu santike nisīdi.
atk-s0508a2:5345_4: Tasmiñca samaye chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo kambale paṭihaññanti,
atk-s0508a2:5345_12: na maya”nti pasīditvā yaṃ manussānaṃ upakārabhūtaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5345_13: taṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ katvā sabbaṭṭhakaṃ nāma dānaṃ datvā purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:5345_14: Sopi “aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ nāla catusaṭṭhi hotī”ti catusaṭṭhi salākabhattāni upanibandhāpetvā yāvajīvaṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tato cuto sagge nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:5346_0: Puna tato cuto imasmiṃ kappe koṇāgamanassa ca bhagavato kassapadasabalassa cāti dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ antare bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbiyaghare nibbatto.
atk-s0508a2:5346_1: So vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekadivasaṃ araññe jaṅghavihāraṃ carati.
atk-s0508a2:5346_2: Tasmiñca samaye paccekabuddho nadītīre cīvarakammaṃ karonto anuvāte appahonte saṅgharitvā ṭhapetuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0508a2:5346_6: karothā”ti uttarasāṭakaṃ datvā “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kenaci parihāni mā hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:5347_0: Gharepissa bhaginiyā saddhiṃ bhariyāya kalahaṃ karontiyā paccekabuddho piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0508a2:5347_1: Athassa bhaginī paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā tassa bhariyaṃ sandhāya “evarūpaṃ bālaṃ yojanasatena parivajjeyya”nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:5347_2: Sā gehaṅgaṇe ṭhitā sutvā “imāya dinnabhattaṃ mā esa bhuñjatū”ti pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalassa pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5347_4: tvaṃ maṃ tāva akkosa vā pahara vā,
atk-s0508a2:5347_5: evarūpassa pana dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramissa pattato bhattaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalaṃ dātuṃ na yutta”nti āha.
atk-s0508a2:5347_8: bhante”ti kalalaṃ chaḍḍetvā pattaṃ dhovitvā gandhacuṇṇena.
atk-s0508a2:5347_9: Ubbaṭṭetvā paṇītabhattassa catumadhurassa ca pūretvā upari āsittena padumagabbhavaṇṇena sappinā vijjotamānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5347_10: paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapetvā “yathā ayaṃ piṇḍapāto obhāsajāto,
atk-s0508a2:5347_11: evaṃ obhāsajātaṃ me sarīraṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:5348_0: Tepi jāyampatikā yāvatāyukaṃ kusalaṃ katvā sagge nibbattitvā puna tato cavitvā upāsako kassapasammāsambuddhakāle
atk-s0508a2:5348_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ asītikoṭivibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:5348_2: itarāpi tādisasseva seṭṭhino dhītā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:5348_4: Tassā pubbe aniṭṭhavipākassa pāpakammassa ānubhāvena patikulaṃ paviṭṭhamattāya ummārabbhantare sakalasarīraṃ ugghāṭitavaccakuṭi viya duggandhaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5348_9: Sā eteneva nīhārena sattasu ṭhānesu paṭinivattitā.
atk-s0508a2:5349_1: Tassa ghanakoṭṭimāhi satasahassagghanikāhi rattasuvaṇṇiṭṭhakāhi yojanubbedhaṃ cetiyaṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:5349_2: Tasmiṃ cetiye karīyamāne sā seṭṭhidhītā cintesi –
atk-s0508a2:5349_4: kiṃ me jīvitenā”ti attano ābharaṇabhaṇḍaṃ bhañjāpetvā suvaṇṇiṭṭhakaṃ kāresi ratanāyataṃ vidatthivitthinnaṃ caturaṅgulubbedhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5349_5: Tato haritālamanosilāpiṇḍaṃ gahetvā aṭṭha uppalahatthake ādāya cetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gatā.
atk-s0508a2:5349_6: Tasmiñca khaṇe ekā iṭṭhakāpanti parikkhipitvā āgacchamānā ghaṭaniṭṭhakāya ūnā hoti,
atk-s0508a2:5349_11: Sā āruyha telena haritālamanosilāpiṇḍaṃ yojetvā tena bandhanena iṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā upari aṭṭhahi
atk-s0508a2:5349_12: uppalahatthakehi pūjaṃ katvā vanditvā “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kāyato candanagandho vāyatu,
atk-s0508a2:5349_13: mukhato uppalagandho”ti patthanaṃ katvā cetiyaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5350_0: Atha tasmiṃyeva khaṇe yassa seṭṭhiputtassa paṭhamaṃ gehaṃ nītā,
atk-s0508a2:5350_9: Te gantvā taṃ vanditvā ṭhitā “kiṃ, tātā,
atk-s0508a2:5350_10: āgatatthā”ti tāya puṭṭhā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhiṃsu. “Tātā,
atk-s0508a2:5350_17: Tassā saha gharapavesanena sakalagehaṃ candanagandho ceva nīluppalagandho ca vāyi.
atk-s0508a2:5350_23: Sā ādito paṭṭhāya attanā katakammaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0508a2:5350_24: Seṭṭhiputto “niyyānikaṃ vata buddhasāsana”nti pasīditvā yojanikaṃ suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ kambalakañcukena parikkhipitvā
atk-s0508a2:5351_0: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā sagge nibbattitvā tato cuto bārāṇasito yojanamatte ṭhāne aññatarasmiṃ amaccakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a2:5351_1: seṭṭhikaññāpi devalokato cavitvā rājakule jeṭṭhadhītā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a2:5351_2: Tesu vayappattesu kumārassa vasanagāme nakkhattaṃ saṅghuṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5351_12: natthi no ito sukhumatarassa paṭilābhāya puñña”nti.
atk-s0508a2:5351_14: ahaṃ ajjeva tuyhaṃ bārāṇasinagare rajjapaṭilābhampi icchāmī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5351_19: Idha vā ettha vā gehe nisīdissatī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5351_20: So pana puññaniyāmena nikkhamitvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā uyyāne maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nipajji.
atk-s0508a2:5351_21: So ca bārāṇasirañño kālaṅkatassa sattamo divaso hoti.
atk-s0508a2:5352_0: Amaccā rañño sarīrakiccaṃ katvā rājaṅgaṇe nisīditvā mantayiṃsu –
atk-s0508a2:5352_10: Te kumudavaṇṇe cattāro sindhave yojetvā pañcavidhaṃ rājakakudhabhaṇḍaṃ setacchattañca rathasmiṃyeva ṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a2:5352_16: Ratho kumāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā ārohanasajjo hutvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0508a2:5352_19: dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu esa rajjaṃ kāretuṃ yutto”ti vatvā “punapi tūriyāni paggaṇhatha,
atk-s0508a2:5353_11: Te tāvadeva abhisekamaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā rājadhītaraṃ sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā,
atk-s0508a2:5353_24: So uṭṭhāya hatthe dhovitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā hatthena udakaṃ ādāya puratthimadisāyaṃ abbhukkiri.
atk-s0508a2:5353_25: Tāvadeva ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā aṭṭha kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:5353_26: Puna udakaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇāyaṃ pacchimāyaṃ uttarāyanti evaṃ catūsu disāsu abbhukkiri.
atk-s0508a2:5353_27: Sabbadisāsu aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ katvā dvattiṃsa kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:5353_28: So ekaṃ dibbadussaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā “nandarañño vijite suttakantikā itthiyo mā suttaṃ kantiṃsūti
atk-s0508a2:5353_29: evaṃ bheriṃ carāpethā”ti vatvā chattaṃ ussāpetvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatto hatthikkhandhavaragato nagaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0508a2:5354_0: Evaṃ kāle gacchante ekadivasaṃ devī rañño mahāsampattiṃ disvā,
atk-s0508a2:5354_2: devī”ti ca puṭṭhā “atimahatī te, deva, sampatti.
atk-s0508a2:5354_4: idāni anāgatassa paccayaṃ kusalaṃ na karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:5354_11: Devī pātova uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya uparipāsāde puratthābhimukhā urena nipajjitvā “sace etissaṃ disāyaṃ arahanto atthi,
atk-s0508a2:5354_12: sveva āgantvā amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantū”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:5354_15: Punadivase dakkhiṇadvāre dānaṃ sajjetvā tatheva akāsi,
atk-s0508a2:5354_17: Uttaradvāre sajjitadivase pana deviyā tatheva nimantentiyā himavante vasantānaṃ padumavatiyā puttānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5354_18: pañcasatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ jeṭṭhako mahāpadumapaccekabuddho bhātike āmantesi, “mārisā,
atk-s0508a2:5354_22: Te adhivāsetvā punadivase anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā,
atk-s0508a2:5354_30: saṅghanavakassa pādamūle nipajjitvā “ayyā paccayehi na kilamissanti,
atk-s0508a2:5354_32: Amhākaṃ yāvajīvaṃ idha nivāsāya paṭiññaṃ dethā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā uyyāne pañcapaṇṇasālāsatāni pañcacaṅkamanasatānīti
atk-s0508a2:5355_0: Evaṃ kāle gacchante rañño paccanto kupito.
atk-s0508a2:5355_2: tvaṃ paccekabuddhesu mā pamajjī”ti deviṃ ovaditvā gato.
atk-s0508a2:5355_4: Mahāpadumapaccekabuddho tiyāmarattiṃ jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā aruṇuggamane ālambanaphalakaṃ ālambitvā ṭhitakova anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0508a2:5355_6: Punadivase devī paccekabuddhānaṃ nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ haritūpalittaṃ kāretvā pupphāni vikiritvā,
atk-s0508a2:5355_7: dhūpaṃ datvā tesaṃ āgamanaṃ olokayantī nisinnā āgamanaṃ apassantī purisaṃ pesesi – “gaccha, tāta, jānāhi,
atk-s0508a2:5355_9: So gantvā mahāpadumassa paṇṇasālāya dvāraṃ vivaritvā tattha apassanto caṅkamanaṃ gantvā ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ disvā vanditvā “kālo,
atk-s0508a2:5355_12: So niddāyati maññe”ti gantvā piṭṭhipāde hatthena parāmasitvā pādānaṃ sītalatāya ceva thaddhatāya ca parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0508a2:5355_14: Evaṃ tatiyassāti sabbesaṃ parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā rājakulaṃ gato. “Kahaṃ, tāta,
atk-s0508a2:5355_17: Devī kandantī rodantī nikkhamitvā nāgarehi saddhiṃ tattha gantvā sādhukīḷitaṃ kāretvā paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5355_18: sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:5356_0: Rājā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā āgato paccuggamanaṃ āgataṃ deviṃ pucchi – “kiṃ, bhadde,
atk-s0508a2:5356_10: Devīpi “imasmiṃ pabbajite ahaṃ kiṃ karissāmī”ti tattheva uyyāne pabbajitvā dvepi jhānaṃ bhāvetvā tato cutā brahmaloke nibbattiṃsu.
