atk-s0508a2:5545_1: Aṅguli cettha chijjathāti ettha patte tassa aṅguli chijjitvā āhārena saddhiṃ patatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5546_0: Kuṭṭamūlaṃ nissāyāti tassa purisassa pasādajananatthaṃ tādise gharabhittisamīpe nisīditvā ālopaṃ taṃ abhuñjisaṃ paribhuñjiṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5546_1: Ayaṃ pana therassa paṭipatti sikkhāpade apaññatteti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5546_2: Paṭikkūle ca appaṭikkūle iva appaṭikkūlasaññitāya ariyiddhiyā ukkaṃsagatattā therassa taṃ ajjhoharantassa jigucchā na uppajji,
atk-s0508a2:5546_3: puthujjanassa pana tādisaṃ bhuñjantassa antāni nikkhameyyuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5547_0: Uttiṭṭhapiṇḍoti uttiṭṭhitvā paresaṃ gharadvāre ṭhatvā gahetabbapiṇḍo,
atk-s0508a2:5547_1: jaṅghabalaṃ nissāya anugharaṃ gantvā laddhabbamissakabhikkhāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5547_4: yo bhikkhu ete uttiṭṭhapiṇḍādayo cattāro paccaye antimantena abhiramitvā paribhuñjati.
atk-s0508a2:5547_5: Sa ve cātuddiso naroti so puggalo ekaṃsena cātuddiso puratthimādicatudisāyogyo,
atk-s0508a2:5547_6: katthaci appaṭigho yāya kāyaci disāya viharituṃ sakkotīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5548_0: Atha thero attano mahallakakāle manussehi “kathaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:5548_1: tumhe evarūpāya jarāya vattamānāya dine dine pabbataṃ abhiruhathā”ti vutte “yattha eke”tiādikā catasso gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5550_0: Ḍayhamānesūti rāgaggiādīhi ekādasahi aggīhi sattesu ḍayhamānesu.
atk-s0508a2:5551_2: nanu ime veḷuvanādayo vihārā manoramā”ti vutte araññapabbatā eva mayhaṃ manoramāti dassento “karerimālāvitatā”tiādikā dvādasa gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5551_5: Kuñjarābhirudāti paṭighosādiguṇībhūtehi hatthīnaṃ gocaresīnaṃ gajjitehi abhitthanitā.
atk-s0508a2:5552_2: Nagāti desantaraṃ agamanato “nagā”ti selamayatāya “selā”ti ca laddhanāmā pabbatā.
atk-s0508a2:5554_1: Gaganāvabbha chāditāti tato eva saradassa gaganaabbhā viya kāḷameghasañchāditā,
atk-s0508a2:5555_1: Pañcaṅgikenāti ātatādīhi pañcahi aṅgehi yuttena tūriyena parivāriyamānassa tādisīpi na hoti,
atk-s0508a2:5555_2: yathā yādisī ekaggacittassa samāhitacittassa sammadeva rūpārūpadhammaṃ aniccādivasena vipassantassa rati hoti.
atk-s0508a2:5558_0: Kammaṃ bahukantiādinā dve gāthā kammārāmānaṃ paccayagiddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānavasena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:5558_1: Tattha kammaṃ bahukaṃ na kārayeti kammārāmo hutvā bahuṃ nāma kammaṃ na kāraye na adhiṭṭhahe,
atk-s0508a2:5558_4: Na uyyameti paccayuppādanagaṇabandhādivasena vāyāmaṃ na kareyya.
atk-s0508a2:5559_0: Anattaneyyametanti etaṃ navakammādhiṭṭhānādikaṃ attano atthāvahaṃ na hotīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5559_2: Navakammādipasutassa hi tahaṃ tahaṃ vicarato kāyasukhādialābhena kicchappatto hoti kilamati khedaṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0508a2:5559_4: Vatthuvisadaattaneyyakiriyādīnaṃ abhāvena so puggalo samathaṃ na vindati cittasamādhānaṃ na labhatīti.
atk-s0508a2:5560_0: Oṭṭhappahatamattenātiādinā dve gāthā sutaparamassa paṇḍitamānino garahavasena,
atk-s0508a2:5560_1: tato parā dve paṇḍitassa pasaṃsāvasena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:5560_4: Attānampi na passatīti anatthaññutāya attano paccakkhabhūtampi atthaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0508a2:5560_5: yāthāvato attano pamāṇaṃ na paricchindatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5560_7: na mayā sadiso añño atthī”ti mānatthaddho hutvā garuṭṭhāniyānampi apacitiṃ adassento ayosalākaṃ gilitvā ṭhito viya thaddhagīvo carati.
atk-s0508a2:5560_8: Ahaṃ seyyoti maññatīti ahameva seyyo uttamoti maññati.
atk-s0508a2:5561_1: bālo maññati attānanti ayaṃ aseyyo hīno samāno aññena seyyena uttamena samānaṃ sadisaṃ katvā attānaṃ bālo mandabuddhi bālabhāveneva maññatīti.
atk-s0508a2:5561_2: Na taṃ viññū pasaṃsantīti taṃ tādisaṃ bālaṃ paggahitacittatāya patthaddhamānasaṃ thambhitattaṃ naraṃ viññū paṇḍitā na pasaṃsanti,
atk-s0508a2:5562_0: Seyyohamasmīti yo pana paṇḍito puggalo “seyyohamasmī”ti vā hīnasadisamānavasena “nāhaṃ seyyo”ti vā kañcipi
atk-s0508a2:5562_1: mānaṃ ajappento vidhāsu navasu mānakoṭṭhāsesu kassacipi vasena na vikampati.
atk-s0508a2:5563_0: Paññavantanti aggaphalapaññāvasena paññavantaṃ iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappattiyā tādiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5563_2: arahattaphalasamāpattisamāpajjanena cetosamathamanuyuttanti tādisaṃ sabbaso pahīnamānaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ viññū
atk-s0508a2:5563_3: buddhādayo paṇḍitā pasaṃsare vaṇṇenti thomentīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5564_0: Puna aññataraṃ dubbacaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā dovacassatāya ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5564_1: sovacassatāya ānisaṃsañca pakāsento “yassa sabrahmacārīsū”tiādikā dve gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5565_0: Puna uddhataṃ unnaḷaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā uddhatādibhāve dosaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5565_1: anuddhatādibhāve ca guṇaṃ vibhāvento “uddhato capalo bhikkhū”tiādikā dve gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:5565_2: Tattha kapīva sīhacammenāti sīhacammena pāruto makkaṭo viya.
atk-s0508a2:5565_3: So uddhatādidosasaṃyutto bhikkhu tena paṃsukūlena ariyaddhajena na upasobhati ariyaguṇānaṃ abhāvato.
atk-s0508a2:5566_0: Yo pana upasobhati, taṃ dassetuṃ “anuddhato”tiādi vuttaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5567_0: Ete sambahulātiādikā pañca gāthā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ namassante brahmakāyike deve disvā āyasmato kappinassa sitapātukammanimittaṃ vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:5567_5: Taṃ tesaṃ devabhāvaṃ aññehi visesetvā dassento “sabbe te brahmakāyikā”ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:5567_6: Yasmā te attano upapattiddhiyā mahatiyā deviddhiyā samannāgatā parivārasampannā ca,
atk-s0508a2:5568_0: “Ko nu senāpati bhoto”ti pucchāya vissajjanavasena “mayā pavattitaṃ dhammacakkaṃ anuttaraṃ sāriputto
atk-s0508a2:5568_1: anuvattetī”ti vadantena bhagavatā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa dhammasenāpatibhāvo anuññātoti āha –
atk-s0508a2:5568_3: Tattha vīranti kilesamārādīnaṃ nimmathanena vīriyavantaṃ mahāvikkantaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5568_6: Namassantāti sirasi añjaliṃ paggayha namassamānā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0508a2:5569_0: Yampi nissāyāti yaṃ nu kho ārammaṇaṃ nissāya ārabbha jhāyatīti nābhijānāmāti puthujjanabhāvena brahmāno evaṃ āhaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:5570_2: Gambhīro gocaro sakoti paramagambhīro atiduddaso duranubodho puthujjanehi asādhāraṇo avisayo.
atk-s0508a2:5570_3: Idāni tassa gambhīrabhāve kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “ye maya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5570_4: Tattha vālavedhisamāgatāti ye mayaṃ vālavedhidhanuggahasadisā atisukhumampi visayaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ samatthā āgatā upaparikkhantā nābhijānāma,
atk-s0508a2:5570_6: Taṃ tathā devakāyehīti taṃ tathārūpaṃ sāriputtaṃ sadevakassa lokassa pūjanārahaṃ tehi brahmakāyikehi
atk-s0508a2:5570_7: tadā tathā pūjitaṃ disvā āyasmato mahākappinassa sitaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:5571_0: Yāvatā buddhakhettamhīti gāthā therena attānaṃ ārabbha sīhanādaṃ nadantena bhāsitā.
atk-s0508a2:5571_3: Buddhā hi bhagavanto dhutaguṇehipi sabbasattehi paramukkaṃsagatā eva,
atk-s0508a2:5571_4: kevalaṃ pana mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānasā sattānaṃ tādisaṃ mahantaṃ upakāraṃ oloketvā gāmantasenāsanavāsādiṃ
atk-s0508a2:5571_6: Dhutaguṇeti kilesānaṃ dhutena guṇena āraññakādibhāvena apekkhitaguṇe.
atk-s0508a2:5571_10: Tathā hesa thero tattha aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
atk-s0508a2:5572_0: Na cīvareti gāthāya “ṭhapayitvā mahāmuni”nti vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti,
atk-s0508a2:5572_2: Tattha na cīvare sampatte taṇhālepenāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:5572_6: Muḷālapupphaṃ vimalaṃva ambunāti yathā nimmalaṃ virajaṃ naḷinaṃ udakena na limpati,
atk-s0508a2:5572_7: evaṃ gotamo bhagavā taṇhālepādinā na limpatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5572_8: Nekkhammaninno abhinikkhammaninno tato eva tibhavābhinissaṭo bhavattayato vinissaṭo visaṃyutto.
atk-s0508a2:5573_0: Yesaṃ satipaṭṭhānagīvādīnaṃ bhāvanāpāripūriyā yattha katthaci anupalitto nekkhammaninnova ahosi,
atk-s0508a2:5573_2: Tattha guṇarāsito uttamaṅgabhūtāya paññāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvato satipaṭṭhānaṃ gīvā etassāti satipaṭṭhānagīvo,
atk-s0508a2:5573_3: anavajjadhammānaṃ ādāne saddhā hattho etassāti saddhāhattho.
atk-s0508a2:5573_4: Guṇasarīrassa uttamaṅgabhāvato paññā sīsaṃ etassāti paññāsīso.
atk-s0508a2:5573_5: Mahāsamudāgamanatāya mahāvisayatāya mahānubhāvatāya mahābalatāya ca mahantaṃ sabbaññutasaṅkhātaṃ ñāṇaṃ etassa atthīti mahāñāṇī.
atk-s0508a2:5578_0: Paññāsanipāte kadā nuhantiādikā āyasmato tālapuṭattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:5578_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a2:5578_3: rājagahe aññatarasmiṃ naṭakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto kulānurūpesu naccaṭṭhānesu nipphattiṃ gantvā
atk-s0508a2:5578_5: So pañcasatamātugāmaparivāro mahatā naṭavibhavena gāmanigamarājadhānīsu samajjaṃ dassetvā,
atk-s0508a2:5578_9: laddhasammānasakkāro ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā satthu santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0508a2:5578_12: pubbakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ naṭānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ ‘yo so naṭo raṅgamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccālikena janaṃ hāseti rameti,
atk-s0508a2:5578_13: so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pahāsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’ti,
atk-s0508a2:5578_15: Atha naṃ bhagavā tikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipi “mā maṃ etaṃ pucchī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5578_17: ime sattā pakatiyāpi rāgabandhanabaddhā dosabandhanabaddhā mohabandhanabaddhā tesaṃ bhiyyopi rajanīye
atk-s0508a2:5578_18: dosanīye mohanīye dhamme upasaṃharanto pamādetvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā niraye upapajjati.
atk-s0508a2:5578_19: Sace panassa evaṃdiṭṭhi hoti ‘yo so naṭo raṅgamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccālikena janaṃ hāseti rameti,
atk-s0508a2:5578_20: so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pahāsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”’ti sāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi.
atk-s0508a2:5578_21: Micchādiṭṭhissa ca dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññatarā gati icchitabbā,
atk-s0508a2:5578_24: Nanu gāmaṇi pageva mayā paṭikkhitto “mā maṃ etaṃ pucchī”ti ? “Nāhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:5578_26: yaṃ maṃ bhagavā naṭānaṃ abhisamparāyaṃ evamāhā”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5578_28: pubbakehi ācariyapācariyehi naṭehi vañcito “naṭo mahājanassa naṭasamajjaṃ dassetvā sugatiṃ upapajjatī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:5578_29: So satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā laddhūpasampanno vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0508a2:5578_30: adhigatārahatto pana arahattappattito pubbe yenākārena attano cittaṃ niggaṇhanavasena yonisomanasikāro udapādi,
atk-s0508a2:5581_0: Aniccato sabbabhavaṃ vipassaṃ, taṃ me idaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5583_0: “Kadā nuhaṃ bhinnapaṭandharo muni, kāsāvavattho amamo nirāso;
atk-s0508a2:5584_0: Rāgañca dosañca tatheva mohaṃ, hantvā sukhī pavanagato vihassaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5587_0: Vipassamāno vītabhayo vihassaṃ, eko vane taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5590_0: Paññāmayaṃ tikhiṇamasiṃ gahetvā, chetvā vase tampi kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5593_0: Māraṃ sasenaṃ sahasā bhañjissaṃ, sīhāsane taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5595_0: “Kadā nuhaṃ sabbhi samāgamesu, diṭṭho bhave dhammagarūhi tādibhi;
atk-s0508a2:5596_0: Yāthāvadassīhi jitindriyehi, padhāniyo taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5598_0: “Kadā nu maṃ tandi khudā pipāsā, vātātapā kīṭasarīsapā vā;
atk-s0508a2:5599_0: Na bādhayissanti na taṃ giribbaje, atthatthiyaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5601_0: “Kadā nu kho yaṃ viditaṃ mahesinā, cattāri saccāni sududdasāni;
atk-s0508a2:5602_0: Samāhitatto satimā agacchaṃ, paññāya taṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5604_0: “Kadā nu rūpe amite ca sadde, gandhe rase phusitabbe ca dhamme;
atk-s0508a2:5605_0: Ādittatohaṃ samathehi yutto, paññāya dacchaṃ tadidaṃ kadā me.
atk-s0508a2:5607_0: “Kadā nuhaṃ dubbacanena vutto, tato nimittaṃ vimano na hessaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5608_0: Atho pasatthopi tato nimittaṃ, tuṭṭho na hessaṃ tadidaṃ kadā me.
atk-s0508a2:5610_0: “Kadā nu kaṭṭhe ca tiṇe latā ca, khandhe imehaṃ amite ca dhamme;
atk-s0508a2:5611_0: Ajjhattikāneva ca bāhirāni ca, samaṃ tuleyyaṃ tadidaṃ kadā me.
atk-s0508a2:5613_0: “Kadā nu maṃ pāvusakālamegho, navena toyena sacīvaraṃ vane;
atk-s0508a2:5614_0: Isippayātamhi pathe vajantaṃ, ovassate taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5616_0: “Kadā mayūrassa sikhaṇḍino vane, dijassa sutvā girigabbhare rutaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5617_0: Paccuṭṭhahitvā amatassa pattiyā, saṃcintaye taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5619_0: “Kadā nu gaṅgaṃ yamunaṃ sarassatiṃ, pātālakhittaṃ vaḷavāmukhañca;
atk-s0508a2:5620_0: Asajjamāno patareyyamiddhiyā, vibhiṃsanaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5622_0: “Kadā nu nāgova asaṅgacārī, padālaye kāmaguṇesu chandaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5623_0: Nibbajjayaṃ sabbasubhaṃ nimittaṃ, jhāne yuto taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5625_0: “Kadā iṇaṭṭova daliddako nidhiṃ, ārādhayitvā dhanikehi pīḷito;
atk-s0508a2:5626_0: Tuṭṭho bhavissaṃ adhigamma sāsanaṃ, mahesino taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:5628_0: “Bahūni vassāni tayāmhi yācito, agāravāsena alaṃ nu te idaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5629_0: Taṃ dāni maṃ pabbajitaṃ samānaṃ, kiṃkāraṇā citta tuvaṃ na yuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5631_0: “Nanu ahaṃ citta tayāmhi yācito, giribbaje citrachadā vihaṅgamā;
atk-s0508a2:5632_0: Mahindaghosatthanitābhigajjino, te taṃ ramessanti vanamhi jhāyinaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5634_0: “Kulamhi mitte ca piye ca ñātake, khiḍḍāratiṃ kāmaguṇañca loke;
atk-s0508a2:5635_0: Sabbaṃ pahāya imamajjhupāgato, athopi tvaṃ citta na mayha tussasi.
atk-s0508a2:5637_0: “Mameva etaṃ na hi tvaṃ paresaṃ, sannāhakāle paridevitena kiṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5638_0: Sabbaṃ idaṃ calamiti pekkhamāno, abhinikkhamiṃ amatapadaṃ jigīsaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5641_0: Cittaṃ calaṃ makkaṭasannibhaṃ iti, avītarāgena sudunnivārayaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5643_0: “Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, aviddasū yattha sitā puthujjanā;
atk-s0508a2:5644_0: Te dukkhamicchanti punabbhavesino, cittena nītā niraye nirākatā.
atk-s0508a2:5647_0: Kāye apekkhaṃ jaha mā virādhaya, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5649_0: “Bhāvehi jhānāni ca indriyāni ca, balāni bojjhaṅgasamādhibhāvanā;
atk-s0508a2:5650_0: Tisso ca vijjā phusa buddhasāsane, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5653_0: Aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ sabbakilesasodhanaṃ, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5655_0: “Dukkhanti khandhe paṭipassa yoniso, yato ca dukkhaṃ samudeti taṃ jaha;
atk-s0508a2:5656_0: Idheva dukkhassa karohi antaṃ, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5658_0: “Aniccaṃ dukkhanti vipassa yoniso, suññaṃ anattāti aghaṃ vadhanti ca;
atk-s0508a2:5659_0: Manovicāre uparundha cetaso, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5662_0: Yuñjassu satthuvacane mahesino, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5665_0: Cando yathā dosinapuṇṇamāsiyā, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5667_0: “Āraññiko hohi ca piṇḍapātiko, sosāniko hohi ca paṃsukūliko;
atk-s0508a2:5668_0: Nesajjiko hohi sadā dhute rato, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5670_0: “Ropetva rukkhāni yathā phalesī, mūle taruṃ chettu tameva icchasi;
atk-s0508a2:5671_0: Tathūpamaṃ cittamidaṃ karosi, yaṃ maṃ aniccamhi cale niyuñjasi.
atk-s0508a2:5673_0: “Arūpa dūraṅgama ekacāri, na te karissaṃ vacanaṃ idānihaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5674_0: Dukkhā hi kāmā kaṭukā mahabbhayā, nibbānamevābhimano carissaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5679_0: Kato ca te citta paṭissavo mayā.
atk-s0508a2:5682_0: Itissu maṃ citta tadā niyuñjasi, idāni tvaṃ gacchasi pubbaciṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5684_0: “Taṇhā avijjā ca piyāpiyañca, subhāni rūpāni sukhā ca vedanā;
atk-s0508a2:5685_0: Manāpiyā kāmaguṇā ca vantā, vante ahaṃ āvamituṃ na ussahe.
atk-s0508a2:5687_0: “Sabbattha te citta vaco kataṃ mayā, bahūsu jātīsu namesi kopito;
atk-s0508a2:5688_0: Ajjhattasambhavo kataññutāya te, dukkhe ciraṃ saṃsaritaṃ tayā kate.
atk-s0508a2:5690_0: “Tvaññeva no citta karosi brāhmaṇo, tvaṃ khattiyo rājadasī karosi;
atk-s0508a2:5691_0: Vessā ca suddā ca bhavāma ekadā, devattanaṃ vāpi taveva vāhasā.
atk-s0508a2:5693_0: “Taveva hetū asurā bhavāmase, tvaṃmūlakaṃ nerayikā bhavāmase;
atk-s0508a2:5694_0: Atho tiracchānagatāpi ekadā, petattanaṃ vāpi taveva vāhasā.
atk-s0508a2:5696_0: “Nanu dubbhissasi maṃ punappunaṃ, muhuṃ muhuṃ cāraṇikaṃva dassayaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5697_0: Ummattakeneva mayā palobhasi, kiñcāpi te citta virādhitaṃ mayā.
atk-s0508a2:5699_0: “Idaṃ pure cittamacāri cārikaṃ, yenicchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5700_0: Tadajjahaṃ niggahessāmi yoniso, hatthippabhinnaṃ viya aṅgusaggaho.
atk-s0508a2:5702_0: “Satthā ca me lokamimaṃ adhiṭṭhahi, aniccato addhuvato asārato;
atk-s0508a2:5703_0: Pakkhanda maṃ citta jinassa sāsane, tārehi oghā mahatā suduttarā.
atk-s0508a2:5705_0: “Na te idaṃ citta yathā purāṇakaṃ, nāhaṃ alaṃ tuyha vase nivattituṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5706_0: Mahesino pabbajitomhi sāsane, na mādisā honti vināsadhārino.
atk-s0508a2:5708_0: “Nagā samuddā saritā vasundharā, disā catasso vidisā adho divā;
atk-s0508a2:5709_0: Sabbe aniccā tibhavā upaddutā, kuhiṃ gato citta sukhaṃ ramissasi.
atk-s0508a2:5711_0: “Dhitipparaṃ kiṃ mama citta kāhisi, na te alaṃ citta vasānuvattako;
atk-s0508a2:5712_0: Na jātu bhastaṃ ubhatomukhaṃ chupe, dhiratthu pūraṃ navasotasandaniṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5718_0: Sumañjughosatthanitābhigajjino, te taṃ ramessanti vanamhi jhāyinaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5720_0: “Vuṭṭhamhi deve caturaṅgule tiṇe, saṃpupphite meghanibhamhi kānane;
atk-s0508a2:5721_0: Nagantare viṭapisamo sayissaṃ, taṃ me mudū hehiti tūlasannibhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5723_0: “Tathā tu kassāmi yathāpi issaro, yaṃ labbhati tenapi hotu me alaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5724_0: Na tāhaṃ kassāmi yathā atandito, biḷārabhastaṃva yathā sumadditaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5726_0: “Tathā tu kassāmi yathāpi issaro, yaṃ labbhati tenapi hotu me alaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5727_0: Viriyena taṃ mayha vasānayissaṃ, gajaṃva mattaṃ kusalaṅkusaggaho.
atk-s0508a2:5729_0: “Tayā sudantena avaṭṭhitena hi, hayena yoggācariyova ujjunā;
atk-s0508a2:5730_0: Pahomi maggaṃ paṭipajjituṃ sivaṃ, cittānurakkhīhi sadā nisevitaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5732_0: “Ārammaṇe taṃ balasā nibandhisaṃ, nāgaṃva thambhamhi daḷhāya rajjuyā;
atk-s0508a2:5733_0: Taṃ me suguttaṃ satiyā subhāvitaṃ, anissitaṃ sabbabhavesu hehisi.
atk-s0508a2:5735_0: “Paññāya chetvā vipathānusārinaṃ, yogena niggayha pathe nivesiya;
atk-s0508a2:5736_0: Disvā samudayaṃ vibhavañca sambhavaṃ, dāyādako hehisi aggavādino.
atk-s0508a2:5741_0: “Migo yathā seri sucittakānane, rammaṃ giriṃ pāvusaabbhamāliniṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5742_0: Anākule tattha nage ramissaṃ, asaṃsayaṃ citta parā bhavissasi.
atk-s0508a2:5745_0: Narā ca nārī ca anubhonti yaṃ sukhaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:5748_0: Tattha kadā nuhanti kadā nu ahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5748_7: Aniccato sabbabhavaṃ vipassanti kāmabhavādibhedaṃ sabbampi bhavaṃ “hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena anicca”nti vipassanto kadā nu viharissanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:5748_10: yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti vacanato itarampi lakkhaṇadvayaṃ vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5748_11: Taṃ me idaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissatīti taṃ idaṃ me parivitakkitaṃ kadā nu bhavissati,
atk-s0508a2:5748_12: kadā nu kho matthakaṃ pāpuṇissatīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5748_15: kadā nu kho ahaṃ mahāgajo viya saṅkhalikabandhanaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5748_16: gihibandhanaṃ chinditvā pabbajitvā kāyavivekaṃ paribrūhayanto ekākī pabbatakandarāsu adutiyo sabbattha
atk-s0508a2:5749_4: Amamoti kule vā gaṇe vā mamattābhāvena amamo.
atk-s0508a2:5749_6: Hantvā sukhī pavanagato vihassanti rāgādike kilese ariyamaggena samucchinditvā maggasukhena phalasukhena
atk-s0508a2:5749_7: sukhī mahāvanagato kadā nu kho ahaṃ viharissāmi.
atk-s0508a2:5750_0: Vadharoganīḷanti maraṇassa ca rogassa ca kulāvakabhūtaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5750_4: purisapuggalassa taṇhānugatassa ayameva kāyo bahiddhā nāmarūpa”ntiādīsu kāyo vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:5750_5: Maccujarāyupaddutanti maraṇena ceva jarāya ca pīḷitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5751_0: Bhayajananinti pañcavīsatiyā mahābhayānaṃ uppādakāraṇabhūtaṃ kāyikassa ca cetasikassa ca sakalassapi vaṭṭadukkhassa āvahanato dukhāvahaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5751_1: Taṇhālataṃ bahuvidhānuvattaninti bahuvidhañca ārammaṇaṃ bhavameva vā anuvattati santanotīti bahuvidhānuvattaniṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5751_3: Paññāmayanti maggapaññāmayaṃ sunisitaṃ asikhaggaṃ vīriyapaggahitena saddhāhatthena gahetvā samucchinditvā “kadā nuhaṃ vase”ti yaṃ parivitakkitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5752_2: Māraṃ sasenaṃ sahasā bhañjissanti kilesasenāya sasenaṃ abhisaṅkhārādimāraṃ sahasā sīghameva bhañjissāmi.
atk-s0508a2:5753_0: Sabbhi samāgamesu diṭṭho bhaveti dhammagāravayuttatāya dhammagarūhi tādilakkhaṇappattiyā tādīhi aviparītadassitāya
atk-s0508a2:5753_1: yāthāvadassīhi ariyamaggeneva pāpajitindriyatāya jitindriyehi buddhādīhi sādhūhi samāgamesu “kadā nu
atk-s0508a2:5753_2: ahaṃ padhāniyoti diṭṭho bhaveyya”nti yaṃ me parivitakkitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5754_3: Na bādhayissantīti maṃ na byādhayissanti sukhadukkhasomanassadomanassānaṃ jhānehi paṭibāhitattāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:5755_0: Yaṃ viditaṃ mahesināti yaṃ catusaccaṃ mahesinā sammāsambuddhena sayambhūñāṇena ñātaṃ paṭividdhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5755_1: tāni cattāri saccāni anupacitakusalasambhārehi suṭṭhu duddasāni maggasamādhinā samāhitatto,
atk-s0508a2:5755_3: ariyamaggapaññāya ahaṃ agacchaṃ paṭivijjhissaṃ adhigamissanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5756_6: Amiteti vā aparimāṇe nīlādivasena anekabhedabhinne rūpe bherisaddādivasena,
atk-s0508a2:5757_2: Vimano na hessanti domanassito na bhaveyyaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5758_2: Imeti ime mama santatipariyāpanne pañca khandhe.
atk-s0508a2:5758_3: Amite ca dhammeti tato aññena indriyakkhandhena amite rūpadhamme. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a2:5758_5: Samaṃ tuleyyanti aniccādivasena ceva asārādiupamāvasena ca sabbaṃ samameva katvā tīreyyaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5759_0: Isippayātamhi pathe vajantanti buddhādīhi mahesīhi sammadeva payāte samathavipassanāmagge vajantaṃ paṭipajjantaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:5759_1: Pāvusasamaye kālamegho navena toyena vassodakena sacīvaraṃ pavane kadā nu ovassati,
atk-s0508a2:5760_0: Mayūrassa sikhaṇḍino vane dijassāti mātukucchito aṇḍakosato cāti dvikkhattuṃ jāyanavasena dijassa,
atk-s0508a2:5760_1: sikhāsambhavena sikhaṇḍino ca mayūrassa vane kadā pana girigabbhare rutaṃ kekāravaṃ sutvā velaṃ sallakkhitvā
atk-s0508a2:5760_3: Saṃcintayeti vuccamāne bhave aniccādito manasi kareyyaṃ vipasseyyanti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5761_0: Gaṅgaṃ yamunaṃ sarassatinti etā mahānadiyo asajjamāno bhāvanāmayāya iddhiyā kadā nu patareyyanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:5761_1: Pātālakhittaṃ baḷavāmukhañcāti pātāya alaṃ pariyattanti pātālaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5761_8: Mahānirayadvārassa hi vivaṭakāle mahāaggikkhandho tato nikkhanto tadabhimukhaṃ anekayojanasatāyāmavitthāraṃ heṭṭhā samuddapadesaṃ ḍahati,
atk-s0508a2:5761_9: tasmiṃ daḍḍhe upari udakaṃ āvaṭṭākārena paribbhamantaṃ mahatā saddena heṭṭhā nipatati.
atk-s0508a2:5761_11: iti tañca pātālakhittaṃ baḷavāmukhañca vibhiṃsanaṃ bhayānakaṃ asajjamāno iddhiyā kadā nu patareyyanti yaṃ parivitakkitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5761_13: bhāvanāmayaṃ iddhiṃ nibbattetvā kadā nu evaṃ iddhiṃ vaḷañjissāmīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5762_0: Nāgova asaṅgacārī padālayeti yathā mattavāraṇo daḷhathambhaṃ bhinditvā ayasaṅkhalikaṃ viddhaṃsetvā asaṅgacārī
atk-s0508a2:5762_1: vanaṃ pavisitvā eko adutiyo hutvā attano rucivasena carati,
atk-s0508a2:5762_2: evamahaṃ kadā nu sabbasubhaṃ nimittaṃ nibbajjayaṃ niravasesato vajjayanto kāmacchandavaso ahutvā jhāne
atk-s0508a2:5762_3: yuto payutto kāmaguṇesu chandaṃ sammadeva padāleyyaṃ chindeyyaṃ pajaheyyanti yaṃ parivitakkitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5763_0: Iṇaṭṭova daliddako nidhiṃ ārādhayitvāti yathā koci daliddo jīvikapakato iṇaṃ gahetvā taṃ sodhetuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0508a2:5763_1: iṇaṭṭo iṇena aṭṭito dhanikehi pīḷito nidhiṃ ārādhayitvā adhigantvā iṇañca sodhetvā sukhena ca jīvanto
atk-s0508a2:5763_3: evaṃ ahampi kadā nu iṇasadisaṃ kāmacchandaṃ pahāya mahesino ariyadhanasampuṇṇatāya maṇikanakādiratanasampuṇṇanidhisadisaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5763_4: buddhassa sāsanaṃ adhigantvā tuṭṭho bhaveyyanti yaṃ parivitakkitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5764_0: Evaṃ pabbajjato pubbe nekkhammavitakkavasena pavattaṃ attano vitakkapavattiṃ dassetvā idāni pabbajitvā yehākārehi attānaṃ ovaditvā adhigacchi,
atk-s0508a2:5764_3: agāravāsena alaṃ nu te idanti anekasaṃvaccharāni vividhadukkhānubandhena agāramajjhe vāsena alaṃ pariyattameva teti,
atk-s0508a2:5764_5: idaṃ tayā anekāni saṃvaccharāni ahaṃ amhi nanu yācito.
atk-s0508a2:5764_6: Taṃ dāni maṃ pabbajitaṃ samānanti taṃ maṃ tayā tathā ussāhanena pabbajitaṃ samānaṃ kena kāraṇena citta tuvaṃ na yuñjasi,
atk-s0508a2:5764_7: samathavipassanaṃ chaḍḍetvā nihīne ālasiye niyojesīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5765_3: ahaṃ tayā nanu yācito amhi āyācito maññe.
atk-s0508a2:5765_5: kasmā idāni tadanurūpaṃ na paṭipajjasīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:5765_10: Te taṃ ramessanti vanamhi jhāyinanti te mayūrā taṃ vane jhānapasutaṃ ramessantīti nanu tayā yācitoti dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:5766_1: Imamajjhupāgatoti imaṃ araññaṭṭhānaṃ pabbajjaṃ vā ajjhupāgato.
atk-s0508a2:5766_3: na mayha tussasīti tvaṃ anuvattitvā ṭhitampi maṃ nārādhessasīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5767_0: Mameva etaṃ na hi tvaṃ paresanti etaṃ, citta,
atk-s0508a2:5767_1: mameva tasmā tvaṃ paresaṃ na hosi.
atk-s0508a2:5767_2: Tvaṃ pana aññesaṃ viya katvā sannāhakāle kilesamāre yujjhituṃ bhāvanāsannāhakāle nati vatvā paridevitena kiṃ payojanaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5767_3: idāni taṃ aññathā vattituṃ na dassāmīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:5767_4: Sabbaṃ idaṃ calamiti pekkhamānoti yasmā “idaṃ cittaṃ aññañca sabbaṃ tebhūmakasaṅkhāraṃ calaṃ anavaṭṭhita”nti
atk-s0508a2:5767_5: paññācakkhunā olokento gehato kāmehi ca abhinikkhamiṃ amatapadaṃ nibbānaṃ jigīsaṃ pariyesanto, tasmā, citta,
atk-s0508a2:5768_0: Avītarāgena sudunnivārayaṃ cittaṃ calaṃ makkaṭasannibhaṃ vanamakkaṭasadisaṃ iti suyuttavādī subhāsitavādī
atk-s0508a2:5769_0: Aviddasū yattha sitā puthujjanāti yattha yesu vatthukāmesu kilesakāmesu ca sitā paṭibaddhā te andhaputhujjanā
atk-s0508a2:5769_2: Icchantā ca cittena nītā niraye nirākatāti cittavasikā nirayasaṃvattanikaṃ kammaṃ karontā hitasukhato
atk-s0508a2:5769_3: nirākatā hutvā attano citteneva niraye nītā na aññathāti cittasseva niggahetabbataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0508a2:5770_1: Tattha mayūrakoñcābhirutamhīti sikhīhi sārasehi ca abhikūjite.
atk-s0508a2:5770_2: Dīpīhi byagghehi purakkhato vasanti mettāvihāritāya evarūpehi tiracchānagatehi purakkhato parivārito hutvā vane vasanto,
atk-s0508a2:5770_4: Kāye apekkhaṃ jahāti sabbaso kāye nirapekkho jaha,
atk-s0508a2:5770_6: Mā virādhayāti imaṃ sudullabhaṃ navamaṃ khaṇaṃ mā virādhehi.
atk-s0508a2:5770_9: maṃ pabbajjato pubbe sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ uyyojesīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:5771_4: Bojjhaṅgasamādhibhāvanāti satta bojjhaṅge catasso samādhibhāvanā ca.
atk-s0508a2:5771_5: Tisso ca vijjāti pubbenivāsañāṇādikā tisso vijjā ca.
atk-s0508a2:5773_1: Paṭipassa yonisoti rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhatoti evamādīhi vividhehi pakārehi vipassanāñāṇena sammā upāyena nayena passa.
atk-s0508a2:5773_2: Taṃ jahāti taṃ dukkhassa samudayaṃ taṇhaṃ pajaha,
atk-s0508a2:5774_0: Aniccantiādi antavantato aniccantikato tāvakālikato niccapaṭikkhepato ca aniccanti vā passa.
atk-s0508a2:5774_1: Dukkhanti te udayabbayapaṭipīḷanato sappaṭibhayato dukkhamato sukhapaṭikkhepato dukkhanti vā passa.
atk-s0508a2:5774_2: Suññanti avasavattanato asāmikato asārato attapaṭikkhepato ca suññaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5774_4: Vigarahitabbato avaḍḍhiābādhanato ca aghanti ca vadhanti ca vipassa yonisoti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:5774_5: Manovicāre uparundha cetasoti manovicārasaññino gehasitasomanassupavicārādike aṭṭhārasa cetaso uparundha vārehi nirodhehi.
atk-s0508a2:5775_2: Virūpoti tena muṇḍabhāvena parūḷhalomatāya chinnabhinnakāsāya vatthatāya virūpo vevaṇṇiyaṃ upagato.
atk-s0508a2:5775_3: Abhisāpamāgatoti “piṇḍolo vicarati pattapāṇī”ti ariyehi kātabbaṃ abhisāpaṃ upagato.
atk-s0508a2:5775_9: Yuñjassu satthuvacaneti sammāsambuddhassa ovāde yogaṃ karohi anuyuñjassu.
atk-s0508a2:5776_2: Cando yathā dosinapuṇṇamāsiyāti vigatadosāya puṇṇamāya kulesu niccanavasāya pāsādikatāya candimā viya carāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:5777_0: Sadā dhute ratoti sabbakālañca dhutaguṇe abhirato.
atk-s0508a2:5777_1: Tathūpamaṃ cittamidaṃ karosīti yathā koci puriso phalāni icchanto phalarukkhe ropetvā tato aladdhaphalova te mūlato chindituṃ icchati, citta,
atk-s0508a2:5777_3: Yaṃ maṃ aniccamhi cale niyuñjasīti yaṃ maṃ pabbajjāya niyojetvā pabbajitvā addhāgataṃ pabbajjāphalaṃ
atk-s0508a2:5777_4: aniccamhi cale saṃsāramukhe niyuñjasi niyojanavasena pavattesi.
atk-s0508a2:5778_1: Cittassa hi tādisaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ nīlādivaṇṇabhedo vā natthi,
atk-s0508a2:5778_4: Yadipi cittassa makkaṭasuttamattampi puratthimādidisābhāgena gamanaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0508a2:5778_5: dūre santaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchatīti dūraṅgama.
atk-s0508a2:5778_7: antamaso dve tīṇipi cittāni ekato uppajjituṃ samatthāni nāma natthi,
atk-s0508a2:5778_8: ekameva pana cittaṃ ekasmiṃ santāne uppajjati.
atk-s0508a2:5778_11: Na te karissaṃ vacanaṃ idānihanti yadipi pubbe tava vase anuvattiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:5778_12: idāni pana satthu ovādaṃ laddhakālato paṭṭhāya cittavasiko na bhavissāmi.
atk-s0508a2:5778_14: Dukkhā hi kāmā kaṭukā mahabbhayā kāmā nāmete atītepi dukkhā,
