atk-s0508a2:6065_4: nava vaṇamukhāni sabbadā rattindivaṃ sandanti, savanti,
atk-s0508a2:6066_1: Bhikkhūti saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhanto bhinnakileso vā dūrato parivajjayateti mamattaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0508a2:6066_4: Yathā sucijātiko sucimeva icchanto sasīsaṃ nhāto mīḷhaṃ disvā dūratova parivajjesi,
atk-s0508a2:6067_1: yathā jānāmi taṃ ahanti evaṃ sarīrasaññitaṃ asucipuñjaṃ yathā ahaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0508a2:6067_4: Gūthaṭṭhānaṃva pāvuseti pāvusakāle kilinnāsuciṃ nirantaraṃ gūthaṭṭhānaṃ viya sucijātiko.
atk-s0508a2:6067_5: Yasmā pana taṃ yathābhūtaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0508a2:6067_6: tasmā tattha nimuggo sīsaṃ na ukkhipatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:6068_0: Evaṃ therena sarīre dose vibhāvite sā gaṇikā lajjāvanatamukhā there gāravaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā “evametaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6068_1: mahāvīrā”ti gāthaṃ vatvā theraṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:6068_2: Tattha ettha ceketi evaṃ pākaṭapaṭikkūlasabhāvepi etasmiṃ kāye ekacce sattā āsattibalavatāya visīdanti visādaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0508a2:6068_3: Paṅkamhiva jaraggavo mahākaddamakucchiyaṃ sampatitadubbalabalibaddo viya byasanameva pāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6069_0: Puna taṃ thero mādise evarūpā paṭipatti niratthakā vighātāvahā evāti dassento “ākāsamhī”tiādinā gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0508a2:6069_2: yo puggalo haliddiyā aññena vā raṅgajātena ākāsaṃ rañjituṃ maññeyya,
atk-s0508a2:6069_3: tassa taṃ kammaṃ vighātudayaṃ cittavighātāvahameva siyā,
atk-s0508a2:6070_0: Tadākāsasamaṃ cittanti tayidaṃ mama cittaṃ ākāsasamaṃ katthaci alaggabhāvena ajjhattaṃ suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6070_1: tasmā mā pāpacitte āsādīti kāmesu nimuggatāya lāmakacitte nihīnacitte mādise mā āsādehi.
atk-s0508a2:6070_2: Aggikhandhaṃva pakkhimāti pakkhimā salabho aggikkhandhaṃ āsādento anatthameva pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0508a2:6071_0: Passa cittakatantiādikā satta gāthā tameva gaṇikaṃ disvā vipallattacittānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānavasena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6071_1: Taṃ sutvā sā gaṇikā maṅkubhūtā āgatamaggeneva palātā.
atk-s0508a2:6072_0: Tadāsītiādikā catasso gāthā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa parinibbānaṃ ārabbha vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6073_0: Sukhumaṃ te paṭivijjhantīti te yogino atisukhumaṃ paṭivijjhanti nāma.
atk-s0508a2:6073_2: Vālaggaṃ usunā yathā yathā satadhābhinnassa vālassa ekaṃ aṃsu aggaṃ rattandhakāratimisāya vijjullatobhāsena vijjhantā viyāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6073_3: Ke pana teti āha “ye pañcakkhandhe passanti,
atk-s0508a2:6073_8: Etena anattato abhivuṭṭhitassa ariyamaggassa vasena dukkhasacce pariññābhisamayaṃ āha,
atk-s0508a2:6073_9: tadavinābhāvato pana itaresampi abhisamayānaṃ suppaṭivijjhatā vuttā eva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6073_10: Keci pana “anatthakārakato pare nāma pañcupādānakkhandhāti ‘parato passantī’ti iminā visesato sabbopi sammadeva vutto”ti vadanti.
atk-s0508a2:6074_0: Sattiyā viya omaṭṭhoti paṭhamagāthā tissattheraṃ ārabbha vuttā,
atk-s0508a2:6075_0: Codito bhāvitattenāti gāthā pāsādakampanasuttantaṃ ārabbha vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6075_1: Tattha bhāvitattena sarīrantimadhārināti bhagavantaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0508a2:6076_0: Nayidaṃ sithilamārabbhātiādikā dve gāthā hīnavīriyaṃ vedanāmakaṃ daharabhikkhuṃ ārabbha vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6076_1: Tattha sithilamārabbhāti sithilaṃ katvā vīriyaṃ akatvā.
atk-s0508a2:6076_2: Appena thāmasāti appakena vīriyabalena nayidaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigantabbaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6077_0: Vivaramanupabhantītiādikā dve gāthā attano vivekabhāvaṃ ārabbha vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6077_1: Tattha brahmunā abhivanditoti mahābrahmunā sadevakena lokena ca abhimukhena hutvā thomito namassito ca.
atk-s0508a2:6078_0: Upasantaṃ uparatantiādikā pañca gāthā rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ mahākassapattheraṃ disvā “kāḷakaṇṇī
atk-s0508a2:6078_1: mayā diṭṭhā”ti oloketvā ṭhitaṃ sāriputtattherassa bhāgineyyaṃ micchādiṭṭhibrāhmaṇaṃ disvā tassa anukampāya
atk-s0508a2:6078_2: “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo mā nassī”ti ariyūpavādapaṭighātatthaṃ “theraṃ vandāhī”ti taṃ uyyojentena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6078_3: Tattha jātisataṃ gaccheti jātīnaṃ sataṃ upagaccheyya.
atk-s0508a2:6078_8: yo puggalo uditoditā asambhinnā satabrāhmaṇajātiyo anupaṭipāṭiyā uppajjanavasena upagaccheyya,
atk-s0508a2:6078_9: tattha ca brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsu nipphattiṃ gato tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū siyā brāhmaṇavattañca pūrento,
atk-s0508a2:6078_10: tassetaṃ vijjādianuṭṭhānaṃ etassa mahākassapattherassa vandanāya vandanāmayapuññassa soḷasiṃ kalaṃ nāgghati,
atk-s0508a2:6079_1: Bhāvanāvasena hi laddhāni rūpajjhānāni paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttataṃ abhirativasena ārammaṇe nirāsaṅgañca
atk-s0508a2:6079_5: Anulomaṃ paṭilomanti paṭhamajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā anulomaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6079_9: Tato piṇḍāya gacchatīti tato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya,
atk-s0508a2:6079_10: tato vā samāpattisamāpajjitato pacchā idāni piṇḍāya gacchatīti tadahu pavattaṃ therassa paṭipattiṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0508a2:6079_11: Thero pana divase divase tatheva paṭipajjati.
atk-s0508a2:6080_0: Tādisaṃ bhikkhuṃ māsādīti yādisassa guṇā ekadesena vuttā,
atk-s0508a2:6080_1: tādisaṃ tathārūpaṃ buddhānubuddhaṃ mahākhīṇāsavaṃ bhikkhuṃ mā āsādehi.
atk-s0508a2:6080_2: Māttānaṃ khaṇi brāhmaṇāti āsādanena ca, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0508a2:6080_5: Abhippasādehi mananti “sādhurūpo vata ayaṃ samaṇo”ti attano cittaṃ pasādehi.
atk-s0508a2:6080_6: Mā te vijaṭi matthakanti tava matthakaṃ tasmiṃ katena aparādhena sattadhā mā phali.
atk-s0508a2:6080_7: Tasmā tassa paṭikāratthaṃ khippameva pañjaliko vandāti.
atk-s0508a2:6080_8: Brāhmaṇo taṃ sutvā bhīto saṃviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto tāvadeva theraṃ khamāpesi.
atk-s0508a2:6081_0: Neso passatītiādikā dve gāthā poṭṭhilaṃ nāma bhikkhuṃ sammā apaṭipajjantaṃ micchājīvakataṃ disvā codanāvasena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6081_1: Tattha neso passati saddhammanti eso poṭṭhilo bhikkhu sataṃ buddhādīnaṃ dhammaṃ maggaphalanibbānaṃ na passati. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a2:6081_2: Saṃsārena purakkhato saṃsārabandhanaavijjādinā purakkhato apāyesu nibbattanato adhogamaṃ heṭṭhāgāmiṃ
atk-s0508a2:6081_3: māyāsāṭheyyānugatattā jimhapathaṃ micchāmaggabhāvato kummaggabhūtaṃ micchājīvaṃ anudhāvati anuparivattati.
atk-s0508a2:6082_0: Kimīva mīḷhasallittoti gūthakimī viya mīḷhena samantato litto kilesāsucivimissite saṅkhāre adhimucchito ajjhāpanno.
atk-s0508a2:6082_1: Pagāḷho lābhasakkāreti lābhe ca sakkāre ca taṇhāvasena pakārato gāḷho ogāḷho.
atk-s0508a2:6082_2: Tuccho gacchati poṭṭhiloti adhisīlasikkhābhāvato tuccho asāro hutvā poṭṭhilo bhikkhu gacchati pavattati.
atk-s0508a2:6083_0: Imañca passātiādikā dve gāthā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ pasaṃsantena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6083_1: Tattha imañca passāti āyasmantaṃ sāriputtattheraṃ disvā pasannamānaso attano cittaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0508a2:6083_2: Sudassananti asekkhānaṃ sīlakkhandhānañceva pāripūriyā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa ca pāripūriyā sundaradassanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6083_3: Vimuttaṃ ubhatobhāgeti ubhatobhāgato vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimuttaṃ ubhatobhāgeti arūpasamāpattiyā rūpakāyato,
atk-s0508a2:6083_6: Sabbaso rāgasallādīnaṃ abhāvena visallaṃ kāmādiyogānaṃ sammadeva khīṇattā khīṇasaṃyogaṃ suparisuddhassa
atk-s0508a2:6083_7: vijjāttayassa adhigatattā tevijjaṃ maccurājassa bhañjitattā maccuhāyinaṃ passāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:6084_0: Ete sambahulātiādikā gāthā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena mahāmoggallānattheraṃ pasaṃsantena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6084_1: Tattha pūjito naradevenāti narehi ca devehi ca paramāya pūjāya pūjito.
atk-s0508a2:6084_2: Uppanno maraṇābhibhūti loke uppanno hutvā maraṇaṃ abhibhavitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0508a2:6084_3: Atha vā pūjito naradevena sammāsambuddhena kāraṇabhūtena ariyāya jātiyā uppanno.
atk-s0508a2:6084_4: Sammāsambuddho hi paṭhamaṃ kammunā naro manusso hutvā pacchāpi ariyāya jātiyā uttamo devo devātidevo ahosi,
atk-s0508a2:6084_6: Pūjito naradevena bhagavatā pasaṃsāvasena uppanno maraṇābhibhūte loke uppanno hutvā maraṇābhibhū maccuhāyī.
atk-s0508a2:6084_7: Puṇḍarīkaṃva toyena udakena puṇḍarīkaṃ viya saṅkhāragate taṇhādiṭṭhilepena na upalimpati,
atk-s0508a2:6085_5: yena mahiddhikena āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena sahassilokadhātu khaṇeneva sammadeva vidito,
atk-s0508a2:6085_6: paccakkhato ñāto sabrahmakappo mahābrahmasadiso āvajjanādivasībhāvappattiyā iddhisampadāya cutūpapāte ca vasī.
atk-s0508a2:6085_7: Kāle passatīti tadanurūpe kāle dibbena cakkhunā devatā passatīti.
atk-s0508a2:6086_0: Sāriputtovātiādikā gāthā āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena attano guṇe pakāsentena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6086_5: yo bhikkhu pāraṅgato pāraṃ pariyantaṃ ukkaṃsaṃ gato so sāriputto sāvakehi paññādīhi guṇehi paramukkaṃsagato.
atk-s0508a2:6086_9: Imaṃ pana thero yathā sāriputto paññāya uttamo,
atk-s0508a2:6086_10: tathā ahaṃ samādhinā uttamoti dīpetuṃ avoca.
atk-s0508a2:6087_0: Tattha khaṇena nimmineti khaṇeneva koṭisatasahassaattabhāvaṃ nimmineyya nimmituṃ samattho.
atk-s0508a2:6087_1: Tassa nimminane na mayhaṃ bhāro atthi.
atk-s0508a2:6087_3: vasībhūtomhi iddhiyāti na kevalaṃ manomayavikubbanāsu eva,
atk-s0508a2:6088_0: Samādhivijjāvasipāramīgatoti savitakkasavicārādisamādhīsu ceva pubbenivāsañāṇādivijjāsu ca vasībhāvena pāramiṃ koṭiṃ patto asi.
atk-s0508a2:6088_1: Tassa taṇhānissayādirahitassa satthu sāsane yathāvuttehi guṇehi ukkaṃsagato.
atk-s0508a2:6089_0: Kīdiso nirayo āsītiādayo gāthā koṭṭhaṃ anupavisitvā nikkhamitvā ṭhitamāraṃ tajjentena therena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6089_2: Yattha dussīti yasmiṃ niraye “dussī”ti evaṃnāmo māro.
atk-s0508a2:6089_4: Vidhuraṃ sāvakanti vidhuraṃ nāma kakusandhassa bhagavato aggasāvakaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6089_6: Kakusandhañca brāhmaṇanti kakusandhañca sammāsambuddhaṃ āsajjāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6089_7: Bhagavantaṃ uddissa kumāraṃ āvisitvā mārena khittā sakkharā therassa sīse pati.
atk-s0508a2:6090_0: Sataṃ āsi ayosaṅkūti tasmiṃ kira niraye upapannānaṃ tigāvuto attabhāvo hoti,
atk-s0508a2:6090_2: Atha nirayapālā tālakkhandhappamāṇānaṃ ayosūlānaṃ ādittānaṃ sampajjalitānaṃ sajotibhūtānaṃ satameva gahetvā
atk-s0508a2:6090_3: “imasmiṃva te ṭhāne ṭhitena hadayena cintetvā pāpaṃ kata”nti sudhādoṇiyaṃ sudhaṃ koṭṭentā viya hadayamajjhaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6090_6: evaṃ gacchantā ca pañcahi vassasatehi ubho ante patvā puna nivattamānā pañcahi vassasatehi hadayamajjhaṃ upagacchanti,
atk-s0508a2:6090_9: Sā kira vedanā mahānirayavedanāto dukkhatarā hoti,
atk-s0508a2:6090_12: Īdiso nirayo āsīti imasmiṃ ṭhāne devadūtasuttena nirayo dīpetabbo.
atk-s0508a2:6091_0: Yo etamabhijānātīti yo mahābhiñño etaṃ kammaphalañca hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ viya abhimukhaṃ katvā paccakkhato jānāti.
atk-s0508a2:6091_1: Bhikkhu buddhassa sāvakoti bhinnakileso bhikkhu sammāsambuddhassa sāvako. Kaṇha,
atk-s0508a2:6092_0: Majjhesarasminti mahāsamuddassa majjhe kira udakaṃ vatthuṃ katvā nibbattavimānāni kappaṭṭhitikāni honti.
atk-s0508a2:6092_3: pabbatamatthake jalitanaḷaggikhandho viya ca etesaṃ acciyo jotanti,
atk-s0508a2:6092_4: tena te ativiya pabhassarā pabhāsampannā honti.
atk-s0508a2:6092_7: Puthu nānattavaṇṇiyoti nīlādivasena nānattavaṇṇā bahū accharā tattha tesu vimānesu naccanti.
atk-s0508a2:6093_0: Yo etamabhijānātīti yo etaṃ vimānaṃ vatthuṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā jānāti.
atk-s0508a2:6094_2: Migāramātupāsādaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhena kampayīti pubbārāme visākhāya mahāupāsikāya kāritaṃ sahassagabbhapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6094_4: Ekasmiñhi samaye pubbārāme yathāvuttapāsāde bhagavati viharante sambahulā navakatarā bhikkhū uparipāsāde
atk-s0508a2:6094_6: taṃ sutvā bhagavā te saṃvejetvā attano dhammadesanāya bhājanabhūte kātukāmo āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānattheraṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0508a2:6094_10: Taṃ sutvā thero satthu ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā abhiññāpādakaṃ āpokasiṇārammaṇaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0508a2:6094_11: vuṭṭhāya “pāsādassa patiṭṭhitokāsaṃ udakaṃ hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāya pāsādamatthake thūpikaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhena pahari,
atk-s0508a2:6094_15: Te bhikkhū bhītā saṃviggā pāsādassa patanabhayena tato nikkhamitvā bhagavato samīpe aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:6094_16: Satthā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0508a2:6094_17: Taṃ sutvā tesu keci sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0508a2:6095_0: Vejayantapāsādanti so vejayantapāsādo tāvatiṃsabhavane yojanasahassubbedho anekasahassaniyyūhakūṭāgārapaṭimaṇḍito
atk-s0508a2:6095_1: devāsurasaṅgāme asure jinitvā sakke devānaminde nagaramajjhe ṭhite uṭṭhito vijayantena nibbattattā “vejayanto”ti
atk-s0508a2:6095_4: Tampi hi ayaṃ thero pādaṅguṭṭhena kampesi.
atk-s0508a2:6095_5: Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavantaṃ pubbārāme viharantaṃ sakko devarājā upasaṅkamitvā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:6095_7: So taṃ sutvā attamano pamudito abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā attano devalokameva gato.
atk-s0508a2:6095_9: “ayaṃ sakko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evarūpaṃ gambhīraṃ nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0508a2:6095_14: So tāvadeva tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ tamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:6095_15: Sakko dibbasampattiyā pamatto hutvā vikkhepaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:6095_16: Thero tassa saṃvegajananatthaṃ vejayantapāsādaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhena kampesi.
atk-s0508a2:6098_0: Ayaṃ panattho cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttisuttena dīpetabbo. Kampitākāro heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0508a2:6099_0: Sakkaṃ so paripucchatīti yathāvuttameva therassa taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttipucchaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6099_3: Tassa sakko viyākāsīti idaṃ therena pāsādakampane kate saṃviggahadayena pamādaṃ pahāya yoniso manasi karitvā pañhassa byākatabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6099_4: Satthārā desitaniyāmeneva hi so tadā kathesi.
atk-s0508a2:6099_6: Tattha sakkaṃ so paripucchatīti sakkaṃ devarājaṃ so moggallānatthero satthārā desitāya taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiyā sammadeva gahitabhāvaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:6099_7: Atītatthe hi idaṃ vattamānavacanaṃ. Api, āvuso, jānāsīti, āvuso,
atk-s0508a2:6099_10: Taṇhakkhayavimuttiyoti yathā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiyo satthārā tuyhaṃ desitā,
atk-s0508a2:6100_7: yā te diṭṭhi pure ahūti imaṃ brahmalokaṃ upagantuṃ samattho natthi koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā,
atk-s0508a2:6100_8: satthu idhāgamanato pubbe yā tuyhaṃ diṭṭhi ahosi,
atk-s0508a2:6100_9: kiṃ ajjāpi idānipi sā diṭṭhi na vigatāti?
atk-s0508a2:6100_11: brahmaloke pabhassaranti brahmaloke vītipatantaṃ mahākappinamahākassapādīhi sāvakehi parivāritassa tejodhātuṃ
atk-s0508a2:6100_12: samāpajjitvā nisinnassa sasāvakassa bhagavato obhāsaṃ passasīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6100_13: Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavā brahmaloke sudhammāya sabhāya sannipatitvā sannisinnassa –
atk-s0508a2:6100_14: “atthi nu kho koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃmahiddhiko,
atk-s0508a2:6100_15: yo idha āgantuṃ sakkuṇeyyā”ti cintentassa brahmuno cittamaññāya tattha gantvā brahmuno matthake ākāse
atk-s0508a2:6100_16: nisinno tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā obhāsaṃ muñcanto mahāmoggallānādīnaṃ āgamanaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0508a2:6100_17: Saha cintanena tepi tattha gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā satthu ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0508a2:6100_18: paccekadisāsu nisīditvā obhāsaṃ vissajjitvā sakalabrahmaloko ekobhāso ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:6100_19: Satthā brahmuno kallacittataṃ ñatvā catusaccapakāsanaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0508a2:6101_0: “Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
atk-s0508a2:6101_1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brahmuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti –
atk-s0508a2:6101_4: Atha kho bhagavā tassa brahmuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya,
atk-s0508a2:6101_6: evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0508a2:6101_7: Atha kho bhagavā tassa brahmuno upari vehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā.
atk-s0508a2:6102_2: Addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tassa brahmuno
atk-s0508a2:6102_4: Disvāna seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya,
atk-s0508a2:6102_6: evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0508a2:6102_7: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno puratthimaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato.
atk-s0508a2:6103_2: Addasā kho āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tassa brahmuno
atk-s0508a2:6103_5: evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0508a2:6103_6: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato.
atk-s0508a2:6104_2: Addasā kho āyasmā mahākappino bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tassa brahmuno
atk-s0508a2:6104_5: evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0508a2:6104_6: Atha kho āyasmā mahākappino pacchimaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno.
atk-s0508a2:6104_7: Uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato.
atk-s0508a2:6105_2: Addasā kho āyasmā anuruddho bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tassa brahmuno
atk-s0508a2:6105_5: evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0508a2:6105_6: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho uttaraṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato.
atk-s0508a2:6105_7: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ brahmānaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0508a2:6106_0: “Ajjāpi te āvuso sā diṭṭhi, yā te diṭṭhi pure ahu;
atk-s0508a2:6108_0: “Na me mārisa sā diṭṭhi, yā me diṭṭhi pure ahu;
atk-s0508a2:6110_0: Svāhaṃ ajja kathaṃ vajjaṃ, ahaṃ niccomhi sassato”ti.
atk-s0508a2:6111_0: “Atha kho bhagavā taṃ brahmānaṃ saṃvejetvā seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso…pe…
atk-s0508a2:6111_1: evameva tasmiṃ brahmaloke antarahito jetavane pāturahosi.
atk-s0508a2:6111_2: Atha kho so brahmā aññataraṃ brahmapārisajjaṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0508a2:6111_5: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ evaṃ vadehi ‘atthi nu kho mārisa moggallāna,
atk-s0508a2:6111_6: aññepi tassa bhagavato sāvakā evaṃmahiddhikā evaṃmahānubhāvā seyyathāpi bhavaṃ moggallāno, kassapo, kappino,
atk-s0508a2:6111_8: mārisā”ti kho so brahmapārisajjo tassa brahmuno paṭissutvā yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0508a2:6111_12: aññepi tassa bhagavato sāvakā evaṃmahiddhikā evaṃmahānubhāvā seyyathāpi bhavaṃ moggallāno, kassapo, kappino,
atk-s0508a2:6111_14: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ brahmapārisajjaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0508a2:6114_0: “Atha kho so brahmapārisajjo āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā yena so brahmā tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0508a2:6117_0: “Idamavoca so brahmapārisajjo. Attamano ca so brahmā tassa brahmapārisajjassa bhāsitaṃ abhinandī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:6118_0: Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “ayaṃ panattho bakabrahmasuttena dīpetabbo”ti.
atk-s0508a2:6119_0: Mahāneruno kūṭanti kūṭasīsena sakalameva sinerupabbatarājaṃ vadati.
atk-s0508a2:6119_1: Vimokkhena aphassayīti jhānavimokkhanissayena abhiññāṇena phassayīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a2:6119_7: Ye ca bhūmisayā narāti bhūmisayā narā nāma aparagoyānakā ca uttarakurukā ca manussā.
atk-s0508a2:6120_0: “Ekasmiṃ kira samaye anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā ‘sve, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:6120_1: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā’ti nimantetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a2:6120_2: Taṃdivasañca bhagavato paccūsasamaye dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokentassa nandopanando nāma nāgarājā ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchi.
atk-s0508a2:6120_3: Bhagavā ‘ayaṃ nāgarājā mayhaṃ ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0508a2:6120_4: kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī’ti āvajjento saraṇagamanassa upanissayaṃ disvā ‘ayaṃ micchādiṭṭhiko tīsu ratanesu appasanno,
atk-s0508a2:6120_5: ko nu kho imaṃ micchādiṭṭhito vimoceyyā’ti āvajjento mahāmoggallānattheraṃ addasa.
atk-s0508a2:6121_0: “Tato pabhātāya rattiyā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi – ‘ānanda,
atk-s0508a2:6121_1: pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ ārocehi tathāgato devacārikaṃ gacchatī’ti.
atk-s0508a2:6121_3: So dibbaratanapallaṅke dibbena setacchattena dhāriyamāno tividhanāṭakehi ceva nāgaparisāya ca parivuto
atk-s0508a2:6121_4: dibbabhājanesu upaṭṭhāpitaṃ annapānavidhiṃ olokayamāno nisinno hoti.
atk-s0508a2:6121_5: Atha kho bhagavā yathā nāgarājā passati,
atk-s0508a2:6121_6: tathā katvā tassa vimānamatthakeneva pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ tāvatiṃsadevalokābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0508a2:6122_0: “Tena kho pana samayena nandopanandassa nāgarājassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti –
atk-s0508a2:6122_1: ‘ime hi nāma muṇḍakā samaṇakā amhākaṃ uparibhavanena devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ bhavanaṃ pavisantipi nikkhamantipi,
atk-s0508a2:6122_2: na idāni ito paṭṭhāya imesaṃ amhākaṃ matthake pādapaṃsuṃ okirantānaṃ gantuṃ dassāmī’ti uṭṭhāya sinerupādaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6122_3: gantvā taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā sineruṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6123_0: “Atha kho āyasmā raṭṭhapālo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ‘pubbe, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:6123_9: na vejayantassa pāsādassa upari dhajaṃ passāmī’ti? Ayaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6123_11: nandopanando nāma nāgarājā tumhākaṃ kupito sineruṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇena paṭicchādetvā andhakāraṃ katvā ṭhitoti.
atk-s0508a2:6123_15: Atha kho āyasmā bhaddiyo āyasmā rāhuloti anukkamena sabbepi bhikkhū uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:6124_3: Thero attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā mahantaṃ nāgarājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā nandopanandaṃ cuddasakkhattuṃ bhogehi
atk-s0508a2:6124_4: parikkhipitvā tassa phaṇassa matthake attano phaṇaṃ ṭhapetvā sinerunā saddhiṃ abhinippīḷesi.
atk-s0508a2:6124_15: Nāgarājā ‘ayaṃ maṃ sinerunā abhinippīḷetvā dhūmāyati ceva pajjalati cā’ti cintetvā, ‘bho,
atk-s0508a2:6124_16: tuvaṃ kosī’ti paṭipucchi. Ahaṃ kho, nanda,
atk-s0508a2:6125_0: “Thero taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā tassa dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotena pavisitvā vāmakaṇṇasotena nikkhami,
atk-s0508a2:6125_5: Thero mukhena pavisitvā antokucchiyaṃ pācīnena ca pacchimena ca caṅkamati.
atk-s0508a2:6125_9: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā, tiṭṭhatu, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:6125_11: ahaṃ nandopanandasadisānaṃ nāgarājānaṃ satampi sahassampi satasahassampi dameyya’nti āha.
atk-s0508a2:6126_2: nikkhamanakāle dāni naṃ dāṭhāntare pakkhipitvā saṅkhādissāmī’ti cintetvā ‘nikkhamatha, bhante,
atk-s0508a2:6126_3: mā maṃ antokucchiyaṃ aparāparaṃ caṅkamanto bādhayitthā’ti āha.
atk-s0508a2:6126_8: ‘Avasesā bhikkhū kira ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihāriyāni kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyuṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6126_9: imaṃ pana ṭhānaṃ patvā evaṃ khippanisantino hutvā samāpajjituṃ nāsakkhissantī’ti nesaṃ bhagavā nāgarājadamanaṃ nānujāni.
atk-s0508a2:6127_0: “Nāgarājā ‘ahaṃ imassa samaṇassa nāsavātena lomakūpampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6127_2: Thero attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā supaṇṇarūpaṃ nimminitvā supaṇṇavātaṃ dassento nāgarājānaṃ anubandhi,
atk-s0508a2:6127_3: nāgarājā taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā, ‘bhante,
atk-s0508a2:6127_4: tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī’ti vadanto therassa pāde vandi.
atk-s0508a2:6127_12: nāgarājā’ti vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto anāthapiṇḍikassa nivesanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a2:6128_2: Moggallānassa ca nandopanandassa ca saṅgāmo ahosīti.
atk-s0508a2:6128_9: sattāhaṃ therassa sakkāraṃ karissāmī’ti vatvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0508a2:6129_0: Yo etamabhijānātīti etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ vimokkhaṃ phusanakaraṇavasena jānāti.
atk-s0508a2:6130_1: ahaṃ bālaṃ ḍahāmīti evaṃ na aggi abhisaṃceteti,
atk-s0508a2:6130_3: bālo eva pana “ayaṃ mandāgatī”ti anijalantaṃ viya jalitaṃ aggiṃ āsajja naṃ paḍayhati, evameva, māra,
atk-s0508a2:6130_6: tvaññeva pana tathā āgamanādiatthena tathāgataṃ aggikhandhasadisaṃ ariyasāvakaṃ āsajja attānaṃ ḍahissasi,
atk-s0508a2:6131_1: Na me pāpaṃ vipaccatīti mama pāpaṃ na vipaccati, kiṃ nu, māra,
atk-s0508a2:6132_0: Karoto te cīyate pāpanti ekaṃsena karontassa te pāpaṃ cirarattāya cirakālaṃ anatthāya dukkhāya upacīyati. Māra,
atk-s0508a2:6132_1: nibbinda buddhamhāti catusaccabuddhato buddhasāvakato nibbinda nibbijja parato kammaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6132_2: Āsaṃ mākāsi bhikkhusūti “bhikkhū virodhemi vihesemī”ti etaṃ āsaṃ mākāsi.
atk-s0508a2:6133_6: So dummano yakkhoti so māro domanassiko hutvā tattheva tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne antaradhāyi,
atk-s0508a2:6133_9: Yaṃ panettha antarantarā atthato na vibhattaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6134_0: Evamayaṃ mahāthero māraṃ tajjetvā devacārikānarakacārikādivasena aññehi sāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ sattūpakāraṃ katvā āyupariyosāne parinibbāyi.
atk-s0508a2:6134_1: Parinibbāyanto ca anomadassissa bhagavato pādamūle paṇidhānaṃ katvā tato paṭṭhāya tattha tattha bhave
atk-s0508a2:6134_2: uḷārāni puññāni katvā sāvakapāramiyā matthake ṭhitopi antarā katassa pāpakammassa vasena uṭṭhitāya kammapilotikāya
atk-s0508a2:6134_3: titthiyehi uyyojitehi corehi bādhito anappakaṃ sarīrakhedaṃ katvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0508a2:6156_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:6173_0: “Asmimānaṃ na passāmi, māno mayhaṃ na vijjati;
atk-s0508a2:6182_0: Sattatinipāte nikkhantaṃ vata maṃ santantiādikā āyasmato vaṅgīsattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a2:6182_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbatto,
atk-s0508a2:6182_3: purimanayeneva vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭibhānavantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā satthu adhikārakammaṃ katvā –
atk-s0508a2:6182_4: “ahampi anāgate paṭibhānavantānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā,
atk-s0508a2:6182_5: satthārā byākato yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a2:6182_6: nibbattitvā vaṅgīsoti laddhanāmo tayo bede uggaṇhanto ācariyaṃ ārādhetvā,
atk-s0508a2:6182_7: chavasīsamantaṃ nāma sikkhitvā chavasīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭetvā “ayaṃ satto asukayoniyaṃ nibbatto”ti jānāti.
atk-s0508a2:6183_0: Brāhmaṇā “ayaṃ amhākaṃ jīvitamaggo”ti ñatvā vaṅgīsaṃ gahetvā paṭicchannayāne nisīdāpetvā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo vicaranti.
atk-s0508a2:6183_1: Vaṅgīsopi tivassamatthake matānampi sīsaṃ āharāpetvā nakhena ākoṭetvā “ayaṃ satto asukayoniyaṃ nibbatto”ti
atk-s0508a2:6183_2: vatvā mahājanassa kaṅkhacchedanatthaṃ te te jane āvāhetvā attano attano gatiṃ kathāpeti.
atk-s0508a2:6183_4: So taṃ nissāya mahājanassa hatthato satampi sahassampi labhatīti.
atk-s0508a2:6183_5: Brāhmaṇā vaṅgīsamādāya yathāruciṃ vicaritvā puna sāvatthiṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:6183_6: Vaṅgīso satthu guṇe sutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:6183_7: Brāhmaṇā “samaṇo gotamo māyāya taṃ āvaṭṭessatī”ti paṭikkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:6183_8: Vaṅgīso tesaṃ vacanaṃ anādiyitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a2:6184_4: Tena tivassamatthake matānampi sīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭetvā nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ jānāmī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:6184_5: Satthā tassa ekaṃ niraye nibbattassa sīsaṃ dassesi,
atk-s0508a2:6184_11: ayaṃ satto niraye nibbatto”ti āha. “Sādhu, vaṅgīsa,
atk-s0508a2:6184_17: Parinibbutassa pana sīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭento neva antaṃ na koṭiṃ passi.
atk-s0508a2:6184_18: Atha naṃ satthā “na sakkosi vaṅgīsā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0508a2:6184_19: “Upaparikkhāmi tāvā”ti punappunaṃ parivattetvā ākoṭentopi bāhirakamantena khīṇāsavassa gatiṃ kathaṃ jānissati,
atk-s0508a2:6186_0: Asattaṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6189_3: taṃ vijjaṃ me dethā”ti apacitiṃ dassetvā satthu santike nisīdi.
atk-s0508a2:6189_5: Vaṅgīso “yaṃkiñci katvā mayā imaṃ mantaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti brāhmaṇe āha –
atk-s0508a2:6189_7: ahaṃ mantaṃ uggaṇhitvā sakalajambudīpe jeṭṭhako bhavissāmi,
atk-s0508a2:6189_8: tumhākampi tena bhaddakameva bhavissatī”ti mantatthāya satthusantikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0508a2:6189_9: Tadā ca thero nigrodhakappo bhagavato santike ṭhito hoti,
atk-s0508a2:6189_14: Athassa satthā “mantaparivāraṃ tāva uggaṇhāhī”ti dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhānañca ācikkhi.
atk-s0508a2:6189_18: samaṇasma gotamassa santike sippaṃ sikkhita”nti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:6189_22: Brāhmaṇā “tvampi dāni samaṇassa gotamassa vasaṃ āpanno,
atk-s0508a2:6189_24: kiṃ mayaṃ tava santike karissāmā”ti āgatamaggeneva pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:6203_0: Devā naro vā brahmā vā, paṭivattā na vijjati.
atk-s0508a2:6207_0: Guṇaṃ bahuṃ pakittetvā, etadagge ṭhapesi taṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6217_0: Namo te sabbalokagga, namo te abhayaṃ kara.
atk-s0508a2:6219_0: Namo te santisukhada, namo te saraṇaṃ kara.
atk-s0508a2:6225_0: Yo so buddhaṃ abhojesi, sattāhaṃ sahasāvakaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6231_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a2:6233_0: Vaṅgīso nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a2:6234_0: “Taṃ sutvā mudito hutvā, yāvajīvaṃ tadā jinaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:6238_0: “Pacchime ca bhave dāni, jāto vippakule ahaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:6243_0: Vaṅgīso iti me nāmaṃ, abhavī lokasammataṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6251_0: Tadā so paṇḍito vīro, uttariṃ samavoca me.
atk-s0508a2:6257_0: Mamāha vadataṃ seṭṭho, kacci vaṅgīsa jānāsi.
atk-s0508a2:6268_0: Takkikā panimā gāthā, ṭhānaso paṭibhanti taṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6270_0: Tena hi dāni vaṅgīsa, ṭhānaso santhavāhi maṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6272_0: Ṭhānaso me tadā tuṭṭho, jino agge ṭhapesi maṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6276_0: Yathāyaṃ bhikkhu vaṅgīso, evaṃ dhāretha bhikkhavo.
atk-s0508a2:6277_0: “Satasahasse kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a2:6282_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6285_0: Arahā pana hutvā thero satthu santikaṃ gacchanto cakkhupathato paṭṭhāya candena, sūriyena, ākāsena,
atk-s0508a2:6285_4: hatthināgenāti tena tena saddhiṃ upamento anekehi padasatehi satthāraṃ vaṇṇentova upagacchati.
atk-s0508a2:6285_5: Tena taṃ satthā saṅghamajjhe nisinno paṭibhānavantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a2:6285_6: Atha therena arahattappattito pubbe ca pacchā ca taṃ taṃ cittaṃ āgamma bhāsitā.
atk-s0508a2:6294_0: Neva maṃ byādhayissanti, dhamme samhi patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0508a2:6297_0: Nibbānagamanaṃ maggaṃ, tattha me nirato mano.
atk-s0508a2:6300_0: Tathā maccu karissāmi, na me maggampi dakkhasi.
atk-s0508a2:6303_0: Vanathaṃ na kareyya kuhiñci, nibbanatho avanatho sa bhikkhu.
atk-s0508a2:6306_0: Parijīyati sabbamaniccaṃ, evaṃ samecca caranti mutattā.
atk-s0508a2:6308_0: “Upadhīsu janā gadhitāse, diṭṭhasute paṭighe ca mute ca;
atk-s0508a2:6309_0: Ettha vinodaya chandamanejo, yo hettha na limpati muni tamāhu.
atk-s0508a2:6312_0: Na ca vaggagatassa kuhiñci, no pana duṭṭhullagāhī sa bhikkhu.
atk-s0508a2:6315_0: Santaṃ padaṃ ajjhagamā muni, paṭicca parinibbuto kaṅkhati kālaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6321_0: Socanti janā cirarattaṃ, mānahatā nirayaṃ upapannā.
atk-s0508a2:6323_0: “Na hi socati bhikkhu kadāci, maggajino sammā paṭipanno;
atk-s0508a2:6326_0: “Tasmā akhilo idha padhānavā, nīvaraṇāni pahāya visuddho;
atk-s0508a2:6342_0: Pare ca na vihiṃseyya, sā ve vācā subhāsitā.
atk-s0508a2:6345_0: Yaṃ anādāya pāpāni, paresaṃ bhāsate piyaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6347_0: “Saccaṃ ve amatā vācā, esa dhammo sanantano;
atk-s0508a2:6348_0: Sacce atthe ca dhamme ca, āhu santo patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0508a2:6385_0: Sāvako te mahāvīra, pāde vandati vaṅgiso.
atk-s0508a2:6388_0: Taṃ passatha bandhapamuñca karaṃ, asitaṃva bhāgaso pavibhajja.
atk-s0508a2:6391_0: Tasmiñca amate akkhāte, dhammadasā ṭhitā asaṃhīrā.
atk-s0508a2:6394_0: Ñatvā ca sacchikatvā ca, aggaṃ so desayi dasaddhānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6396_0: “Evaṃ sudesite dhamme, ko pamādo vijānataṃ dhammaṃ;
atk-s0508a2:6397_0: Tasmā hi tassa bhagavato sāsane, appamatto sadā namassamanusikkhe.
atk-s0508a2:6417_0: “Cando yathā vigatavalāhake nabhe, virocati vītamalova bhāṇumā;
atk-s0508a2:6418_0: Evampi aṅgīrasa tvaṃ mahāmuni, atirocasi yasasā sabbalokaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6420_0: “Kāveyyamattā vicarimha pubbe, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
atk-s0508a2:6424_0: Dhammaṃ sutvā pasīdimha, saddhā no udapajjatha.
atk-s0508a2:6441_0: “Evamete tathā vuttā, diṭṭhā me te yathā tathā;
atk-s0508a2:6442_0: Sadattho me anuppatto, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6444_0: “Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
atk-s0508a2:6450_0: “Pucchāmi satthāramanomapaññaṃ, diṭṭheva dhamme yo vicikicchānaṃ chettā;
atk-s0508a2:6451_0: Aggāḷave kālamakāsi bhikkhu, ñāto yasassī abhinibbutatto.
atk-s0508a2:6453_0: “Nigrodhakappo iti tassa nāmaṃ, tayā kataṃ bhagavā brāhmaṇassa;
atk-s0508a2:6454_0: So taṃ namassaṃ acari mutyapekho, āraddhavīriyo daḷhadhammadassī.
atk-s0508a2:6456_0: “Taṃ sāvakaṃ sakka mayampi sabbe, aññātumicchāma samantacakkhu;
atk-s0508a2:6457_0: Samavaṭṭhitā no savanāya sotā, tuvaṃ no satthā tvamanuttarosi.
atk-s0508a2:6459_0: “Chinda no vicikicchaṃ brūhi metaṃ, parinibbutaṃ vedaya bhūripañña;
atk-s0508a2:6460_0: Majjheva no bhāsa samantacakkhu, sakkova devāna sahassanetto.
atk-s0508a2:6462_0: “Ye keci ganthā idha mohamaggā, aññāṇapakkhā vicikicchaṭhānā;
atk-s0508a2:6463_0: Tathāgataṃ patvā na te bhavanti, cakkhuñhi etaṃ paramaṃ narānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6465_0: “No ce hi jātu puriso kilese, vāto yathā abbhaghanaṃ vihāne;
atk-s0508a2:6466_0: Tamovassa nivuto sabbaloko, jotimantopi na pabhāseyyuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6468_0: “Dhīrā ca pajjotakarā bhavanti, taṃ taṃ ahaṃ vīra tatheva maññe;
atk-s0508a2:6469_0: Vipassinaṃ jānamupāgamimha, parisāsu no āvikarohi kappaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6471_0: “Khippaṃ giraṃ eraya vaggu vagguṃ, haṃsova paggayha saṇikaṃ nikūja;
atk-s0508a2:6472_0: Bindussarena suvikappitena, sabbeva te ujjugatā suṇoma.
atk-s0508a2:6475_0: Na kāmakāro hi puthujjanānaṃ, saṅkheyyakāro ca tathāgatānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6478_0: Ayamañjali pacchimo suppaṇāmito, mā mohayī jānamanomapañña.
atk-s0508a2:6481_0: Vāriṃ yathā ghammani ghammatatto, vācābhikaṅkhāmi sutaṃ pavassa.
atk-s0508a2:6484_0: Nibbāyi so ādu saupādiseso, yathā vimutto ahu taṃ suṇoma.
atk-s0508a2:6488_0: Atāri jātiṃ maraṇaṃ asesaṃ, iccabravi bhagavā pañcaseṭṭho.
atk-s0508a2:6491_0: Amoghaṃ kira me puṭṭhaṃ, na maṃ vañcesi brāhmaṇo.
atk-s0508a2:6493_0: “Yathā vādī tathā kārī, ahu buddhassa sāvako;
atk-s0508a2:6494_0: Acchecchi maccuno jālaṃ, tataṃ māyāvino daḷhaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6501_0: Imā gāthā saṅgītikāle ekajjhaṃ katvā saṅgahaṃ āropitā.
atk-s0508a2:6501_1: Tattha “nikkhantaṃ vata maṃ santa”ntiādayo pañca gāthā āyasmā vaṅgīso navo acirapabbajito hutvā vihāraṃ
atk-s0508a2:6501_2: upagatā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā sambahulā itthiyo disvā uppannarāgo taṃ vinodento abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:6502_1: agārasmānagāriyanti agārato nikkhantaṃ anagāriyaṃ pabbajitaṃ maṃ samānaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6502_6: nayimaṃ anuddhaṃsituṃ yutta”nti evaṃ aparihārato nillajjā.
atk-s0508a2:6503_8: ca yassa āropitassa jiyāya bandho lohasīsādīnaṃ bhāro daṇḍe gahetvā yāva kaṇḍapamāṇā nabhaṃ ukkhittassa pathavito muccati.
atk-s0508a2:6503_13: sikkhitā katahatthā uggā daḷhadhanuno mahissāsā uggaputtā sahassamattā kadācipi yuddhe parājayaṃ apattā
atk-s0508a2:6503_14: appamattā samantato ṭhatvā thambhaṃ upanissāya sacepi vasseyyuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6503_15: Tādisehipi issāsasahassehi samantā sare parikirīyante susikkhito puriso daṇḍaṃ gahetvā sabbe sare attano sarīre apatamāne katvā pādamūle pāteyya.
atk-s0508a2:6503_16: Tattha ekopi issāso dve sare ekato khipanto nāma natthi.
atk-s0508a2:6503_17: Itthiyo pana rūpārammaṇādivasena pañca pañca sare ekato khipanti,
atk-s0508a2:6503_19: Ettakā bhiyyoti imāhi itthīhi bhiyyopi bahū itthiyo attano itthikuttahāsabhāvādito vidhaṃsenti.
atk-s0508a2:6504_0: Sakkhī hi me sutaṃ etanti sammukhā mayā etaṃ sutaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6504_4: Tattha me nirato manoti tasmiṃ vipassanāmagge mayhaṃ cittaṃ nirataṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6505_0: Evañce maṃ viharantanti evaṃ aniccaasubhajjhānabhāvanāya ca vipassanābhāvanāya ca viharantaṃ maṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6505_3: na me maggampi dakkhasīti mayā kataṃ maggampi yathā na passasi,
atk-s0508a2:6506_0: Aratiñcātiādikā pañca gāthā attano santāne uppanne aratiādike vinodentena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6506_1: Tattha aratinti adhikusalesu dhammesu pantasenāsanesu ca ukkaṇṭhanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6506_5: gehanissitaṃ puttadārādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ ñātivitakkādiñca micchāvitakkaṃ anavasesato pahāya.
atk-s0508a2:6506_6: Vanathaṃ na kareyya kuhiñcīti ajjhattikabāhirappabhede sabbasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ taṇhaṃ na kareyyaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6506_7: Nibbanatho avanatho sa bhikkhūti yo hi sabbena sabbaṃ nittaṇho,
atk-s0508a2:6506_8: tato eva katthacipi nandiyā abhāvato avanatho,
atk-s0508a2:6506_9: so bhikkhu nāma saṃsāre bhayassa sammadeva ikkhaṇatāya bhinnakilesatāya cāti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6507_1: rūpagataṃ jagatogadhaṃ kiñcīti yaṃkiñci idha pathavīgataṃ bhūminissitaṃ vehāsaṃ vehāsaṭṭhaṃ devalokanissitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6507_2: rūpagataṃ rūpajātaṃ ruppanasabhāvaṃ jagatogadhaṃ lokikaṃ bhavattayapariyāpannaṃ saṅkhataṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6507_4: tato eva aniccaṃ tato eva dukkhaṃ anattāti evaṃ tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ āha.
atk-s0508a2:6507_6: Evaṃ samecca caranti mutattāti evaṃ samecca abhisamecca vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0508a2:6508_3: Ettha hi visesato kāmaguṇūpadhīsu chando apanetabboti dassento āha diṭṭhasute paṭighe ca mute cāti.
atk-s0508a2:6508_11: Ettha vinodaya chandamanejoti etasmiṃ diṭṭhādibhede pañcakāmaguṇe kāmacchandaṃ vinodehi,
atk-s0508a2:6508_12: tathā sati sabbattha anejo avikappo bhavasi.
atk-s0508a2:6508_13: Yo hettha na limpati muni tamāhūti yo hi ettha kāmaguṇe taṇhālepena na limpati,
atk-s0508a2:6508_15: “Atha saṭṭhisitā”ti pāḷīti adhippāyena keci “saṭṭhidhammārammaṇanissitā”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0508a2:6508_17: appakañhi ūnaṃ adhikaṃ vā na gaṇanūpagaṃ hotīti.
atk-s0508a2:6508_18: Aṭṭhasaṭṭhisitāti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatasannissitā micchāvitakkāti atthoti keci vadanti.
atk-s0508a2:6508_19: Diṭṭhigatikā ca sattāvāsābhāvaladdhiṃ ajjhūpagatāti adhiccasamuppannavādaṃ ṭhapetvā itaresaṃ vasena “atha saṭṭhisitā savitakkā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6508_22: Puthujjanatāya adhammā niviṭṭhāti te pana micchāvitakkā niccādigāhavasena adhammā dhammato apetā puthujjanatāyaṃ andhabāle niviṭṭhā abhiniviṭṭhā.
atk-s0508a2:6508_23: Na ca vaggagatassa kuhiñcīti yattha katthaci vatthusmiṃ sassatavādādimicchādiṭṭhivaggagato,
atk-s0508a2:6508_26: puthū janatāya adhammā niviṭṭhā”ti padaṃ uddharitvā atha cha ārammaṇanissitā puthū adhammavitakkā janatāya niviṭṭhāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6508_27: Tathā na ca vaggagatassa kuhiñcīti tesaṃ vasena na katthaci kilesavaggagato bhaveyyāti ca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6508_28: No pana duṭṭhullagāhī sa bhikkhūti yo kilesehi dūsitattā ativiya duṭṭhullatā ca duṭṭhullānaṃ micchāvādānaṃ gaṇhanasīlo ca no assa no bhaveyya,
atk-s0508a2:6509_8: Parinibbutoti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena nibbānaṃ paṭicca saupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto.
atk-s0508a2:6509_9: Kaṅkhati kālanti idāni anupādisesanibbānatthāya kālaṃ āgameti.
atk-s0508a2:6510_0: Mānaṃ pajahassūtiādayo catasso gāthā paṭibhānasampattiṃ nissāya attano pavattamānaṃ mānaṃ vinodentena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6510_1: Tattha mānaṃ pajahassūti seyyamānādinavavidhaṃ mānaṃ pariccaja.
atk-s0508a2:6510_2: Gotamāti gotamagottassa bhagavato sāvakattā attānaṃ gotamagottaṃ katvā ālapati.
atk-s0508a2:6510_3: Mānapathanti mānassa pavattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ ayonisomanasikāraparikkhittaṃ jātiādiṃ tappaṭibaddhakilesappahānena jahassu pajaha.
atk-s0508a2:6510_5: Mānapathamhi sa mucchitoti mānavatthunimittaṃ mucchaṃ āpanno.
atk-s0508a2:6510_6: Vippaṭisārīhuvā cirarattanti imasmiṃ mānapathānuyogakkhaṇe vītivatte pubbeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇissa,
atk-s0508a2:6511_0: Makkhena makkhitā pajāti sūrādinā attānaṃ ukkaṃsetvā pare vambhetvā paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇena makkhena pisitattā makkhī.
atk-s0508a2:6511_1: Puggalo hi yathā yathā paresaṃ guṇe makkheti,
atk-s0508a2:6511_2: tathā tathā attano guṇe puñjati nirākaroti nāma.
atk-s0508a2:6512_1: Kittiñca sukhañcāti viññūhi pasaṃsitañca kāyikacetasikasukhañca anubhotīti paṭilabhati.
atk-s0508a2:6512_2: Dhammadasoti tamāhu tathattanti taṃ tathabhāvaṃ sammāpaṭipannaṃ yāthāvato dhammadassīti paṇḍitā āhu.
atk-s0508a2:6513_4: Vijjāyantakaro samitāvīti sabbaso samitakileso tividhāya vijjāya pariyosānappatto hotīti attānaṃ ovadati.
atk-s0508a2:6514_0: Athekadivasaṃ āyasmā ānando aññatarena rājamahāmattena nimantito pubbaṇhasamayaṃ tassa gehaṃ gantvā paññatte
atk-s0508a2:6514_2: Atha tasmiṃ gehe itthiyo sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0508a2:6514_5: Athāyasmato vaṅgīsassa navapabbajitassa ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetuṃ asakkontassa visabhāgārammaṇe rāgo uppajji.
atk-s0508a2:6514_6: So saddho ujujātiko kulaputto “ayaṃ me rāgo vaḍḍhitvā diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikampi atthaṃ nāseyyā”ti
atk-s0508a2:6514_7: cintetvā yathānisinnova therassa attano pavattiṃ āvikaronto “kāmarāgenā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:6514_9: cittaṃ pana bādhento cirataraṃ bādhetīti dassetuṃ “kāmarāgena ḍayhāmī”ti vatvā “cittaṃ me pariḍayhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6514_10: Nibbāpananti rāganibbāpanakāraṇaṃ rāgapariḷāhassa nibbāpanasamatthaṃ ovādaṃ karohīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6515_0: Saññāya vipariyesātiādikā gāthā tena yācitena āyasmatā ānandena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6515_1: Vipariyesāti vipallāsena asubhe subhanti pavattena viparītaggāhena.
atk-s0508a2:6515_4: Subhaṃ rāgūpasaṃhitanti rāgavaḍḍhanārammaṇaṃ subhaṃ parivajjento asubhasaññāya parivajjeyya,
atk-s0508a2:6516_1: Cittaṃ bhāvehi ekaggaṃ susamāhitanti attano cittavikkhepābhāvena ekaggaṃ ārammaṇesu susamāhitaṃ appitaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6516_2: katvā bhāvehi tava asubhānupassanaṃ sukaraṃ akkhāmīti.
atk-s0508a2:6516_3: Sati kāyagatā tyatthūti vuttakāyagatāsatibhāvanā tayā bhāvitā bahulīkatā hotūti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6516_4: Nibbidābahulo bhavāti attabhāve sabbasmiñca nibbedabahulo hohi.
atk-s0508a2:6517_0: Animittañca bhāvehīti niccanimittādīnaṃ ugghāṭanena visesato aniccānupassanā animittā nāma,
atk-s0508a2:6517_1: tato mānānusayamujjahāti taṃ bhāvento maggapaṭipāṭiyā aggamaggādhigamena mānānusayaṃ samucchinda.
atk-s0508a2:6517_2: Mānābhisamayāti mānassa dassanābhisamayā ceva pahānābhisamayā ca.
atk-s0508a2:6517_3: Upasantoti sabbaso rāgādīnaṃ santatāya upasanto carissasi viharissasīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6518_0: Tameva vācantiādikā catasso gāthā bhagavatā subhāsitasutte desite somanassajātena therena bhagavantaṃ sammukhā abhitthavantena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6518_1: Yāyattānaṃ na tāpayeti yāya vācāya hetubhūtāya attānaṃ vippaṭisārena na tāpeyya na viheṭheyya.
atk-s0508a2:6518_2: Pare ca na vihiṃseyyāti pare ca parehi bhindanto na bādheyya.
atk-s0508a2:6518_3: Sā ve vācā subhāsitāti sā vācā ekaṃsena subhāsitā nāma,
atk-s0508a2:6519_0: Paṭinanditāti paṭimukhabhāvena nanditā piyāyitā sampati āyatiñca suṇantehi sampaṭicchitā.
atk-s0508a2:6519_1: Yaṃ anādāyāti yaṃ vācaṃ bhāsanto pāpāni paresaṃ appiyāni aniṭṭhāni pharusavacanāni anādāya aggahetvā atthabyañjanamadhuraṃ piyameva dīpeti.
atk-s0508a2:6520_4: Esa dhammo sanantanoti yā ayaṃ saccavācā nāma,
atk-s0508a2:6520_6: Idameva hi porāṇānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ yaṃ te na alikaṃ bhāsiṃsu. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a2:6520_9: Tattha sacce patiṭṭhitattā eva attano ca paresañca atthe patiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0508a2:6520_10: atthe patiṭṭhitattā eva dhamme patiṭṭhitā hontīti veditabbā.
atk-s0508a2:6520_15: yaṃ paresaṃ atthato anapetattā atthaṃ anuparodhakaraṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6520_16: dhammato anapetattā dhammaṃ dhammikameva atthaṃ sādhetīti.
atk-s0508a2:6520_24: Atha vā yaṃ buddho nibbānapattiyā vā dukkhassantakiriyāya vāti dvinnaṃ nibbānadhātūnaṃ atthāya khemamaggappakāsanato khemaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0508a2:6520_25: Sā ve vācānamuttamāti sā vācā sabbavācānaṃ seṭṭhāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0508a2:6520_26: Imāya gāthāya mantāvacanavasena bhagavantaṃ abhitthavanto arahattanikūṭena thomanaṃ pariyosāpeti.
atk-s0508a2:6521_0: Gambhīrapaññoti tisso gāthā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa pasaṃsanavasena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6521_1: Tattha gambhīrapaññoti gambhīresu khandhāyatanādīsu pavattāya nipuṇāya paññāya samannāgatattā gambhīrapañño.
atk-s0508a2:6521_5: ayaṃ nibbānassa maggo”ti evaṃ magge ca amagge ca kovidatāya maggāmaggassa kovido.
atk-s0508a2:6521_6: Mahatiyā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ pattāya paññāya vasena mahāpañño.
atk-s0508a2:6521_7: Dhammaṃ deseti bhikkhunanti sammadeva pavattiṃ nivattiṃ vibhāvento bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0508a2:6521_8: Tassā pana desanāya pavattiākāraṃ dassetuṃ “saṃkhittenapī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6522_7: idaṃ dukkhanti yogo karaṇīyo”ti evaṃ saṃkhittenapi deseti.
atk-s0508a2:6522_10: Jātipi dukkhā”tiādinā nayena tāneva vibhajanto vitthārenapi bhāsati.
atk-s0508a2:6522_12: Sālikāyiva nigghosoti yathā madhuraṃ ambapakkaṃ sāyitvā pakkhehi vātaṃ datvā madhuraravaṃ nicchārentiyā sālikāya nigghoso,
atk-s0508a2:6522_13: evaṃ therassa dhammaṃ kathentassa madhuro nigghoso hoti.
atk-s0508a2:6522_14: Dhammasenāpatissa hi pittādīnaṃ vasena apalibuddhavacanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0508a2:6522_16: Paṭibhānaṃ udiyyatīti kathetukamyatāya sati samuddato vīciyo viya uparūpari anantaṃ paṭibhānaṃ uṭṭhahati.
atk-s0508a2:6523_10: Odhentīti avadahanti aññāya cittaṃ upaṭṭhapentā sotaṃ upanenti.
atk-s0508a2:6524_0: Ajja pannarasetiādikā catasso gāthā pavāraṇāsuttantadesanāya satthāraṃ mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā thomentena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6524_1: Tattha pannaraseti yasmiñhi samaye bhagavā pubbārāme nisīdanto sāyanhasamaye sampattaparisāya kālayuttaṃ samayayuttaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā,
atk-s0508a2:6524_5: samantato nisinnaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anuviloketvā tadahuposathe pavāraṇādivase nisinno hoti,
atk-s0508a2:6524_9: pañcasatamattā bhikkhū satthāraṃ parivāretvā nisajjavasena ceva ajjhāsayavasena ca samāgatā.
atk-s0508a2:6524_10: Te ca saṃyojanabandhanacchidāti saṃyojanasaṅkhāte santānassa bandhanabhūte kilese chinditvā ṭhitā.
atk-s0508a2:6524_11: Tato eva anīghā khīṇapunabbhavā isīti kilesadukkhābhāvena nidukkhā khīṇapunabbhavā,
atk-s0508a2:6525_1: Satthavāhanti aṭṭhaṅgike ariyamaggarathe āropetvā veneyyasatte vāheti saṃsārakantārato uttāretīti bhagavā satthavāho.
atk-s0508a2:6525_5: taṃ satthavāhaṃ anuttaraṃ satthāraṃ sāvakā payirupāsanti.
atk-s0508a2:6525_6: Tevijjā maccuhāyinoti evarūpehi sāvakehi parivārito cakkavatti viya rājā amaccaparivārito janapadacārikavasena samantā anupariyetīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a2:6526_2: Vande ādiccabandhunanti ādiccabandhuṃ satthāraṃ dasabalaṃ vandāmīti vadati.
atk-s0508a2:6527_0: Parosahassantiādikā catasso gāthā nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ bhagavantaṃ thomentena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6527_4: Nibbānaṃ pattassa ca kutocipi bhayaṃ natthīti nibbānaṃ akutobhayaṃ nāma.
atk-s0508a2:6528_0: “Āguṃ na karotī”tiādinā vuttakāraṇehi bhagavā nāgoti vuccatīti nāganāmosi bhagavāti.
atk-s0508a2:6528_2: vipassīsammāsambuddhato paṭṭhāya isīnaṃ vā sattamako isi.
atk-s0508a2:6529_2: pāde vandati vaṅgīsoti idaṃ thero arahattaṃ patvā attano visesādhigamaṃ pakāsento vadati.
atk-s0508a2:6530_0: Ummaggapathantiādikā catasso gāthā bhagavatā “kiṃ nu te, vaṅgīsa,
atk-s0508a2:6530_2: udāhu ṭhānaso cetā paṭibhantī”ti pucchitena ṭhānaso paṭibhantīti dassentena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6530_9: Atha bhagavā “ime bhikkhū vaṅgīsassa paṭibhānasampattiṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0508a2:6530_10: ahamassa paṭibhānasampattiṃ jānāpessāmī”ti cintetvā “kiṃ nu kho,
atk-s0508a2:6530_14: Pabhijja khīlānīti rāgādikhīlāni pañca bhinditvā carasi.
atk-s0508a2:6530_15: Taṃ passathāti evaṃ abhibhuyya ca chinditvā ca carantaṃ buddhaṃ passatha.
atk-s0508a2:6530_18: Bhāgaso paṭibhajjāti satipaṭṭhānādikoṭṭhāsato dhammaṃ paṭibhajjanīyaṃ katvā.
atk-s0508a2:6530_20: Uddesādikoṭṭhāsato pakārena vibhajitvā vibhajitvā dhammaṃ desetīti attho.
atk-s0508a2:6531_1: Anekavihitanti satipaṭṭhānādivasena anekavidhaṃ aṭṭhatiṃsāya vā kammaṭṭhānānaṃ vasena anekappakāraṃ amatāvahaṃ maggaṃ akkhāsi abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:6531_2: Tasmiñca amate akkhāteti tasmiṃ tena akkhāte amate amatāvahe.
atk-s0508a2:6531_4: Ṭhitā asaṃhīrāti kenaci asaṃhāriyā hutvā patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0508a2:6532_0: Tasmāti yasmā “esa dhammo sudesito”ti jānantena pamādo na kātabbo,
atk-s0508a2:6532_1: tasmā anusikkheti tisso sikkhā vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā maggapaṭipāṭiyā ca sikkheyya.
atk-s0508a2:6533_0: Buddhānubuddhotiādikā tisso gāthā āyasmato aññātakoṇḍaññattherassa thomanavasena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6533_2: Buddhā hi paṭhamaṃ cattāri saccāni bujjhiṃsu,
atk-s0508a2:6534_0: Tevijjo cetopariyakovidoti chasu abhiññāsu catasso vadati,
atk-s0508a2:6534_3: Yasmā theraṃ himavante chaddantadahato āgantvā bhagavati paramanipaccakāraṃ dassetvā,
atk-s0508a2:6534_4: vandantaṃ disvā pasannamānasena bhagavato sammukhā theraṃ abhitthavantena imā gāthā vuttā,
atk-s0508a2:6535_0: Nagassa passetiādikā tisso gāthā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ sabbeheva arahantehi bhagavati kāḷasilāyaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6535_1: viharante āyasmā mahāmoggallāno tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittaṃ samanvesanto arahattaphalavimuttiṃ passittha.
atk-s0508a2:6535_2: Taṃ disvā āyasmā vaṅgīso bhagavantaṃ there ca abhitthavanto abhāsi.
atk-s0508a2:6535_3: Tattha nagassa passeti isigilipabbatassa passe kāḷasilāyaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6536_1: Cittaṃ nesaṃ samanvesanti tesaṃ khīṇāsavabhikkhūnaṃ cittaṃ samanvesanto.
atk-s0508a2:6537_0: Evaṃ sabbaṅgasampannaṃ “muniṃ dukkhassa pāragu”nti vuttāya satthusampattiyā ceva “tevijjā maccuhāyino”ti
atk-s0508a2:6537_1: vuttāya sāvakasampattiyā cāti sabbehi aṅgehi sampannaṃ samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6537_2: Muninti hi iminā padena monasaṅkhātena ñāṇena satthu anavasesañeyyāvabodho vuttoti anāvaraṇañāṇena dasabalañāṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho kato hoti,
atk-s0508a2:6537_5: Tadubhayena ca satthu ānubhāvasampadādayo dassitā honti.
atk-s0508a2:6537_6: Tevijjā maccuhāyinoti iminā sāvakānaṃ ñāṇasampattidīpanena ca nibbānadhātuyā adhigamadīpanena ca padadvayena satthusāvakasampatti dassitā hoti.
atk-s0508a2:6537_7: Tathā hi yathāvuttamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “muniṃ dukkhassa pāraguṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6538_0: Cando yathāti gāthā bhagavantaṃ campānagare gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena anekehi
atk-s0508a2:6538_1: ca devanāgasahassehi parivutaṃ attano vaṇṇena ca yasasā ca virocamānaṃ disvā somanassajātena abhitthavantena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6538_2: Tattha cando yathā vigatavalāhake nabheti yathā saradasamaye apagatavalāhake valāhakasadisena aññena
atk-s0508a2:6538_3: ca mahikādinā upakkilesena vimutte ākāse puṇṇacando virocati,
atk-s0508a2:6538_4: vītamalova bhāṇumāti teneva valāhakādiupakkilesavigamena vigatamalo bhāṇumā sūriyo yathā virocati. Evampi, aṅgīrasa,
atk-s0508a2:6538_5: tvanti evaṃ aṅgehi niccharaṇajutīhi jutimanta tvampi mahāmuni bhagavā,
atk-s0508a2:6538_6: atirocasi attano yasasā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ atikkamitvā virocasīti.
atk-s0508a2:6539_0: Kāveyyamattātiādikā dasa gāthā arahattaṃ patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā satthu attano ca guṇe vibhāventena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6539_1: Tattha kāveyyamattāti kāveyyena kabbakaraṇena mattā mānitā sambhāvitā guṇodayaṃ āpannā.
atk-s0508a2:6540_0: Addhā no udapajjathāti ratanattayaṃ addhā amhākaṃ upakāratthāya uppajji.
atk-s0508a2:6541_1: Khandhe āyatanāni ca dhātuyo cāti pañcakkhandhe dvādasāyatanāni,
atk-s0508a2:6541_4: Sā visuddhimagge vitthāritā evāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0508a2:6541_5: Viditvānāti rūpādivibhāgādito aniccatādito ca pubbabhāgañāṇena jānitvā.
atk-s0508a2:6542_0: Ye te sāsanakārakāti ye te sattā tathāgatānaṃ sāsanakārakā,
atk-s0508a2:6542_1: tesaṃ bahūnaṃ atthāya vata uppajjanti tathāgatā.
atk-s0508a2:6543_1: ye bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ca sammattaniyāmaṃ addasaṃsu adhigacchiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:6543_2: Tesaṃ atthāya vata bodhiṃ sammāsambodhiṃ ajjhagamā,
atk-s0508a2:6544_0: Sudesitāti veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ saṅkhepato vitthārato ca suṭṭhu desitā.
atk-s0508a2:6544_6: sā sabbākārato visuddhimagge vitthāritāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0508a2:6544_7: Evamete tathāti ete dukkhādayo ariyasaccadhammā evaṃ dukkhādippakārena tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0508a2:6544_8: Vuttā diṭṭhā me te yathā tathāti yathā satthārā vuttā,
atk-s0508a2:6544_11: Sadattho me anuppatto arahattaṃ mayā sacchikataṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6544_12: Tato ca kataṃ buddhassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ ovādānusiṭṭhiyaṃ anupatiṭṭho.
atk-s0508a2:6545_0: Svāgataṃ vata me āsīti suāgamanaṃ vata me ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:6545_1: Mama buddhassa santiketi mama sambuddhassa bhagavato santike samīpe.
atk-s0508a2:6546_2: Iminā hi padena vuttamevatthaṃ vivarituṃ “sotadhātu visodhitā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6547_0: Pucchāmi satthārantiādikā dvādasa gāthā attano upajjhāyassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ pucchantena vuttā.
atk-s0508a2:6547_1: Āyasmato nigrodhakappattherassa hi parinibbānakāle āyasmā vaṅgīso asammukhā ahosi.
atk-s0508a2:6547_3: pubbavāsanāvasena hi tādisañca āyasmato pilindavacchassa vasalavādena samudācāro viya khīṇāsavānampi hotiyeva.
atk-s0508a2:6547_14: Vicikicchānanti saṃsayānaṃ evarūpānaṃ vā parivitakkānaṃ chettā.
atk-s0508a2:6548_0: Tayā katanti tādise chāyāsampanne nigrodharukkhamūle nisinnattā “nigrodhakappo”ti tayā kataṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6548_1: Iti so yathā attanā upalakkhitaṃ tathā vadati.
atk-s0508a2:6548_2: Bhagavā pana na nisinnattā eva taṃ tathā ālapati,
atk-s0508a2:6548_3: api ca kho tattha arahattaṃ pattattāpi.
atk-s0508a2:6550_9: Tuvaṃ no satthā tvamanuttarosīti thutivacanavasena vadati.
atk-s0508a2:6551_0: Chinda no vicikicchanti vicikicchāpaṭirūpakaṃ taṃ parivitakkaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0508a2:6551_6: Majjheva no bhāsā”ti parinibbutaṃ jānitvā mahāpañña bhagavā majjheva amhākaṃ sabbesaṃ bhāsa,
atk-s0508a2:6551_11: yathā sakko sahassanetto devānaṃ majjhe tehi sakkaccaṃ sampaṭicchitavacanaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0508a2:6551_12: evaṃ amhākaṃ majjhe amhehi sampaṭicchitavacanaṃ bhāsāti.
atk-s0508a2:6552_0: Ye kecīti imampi gāthaṃ bhagavantaṃ thunanto vattukāmataṃ janetuṃ bhaṇati.
atk-s0508a2:6552_3: tesaṃ appahāne sati mohavicikicchānaṃ pahānābhāvato mohamaggāti ca,
atk-s0508a2:6552_6: Sabbe te tathāgataṃ patvā tathāgatassa desanābalena viddhaṃsitā bhavanti, nassanti.
atk-s0508a2:6552_9: yasmā tathāgato sabbaganthavidhamanena paññācakkhujananato narānaṃ paramaṃ cakkhunti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0508a2:6553_0: No ce hi jātūti imampi gāthaṃ thunanto eva vattukāmataṃ janento bhaṇati.
atk-s0508a2:6553_5: yadi bhagavā puratthimādibhedo vāto viya abbhaghanaṃ desanāvegena kilese vihaneyya,
atk-s0508a2:6553_6: tato yathā abbhaghananivuto loko tamova hoti ekandhakāro,
atk-s0508a2:6553_7: evaṃ sabbopi loko aññāṇanivuto tamova siyā.
atk-s0508a2:6553_8: Ye cāpi ime idāni jotimanto khāyanti sāriputtādayo,
atk-s0508a2:6554_4: Taṃ tasmā ahaṃ taṃ vīra padhānavīriyasamannāgata bhagavā,
atk-s0508a2:6554_6: Mayampi vipassinaṃ sabbadhamme yathābhūtaṃ passantaṃ bhagavantaṃ jānantā eva upāgamimhā.
atk-s0508a2:6554_7: Tasmā “parisāsu no āvikarohi kappaṃ parinibbutova yathā nigrodhakappaṃ āvikarohi pakāsehī”ti.
atk-s0508a2:6555_2: bhagavā khippaṃ giraṃ eraya vaggu vagguṃ acirāyamāno vācaṃ bhāsa vaggu manoharaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6555_3: Haṃsova yathā suvaṇṇahaṃso gocaraṃ pariggaṇhanto jātassaravanasaṇḍaṃ disvā gīvaṃ paggayha pakkhe uddhunitvā
atk-s0508a2:6555_4: haṭṭhatuṭṭho saṇikaṃ ataramāno vagguṃ nikūjati giraṃ nicchāreti,
atk-s0508a2:6555_5: evamevaṃ tvaṃ saṇikaṃ nikūja iminā mahāpurisalakkhaṇaññatarena bindussarena suṭṭhu vikappitena abhisaṅkhatena,
atk-s0508a2:6555_6: ete mayaṃ sabbe ujugatā avikkhittamānasā hutvā tava nikūjaṃ suṇomāti.
atk-s0508a2:6556_4: sotāpannādayo viya kiñci asesetvā pahīnajātimaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0508a2:6556_8: Na kāmakāro hohi puthujjanānanti puthujjanasekkhādīnaṃ tividhānaṃ janānaṃ kāmakāro natthi,
atk-s0508a2:6556_9: te yaṃ icchanti ñātuṃ vā vattuṃ vā,
atk-s0508a2:6556_11: Saṅkheyyakāro ca tathāgatānanti tathāgatānaṃ pana vīmaṃsakāro paññāpubbaṅgamakiriyā,
atk-s0508a2:6556_12: te yaṃ icchanti ñātuṃ vā vattuṃ vā,
atk-s0508a2:6557_2: tathā hi tava bhagavā idaṃ samujjupaññassa sabbattha appaṭihatabhāvena ujugatapaññassa sammadeva vuttaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6557_4: suppabuddho sakko sattame divase pathaviṃ pavisissatī”ti evamādiṃ samuggahitaṃ sammadeva uggahitaṃ aviparītaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6557_6: Ayamañjali pacchimo suppaṇāmitoti ayaṃ aparopi añjali suṭṭhutaraṃ paṇāmito.
atk-s0508a2:6557_7: Mā mohayī jānanti mā no avacanena mohayi,
atk-s0508a2:6558_0: Paroparanti imaṃ pana gāthaṃ aparenapi pariyāyena amohanameva yācanto āha.
atk-s0508a2:6558_1: Tattha paroparanti lokuttaralokiyavasena sundarāsundaraṃ dūre santike vā.
atk-s0508a2:6558_5: Vācābhikaṅkhāmīti yathā ghammani ghammakāle uṇhābhitatto puriso kilanto tasito vāriṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6558_7: Sutaṃ pavassāti sutasaṅkhātaṃ saddāyatanaṃ pavassa pagghara muñca pavatta.
atk-s0508a2:6559_3: Yathā vimuttoti “kiṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā yathā asekkho,
atk-s0508a2:6559_4: udāhu saupādisesāya yathā sekkho”ti vā pucchati.
atk-s0508a2:6560_0: Evaṃ dvādasahi gāthāhi yācito bhagavā taṃ viyākaronto “acchecchī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a2:6560_1: Tattha acchecchi taṇhaṃ idha nāmarūpe (iti bhagavā) kaṇhassa sotaṃ dīgharattānusayitanti imasmiṃ nāmarūpe
atk-s0508a2:6560_2: kāmataṇhādibhedā taṇhā dīgharattaṃ appahīnaṭṭhena anusayitā kaṇhanāmakassa mārassa sotantipi vuccati.
atk-s0508a2:6560_3: Taṃ kaṇhassa sotamutaṃ dīgharattānusayitaṃ idha nāmarūpe taṇhaṃ kappāyano chindi.
atk-s0508a2:6560_4: Iti bhagavāti idaṃ pana saṅgītikārānaṃ vacanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6560_5: Atāri jātiṃ maraṇaṃ asesanti so taṃ taṇhaṃ chetvā asesaṃ jātimaraṇaṃ atari anupādisesāya parinibbāyīti dasseti,
atk-s0508a2:6560_6: iccabravi bhagavā pañcaseṭṭhoti āyasmatā vaṅgīsena puṭṭho bhagavā evaṃ avoca pañcahi saddhādīhi indriyehi anaññasādhāraṇehi cakkhūhi vā seṭṭho.
atk-s0508a2:6560_7: Atha vā pañcaseṭṭhoti pañcahi sīlādīhi dhammakkhandhehi,
atk-s0508a2:6560_8: pañcahi vā hetusampadādīhi seṭṭho uttamo pavaroti saṅgītikārānamevidampi vacanaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6561_0: Evaṃ vutte bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandamānaso āyasmā vaṅgīso “esa sutvā”tiādikā gāthāyo āha.
atk-s0508a2:6561_1: Tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṃ na maṃ vañcesīti yasmā parinibbuto,
atk-s0508a2:6561_2: tasmā tassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ icchantaṃ maṃ na vañcesi,
atk-s0508a2:6562_1: tasmā taṃ sandhāyāha “yathā vādī tathā kārī,
atk-s0508a2:6562_3: Maccuno jālaṃ tata”nti tebhūmakavaṭṭe vitthataṃ mārassa taṇhājālaṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6562_6: tesaṃ yo anekāhi māyāhi anekakkhattuṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0508a2:6563_3: Tassa upādānassa ādiṃ avijjātaṇhādibhedaṃ kāraṇaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā addasa.
atk-s0508a2:6563_4: Kappo kappiyoti evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati bhagavāti adhippāyena vadati.
atk-s0508a2:6563_7: tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ suduttaraṃ accagā vatāti vedajāto vadati.
atk-s0508a2:6564_0: Idāni satthari attano upajjhāye ca pasannamānaso pasannākāraṃ vibhāvento “taṃ devadeva”nti osānagāthamāha.
atk-s0508a2:6564_3: visuddhidevoti tesaṃ sabbesampi devānaṃ uttamadevatāya devadevaṃ dvipaduttama bhagavā taṃ vandāmi.
atk-s0508a2:6564_5: atha kho tava saccābhisambodhiyā anudhammajātattā anujātaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6564_7: āguakaraṇādiatthena nāgaṃ tava ure vāyāmajanitajātitāya orasaṃ puttaṃ nigrodhakappañca vandāmi.
atk-s0508a2:6565_0: Evamete subhūtiādayo vaṅgīsapariyosānā dvisataṃ catusaṭṭhi ca mahātherā idha pāḷiyaṃ ārūḷhā,
atk-s0508a2:6565_1: te sabbe yathā sammāsambuddhassa sāvakabhāvena ekavidhā.
atk-s0508a2:6566_4: tassa sahāyabhūtā vimalo subāhu puṇṇaji gavampatīti cattāro,
atk-s0508a2:6566_10: coro aṅgulimālattheroti sabbe sahassaṃ paññāsādhikāni tīṇi satāni ca honti.
atk-s0508a2:6569_9: Evaṃ vuttato aññe na ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadā,
atk-s0508a2:6569_15: tesaṃ bhagavā pabbajjaṃ viya tīhi saraṇagamaneheva upasampadampi anuññāsi,
atk-s0508a2:6570_9: sabbaṃ taṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karitvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇissāmī’ti,
atk-s0508a2:6570_14: ‘sātasahagatā ca me kāyagatā sati na vijahissatī’ti,
atk-s0508a2:6571_2: Yā pubbārāme caṅkamantena bhagavatā “uddhumātakasaññāti vā sopāka ‘rūpasaññā’ti vā ime dhammā nānatthā nānābyañjanā,
atk-s0508a2:6571_3: udāhu ekatthā byañjanameva nāna”ntiādinā asubhanissitesu pañhesu pucchitesu bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamantena
atk-s0508a2:6571_4: sattavassikena sopākasāmaṇerena “uddhumātakasaññāti vā bhagavā ‘rūpasaññā’ti vā ime dhammā ekatthā,
atk-s0508a2:6571_5: byañjanameva nāna”ntiādinā vissajjitesu “iminā sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā ime pañhā byākatā”ti āraddhacittena bhagavatā anuññātaupasampadā.
atk-s0508a2:6572_3: Ye hi satthu dharamānakāle ariyāya jātiyā jātā,
atk-s0508a2:6572_5: Ye pana bhagavato parinibbānato pacchā adhigatavisesā,
atk-s0508a2:6572_6: te satipi satthu dhammasarīrassa paccakkhabhāve satthu sarīrassa apaccakkhabhāvato parammukhasāvakā nāma.
atk-s0508a2:6573_1: idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatā pana ubhatobhāgavimuttā evāti veditabbā.
atk-s0508a2:6575_1: yesañhi purimesu sammāsambuddhesu paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakesupi puññakiriyāvasena pavattitaṃ sāvakapāramitāsaṅkhātaṃ atthi apadānaṃ,
atk-s0508a2:6576_0: Kiṃ pana sabbena sabbaṃ pubbahetusampattiyā vinā saccābhisambodho sambhavatīti?
atk-s0508a2:6576_6: katamaṃ nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā”tiādi.
atk-s0508a2:6576_15: Tathā hi ime sattā buddhuppādesu acchariyācinteyyaguṇavibhūtivitthataṃ buddhānaṃ ānubhāvaṃ passantā catuppamāṇikassa
atk-s0508a2:6576_16: lokassa sabbathāpi pasādāvahattā satthari saddhaṃ paṭilabhanti.
atk-s0508a2:6576_20: tesaṃ santike ovādānusāsanapaṭilābhena ca saddhamme saddhaṃ paṭilabhanti,
atk-s0508a2:6576_21: te tattha paṭiladdhasaddhā yadipi saṃsāre nibbāne ca ādīnavānisaṃse passanti,
atk-s0508a2:6576_22: mahārajakkhatāya pana yogakkhemaṃ anabhisambhunantā antarantarā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalabījaṃ attano
atk-s0508a2:6583_0: Evaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ uddissa uppāditakusalacittaṃ satasahassādhikacatuasaṅkhyeyyakālantare vimokkhādhigamassa upanissayo na hotīti na sakkā vattuṃ.
atk-s0508a2:6584_3: Tesu āyasmā aññāsikoṇḍañño, vappo, bhaddiyo, mahānāmo, assaji, nālako, yaso, vimalo, subāhu, puṇṇaji,
atk-s0508a2:6584_16: kaṅkhārevato, ānando, nandako, bhagu, nando, kimilo, bhaddiyo, rāhulo, sīvali, upāli, dabbo, upaseno,
atk-s0508a2:6584_26: raṭṭhapālo, vaṅgīso, sabhiyo, selo, upavāno, meghiyo, sāgato, nāgito,
atk-s0508a2:6584_33: tissametteyyo, puṇṇako, mettagū, dhotako, upasivo, nando, hemako, todeyyo, kappo,
atk-s0508a2:6585_0: Kasmā pana te eva therā “mahāsāvakā”ti vuccantīti?
atk-s0508a2:6585_2: Tathā hi dve aggasāvakāpi mahāsāvakesu antogadhā.
atk-s0508a2:6585_3: Te hi sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakappattiyā sāvakesu aggadhammādhigamena aggaṭṭhāne ṭhitāpi abhinīhāramahantatāsāmaññena “mahāsāvakā”tipi vuccanti.
atk-s0508a2:6585_5: Tathā hi te padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle katapaṇidhānā.
atk-s0508a2:6585_6: Tato eva sātisayaṃ abhiññāsamāpattīsu vasino pabhinnapaṭisambhidā ca.
atk-s0508a2:6585_7: Kāmaṃ sabbepi arahanto sīlavisuddhiādike sampādetvā catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu patiṭṭhitacittā satta bojjhaṅge
atk-s0508a2:6585_8: yathābhūtaṃ bhāvetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā anavasesato kilese khepetvā aggaphale patiṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0508a2:6585_10: paññāvimuttato ca ubhatobhāgavimuttassa pubbabhāgabhāvanāviseso addhā icchito viseso,
atk-s0508a2:6585_11: evaṃ abhinīhāramahantatāpubbayogamahantatāhi attasantāne sātisayaguṇavisesassa nipphāditattā sīlādiguṇehi mahantā sāvakāti mahāsāvakā.
atk-s0508a2:6585_12: Tesuyeva pana ye bodhipakkhiyadhammesu pāmokkhabhāvena dhurabhūtānaṃ sammādiṭṭhisammāsamādhīnaṃ sātisayakiccantarabhāvanipphattiyā
atk-s0508a2:6585_13: kāraṇabhūtāya tajjābhinīhārābhinihatāya sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ cirakālaṃ samāhitāya sammāpaṭipattiyā yathākkamaṃ
atk-s0508a2:6585_14: paññāya samādhismiñca ukkaṃsapāramippattiyā savisesaṃ sabbaguṇehi aggabhāve ṭhitā.
atk-s0508a2:6585_15: Te sāriputtamoggallānā satipi mahāsāvakatte sāvakapāramiyā matthake sabbasāvakānaṃ aggabhāve ṭhitattā abhinīhāramahantabhāvato,
atk-s0508a2:6585_17: Ye pana ariyasāvakā aggasāvakā viya ca mahāsāvakā viya ca na parimitāva,
atk-s0508a2:6585_20: Idha pāḷiyaṃ ārūḷhā pana parimitāva gāthāvasena pariggahitattā.
atk-s0508a2:6585_21: Tathāpi mahāsāvakesupi keci idha pāḷiyaṃ nārūḷhā.
atk-s0508a2:6586_2: Tayo hi ime vimokkhā suññato vimokkho,
atk-s0508a2:6586_5: Te ca vimokkhā suññatādīhi aniccānupassanādīhi tīhi anupassanāhi adhigantabbā.
atk-s0508a2:6586_6: Ādito hi aniccādīsu yena kenaci ākārena vipassanābhiniveso hoti.
atk-s0508a2:6586_7: Yadā pana vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya aniccākārato saṅkhāre sammasantiyā maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0508a2:6586_8: tadā vipassanā satipi rāganimittādīnaṃ samugghāṭane saṅkhāranimittaṃ pana sā na vissajjetīti nippariyāyena
atk-s0508a2:6586_9: animittanāmaṃ alabhamānā attano maggassa animittanāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkotīti.
atk-s0508a2:6589_0: Ādinā hi vipassanāya animittavimokkhabhāvo anuttarassa animittavimokkhabhāvo ca vutto.
atk-s0508a2:6589_1: Yadā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya dukkhato saṅkhāre sammasantiyā maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0508a2:6589_2: tadā vipassanā rāgapaṇidhiādīnaṃ samugghāṭanena appaṇihitanāmaṃ labhatīti appaṇihitavimokkhaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0508a2:6589_4: Yadā pana vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya anattākārena sammasantiyā maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0508a2:6589_5: tadā vipassanā attadiṭṭhiyā samugghāṭanena suññatanāmaṃ labhatīti suññatavimokkhaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0508a2:6589_6: Tadanantaro ca maggo suññatavimokkho nāma hoti.
atk-s0508a2:6589_7: Imesu aggamaggabhūtesu tīsu vimokkhesu imesaṃ therānaṃ keci animittavimokkhena muttā,
atk-s0508a2:6590_6: Tattha rūpamukhādīsu vipassanābhinivesesu yo rūpamukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisitvā cattāri mahābhūtāni
atk-s0508a2:6590_8: rūpārūpaṃ pana pariggaṇhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariggahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0508a2:6590_10: pariggahitarūpārūpassa pana vipassanāparivāse maggapātubhāvadandhatāya dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-s0508a2:6590_11: Yopi rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapento dukkhena kasirena kilamanto vavatthapeti,
atk-s0508a2:6590_12: vavatthapite ca nāmarūpe vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0508a2:6590_14: Aparo nāmarūpampi vavatthapetvā paccaye pariggaṇhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariggaṇhāti.
atk-s0508a2:6590_15: Paccaye ca pariggahetvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0508a2:6590_17: Aparo paccayepi pariggahetvā lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0508a2:6590_18: paṭividdhalakkhaṇo ca vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0508a2:6590_20: Aparo lakkhaṇānipi paṭivijjhitvā vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne vahante uppannavipassanānikantiṃ pariyādiyamāno
atk-s0508a2:6590_22: nikantiñca pariyādiyitvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0508a2:6590_24: Yathāvuttāsuyeva paṭipadāsu maggapātubhāvassa khippatāya dukkhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā,
atk-s0508a2:6590_25: tāsaṃ pana paṭipadānaṃ akicchasiddhiyaṃ maggapātubhāvassa dandhatāya khippatāya ca yathākkamaṃ sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā,
atk-s0508a2:6590_27: Imāsaṃ catassannaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena aggamaggappattiyā therānaṃ catubbidhatā veditabbā.
atk-s0508a2:6590_28: Na hi paṭipadāhi vinā ariyamaggādhigamo atthi.
atk-s0508a2:6590_29: Tathā hi abhidhamme “yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ…pe…
atk-s0508a2:6590_30: dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiñña”ntiādinā paṭipadāya saddhiṃyeva ariyamaggo vibhatto,
atk-s0508a2:6591_1: Satipi nesaṃ saccābhisambodhasāmaññe ekacce therā saddhuttarā,
atk-s0508a2:6591_11: Tathā hi so gatimantatāya atthakosallādivantatāya ca pasaṃsito,
atk-s0508a2:6591_13: Aggamaggakkhaṇe pana sesānampi indriyānaṃ ekasabhāvā icchitāti.
atk-s0508a2:6592_7: ekacce atthapaṭisambhidā dhammapaṭisambhidā niruttipaṭisambhidā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti imāsaṃ catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ vasena paṭisambhidāppattā;
atk-s0508a2:6592_9: ekacce pubbenivāsañāṇādīnaṃ tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ vasena tevijjā.
atk-s0508a2:6592_10: Ye pana khaṇikasamādhimatte ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā adhigataaggamaggā,
atk-s0508a2:6592_11: te ādito antarantarā ca samādhijena jhānaṅgena vipassanābbhantaraṃ paṭisandhānānaṃ abhāvā sukkhā vipassanā etesanti sukkhavipassakā nāma.
atk-s0508a2:6592_12: Ayañca vibhāgo sāvakānaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ upaparikkhitvā vutto.
atk-s0508a2:6597_4: Catūsu hi arūpasamāpattīsu ekamekaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ pattā cattāro,
atk-s0508a2:6597_5: nirodhato vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ patto cāti pañca,
atk-s0508a2:6597_7: saddhādhurapaññādhuravasena dve paññāvimuttāti evaṃ vimuttibhedena sattavidhā.
atk-s0508a2:6599_3: paññāvimuttiyaṃ cetovimuttiyañca pāramippattā dve aggasāvakā cāti evaṃ navavidhā.
atk-s0508a2:6600_1: Catūsu arūpāvacarajjhānesu ca ekamekaṃ pādakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pattā cattāro,
atk-s0508a2:6600_3: yathāvuttā ca ubhatobhāgavimuttā cāti evaṃ vimuttibhedeneva dasavidhā.
atk-s0508a2:6600_4: Te yathāvuttena dhurabhedena bhijjamānā vīsati honti.
atk-s0508a2:6600_6: Puna paṭipadābhedena dhurabhedena ca bhijjamānā asīti honti.
atk-s0508a2:6600_7: Atha te suññatavimuttādivibhāgena bhijjamānā cattālīsādhikā dve satāni honti.
atk-s0508a2:6600_8: Puna indriyādhikabhāvena bhijjamānā dvisatuttaraṃ sahassaṃ hontīti.
atk-s0508a2:6600_9: Evaṃ attano guṇavasena anekabhedavibhattesu maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhesu ariyasāvakesu ye attano paṭipattipavattiādike ca vibhāventi.
atk-s0508a2:6600_10: Ye “channā me kuṭikā”tiādikā gāthā udānādivasena abhāsiṃsu.
atk-s0508a2:6600_11: Te ca idha gāthāmukhena saṅgahaṃ ārūḷhā. Tenāha –
